title: Empire State Studio
all_reviews: ['Jason was very attentive and the apartment is very well located. Thank you very much!', 'Loved this place!! Very cozy and private studio, great for one or two people. Location was prime; about a 6-7 minute walk from the Empire State Building and centrally located in lower Manhattan. The photos actually don‚Äôt do this apartment justice as it was much larger than we thought, especially the living room area and dining table.\nJason made check-in easy with communication and follow up with any questions, and he made sure we had everything we needed. Would stay here again on our next visit!', 'Jason‚Äôs place was perfect for me. Homey, quiet, thoughtful in its amenities, and comfy. Jason was very responsive. The neighborhood has everything one needs and is close to public transportation. A super NY studio‚ù£Ô∏è', "Jason's place was great- it was exactly as advertised. There is low water pressure and the water takes a while to warm up but that is not Jason's issue. The place was clean and check in went very smooth! Thanks!", "Jason's place is just right, perfect for a few days in New York. Not ideal if you want to cook. Go enjoy New York restaurants instead.", 'Jason is a friendly host. I was impressed by the way he answered me right away when I needed it late at night. The cleanliness was perfect.\nThe location of the accommodation was so nice. The house is old, but it was a good house given that it is New York.']

title: Room In Hell‚Äôs Kitchen Heart
all_reviews: ['nice place close to everything, very good interaction with the owner', 'A great experience. Monica was friendly and helpful, and the place was pristine. Super close to bus stops and easy to get around. The outdoor space is amazing and has direct access from the room. I was also really impressed with the size and comfort of the bathroom. Overall, a very thoughtful host and a room (and apartment) with everything you might need.', "Monica's place is very nice located next to some main attractions and close to the bus and subway stations. This made it easy to go around even on foot to Times square. There are lots of restaurants and caf√©s near as well. Monica is very friendly and responsive when I had any question. I would definitely come back to stay at her place!", 'The place is a great location for Midtown activities. It was quiet in this back bedroom despite the hustle and bustle of the neighborhood. The outdoor porch was a nice place to take a breath after a busy day. The space was super clean and sharing the bathroom was never a problem.', "Not only does Monica have a nice refuge from the bustle of Hell's Kitchen (the quiet, private courtyard on to which my room opened is a rare feature in Manhattan), but she was also responsive in the extreme. Thank you for hosting an easy, comfortable stay!", 'monica was very attentive and plays her role as a great host.\nthe location is ideal because very close to the services and essential sites to visit.\nexcellent value for money.']

title: S/Rm Br/st PSlope great for Med/Stu
all_reviews:
['I had a great stay with Kathleen. She was very kind and caring. The location is great, very easy to find and close to a subway making getting in and out of Manhattan very easy. The area has everything you need, restaurants, stores etc. I personally never saw any other guests so you certainly have your own space. I found my stay to be quiet and peaceful. I highly recommend Kathleen', "The room is small but clean and perfect. I stayed there for 1 week and it was ok.
The street is quiet but very close to restaurants and caf√©s. The metro with several lines to go to Manhattan is close too.
And the area is safe.
Kathleen is discreet and friendly.
It's a great option for New York.", 'Kathleen‚Äôs house was exactly what promised. It was clean and quiet. It almost felt like I had my private bathroom because I never had to wait if I needed to use it.
Kathleen was also very sweet and helpful host, I felt very welcomed and the place felt like home. There are also many restaurants and other services close by and subway is close too. Would definitely stay here again!', 'We stayed 8 nights and had a great time. The room itself is not spacious (it‚Äôs New York and a very good neighborhood) but there is enough room for two persons, luggage and more. The room included a small refrigerator and a microwave. The neighborhood is quiet with a few restaurants nearby and close to the subway lines 2 and 3 (it‚Äôs a two minute walk), which take you in 10 minutes to Manhattan.
Kathleen was very friendly from check-in to check-out. We felt welcomed and home. The interior of the building looks just so comfy.', 'Nice host, convenient area. Great for medical students rotating in NYC', 'It was great staying with Kathleen. She is a really nice person. The location is really convenient!']

title: Unique & Elegant en-suite Bedroom/Private Bathroom
all_reviews:
["We had a great stay at Juliana & Salvador's! We would book the room againüòç.", 'Our time at Juliana‚Äôs and Salvador‚Äôs place was absolutely amazing. Thank you Salvador!', 'Salvador‚Äôs place is a very good place to stay in NYC and visit the eastern neighborhoods. He is very available and respects intimacy. We will return to his house with pleasure.', 'All as described, Salvador and Juliana have a very nice house and give good tips for the area. Great communication and a great room.

Juliana and Salvador are very sweet, they don‚Äôt hesitate to go the extra mile.
They‚Äôre always looking for opportunities to help you.
Would absolutely recommend to everybody! 10/10', 'I loved my stay here! Hosts were extremely attentive and kind as well as, flexible with our accommodation. I love Brooklyn and this home allowed me to explore it more!', 'Salvador‚Äôs place was great and in the perfect location for us as it was only a 14 minute walk to my friends who we were visiting and there were a lot of cute places to check out around the location. The apartment was in line with the photos. Clean , quite and comfy. Ideal for recovering after long days of walking in New York City.
We felt safe and at home!
A place that I recommend without hesitating

Sal and Julianna even gave us great directions to reach the subway. Every time we saw them they greeted us with a smile. We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend this spot to anyone. We can‚Äôt wait to come back to visit and stay with them.', 'Thank you for a wonderful stay! I would definitely stay here again when I‚Äôm back in the city!', 'Salvador and his wife were great hosts, very friendly and eager to help and communicative. The place was very affordable with options for transportation and not so far from the LGA airport. The neighborhood quiet, so we could sleep without issues. Would definitely recommend and consider booking again when back in NY.', "Our stay at Salvador and Juliana's went very well as they were welcoming and available to us at any time as soon as we arrived.
The neighborhood in the middle of summer was lively and pleasant to visit. The subway not far away was very convenient.
We recommend Salvador and Juliana's place for their hospitality and very comfortable and impeccable!", 'My stay was great! The accommodation is easily accessible and has a self-contained entrance.
The room was clean, as pictured. The sheets were super soft, and the bed very comfortable.
The house is 10 minutes walk from the metro line G. There is quite a bit of very nice coffee around. I felt safe in the area.
Salvador has always been very responsive.
I would definitely recommend this place and would definitely stay again!
Thank you again!', 'Juliana and Salvador have managed to create a very nice place. It is clean,and everything is available for a good stay.
Communication is very good and they are very helpful.', 'The apartment is really beautiful and cozy. What we liked in particular was the comfortable bed in which we could sleep perfectly after a long day full of sightseeing. As well as that I would like to point out that the neighbourhood is fabulous and a very interesting place to be. When spending time in BedStuy you get an authentic impression of the New Yorkers live. We would really like to come back to see even more of Brooklyn and can only thank Salvador and Juliana for their hospitality.', 'Great neighbourhood, clean room and bathroom, and great hosts!', 'Genuinely Good Host. Beautiful, clean and spacious room.', 'very comfortable. netflix available. satisfied.', 'I would definitely recommend Salvador and Juliana‚Äôs place. It‚Äôs exactly as they have described, very clean and comfortable. The room is very big for NYC with 2 closet spaces and a private bathroom. The area has a bunch of cool spots for coffee, pizza and some bars. They have some recommendations listed in the room as well. It was less than 10 minute walk to the nearest subway , it was a nice walk through the park. Super easy to get to Williamsburg or Manhattan.
Salvador and Juliana were very kind to accept my booking last minute and were always easily contactable if I needed anything. They went out of their way to check if everything was smooth with check in and if I needed any help with anything. Great hosts!
I‚Äôll definitely book again if I‚Äôm back in NYC.', 'Salvador was a great host and was very responsive. He gave me super clear instructions and the space was great. I actually got injured on my trip and he offered to help me out and I really appreciate it . Definitely great location', 'Salvador and Juliana are very nice and helpful hosts. The home is lovely in a genuine, peaceful area with several shops and restaurants as well as good transport into Manhattan.', "I loved the room with tasteful details, the privacy of the en-suite bathroom, and the kitchen items go a long way. I didn't like the area at all, according to them the police are safe nearby but when walking it doesn't seem like it, a single woman I don't recommend it, much less at night so I got quite lost in enjoying the New York night. I also spent it traveling, it seems close but does not perform. For the price it should be better located.
Hosts responded hard and limited to neighborhood or tourist inquiries in general, not much empathy. They especially ask for silence from 9 pm to 9 am and with the little separation or overwhelming of their apartment they were the ones who were late and very early mornings interrupted my sleep for example at 6 am. Very understandable to have a small child who cries and screams for hours but something they should do about it, in good luck I say. And I asked to stay until later and not for a minute to leave the suitcases. Poor price-consumption I wouldn't be back", 'Salvador and his wife are amazing hosts!
We had an amazing time!', 'My mother stayed at Salvador and Juliana's place (I live a few apartments down, so it was very convenient), and she absolutely LOVED it. She left a letter on the desk and took a photo of it, so in her own words:
"Thank you very, very much!
This is the most beautiful stay that I have had in NYC. I loved facing North - seeing the daily traffic and Brooklyn city life.
You have done a beautiful job keeping the character of this house while modernizing the restroom/shower.
The decor is spot-on! (At least for me!).
I loved having the electric tea pot which I used for making both hot tea and pressed coffee.
I loved staying here and hope to be able to do so again in the future.
It is quiet and peaceful - and perfect!
I used the desk for writing and studying.
Thank you!
Leslie from Dallas, TX‚Äù
Can't express how much it meant to me that my mom had such a wonderful trip up here. Thank you for hosting Salvador and Juliana!', 'The space is completely separated from the residence. Everything was orderly and clean.', 'We were very pleased with the place and would book it again and again! Someone was always available via chat, super nice communication and uncomplicated check-in and check-out. We would recommend it to anyone.', 'This was a fantastic stay. The room is very spacious and spotless clean. The hosts are extremely helpful and were very accommodating when we had flight schedule changes. The location is quiet and a short walk to citibikes, subway and restaurants.', "We loved our stay at Salvador's and we thank him again for his hospitality and the quality of his property.
We will come back!", "We enjoyed our stay at Salvador and Juliana's place in Brooklyn. It was very convenient to our daughter's apartment a few blocks away, was walkable, and offered easy access to bus and subway services. We were comfortable in the neighborhood, even when we got back late at night.
There is a park at the end of the block and restaurants and bodegas close by. We even used a laundromat nearby.
The bedroom and bath are bright and clean. The bed is the most comfortable one I've ever had at any Airbnb or other home away from home. We slept great, which is unusual when we travel and needed after days where we walked 10 miles. I was so happy they did not have feather pillows as I hate those!
The window A/C worked great, and the light-blocking shades and large-screen TV were nice as well. Good closet space, and a nice large shower. There a kitchenette outside the room with a mini-fridge and coffee set-up that was handy.
We would be happy to stay with them in the future!", 'Great place, recommend.', 'Very nice room with all amenities. It is very close to the subway (5-10 mins walk) and well connected with Manhattan. It‚Äôs a great place where to stay if you are planning to spend some days of holiday in New York City. Salvador and Juliana are two exquisite hosts.', 'Salvador and Juliana were great hosts! We had a mix up with our booking and they helped us out so much - they were super responsive throughout the booking and stay! The place was very clean and really nice to have AC in the July heat :). It‚Äôs about 45 mins subway from times sq/manhattan so it was tough planning to break in between the day but if you‚Äôre just planning long days out in the city and returning once not bad at all. The neighborhood itself is also very cute :) my friend and I felt super safe walking 10mins from the metro station back to the place even at 2-3am! Hiiiighly recommend this place. Everything you could want for an amazing stay :)', 'Salvador and his partner are great hosts!
Conciliating and accessible you will not regret choosing their accommodation. In addition to a beautifully decorated and very clean room, the accommodation is located a short walk from the metro!', 'We enjoyed our stay at Salvador‚Äôs & Juliana‚Äôs residence. They were attentive throughout our stay. Gave us detailed information, friendly & understanding of our late check in. Both bathroom & bedroom very clean. The room was cozy & spacious. Also the neighbor was good, many local restaurants & coffee shops to walk to.
We had a great stay !
Obrigado üòä', 'My fianc√©e and I had such a great stay! Salvador was friendly & communicative and the space was great. The bed was extremely comfortable, bathroom was very clean, and the location is perfect. You are a short walk to the subway, a beautiful park, and a number of food and coffee shops. I really appreciated how Salvador checked in with us during our stay to make sure we had everything we needed and even went as far as accommodating a later check out for us. Overall, I would absolutely stay here again the next time i‚Äôm in Bed Stuy!', 'Beautiful and perfect space in Bed-Stuy close to a fun park, local shops, great restaurants. This Airbnb is on a cute and quiet brownstone lined street and we loved our stay! The hosts Salvador and Juliana were very kind and responsive and we will certainly stay again for our next trips to NYC. I highly recommend their space!', "Its been a pleasure staying in this apartment for 6 nights.
It looks exactly like on the pictures. I really enjoyed the neighbourhood and especially Herbert von King Park.
The next subway station is a 5min walk away and you'll find endless possibilities for eating and drinking in walking distance.", 'Easily accessible and nice location in Bedford. Everything you might need is available! Friendly hosts who respond quickly. Recommended!', 'Salvador is a kind and accommodating host. We felt like he went out of the way to make our stay easeful, even providing us a place to stash our bags when we arrived before checkin and then moving them into the room when it was ready! Incredibly communicative and proactive. The room and bathroom were clean and comfortable ‚Äî a perfect home base for a short trip running around NYC!', 'Very comfortable room. The description is very accurate. Salvador is a very attentive host and always responsive to our requests, very good tips for restaurants nearby, I highly recommend it!', 'Our stay at the Juliana and Salvador Residence was wonderful!!! Thank you Julianna and Salvador and we will definitely be back !!!', 'Great stay, great host. Would stay here again. Really enjoyed our stay.', 'Such a great stay for my husband and I, beautifully spacious and very comfortable. Short walk to the subway.', 'I had a great time. title: Blush Freesia | Private Room in Manhattan
all_reviews:
["In the middle of the Lower Eastside, on the outskirts of Chinatown, the apartment is right on Seward Park - great location =)
Amazing apartment, great location, clean bathroom, easy check in and out - I'd love to come back", 'Great flat and location', 'Jack's place was great! He was proactive and responsive, we never had any issues! Space was "shared" but we never saw or heard the other visitor so it felt very private. Location is walkable with good food in the area. Super quick walk to Chinatown and Little Italy and nearby subway access for other destinations. The room was smaller than expected but didn't pose any issues. Space would benefit from a deeper clean but overall was maintained and could see a general cleaning service was done. Thank you Jack for the stay!', 'Absolutely amazing location‚Äîwalking distance to anything you could need. Lots of great food and shopping options steps away.
Communication with jack was solid‚Äîvery thorough and clear directions, very fast responses. All in all, it was a great spot to stay in NY.
There were a few hiccups that bring the rating down to 4/5:
1) in general, the place feels dingier than the photos reflect
2) i didn‚Äôt realize the other room would be occupied by another air bnb guest
3) the cleaning person came earlier than checkout, making packing up a bit more challenging.
It‚Äôs rare for me to rate less than 5/5. But I give it 4/5 because, while i would stay here again, i would do so with lower expectations.', 'Good view of the park, the street nearby is hoppin. Didn‚Äôt expect the blatta, but that‚Äôs a New York thing I guess. I was fortunate with the neighbor, as all the shared spaces were chill.', 'Very nice place overall']

title: Trendy Apt in Prime Chelsea on a Tree-lined Street
all_reviews:
["Alex exceeded my expectations as a host. We left my child's video game console behind and he mailed it to us right away. Also, the place is great.", 'The host was very friendly and responsive. Allowed for flexible early arrival and late departure! Gave great recommendations and had everything as described.', 'Alex‚Äôs spot was great! Excellent communication and super accommodating. Will be staying again in the future when returning to the area!', 'We loved this apartment! Super clean, cozy, fabulous decor, and very thoughtful layout for the size of the space, it was exactly what we had hoped it would be‚Ä¶perfect for two.
The location was in terms of proximity to the Meatpacking District, Greenwich, Hudson Yards, NoMad, Times Square were all very walkable.
The host was also wonderful. Effective and helpful communication; everything from local recommendations to arrival/departure instructions, they were accessible for one-off questions we had.
We loved this place and would absolutely recommend it for a visit to NYC!', 'This place is absolutely precious chic and perfect for anyone coming to stay in NYC. Excellent host who makes you feel like you have your own concierge the whole trip, and the apartment made me want to move in and live in NYC for good. Had everything you‚Äôd need - even shampoo / conditioner, tea coffee etc. bed is super comfy and the decor just makes you feel like you‚Äôre in a sanctuary space. I‚Äôll definitely be staying here again.', 'Wonderful stay. Alex was vey understanding and easy to communicate with. I had a good time from the moment I got there. The hosts responded to any questions we had very quickly and even brought over a hairdryer when we couldn‚Äôt find one. The apartment was super clean and comfortable. The location is an easy walk from local things and the subway which was such a plus. Would love to stay here again and the amazing hosts made it even better!', 'This is the perfect studio for a couple to feel at home in Chelsea and live the vibes of this lovely neighborhood. The apartment was beautifully decorated and had everything you needed. Alex was a great host!', 'Such a beautiful apartment, ideal to get into the city and an absolute wonderful host that made every part of the stay special with details that made me feel right at home!', "This place is a gem tucked away on a lovely tree-lined street in Chelsea. The building did not have an elevator, but two flights of stairs were manageable. Two sets of locked doors allow entry into the secure apartment building. The apartment interior is beautifully decorated in a contemporary style with thoughtful touches. A wall of windows with two sets of shades created a comfortable environment in the daytime and in the evening. Multiple vases were filled with fresh unique flowers and plants. A Nespresso machine with coffee pods and multiple tea bags are provided to guests. The bed and bedding are comfortable. The internet signal is strong and consistent. The bathroom is extremely small but had a medicine cabinet with multiple shelves to accommodate one's personal items. The closet contained a tall dresser and multiple hangers. Alex was quick to respond to any questions/issues and reached out during my stay to ensure that everything was going smoothly. Highly recommend!", 'I spent one full week in Alex‚Äôs appartment for vacation with my 15 year old daughter. The appartment is very similar to the pictures, with nice decoration, in a nice and rather quiet area. Very convenient with easy access to several subway lines. The appartment is pleasant, the bed is comfortable. The kitchen is very small so don‚Äôt expect to be able to make a lot of cooking, but it is better than nothing at least for the breakfast.
And Alex has always been very reactive to answer my questions, either before our travel or during our stay. This is a place I will keep in mind for potential future trips to NYC.', "My stay at Alex's place in Chelsea was fantastic! The location is superb, offering convenience and easy access to NYC's best. The apartment matched the pictures perfectly, providing a clean and stylish space. Alex was a wonderful host, responsive and helpful. Highly recommend for a top-notch NYC experience!", "We spent 1 week at Alex's place and had a great time. Close to West village (15min), meatpacking (Chelsea Market), high line (3 blocks). 30 min walk to a Broadway show.
The place is a New York studio: clean, minimal but functional kitchen. Very clean and enjoyable in a nice tree bordered street.
Would love to come back!", 'Nice place, well located', 'Great place to stay. Very convenient location.
The only negative was not having anywhere to sit to eat meals.
Very responsive host.', 'It was such a cute space!! My bf and I loved it for our first time in nyc. We loved the location because it wasn‚Äôt in the busy part of the city but still close to walk to places. The house was so clean and Alex was just so kind and responsive to all my questions!!', "This studio apartment is defined by three key elements: value, experience, and convenience. Its exceptional value surpasses comparable options in the area, offering a spacious interior larger than many Manhattan hotel rooms. The well-equipped kitchen for simple meals. Chelsea's location emerged as a highlight. Positioned perfectly between Midtown and Lower Manhattan, a 15-minute subway trip seamlessly connects to either part of the island. The unique opportunity provided by Airbnb to stay in a genuine apartment is emphasized. This immersive experience offers a glimpse into what living in New York could be like, contributing significantly to a deeper understanding of the city. Throughout a comfortable week-long stay, the unanimous agreement was that this place exceeded expectations. It served not only as a resting spot but as a cherished haven. Brewing tea and watching TV in the evenings after a day of exploring New York's was wonderful solidifying our love for this place.", 'Would stay here again.', 'If you go to Brooklyn then catch the train 8‚Äôits more efficient to take your bag with yuu out then to the trains.', 'Cozy studio in a great neighborhood. Chelsea is located near restaurants, the Whitney Museum, the High Line and excellent transportation. Host was very responsive to requests. They provided city wide restaurant recommendations and things to do. It was easy to get to places like MoMA, the Metropolitan Museum and the Brooklyn Botanic Gardens. We had a great week in New York.', 'This little shoebox is well appointed, clean and lovely -- just make note that it is *tiny*! Some street noise (sirens) was an issue during the stay, but I just wore my Bose headphones when in the apartment. Classic quirky NYC space.', 'We had a great experience at the Alex place! He was always responsive and taking care of all our needs. The caffe machine was great and you can have a tea too.
We recommended this place!']

title: 15 Minutes to Time Square.
all_reviews: ['Easy and quick to get to NYC and a very nice host!', 'Sergio was really kind and helpful.\nLarge, very nice room. - comfortable bed.\nThe bus stop is very near. Would recommend to stay there. Everything was perfect, thank you!:)']

title: Luxury Condo in the Heart of Manhattan!(High Rise)
all_reviews:
['We spent 1 week at Kyle & Vlad and felt at home.
Kyle recommended us great restaurants/ bars & was helpful at all times.
The location as well as the view are absolutely hammer! We would stay with Kyle & Vlad again any time.', 'overall - very nice experience and as advertised in the other reviews', 'This place was everything we expected and needed. The host is very accomodating and such a nice person. He also helped us out when we had an issue with some online tickets. We made breakfast in the kitchen every morning and that was usually when we met our host and chatted a bit. There are small food shops near by and places to get fresh bread. The house cat is lovely and didn't come into our room which was of course nice as we are not used to having a cat. The flat has a stunning view from the bedroom and kitchen area and of course the great balcony. The location was so convenient and you couldn't be more "in the middle of everything" as well as getting to and from our airport (JFK). All our best wishes to the host and his future guests! We would love to go back again!!', "We stayed at Vlad's for 5 nights and we absolutely loved every day. The views from the 40th floor were outstanding and we never tired of seeing it day and night. Spectacular. We could relax and rest in style and comfort throughout our stay. Vlad was the most perfect host, making us feel so welcome and helped us with plenty of local advice on places to see, visit and eat. It was also very quiet; considering you're in a big building shared with many neighbours, we never heard a thing. The door staff and reception were so friendly, extremely smart and, always happy.
Vlad's place is the perfect location, right opposite the Empire State Building and so central to reach most of the top places to see on foot.
Nearby, we hired a bicycle for 3 hours and completed the Central Park loop, with a picnic to end a perfect day. Central Park was beautiful to see and great fun to cycle around.
We used the local transport to and from JFK and it was so simple to access and reliable too.", 'This is your best choice when traveling in New York. Vlad was very friendly and gave us lots of information about traveling in NYC. We certainly love living in his apartment and have fun with his cats. The apartment has a stunning view and location. Close to 3 different subway lines.
We hope to visit NYC soon and stay at this apartment again.', "you simply cannot ask for better location, view, and price. period.
bed is comfortable, water pressure is superb, and there's plenty of space for bags/luggage (which is not at all something you would find in most other places in Manhattan).", 'The location of this Airbnb is unbeatable, it provided easy access to Times Square, Central Park, and the Empire State Building. Comfortable bed, curious cat, calm and cozy.', 'Perfect location, perfect views on Manhattan, very big room and private bathroom.
Very nice host, available when needed.
Definitely recommended and my next time in NY will be here.', 'Good host, very good location!', 'Awesome location, super comfy mattress, beautiful views!', 'The place was fantastic, location ideal, the bed was so comfortable. Kyle was beyond helpful. Everything was better than we could have expected. If you are doing NY this is the place to stay', 'Great location. Super central but still quiet due to the unit being on a very high floor and having well-insulated windows. AC was great, the internet was fast, and everything was super clean. Kyle is a great host!
I will definitely be recommending this place to any friends or coworkers looking for a place in NYC.', 'What a great experience!
Amazing location, stylish and comfortable, loved the gym. Totally recommend it', 'great spot and very friendly', '2nd time staying here and it was just as perfect as the first time! Amazing spot, great views, and even better customer service. Thanks again!', 'This was our first time using Airbnb and we were a little nervous. Well we were blown away by the location, the room, and Vlad‚Äôs hospitality. Communication was fantastic and from day 1 we felt comfortable and were genuinely excited to arrive back at the room. We thank you for your great information, communication and being available for any questions or assistance we needed. We feel like we stayed with a friend and will definitely be coming back. The spot is amazing and easy to navigate the city. You will be amazed!', 'My wife and I had a great stay with Kyle. We are from the UK and it was my first (and only) return to New York since 1969 and the first ever visit for my wife. How New York has changed in 50+ years!!
This was our first experience of staying in a shared apartment but Kyle was very welcoming and quickly made us feel at home. The location is very central which is both a blessing and a curse. It is great that so much is on your doorstep but the curse is that it is all to easy to walk, and walk, and walk. Perhaps our age is showing!
Will we return? No, but only because of our age. I would not particularly recommend New York for those deep past retirement but for a younger generation it would be superb. Would I recommend staying with Kyle - definitely yes.', 'Absolutely stunning place, just off Empire State on the 40th floor! Great city skyline 24 hours a day! Kyle is a kind, helpful person with a clean apartment and a flexible approach to guests. We spent 5 days in a nice atmosphere. The room has a separate bathroom with everything you need. Clean linens and towels. You know, it costs a bit, but it justifies the place, which is the middle of Manhattan :-) I highly recommend it!', 'Vlad‚Äôs place offers everything as described in his listing. As a host, Kyle knows how to be helpful and provide a clean, convenient and comfortable room with a great view. I look forward to staying at his place again.', 'I was very happy with my choice for my stay in NYC. As a single female, I particularly appreciated the secure feeling of a doorman. Large and comfy room with an enormous window. I enjoyed the presence of the most handsome tuxedo cat, Vlad, who is also both very shiny clean and quiet. A lovely home away from home. I want to return to watch a 5th Avenue parade from the balcony!', 'the very good reviews for the apartment and the host are absolutely justified. living in the center of New York with a fantastic view of the skyline will stay in good memory for a long time. thanks to kyle and vlad. 5 stars', 'If you‚Äôre looking for an amazing stay in New York, look no further, this place is the best! Its location is unparalleled, letting you travel everywhere quickly, the room is very comfortable and very private and the host is so friendly! We‚Äôve had a fantastic stay and will definitely come back to this airbnb next time we‚Äôre in New York.', 'A great place and a great host. This AirBnB will make your NY trip special!', "We were two adult friends staying at Vlad's for the weekend. For our purposes, the location would be hard to beat. The cat was curious about us but never a bother.

The room and private bath were more than adequate for the two of us. The view is probably the best I've experienced from a bedroom in Manhattan.

Valerie & Florian', "*It was amazing*

a big thumbs up for this booking. amazing location and super host. Apartment views are superb.']

title: Lovely Park Slope Apt w. Private Bed/Bath/Entrance
all_reviews:
['Everything was as described: the place was clean and had everything you could need, location was great and within walking distance of shops/restaurants/direct metro to Manhattan/etc, David was very friendly and super helpful. We enjoyed our stay there and will very likely come back next time we are in the area!', 'We stayed at David and Roni‚Äôs for 4 nights while visiting our kids in Bklyn. The apartment was spotless and roomy, with a very comfortable bed and soft sheets. The neighborhood is great, and was convenient for us. David is friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay again.', "We had a wonderful week in New York, with our 3 teenage daughters.
David's place, on the Brooklyn side, is 5 minutes from the subway to Manhattan. We spent all our days visiting the city and could return without difficulty, even late at night, or dinner at the apartment, which can be appreciated after a day in New York:)
Our 3 daughters slept in the bedroom, my husband and I in a bed in the living room, very comfortable.
Really, the apartment was perfect for us and David was very welcoming. He did everything he could to make our stay easier, allowing us to drop off our luggage before we could even get into the apartment and keeping them on the last day until we left.
Recommended! And a little secret I share: the cheesecake you'll find at Yardsale Cafe is the best in the world!!!", 'If you need a place in Park Slope look no further. It was perfect! Wonderful communication!', 'a wonderful place, my adult son and I had plenty of room. David left recommendations for restaurants and things in the area. Overall a great experience!', 'This was a wonderful place. David was a great host and created a great space to enjoy our trip. The surrounding area was nice and offered a lot of locations within walking distance.', "David was very welcoming, full of good advice and very friendly. We appreciated the many touches including children's games, treats on arrival, the possibility of borrowing an umbrella...
The apartment is well located with subways nearby. It's very well arranged and we did not lack anything. A very cozy apartment and a top host üëå", 'Great place and great host. Walking distance to all of Park Slope and only minutes from the subway. Cannot say enough good things about David. Actually, during my last day I informed him about an accident that caused some minor damage in the bathroom. He could not have been more understanding and accommodating. Would return.', "David's place is spotless, it has everything you need like at home, everything is as in the photos and the neighborhood is quiet with the bus and metro right next door. We met David several times and we had good contacts, he is always attentive to our needs, very kind and attentive, he sends us messages regularly to see if everything is okay. Thank you for the gift upon arrival and the great welcome. David allowed us to leave our luggage while we waited for checkout. We were delighted with our stay and will be back in a heartbeat. Thank you üôè", 'David‚Äôs space was perfect for our weekend getaway to explore Brooklyn. We had no problem checking in, and the apartment was spotless and had everything we needed to make us feel at home. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen well-stocked with dishes, glasses, utensils and cookware (including a wine opener!). We found wonderful restaurants, delis and coffee shops within easy walking distance. David was super-responsive and the perfect host‚ÄîHighly recommend!', 'Great spot to take a break from the bustle of the city. Quiet area, but still plenty of places to eat, etc. Good proximity to the subway. David was a great and very helpful host and accommodated a couple of special requests I had. Would stay here again.', "One of the best places I've stayed in Brooklyn. Great value for the very comfortable apartment with fully functional appliances, fast wifi for remote work, & welcome treats. Location is great, great coffee shops & restaurant within 10min walking, & close to the subway giving access to Manhattan in less than 30min. Hosts are amazing, very friendly, and easy to get in touch with. If you're reading this comment, don't hesitate to book David's place for your stay in Brooklyn!", 'We loved our stay here as a couple. The location is fantastic. So many great restaurants nearby, and close to Prospect Park & the Brooklyn Botanic Gardens. The bed was comfortable, and the whole place was private, roomy, clean and comfortable. David was an amazing host. He proactively communicated in advance about what to expect, checked in several times to see how we were doing once we were there, was responsive to requests for local recommendations, and was super friendly and welcoming. We would definitely stay here again!', "David was flexible, friendly, and efficient. We particularly enjoyed the treats he'd left for us!", 'Great stay! Comfy bed, well- furnished kitchen, responsive host. We didn‚Äôt spend much time there during the day because of other plans. My only disappointment was that the garden part of the ‚Äúgarden apartment‚Äù wasn‚Äôt visible - it was blocked off. Not a big deal and all good otherwise!', 'We loved our stay! David was an incredible host‚Ä¶ full of suggestions and super invested in making sure we were happy and comfortable.
We loved having a kitchen and SOOOOO much space- So much better than a New York tiny hotel room!
The bed was totally comfy and the extra convertible beds offered more space for our kids.
Definitely click and book now!', 'To sum it all up - what a lovely experience in a beautiful setting and great neighborhood Checked every box I had in mind for my birthday get away including walking in to this beautiful space finding a bowl of treats, a bottle of wine and a happy birthday card. Bumped into David a few times outside and in town and had lovely conversations. Just a real deal amazing family / hosts.', 'Great place, great host. The host was very accommodating and insured we felt comfortable with everything, especially since we were unfamiliar with the area and not feequent travelers.
Would absolutely stay here again!', 'The lodges were clean. Easy to get to with a few minutes. Walk from the subway. Plenty of places to shop or dine nearby. The host David was wonderful. I always available if needed and quickly responded to text messages. Prior to my arrival he responded to all of my inquiries. the location was a bit out-of-the-way for me as I needed to go back-and-forth to Manhattan quite a bit. The apartment was comfortable and had plenty of supplies for cooking and lots of books if you decided to stay in because of the weather.', 'David is the nicest Airbnb host that I have met in all of my time of staying at Airbnbs. I contacted him while I was staying in London to ask him a few questions about the Airbnb. He got back to me right away and answered all of my questions.
The Airbnb itself is very clean, large and nicely furnished. The bed is very comfortable and the entire apartment feels like a home away from home.
I forgot something after I check-out of the Airbnb and David called me right away to let me know. If you are looking for a place to stay in Park Slope this is an excellent choice.', 'Lovely up to date apartment with everything you need for a comfortable stay.', 'I just want to say that David‚Äôs spot was absolutely perfect! Great location and great apartment. It truly was the best place we could‚Äôve stayed during our stay.', "We spent 7 nights at David & Roni's while visiting our daughter who lives nearby. Every bit of our experience, from first contact to checking out, was beyond our expectations. Everything was as described. David is an excellent host, and extremely responsive to messages and questions. The neighborhood is lovely and safe, with cozy coffee shops, delicious restaurants and shopping just blocks away. Prospect Park is an easy 20 minute stroll. Easy access to the subway makes day trips to Manhattan a breeze. We will definitely be in touch for our next visit!", 'my short stay was perfect and David was extremely responsive to questions and provided helpful suggestions and recommendations. the apartment is spacious and truly private, just a couple blocks from the train. the neighborhood was safe and beautiful. 5 stars', 'David was an awesome host! Super responsive and accommodating. Went above and beyond welcoming us with treats and a bottle of wine as well as toys for our baby! The unit was very clean and we love that it was no shoes since we have a very active crawling baby that loves to explore. We without a doubt will book David‚Äôs place again next time we are in town.', "David was a fantastic host - He set up an early bag drop and check in which was very helpful. He was also very responsive, checkin in regularly and gave great local recommendations and helpful tips on how to get around. The apartment itself was clean and very comfortable. It's also close to great restaurants, shops and amenities and public transport - ticked all boxes. Would definitely recommend it to anyone in Brooklyn for a short stay.", 'Will definitely stay again on our next visit to Brooklyn.', "David is such an accommodating host! We came for a wedding, and we knew the area from having lived nearby for years, but neverthless he was super helpful and if we had needed anything I'm sure he would have been able to accommodate in a prompt manner.", 'Had a great weekend stay in Brooklyn! David was an amazing host!', 'The apartment was everything we were looking for. David and his family were excellent hosts and very helpful. The apartment was well kept, walking distance to a bunch of restaurants, and finding parking in the neighborhood was a breeze. We will definitely book again next time we are back in Brooklyn!', 'We spent 9 nights at David‚Äôs well appointed and very comfortable basement apartment. He was a caring host who checked in with us every few days. The bedroom was excellent with plenty of room for all our stuff and a fantastic bed. The bathroom had a good shower and good storage for toiletries plus extra towels if needed. The kitchen was very clean and well equipped. The location is residential but has cafes, eateries and supermarket close by, the subway is a 5-10 minute walk. Prospect Park is 3-4 blocks away. We highly recommend David‚Äôs apartment and won‚Äôt hesitate to stay again.', 'Nice place. Great location and very accessible for my parents. Host is a great communicator and very informative. Highly recommend.', 'Great location, good neighbourhood. The apartment had everything we needed to make us feel at home. David was extremely friendly and readily available to provide any help.', "My family had a wonderful stay at David's place! We were comfortable, felt very safe, and David was so friendly and easy to communicate with. We loved the neighborhood and were close to everything we needed, even a playground for the kids. There is ample street parking if you come with a vehicle (like we did), and the neighborhood is easy to navigate. David's place was clean and spacious, and we will definitely stay here over a hotel when we come back to visit!", "We're from upstate New York and the city is not easy for us to navigate. Appreciated David's communication and the comfort of his airbnb. Clean, comfortable and helpful instructions made our stay enjoyable! Thanks David.", 'We highly recommend this wonderful apartment right by the park! David was the perfect host, & all the extra touches made it an easy, and very comfortable stay for our family of three! Would love to stay here again.', 'David is a warm host, very attentive, considerate, available , very accommodating for check-in and check-out times, anxious to ensure the best stay possible
Thanks to him', 'It was a great experience in nyc and the host was very friendly and accommodating 10/10 would recommend', 'Great, comfortable space and David was extremely responsive and friendly!', "David's place is super well-situated in a great area. The access was good, I felt very safe and the accommodations were clean and well-appointed. I'll definitely return!", 'We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and would rebook in a heartbeat if/when we return to NY. David was an outstanding and friendly host who made sure we were comfortable and was available for questions. The beds were so comfortable and the towels were nice and thick. I loved having the kitchen amenities of home for breakfasts and periodic meals. I found the home and neighborhood to be a comfortable place to stay as a single parent with my teenage daughter. My only regret is not taking the time to walk around Green-Wood Cemetery. It has a fascinating history, with several prominent folks buried there. I am a bird nerd and would have enjoyed a stroll or two around the grounds. There are parrots nesting in the gothic gate at the 5th At entrance. I briefly walked by. It‚Äôs lovely!', 'David and Roni were so kind and welcoming to us. They had everything ready and made everything so easy for our arrival.
The apartment is as clean as a top hotel, easily accessible and in a really safe neighbourhood close to a ton of great eateries.
Perfect for an active New York trip!', 'We loved our stay in Brooklyn! The place was cozy, quiet, and comfortable. We enjoyed the neighborhood and the convenience of nearby restaurants, groceries, and subway for our sightseeing vacation in NYC.
everything was as expected, and David was a fantastic host ‚Äî from the snacks and wine that greeted us at our arrival, to prompt replies to my inquiries in advance and throughout our stay, to flexibility with accommodating an extra person for part of our stay.
Highly recommended!', 'Great place, very clean, great location, walkable to everything. We had a great stay!', "David's home is a wonderful place to stay! The local restaurants are outstanding, and the train ride into Manhattan is easily accessible. His home is extremely clean and has all the amenities one would want while traveling. David is very accommodating, answers messages quickly, and is very easy to work with.", 'We look forward to returning. It was just as described. David provided excellent instructions, always responsive which we appreciated. We had no concerns, but always appreciate getting to know our host.
I‚Äôm a clean freak and David‚Äôs place met my high standards. This will be our go to location to book on our next visit to family.', "great place to stay in the South slope. very comfortable, clean, safe, easy access to Manhattan ,great neighborhood and super responsive and protective host. one of the best air BNB s I've stayed at. highly recommend", 'David was a great host and very helpful and communicative. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend his space.', 'We were in town to be tourists, but also to spend time with family who live in the Park Slope neighborhood. This location was perfect for us‚Ä¶very close to markets and cafes and within walking distance of all three family members. It was exactly as advertised‚Ä¶clean, comfortable, with everything we needed. Communication was easy‚Ä¶David was quick to respond to concerns and gave clear instructions for all parts of our stay. We would stay here again, for sure!', 'David was so responsive and helpful and went the extra mile for sure. My In Laws were visiting NYC for first time in many years and it was great that they were so comfortable and close to us. Worked perfectly for them!', 'David‚Äôs place was convenient and comfortable. We found parking right up the block for the whole weekend and were within walking distance of great restaurants, bars, and the subway. The apartment was clean and perfectly sized for two of us. Would highly recommend!', 'Id Book Again', "My in-laws came out for a visit and David's place we perfect for their stay. They very much enjoyed their time here and the cleanliness and accessibility of David's place.", 'Great stay at David‚Äôs! Responsive, friendly, flexible.', 'If I could give more stars than a perfect score, I would! Communication was excellent - David was friendly, thorough and solicitous from booking onward. The treats and wine he had waiting for us were very welcome. The location was perfect for us - a short walk to the subway and a quieter home base away from Manhattan‚Äôs hustle and bustle, yet close by to cool Brooklyn spots like holiday light displays. The place itself was roomy, comfortable and well appointed. Every time I turned to look for something - scissors, measuring cups, coffee - it was right there. The bed deserves its own review: Oh. My. Gosh. Sooo comfortable. It felt like a cozy home with family-friendly touches like puzzles and books, and some luxe ones, like a white noise machine (which came in very handy for masking the sound of our teenagers!). Thanks, David, for being a top-notch host!', 'David and his family are wonderful hosts! They were very concerned that we had arrived safely, were able to get into the apartment without difficulty, that everything was in order and that we lacked for nothing. The instructions left for us were well-written; they also left information as to local sights and places to eat. Extremely responsive to any questions. The apartment was very, very clean, very comfortable (great bed!) and quiet at night. Felt very much cared for and about. We would happily stay there again when visiting Brooklyn.', 'David‚Äôs place was clean, private, and very comfortable. He was a perfect host and very attentive to our needs. His place exceeded our expectations in every way. It had a well equipped kitchen, a clean bathroom, and a comfortable bedroom and living room. Also a private entrance. It is close to a bus stop and subway station. It‚Äôs very convenient to restaurants and markets. We will certainly stay there again when we are next in New York. Thank you David for making our stay so pleasant.', 'Excellent location, amazing neighborhood. David was an excellent host, very communicative and helpful. The rental was very clean and spacious. The water pressure in the shower was excellent - always a plus!
If I find myself back in NYC I will certainly be booking here again!', 'David is an excellent host, highly recommend .
Very quick response .I would stay there again', 'David is very friendly and helpful. great place for a weekend stay. Very walkavle and near Prospct Park!', 'David couldn‚Äôt have been more welcoming! He checked on us throughout our stay and was super responsive. The apartment was clean and cozy; it looks just like the pictures and has all of the amenities you need! The neighborhood is great with lots of great restaurants nearby. We hope to stay there again soon!', 'We had a great stay here! The place is exactly as described and in a great location. Street parking is easy and there are lots of things to do in walking distance. David was very responsive when we needed to modify our booking and helped us out quickly.', 'Very warm and friendly host! The place was thoughtfully designed and our experience was absolutely terrific. Would definitely book again when we return to the area in the future.', "From our first contact before I booked the apartment and right up to our departure after a 4 night stay, David has been excellent in communicating swiftly with us and providing help immediately when it was needed.
The apartment has worked perfectly for us two sisters, who both appreciate having our own sleeping rooms!
So having a separate bedroom with a comfortable double bed and a comfortable sofabed made up in the lounge area was an excellent arrangement for us.
We spent very little time in the apartment as we spent the days visiting family elsewhere in Brooklyn. However, if one would like to russle up a meal, the apartment has a well equipped galley kitchen for the purpose.
We have been very pleased to stay in David's apartment and can highly recommend it to others!", 'Great location and plenty of space for 2-3 people. We took our infant son and appreciated that a pack n play was set up. Close to prospect park, subway, and plenty of restaurants.', 'This place was perfect! Great location and David was friendly and greeted us as we arrived and always checked in on us during our stay. I can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay again! The neighborhood was very quiet and a convenient deli on the corner that came in handy throughout the stay!', 'This is a cozy spot close to a lot of amenities, and we felt right at home - which was an extra blessing as we were all a bit sick on our trip, so spent most of our time resting at the airbnb. The bed is super comfortable! David is very responsive and kind. He had a pack and play set up for my baby, and there were toys and teddies for him to play with as well. Thank you!', 'This is an ideal place to stay in the Park Slope area, even if you have a child. David is exceedingly friendly and responsive and his unit is tremendous value for all you are getting in terms of space, amenities, and location. We would highly recommend staying here and would gladly do so again in the future.', 'Great stay and interactions with David and Roni. Look forward to coming back.', 'Lovely stay! The bed was comfy, the sofa-turned-bed in the living room was also comfy, and the AC worked great (a must for summer in NYC). Close to a couple subway stops but in the chill area of Park Slope, which is great.', "The stay at David's place was perfect, it was really like feeling at home. David is considerate, flexible and available and from a long time before departure he communicated useful information to us. The check-in and check-out times were flexible and there was a lot of willingness to meet our needs. The directions to the house and for check-in and check-out were perfect.
During our stay David always kept in touch with us to find out if everything was okay and to give us useful information.
The neighborhood is very nice, quiet and elegant.
Tidy and clean. The house is spacious and nearby there are shops and restaurants and services. Well connected with public transit, subway stops within walking distance of a short walk, and buses under the house.
We'll recommend David's place to all our friends headed to New York, and we'll be back.", "David's place was pristinely clean and very cozy. Everything we needed was in the apartment, including all cookware and very nice appliances. As a host, David was remarkable in his attentiveness and care for our comfort and enjoyment. He offered to keep our bags for us for as long as we needed after checkout. Just a perfect experience!", 'Great space. Will stay there again if traveling to Brklyn. Spotless place, lots of goodies, books, puzzles, magazines. Location is great too. Close to everything and to subway/train. David awesome host- reached out before, during and after. Cannot recommend highly enough.', "I recently had the pleasure of staying at David's Airbnb in Brooklyn's Park Slope neighborhood, and I must say it was an exceptional experience. From start to finish, David proved to be an outstanding host, going above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable.
The location of the Airbnb is fantastic. Nestled in the heart of Park Slope, it provided easy access to trendy restaurants, charming cafes, and vibrant local shops. The neighborhood itself exudes a welcoming and safe atmosphere, making it the perfect base for exploring Brooklyn and beyond.", 'David was great! Perfect place. Perfect location. Adjusted the sleeping arrangements to accommodate us.', "This was the second time I've stayed at David's place, and it was just as I remembered from last year ‚Äî super clean, comfortable, all the amenities you could possibly need, excellent location, and incredibly responsive and friendly host. The unit is spacious and laid out well with comfortable seating and bedding, and the bathroom and kitchen are both clean and well stocked with all the necessities. I was able to work from the apartment comfortably, and it's a perfect location in terms of shopping, restaurants, mass transit, and playgrounds for my daughter. There's a reason why I returned without even looking into other options, and it will continue to be my go-to accommodation every time I go to New York.", 'Fantastic Airbnb! Super comfy, exactly as described and a wonderful respite in the city! David was a great host, super thoughtful and communicative. Highly recommend!', 'Second time I‚Äôve stayed, and the place was as lovely as ever!', "We had a great time in this apartment! It is well-equipped, clean and cozy. It is easily accessible with a metro stop within 10 minutes of access. A big thank you to David for his availability and good advice. We'll be back!", 'My husband and I stayed for three nights on our recent visit. Can‚Äôt say enough about our positive experience there. This apartment is meticulously maintained and spacious, yet compact. The kitchen has full-sized appliances, dishes for food preparation, and a coffeemaker (We appreciated the ground coffee provided). Located in a quiet, leafy, and walkable neighborhood, yet within three blocks of streets filled with plenty of restaurant choices, food marts, etc. The subway line also is within four blocks. No problem getting around at all! David is an affable and attentive host. He left treats for our arrival, always checked in by text to make sure everything was going well, and stopped to meet us at our convenience on our last morning there.', 'We had a wonderful stay at David‚Äôs place, he is one of the best Airbnb hosts we‚Äôve had. Great communication all the way through, and the advice, welcome goodies - and books and toys in the apartment for our 3.5 year old - was very much appreciated.
The apartment itself is in a fantastic location, a short walk to the station but also surrounded by excellent shops, restaurants and green spaces. We followed the recommendations from David and were not disappointed. The apartment itself was very clean, well equipped and spacious for our little family. Just like in the photos, it is modern and kitted out with all the home comforts. What a treat to have a big fridge, and be able to cook in the kitchen, and have a microwave, toaster and kettle for the breakfast run.
We can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay here when we are next in New York. Thanks David for the fantastic 5 star hospitality!', 'We really enjoyed our stay. Lovely place, and neighborhood. Quiet, comfortable, clean, and charming.
David had great recommendations, was flexible with our check-in and check-out needs. We felt right at home.', 'David and his family were amazing! They were flexible with check-in, showed up nearly immediately when we ran into a little problem when checking in, had great recommendations, and were all very kind! I will be staying here again the next time I‚Äôm in the city!', 'Lovely, welcoming home and wonderfully communicative host. Great location close to many amenities and activities.', 'David‚Äôs place is a comfortable, clean, and secure apartment in a beautiful Brooklyn neighborhood. David was very helpful and communicative during my stay and I was happy to get a chance to meet him in person as our schedules leaving the house matched up each morning. There is plenty of food nearby, and multiple subway stops to choose from. I look forward to staying here again in the future.', 'We stayed with David and Roni before Christmas. They were very helpful, kind, and communicative On the day of departure, we were allowed to leave the suitcases with him, they are flexible and do everything to feel comfortable. The apartment is 10 minutes away from the subway station and with the line (yellow) R you can reach Manhattan quickly. David and Roni have also created a guidebook for Prospect Park, well worth exploring the area because the park is surprisingly beautiful and quiet.
It was very nice to stay with you, we absolutely felt at home. Thank you!', "The space is as shown in the pictures, everything is sparkling, and the host was friendly and flexible. There are several subway stations nearby and that makes it much easier to get around Brooklyn and NYC. It's definitely a place we'll be back to when we get back to Brooklyn. THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR EVERYTHING!", "The apartment is nicely laid out with the bedroom down a hallway, the kitchen and living room in the front. The kitchen was very well equipped so it would be easy to make a meal if one wanted to. The couch and arm chair were super cosy. It's located in a quiet neighborhood close to many restaurants and prospect park. David was very proactive about texting and asking if everything was ok. This was helpful because I did have some questions and would of been reluctant to bug him. He really wants his guests to have the best of all possible experience.", 'great place, great location, great host', 'David‚Äôs place was wonderful for our family! Everything was as listed and shown, and the neighborhood was great (within walking distance to many things). He was very proactive in communicating and responded quickly‚Äîvery friendly and helpful! We would definitely stay there again.', 'We had a great stay. David was a great host. We appreciated the toddler-friendly amenities!', 'David place was amazing! A spacious place to stay for a few days. Very communicative. Easy check in & out. Supplies kitchen cookware, living essentials, and toiletries. Quiet great neighborhood. Public transportation was only 3blocks away. Would most definitely stay there again next time me & my fianc√© are in town! Thank you so much David.', 'David was a wonderful host. You are greeted with special treats and clear, easy instructions for your stay. His place is immaculate and super comfortable and the location is perfect.', 'David is a wonderful host and his apartment was beautiful. He was incredibly communicative, friendly, and helpful. My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay. Would highly recommend.', "wonderful host. great neighborhood. very clean, well-decorated, and functional place. lovely touches, including a pack and play and some toys for my little. i look forward to stay at David's place in future trips!", 'Wonderful hosts, perfect location and great space. Definitely coming back!', 'Great location', 'David was very accommodating and friendly. He texted me with information and was quickly to respond if we needed anything or had questions. He had all the info we needed readily available. The place was immaculate and we will definitely stay here again. Perfect host and the location was walkable to many places in Park Slope. It made the perfect stay. Can‚Äôt say thanks enough and he definitely gets a 5 star.', 'The apartment was clean, neat, and spacious by New York standards. It comfortably fit me and three kids. David was extremely responsive and solicitous. The neighborhood has grocery stores, restaurants, bars - everything you could want, including proximity to a subway. Highly recommended.', 'Comfortable and well set-up. Shelves of good books, a few games, and treats upon arrival made it personal and welcoming. The beds are comfortable, heat and air well regulated. We had absolutely no complaints. Also, the location is delightful and walkable!', "David was an excellent host - easy to communicate with and was kind enough to check in to make sure we had everything we needed during our stay. David's place is in a convenient location in a cool neighborhood, close to subway and bus lines. I can highly recommend David's place and would gladly book with him for future Brooklyn stays.", 'We were grateful to stay here -a family and dog friendly neighborhood with great food and services nearby, and walking distance to Prospect Park, Brooklyn zoo, and museum. The place was spacious and had everything needed for a comfortable stay. David was friendly and helpful and everything went smoothly. We would be happy to stay here again.', 'The place was spacious. I had a small kitchen and living room all to myself. Family upstairs, but was very private downstairs. Close to great restaurants and Prospect Park.', "David was extremely accommodating and communicative. We really appreciated that he checked in during our stay to make sure that everything was going well. The place was very clean and filled with everything that we needed including a pack 'n play for our little one. The pull out sofa bed was in fact comfortable. The location is convenient and its an easy walk to the park or zoo. We'd definitely return if we have the chance."]

title: Quiet Lower East Side Studio
all_reviews:
["Ray is a lovely and approachable guy.
The house is very located if you're looking to get to know and enjoy Manhattan.
It is very noisy and its walls do not dampen anything the noise of the neighbors and the bars on the street. It is a street with very good nightlife and fun where you can enjoy the night of Manhattan, but not to rest in the house because you can hear everything.
The house is very dim.
The shower is not the best in the world.
The bed is very comfortable.", "Great place to stay and explore New York. Ray's apartment was just what we were after. Everything there that we needed, clean and just a little bit quirky, but in a good way. Ray's communication was good and he was there to meet us on arrival. Highly recommended!", "Check in was a little tricky at first, but we were able to check in overall. It's a great location in the LES next to some amazing shops and restaurants. Definitely a great value for the city, especially if you're planning on touring NYC. Despite being in a busy neighborhood, the apartment was super quiet, which is great. Would recommend.", 'Great place to stay.', 'very good value for money. 2 metro stations close to the accommodation. it is 20 min by metro from times square, empire state building and the status of freedom ,etc.... I recommend it.', "Ray's place is in a great location. very walkable to great restaurants and nightlife and a nice 20 minute bike ride to midtown."]

title: Chez Jesse Vacation Spot - Garden
all_reviews: ['Thank you, Jesse! Your home was just what we needed for a brief stay in NY. Good location, price, convenience, cleanliness and comfort. We drove in from Boston; easy to park on the street; made it possible to not need to drive all the way into the city. Clear directions both pre visit and in the resource book in the room for guests. Appreciated the thoughtfulness you put into the kitchen / living room area as well - comfortable, lovely and thoughtful.', 'Incredibly stay with Jesse! He was very communicative and the place was squeaky clean. The place has ample security & is close enough to public transit. Would definitely return to stay.', 'I went to New York on a solo trip from the beginning of my life.My stay is 7 days.I was worried that every place was expensive and I found a place to stay.The host will respond as soon as they ask questions.The toilet, bathroom is next to the room, so I can only use it myself.The living room is shared and fully equipped with a refrigerator, cups, coffee, and microwave.It wasn\'t very suitable for other guests, but when I met them, they said, "Hi!"The‚ò∫Ô∏è room was also spacious, and it was clean.There is also an iron, a lot of hangers, drawers, etc., so I think it is very suitable for long-term stays.The train is also close by.I used Uber to get around at the beginning of the day and when I came back at the end.There were not enough clothes on the way, so I checked the location with the host and went to the coin laundry alone in the morning. TheüòÇ supermarket and pharmacy were also within walking distance, so I went shopping, but there was no problem!I was very lonely and cried to say goodbye to the host when I left.It was a really cozy place to stay that felt like a home away from home.I\'ve decided here by looking at the ratings, but I know what you\'re saying.I think I will choose this place without hesitation if I come to New York again (o ^ ^ o) Thank you Erica & Jesse', "A fantastic stay with lots of room and an incredibly clean home. Location was great, with it being less than a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway which could get you to Times Square in under 30 minutes. Jesse was a great host who provided clear instructions prior to arrival and whenever we had to contact him during our stay (which was minimal as everything was spot on) he'd respond in a timely manner. Overall a brilliant stay and a place I'd recommend anyone to stay at.", 'Jesse was an amazing a patient host, instructions were clear and house rules were reasonable. Genuinely felt like a second home while in the city and would (and probably will lol) book again. Amazing quality especially for its price. Thank you again for everything.', "I've never experienced such a friendly thoughtful host. Jesse took care of everything. Even for earplugs, for example. For New York, I thought it was a top airbnb. Thank you Jesse!"]

title: Spacious room in fun, quiet house
all_reviews:
['I had a wonderful time staying here! It‚Äôs a great neighbourhood, the room was very cozy, quiet and clean. Ame was a fantastic host - always helpful and very friendly. 10/10 recommend!', 'Great location, easily accessible metro to Manhattan. Brooklyn is vibes, good local places to eat and has good tips for local eats. Ame was friendly, welcoming and made us some delicious cake! Room was bright, airy and clean. We would stay again.', 'Beautiful home in such a great neighbourhood. We loved our room and staying with Ame.', 'Spent a wonderful few days in Ame‚Äôs home, which was exactly as described‚Äîspacious and welcoming. Ame was a lovely host, making me feel welcome and at home. The room was enormous and very comfortable, and the neighborhood is great. Would definitely book again in the future.', 'Ames place was recommended to us for Brooklyn, NY from friends. We enjoyed our stay there very much.', "I felt very at home in the 13 mornings and nights. Could also cook my morning coffee and store a few things in the fridge. The shower was great, the bed comfortable. And there's a nice terrace at the back. Very quiet there. To Metro & LIRR station on Atlantic Avenue 10 mins. In general appealing & safe area!", "I loved Ame appartment. I've been there with my boyfriend and we could have our own privacy, cooked and being free with our times.
Ame was there to help us whenever we needed her, she was really nice and opened with us.
This one was my first airbnb and I really loved it, to cook is great, the kitchen is awesome.", 'It was a very pleasant stay at Ames place in Brooklyn. The house is situated very well, close to busy streets, food shops, vintage shops and metro lines.
Inside we did like the style. Everything is there for a reason. Very tasteful from the furniture to the shampoo in the bathroom.
We would like to spend much more time there.
Thank you Ame.', 'Great location for exploring from Manhattan to Coney Island and everything in between. Lovely bedroom and bathroom with lots of local places to find food.', "We had booked 10 nights with Ame and were very warmly welcomed by her. Check-in was very quick, she showed us everything. The house and decor is beautiful, we felt very comfortable right away. There is also a small terrace where you can relax nicely. Our room on the 1st floor was very spacious and nice and bright, the bathroom with shower, all very clean. Ame's house is located in a very quiet street with beautiful old trees, you can hear the birds chirping early and don't think you are in N.Y. There are numerous cafes, bars in the immediate vicinity and the subway is just 5 minutes away. We also received great tips from Ame, which we of course implemented. Thank you Ame for the great time, it was the vacation of our lives!!! New is always worth a trip. We'll be back for sure and book with you again:)", "We were thrilled to stay a few nights at Ame's place. Filled with character and charm, the apartment was clean and easy to find. She even let us drop off our bags a bit earlier than our appointed check-in time so we could explore the neighborhood unencumbered. We weren't there much (too much to see and do all over NYC!) but her stoop was a welcome sight at the end of a long day.", 'Nice room in a beautiful house in a very friendly area. Close to the subway on foot. Host flexible compared to our little boy.', 'We had a wonderful stay at Ame‚Äòs place! The house is absolutely stunning, located in a beautiful Brooklyn street, the room offers a lot of space and is very nicely furnished. There are several options to take different Subway lines nearby, which made it really easy to reach Manhattan. There is also a convenient connection to the Long Island Railroad Service nearby, connecting you to the JFK Airtrain.
Ame was an excellent host, and while she was away for the first days of our stay, she gave us excellent instructions and arranged for a friend to welcome us. As this was our first Airbnb stay ever, we could not have been happier with this choice. We are highly recommending this place for anyone looking for a fantastic NYC experience!', "We had a wonderful time in Ame's beautiful house. The street is very quiet and relaxing, but it takes only some steps to get to a lively area with lots of restaurants.
Ame was very friendly and clear in her communication. A can totally recommend staying at Ame's.", 'Ame‚Äôs place was even better than expected or was what shown in the photos! It is a beautiful home, and convenient for us to go all over the city. Thanks again Ame!', "We had a beautiful stay in Ame's house. Ame provided everything we needed and we had nice little chats with her. The location is in a quite sidestreet in Brooklyn but you are at a metro station to NY in no time.
All in all it was nice staying with Ame so we would definitely come again.", "Ame's place was great! She is very nice women and her home it cozy located in a very good neighborhood. title: Cozy accommodation in Chelsea

title: Modern Cozy Nest located on UES/Central Park
all_reviews:
['The location of the place is great with easy access to public transportation and dining places. However, the actual address is different than the listed address on Airbnb (a few streets away from the listed address). We only got to know the actual address via other channels one day before our check-in date. The apartment has a security system but no doorman. We met John in front of the apartment for the check-in, and he is very friendly and easy to communicate. The room is on the first floor. We stayed for 8 nights. For the first few nights, there was a noise problem in the apartment due to a running machine outside the room, but John was very responsive and helped us resolve the issue as soon as possible.
Overall, John is a great host and this place is a good value (considering the skyrocketing hotel prices in Manhattan).', 'Clean and comfy apartment in a great location, quiet street, near subway, restaurants, and the East River.', 'Great place, helpful and responsive host. Will gladly stay again!', 'I liked everything, thank you:)', 'We had a wonderful stay at Aldee‚Äôs place with my 10-year-old daughter. The accommodations were comfortable, peaceful, and enjoyable for both of us. Though on the ground floor, we felt safe, and the street noise was minimal. The flat is well-connected, with buses and subway lines within walking distance.
John, who assisted us during our stay, was incredibly helpful and friendly, which we truly appreciated. I would enthusiastically recommend this flat to others.', 'Great amenities and very clean. The location was awesome, very walkable. Had a great time!', 'Nice place to stay.', 'Aldees‚Äôs place was inviting and cozy. Perfect location, central to many restaurants and various activities in the city.', 'A very good option to stay in NY. Aidee and his partner are very polite and flexible.', 'Had a great day. Everything was exactly as described. The location was very close to Central Park so very easy to walk to. Would definitely book here again!', "I was visiting Aldee's place for 3 nights with my wife and daughter. The place is well located close to the subway and bus stations.
Everything was good and Aldee was available with his cohost John to assist when needed.
The apartment is in the first floor of the building close to the main door so you could have a bit of noise when others go in and out.
I think the apartment could have been cleaner (without saying it was dirty).", 'Was a great place to stay! Clean comfortable and had everything I needed for my stay. Well positioned in the city to get anywhere I needed. Communication with the host was also quick and easy.', 'I enjoyed my stay here quiet nice area in upper east side ten minutes from the subway and lots to do', 'Excellent, everything according to the listing.', 'Very nice apartment. we found it clean and tidy. Well located close to various means of transportation. quiet and safe area. Ideal for 2 people.', 'Very comfortable and well located. Close to some great restaurant options on 2nd Avenue and very close to public transit options. Would stay here again.', "We really enjoyed our stay and the neighborhood. Place was spacious and clean. If you're planning to walk a lot and want to explore UES this is a very good option. Excellent value.", 'Great area, close to Tsentral Park, Metropolitan Museum, easy access to subway and buses', 'Great place in a good area.', 'Great apartment in a perfect location.', 'Excellent stay. Very close to restaurants and bars, yet quiet and peaceful during the night. Would stay again and would definitely recommend to others.']

title: Boerum Hill Beauty
all_reviews:
['I would definitely recommend Christine‚Äôs place . She was very friendly and welcomes you at home. She has great communication. You have total privacy, peace and quiet. The bedroom and living space was as described and I felt at home and comfortable. The shower was my concern when I made my reservation- the shower head holder/bracket was below waist level and no curtain to contain water- but I managed and it was a breeze.
