The room got a little cold on my second night (it‚Äôs a very cold week in NY) but there were extra blankets and a small portable heater which was helpful! The room is located on its own floor so there was a lot of privacy which was nice. There is also a desk which is convenient if you work from home.', 'Good location, modern house with good room and bathroom to myself. Pleasant host who made me feel welcome. I will come again', 'My stay was fantastic. Christine was very welcoming and responsive. The place was clean and spacious. The location is good with access to multiple subway stations. It was a good mix of feeling welcome and having privacy on my own floor. I would definitely come back.', 'Amazing hosts! very pleasant. The place is really nice, and has a great location. Museums, restaurants and Subways available at walking distance. I will definitely stay here again.', 'Ben and Christine are friendly and make guests feel comfortable. Thank youü´ßüëçüèª', 'Christine and Ben are excellent hosts who are responsive, welcoming, inviting and friendly. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The home is very stylish and clean. My room was very comfortable and having my own bathroom was great. Highly recommended staying here if you‚Äôre in the city for a few days- the area is great too!', 'Great central Brooklyn location close to shops and multiple subway stations that take you into Manhattan in minutes', "Had a great stay at Christine's place. A beautiful home and close to the subway. Would definitely book this listing again when visiting NY.", 'The house is beautiful. They have lovely art. It is spacious and clean. The private room and bathroom felt tucked away. It was an easy walk to BAM and I had no problem finding free street parking.', 'Perfect place to stay with great location and handy to Subway. It was a private space in the house and Christine and Ben made me feel very welcome. Interesting area and I enjoyed walking across the bridges to Manhattan. Looking forward to
another visit.', 'I had a wonderful stay. This will be the first place I try to book for any future trip to Brooklyn!', "Lovely place in a great location - close to at least three different subway stops and Atlantic Blvd for restaurants & shops.
The house itself has a big lounge area on the ground floor and then a windy staircase up to your own floor - nice sized bathroom be mindful of the shower there is no curtain so careful where you aim that shower! Bedroom was fine there is a smallish desk with a chair and a TV (which I didn't use).
There is a fridge in the kitchen and Christine helped me with the washing machine.
Thanks to Christine for accepting a delivery for me prior to my arrival.
Merci beaucoup Christine!", 'I really enjoyed staying at Christine's place for my New York trip. The place was as described and I felt right at home, especially since I had my own floor and bathroom! Everything was clean and I had everything I needed to enjoy my time even more in NY. Christine was also really helpful regarding some minor problems that I had and I could also use their ‚Äûgym" in the cellar. Having access to the washer and dryer was also practical especially when you plan to stay a bit longer. I can highly recommend this place when you wanna stay in New York (Brooklyn) since it's not too far away from Manhattan via subway, 15-30 minutes depending on where you want to go.', 'My stay was great, everything was as described. I would definitely stay again.', 'Beautiful home in an amazing location with friendly hosts. Highly recommend!', 'Ben and Christine were amazing and helpful when we needed them. The apartment was beautifully decorated and in an amazing part of town. Best of all it came with a friendly cat.', "If you're coming into the city, especially the Brooklyn area this is a wonderful spot. Both my hosts were welcoming, enjoyable conversations, while also giving me space to enjoy their home, which is gorgeous! You choose this spot this definitely has the feel you want if you're sharing a space with the owner of the home. They made the trip truly enjoyable!", "It was such a pleasure to spend a few days at Christine's and Ben's place in Boerum Hill. Lovely and gracious hosts, I felt right at home immediately. I was there to work and the space is great for that as well. A great desk to work on just outside the bedroom space. A nice added touch. I'd highly recommend staying at Christine's place!", 'It was really awesome and felt like home for those days. The Subway station was not far away. I slept very well with all the "New York noises" in the background, felt safe walking alone around the neighborhood at night and would definitely book this place again.', 'Christine has been a lovely host, very helpful and flexible, especially regarding my late checkout.
She even generously offered me to stay one more night for free in case that my flight should be cancelled due to the storm and flooding at the time of my departure.
The location of Christine‚Äòs apartment is perfect in Boerum Hill one of the most beautiful neighbourhoods in Brooklyn.
There are lots of restaurants, bars and cafes in walking distance.
Also, it is easy to get around with major public transport hubs only a few minutes away on foot.
The apartment itself offered everything that a guest needs including a separate bathroom right beside the guest room.
All in all I have had a great time in Christine‚Äôs apartment despite the less than ideal weather. :)', 'Christine was a great host and very welcoming. The location is extremely convient being so close to Atlantic terminal. Overall really enjoyed my stay!', 'Christine‚Äôs place was wonderful. The place is amazingly spacious and airy. I had my own bathroom which was absolutely spotless. It was quiet and comfortable and perfect for a weekend class in Brooklyn. I would absolutely book here again. An overall great stay.', 'Great place and a great host! Definitely recommend!', 'An excellent stay, I thoroughly enjoyed Christine‚Äôs beautiful, artistic home and her warm embrace of me. I felt heard, seen, and we had such affirming conversations - thank you.
I highly encourage you to book this place, and have a great chat with Christine. And if you are lucky - which I was - you‚Äôll get love from their cat Kiki and hear Beautiful Jazz music.', 'really excellent hosts and location', 'Christine‚Äôs place is a wonderful oasis in bustling Brooklyn. The place is really stylish and all the amenities are clean and well maintained. Christine and Ben are very welcoming and considerate, and a pleasure to have a chat with. Totally recommend to anyone coming to NYC!', 'Great place to discover Brooklyn and close to transportation to Manhattan.
10 min cab drive to the cruise ship terminal. But be prepared to explain how to get there to the driver.
Pleasant walk through neighborhoods and along shops and restaurants to Brooklyn museum and Prospect Park.
Friendly and responsive hosts.
Would definitely book again.', 'Very nice hosts. Cool home. Bed could use a little upgrade, but overall quite good.', 'Christine is a great host.
Very friendly and welcoming. The apartment is located in a quiet area, a short distance from restaurants and the subway station.
Due to the older building the window in the bedroom can‚Äòt be closed completely so it can get a bit cold during the winter months.
Christine provides as many blankets as you need :).
Overall I loved my stay there.
Would definitely stay here again. I can highly recommend her place. Thank you so much Christine!', 'The location is ideal, in a very nice area of Brooklyn and close to the subway; the apartment is very warm and comfortable, the layout of the bedroom (with BATHROOM and attached office) is very convenient because independent of the rest of the accommodation; just one clarification: the room overlooks a fairly busy street and it is better to have quiet balls if you are sensitive to noise. For the rest, Christine and Ben are welcoming and available, so my short stay at their place was very nice, and I absolutely recommend this place', "Christine's place is wondefull - spotlessly clean and ideally situated in Brooklyn. You'll find plenty of restaurants, bars and public transportation options just a short distance away. Christine and her husband Ben are incredibly friendly, responsive and helpfull. I hightly recommend staying here!", 'We are frequent travelers to New York City, for over 15 years, and prefer to stay in Brooklyn. This is a warm and welcoming home with delightful hosts. The bed was very comfortable, with a private bathroom and artistic touches throughout. We hope to return.', 'Christine and Ben are wonderful hosts. Extremely friendly, warm, helpful and responsive but definitely respect your privacy. Their home is beautiful with a wonderful back garden. The entire city is literally right outside the front door yet inside is quiet and relaxing.']

title: Close to Manhattan private suite.

title: Stylish studio near Times Square
all_reviews:
["As a middle-aged woman travelling alone for the first time to New York, I wanted a place that felt safe and was convenient for walking to/from some events I had planned around Manhattan. The apartment is tucked away with a very discrete doorway on a busy street. Be prepared to climb stairs! I didn't mind the workout, but folks should know in advance as I imagine they could be awkward with a heavy suitcase. Everything was super clean and the bed was comfortable. I didn't cook, but there is a full kitchen. It was very warm, so check the temperature before going out to make sure you're dressed warmly enough. The location was central - 15min walk to Times Square, Central Park, Hudson River - and once I got used to the flow of the city it generally felt safe even when walking in the evening. I would definitely recommend!", 'Beautiful, clean, well-kept apartment! Shopping and everything you need in the immediate vicinity. Many great sights are within walking distance. Location was great. We slept there for 8 nights and only arrived with hand luggage - no problem at all! All important things (e.g. hair dryer, shampoo, etc.) are available. Elana was always easily accessible and very helpful. We were super satisfied and would always recommend the place!', 'Host went above and beyond to help me in every way!', "From the first communication with Elena, I felt comfortable and taken care of. Elena was on top of everything and took care to contact us in advance to make sure everything would come together smoothly.
The apartment is clean and comfortable with everything you'll need for your stay. Wifi, Flat screen TV with Apple TV available, dishes, pots and pans and a most welcome Nespresso Cappuccino maker. There was even a Roomba.
Shampoo, conditioner and body wash were provided.
There are plenty of good restaurants nearby - make sure you check out Lily's Crepes and Shakes just downstairs. It's about a 10 minute walk to Times Square.
We highly recommend Elena's apartment for your stay in New York City.", 'The place was very nice and in a great location...nearby many restaurants and walking distance to Chelsea Market, Town Square, Central Park. Would return', 'Elena was very responsive. I quickly got into the Airbnb thanks to her clear instructions. The location is at Hell‚Äôs Kitchen, i.e. a lot of great restaurants are within walking distance; Target is only a few min walk; delis are all around the corner (as expected); Times Square / closest subway station is about 10-15 min walk away. Very convenient.
Not a complaint to Elena‚Äôs Airbnb but would like to set out some expectations for folks out there: In old buildings in New York‚Äôs fashion, the bathroom is relatively small and very clampy. The Airbnb is located on the 4th floor. I had a 50lbs suitcase. The stairs were very steep. So prepare yourself mentally before walking up those stairs.', 'Awesome apartment, and located in a great location. Lots of restaurants on the below street. Located near time square and central park. Extremely safe neighborhood. Subway stations nearby. The apartment has everything you need. We definitely appreciated the foot massager machine in the apartment from all the walking we did.', "We had a great time at Elena's apartment! The place was very clean and comfortable", "Elena's apartment was everything we expected for our stay in New York. Close to Times Square and Central Park walk. It has a bus stop in front of the apartment and the metro a short time walking. It has several places to eat and shop nearby as well. If I ever come back to the city I wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.", "Elena is a charming host, the home is conveniently located and functional, and relatively peaceful compared to the proximity to Times Square! Still note the three floors without an elevator, it's best to know for luggage:)
Thank you for the perfect stay in NYC!", 'Elenas place is quiet, warm, comfortable and had everything I could have wanted.
It was easy to access and everything worked!
There are plenty of friendly food outlets close and word class exhibits and entertainment just a walk away.
I would recommend it to anyone visiting.', 'perfect place to stay for the week of vacation in NYC.
Thanks to Elena for her guidance and advice', "Elena's apartment is super practical and very complete. It has everything you need for a great stay. Very clean and is in a very good location. Definitely if I get back to NY I would stay here again. Thank you", 'Elena‚Äôs place was perfect for us on our stay in New York.', "Elena's flat is flawless. Very quiet, clean and tidy flat, the district is the perfect place to easily get to Manhattan sightseeings by walking. Elena has been extremely helpful and reactive for all our requests! Highly recommended.", 'Super nice and clean, convenient location for sightseeing in New York City. Very thoughtful host to provide extra blankets to keep us warm and cozy during our stay.', 'Loved the apartment - very close to Time‚Äôs Square, many great food options within a few blocks. There was a sweet note and gift for us when we arrived. The place is exactly as pictured. Stocked with coffee for early mornings. Very comfortable for two of us to stay a few nights. Would highly recommend!!', 'I really liked the apartment and the location was convenient for getting around Manhattan to the various meetings I had to attend. It was quiet mostly with the exception of Friday night when it was a bit noisier.
It was clean, well kitted out and I really appreciated the free coffee!
I had trouble finding it due to an error in the address on the booking but I believe Elena will sort this with AirBnB.', 'Elena was great and the place is beautiful and in a very central location in the city... Easy to get to everything.', 'Exceeded our expectations. Elena was such a gracious host, and the place was perfect for us!', 'Elena was super kind and the apartment is very nice. Recommended', 'Everything was great overall, space, commutation, price. I would definitely recommend the place as a good spot.', 'Amazing stay in the heart of Manhattan!
Very close to the subway and to all commodities, the apartment is located in a quiet area and is perfect to rest after long days of exploring the city!
Elena was an amazing host! I definitely recommend this place for both long and short stays!', 'We had a great time.
The location of the listing is ideal, the apartment is as described. Thank you Elena.', 'Experience from üåüüåüüåüüåüüåü
From the start Elena, the owner, was available to listen to our needs and answer our questions, providing us with all the necessary instructions for checkin and checkout and to have a perfect experience in her flat.
The studio is very quaint, spacious and clean, with all the amenities (internet, hot/cold air, refrigerator, Nespresso coffee, bathtub/shower, bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries, walk-in wardrobe and kitchen) . Located just minutes away from Time Square, the flat is in a quiet, central and convenient area with good transport links.
Great experience from ripetere‚ù§Ô∏è
Thank you Elena ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Elena‚Äôs apartment is in a great location just a few blocks from Times Square, on 10th avenue with plenty of bars, restaurants & delis, and there is a corner store right downstairs. Once I‚Äôd looked on the map and figured out the direction of the avenues & streets it was really easy to find. There is great kitchen area well equipped with everything you need, including a coffee machine. The apartment is on the 4th floor so we felt comfortable having the window open and hearing the sounds of the city just added to the authenticity of staying in a New York apartment. Elena was very helpful and always very responsive to messages. Check in was smooth and exactly as explained. We loved staying at Elena‚Äôs apartment and wouldn‚Äôt hesitate to stay there again if the opportunity came along.
Stay here.. you‚Äôll love it!!!', "Loved our stay in Elena's apartment! The walls must be well insulated, not a peep from the apartment beside us. We were there during a heat wave so the window AC was an absolute Godsend. The range was gas (yay!) and the few pans provided fit our needs perfectly.
Keep in mind that it is a very old apartment building with no vent in the tiny bathroom and several flights of stairs to get to her floor. The windows are tall and provide wonderful natural light into the room. I do recommend an eye mask at night as the pull-down shades wouldn't stay down. The noise from the street below was minimal for NYC, but if noise bothers you bring ear plugs. Every night featured sirens at least once or twice.
The location of the apartment was key. Several small grocery stores, a variety of restaurants and all of our theatres were within walking distance. Elena was very responsive as a host. We would stay there again, 100%!", "We had a great time at Elena's place. The apartment is great, the location right in Hell's Kitchen and near Midtown is very comfortable. But the best was that Elena does not only the minimum for an AirBnB host but she also adds little extras that make a total difference. Things like: enough and beyond coffee capsules, hair dryer, make up cleaning elements, shampoo and conditioner options, etc. I believe this distinguishes an ok AirBnB experience from a great one. Thanks Elena!", 'A lovely place, totally centrally located.', "The apartment is centrally located, in the middle of Hell's Kitchen. The equipment is good and was very clean and tidy. If I come back to New York, I would book it again. Contact with Elena was very straightforward and quick to respond.", "Elena's apartment was exceptional. My husband and I got to experience the full emersion into NYC life. The location was walking distance to great restaurants, Broadway, Times Square, Grand Central Station and subway stations to get you anywhere else. Apartment was clean, cozy, and quiet. Thank you, Elena! ‚ù§", 'Elena was always very attentive, helpful and agile in contact, the apartment is well located, comfortable and with everything we needed.', 'The studio was really super equipped. From a fully equipped kitchen to yoga mats and coffee, everything was available. It was all extremely clean. We enjoyed our stay very much.', 'We stayed here for a long weekend and the location was great! 10 minute walk to Times Square, less than 10 minute walk to Broadway/Shows. Also close to bus and subway as well as restaurants and 2 markets next door to grab snacks, smoothies, and salads. It was so convenient! Felt like a New Yorker staying here! My 14 year old daughter was with me and she loved it too! The place was squeaky clean! Smelled amazing when we walked in! The espresso machine was such an added bonus, I needed to stay caffeinated to keep up with my daughter :)', 'My husband and I had a great time in NYC and really liked staying at Elena‚Äôs apartment. We didn‚Äôt spend a lot of time there, as we were out and about alot. The apartment was nice and clean, plenty of room for us, and Elena responded to questions very quickly. The door lock is a bit tricky though. Overall it was a great experience!', "I had the most wonderful stay at this Airbnb apartment near Times Square! The location couldn't have been better ‚Äì just steps away from all the action. The apartment itself was a cozy haven, providing the perfect respite from the city's hustle and bustle. The attention to detail in the decor and furnishings made it feel like a home away from home.
The comfort of the apartment was truly exceptional, with a plush bed and all the amenities you could need. It was very clean and well-maintained. I couldn't have asked for a more comfortable and relaxing place to stay.
The host was incredibly accommodating and responsive, making the entire experience seamless. I can't wait to return to this hidden gem in the heart of the city. If you're looking for a top-notch Airbnb experience in a prime location, this is the place to book!", "Really nice week in Elena's apartment. It was clean and tidy throughout the apartment and we enjoyed it very much. We felt at home with free coffee and the opportunity to borrow spices and other things we needed.
Elena is very hospitable and always responded quickly when we wrote.", 'Lovely apartment for a stay in New York. Loved the central spot and the decent size.', 'Elena‚Äôs place is near everything and super convenient to walk to Times Square and Broadways shows. My Wife and I enjoyed our time there and would definitely recommend this location to our friends.', "Our time in Elena's place was wonderful. Elena was such an amazing host, super kind, considerate, accommodating. She quickly responded to all of our questions, and all communication was smooth.
The apartment was impeccable, super comfortable. The kitchen is spectacular, very complete and large (kitchen items and appliances). The bed is comfortable and spacious. The shower has great water pressure. Since we stayed during the cold days, we loved arriving at the apartment because it was very cozy and warm inside.
The apartment is located near some metro stations and within walking distance of many of the theaters. There is a pizzeria and a deli next door, one open until 4 am and the other 24 hours a day, very convenient. At night it is a quiet neighborhood, so we were able to sleep perfectly.
We loved our stay at Elena's apartment and would love to stay there on future trips. A super recommended place and a super recommended host.
Thank you Elena for everything!", 'Elena is very welcoming, quick response, and open to any questions you might have. The room is cozy and has everything you need. The tourist attractions are within walking distance. I enjoyed my stay in NY!']

title: Cozy and Breathtaking Skyline View Condo
all_reviews:
["A lovely stay at Kenia and Rodrigo's place. A 20 minute bus ride to Times Square, clean and quiet. They were very responsive and understanding when we ran in to some problems with transportation and were late meeting them. And yes, the apartment is hot, but that is not controlled by the hosts. With ceiling fans and a few open windows it was not too bad. The view of the NYC skyline is amazing! Would stay here again.", 'Very kind ,helpful host. She answered all my questions right away. The view is beautiful. Equipped with everything,very nice apartment. I can only recommend it to everyone', 'If you plan a trip to New York this is a very highly recommended place with a die for View. First, the hosts are so Amazing: friendly, responsive, helpful and so caring .They waited for us In the apartment to make sure we settled in well and explained to us everything what we needed for our stay and lots of advice for our holiday. The apartment is in the Most Beautiful and safe place. Very easy to get to New York centre by bus , the bus stop is just in front of the block. The apartment has got everything you will need for your stay. Thank you so much for your hospitality and New York was Wonderful!!!', 'We loved our stay! As soon as we opened the door, we were charmed by the view of Manhattan, the cleanliness of the space, and the scent of freshness. We took advantage of the spectacular view both directly in the unit and on the street opposite. The bus took us to Port Authority in 15-20 minutes. We highly recommend this place!', 'Let‚Äôs start with the view of the city line! It was a joy waking up to the beautiful sunrise in your face!! The host was very nice. We were met by Kenia, she gave us a quick walk through and informed us about the area (stores, restaurants, and transportation) Bottled water was available in the refrigerator. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. I really loved the welcome note with our names in a frame. I know that‚Äôs cheesy but it‚Äôs the little things for me. I will definitely book with them again!! 5 out of 5!!!! Love Love Love!!!! The best Airbnb I‚Äôve stayed in, hands down.', "We had a great time at Kenia's and Rodrigo's place, communication was easy, quick and friendly. Highly recommended!", 'Our family loved The Home Away! It was clean, welcoming, and the view was incredible. The hosts thought of everything that would make our stay comfortable, and they were very responsive. The bus stop is just steps from the front door, making it easy to get into the city. We have nothing but wonderful things to say about our experience and our gracious hosts!', 'Apartment is beautiful, location excellent. There is bus access to get around New York.', 'We had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The location was perfect, making it super easy to get to the Big Apple. The place was spotlessly clean and well-maintained. We loved how convenient and comfortable everything was. Highly recommended!', "Had an amazing stay at this Airbnb with a thoughtful host. Instantly felt at home with a personalized name frame. Attention to detail was impressive ‚Äì provided eye masks, earplugs, and a local newspaper for a peaceful stay. Easy self-check-in, sparkling clean space, and a stocked fridge added to the comfort.
Highlight was the incredible view ‚Äì waking up to breathtaking scenery was a delight. Host's quick responses and dedication to ensuring a memorable stay were outstanding. A top-notch host, excellent accommodation, and prime location made my trip unforgettable.
Highly recommend this Airbnb! Can't wait to come back. Perfect for those who crave stunning views, top-notch amenities, and caring hosts for their next getaway.", 'we felt at home from the first moment. the view is breathtaking and the apartment very comfortable', 'We stayed 2 nights and it was a great place. The host are very responsible. The view is a killer. Next time I come to NYC I‚Äôll definitely stay here. As it is close to the NJ/NY water ways (ferry). 100x better than getting stuck in a car.
You get the nice view from Manhattan!', 'We had a wonderful time at Kenia‚Äôs apartment! It felt really homey, safe and relaxing - loved the radio and cute little ornaments throughout the place! The beds were super comfortable, the apartment was really spacious and clean, the kitchen had everything we needed (plus some really useful necessities in the cupboards), the views were absolutely stunning - we probably spent an hour each day watching sunrises and sunsets! :) Very glad there was a washing machine, washing powder and a drier - so useful when travelling with kids!!
Easy and cheap to get to Times Square by bus, although we took a ferry as well (steep steps to get up and down though) - more pricey but lovely views over Manhattan! JFK is 35/45 min ride away (70-90 dollars).
The only minor annoying thing was the noisy front bedroom, but I swapped for the other one with the person who isn‚Äôt a light sleeper like me!
Would definitely recommend and stay there again! Thank you, Kenia!', 'We absolutely loved this place! The hosts were so helpful and very communicative. The apartment looks exactly like the photos and is in an amazing location - quick & easy bus ride to Times Square. Very clean and spacious. Wonderful place, definitely recommend!', 'The apartment is absolutely gorgeous in New Jersey and the view of the skyline is just breathtaking, no matter what time of day or with what weather. We always got off the bus, which takes you very quickly and simply to close to the apartment, and looked for minutes. The same applies to the apartment, often we stayed longer on the windows when we wanted. The apartment itself is well and newly furnished, but the heating can apparently only be operated uniformly for the whole house, and it was really very warm. We often had to open the windows to ventilate and partly sat in the tshirt in the apartment even though it was very cold outside. You will have a capsule coffee machine and a kettle, also for cooking everything is there. A Lidl supermarket is 2 blocks away. The hosts were very nice and accommodating. We will come back very gladly!!!', "If I was to return to my my home states of NJ and NY, I would definitely rebook this Airbnb. Only negative about the 6 day stay, hosts should have mentioned that there is no elevator and there's a 3 floor walk up. My traveling companion has issues with walking. It was tough. Apart from that I had always wanted to stay in an abode in Weehawken overlooking the Hudson and the NY skyline. OMG. Fabulous fabulous fabulous. Ask about the ceiling fans.", 'Great place to stay - plenty of room and walking distance to restaurants/ supermarket/ ferry and 50 metres to bus stop taking 15 mins into the city . Perfect !!', 'Honestly one of the best Airbnb stays I have had in awhile. The host was extremely welcoming and nice. She gave us tips on things to do and watch out for in the city. The place was absolutely beautiful and was extremely clean. Floor was shiny clean. The bathroom was gorgeous. I recommend staying here. Absolutely worth it!', 'We felt very welcome and it was a pleasure staying here!', 'Nothing can beat the view of the Manhattan sky line..
it takes 2 minutes to the bus stop. Bus takes you in 15 minutes to Port Authority.
Taking a taxi past midnight from Manhattan to Weehawken was 60 usd (tip included.
Kenia and Rodrigo are very kind people. Felt at home immediately. We were there in this extremely hot weather but were able to keep the place cool enough.
We would go back if travels take us to the New York area. 10/10!', 'This comfortable apartment suited my family of five well. The view of NYC is spectacular and the neighborhood is quiet and pleasant. Easy comute by local bus into NYC and you can pay with cash on the bus (exact change not needed). Would happily recommend this apartment. We rented a car at the last minute and we were able to park nearby.', 'Their place gets the best views of Manhattan at all times. It is an ever changing landscape from dawn to dusk with that iconic skyline.
The only drawback of this place is the noise level which for us who come from a very quiet place was high. We do understand however, that this is part of New York, and not unique to this place.
Kenia is a great hostess, helpful and responsive.
The bus is literally a two minute walk away.', "Great place to stay and quick responses. From the landlady. :) unfortunately the heater was broken and it was very warm. But that was bearable and some issues were resolved right away. Thank you for the help. We'll be back.", 'It was a very nice journey. It is indeed very close to the bus which brought us to Time Square in 15-20 minutes. The skyline view is amazing and the park in front of the building as well. It was very comfortable and clean. Kenia and her family are very kind and super reactive.', "What a find Kenia and Rodrigo's place was.
Everything in the apartment you could want, it's clean and perfectly situated.
Kenia and Rodrigo are perfect hosts and very quickly respond to any questions. Would highly recommend this property and would have no hesitation in booking another stay.", "Great stay for us in this more than perfect apartment! The view is just fantastic, access is very quick from Manhattan.
It's a home to recommend", 'Fantastic hosts and accommodation. Highly recommended! Convenient for stores, a great deli (Linda‚Äôs Place) and a great pizza shop (Romano‚Äôs). Easy for bus to Manhattan.', "A great apartment with a sensational view of the skyline. We felt very comfortable and Kenya helped us with good tips. What you need to know is that you always have to pay extra by bus to New York ( not included in the metro card). We were traveling in New York all day, coming into the apartment in between, it's rather unfavorable.
The kitchen has good appliances, but the amenities of plates, cutlery etc. were rather meager.
Food supply was fine. Lidl is within walking distance.
Thanks to Kenya for the wonderful stay", 'A wonderful stay! Nice place in quiet Jersey, while you are in Time Square by bus. Lidl close by, handy for breakfast and food. Apartment is very clean and nice. Communication with host is great and very helpful.
Sleeping in the living room and street side room is noisy and fast light (bring a sleeping mask) but is fine. Absolutely recommended!', 'We had a great time, the apartment was spotless, Kenia welcomed us and gave a lot of good advice (we ate at the Beyti restaurant, it was excellent).
Manhattan is very easily accessible by bus.

title: Designer studio-center of it all
all_reviews:
['The place is very walkable to the Hoboken riverfront and easy to get to PATH. The place was really comfortable to stay and very well managed. I was provided with fresh linens and towels, the place smelled fresh and enough utensils to spend 4 days there. Away from hustle and hustle of the city, this place is a must to stay if you are looking for a comfortable and peaceful stay!', 'Very exceptional accommodation. Not only visually, the equipment is also thought out down to the last detail.
Where else to get bathrobes? üòç
In addition, everything is of really good quality.

We have collected some ideas for our own apartment.

Thanks to you!
The neighborhood is sensational', 'A beautiful space in a great area! We really enjoyed our stay. Dianna was a great host and the place is very thoughtfully kitted out and wonderfully styled. Thank you! :)', "We had a great stay here for around three weeks. The studio is small, but completely functional and very comfortable. Dianne was helpful and communicative throughout. I'd highly recommend the apartment for any Hoboken stay.", "Went with the idea of exploring New York City. The location makes it easy to take the PATH to the city, which was a huge help. While we did enjoy NYC, I was blown away by Hoboken itself. There's so much to do and see. The place is a few blocks away from the Hudson, offering the most amazing few of the city from New Jersey. Takes your breathe away. We already have talks of coming back, but spending more time in Hoboken enjoying all this town has to offer. Thanks, Dianna! Blown away by your hospitality and amazing city!", "Dianna's place was perfect for our stay: immaculate, comfortable, and well decorated, with an easy walk to the NJ transit terminal, where we used the PATH train and ferry to Midtown Manhattan/NY. The Hudson River Waterfront walkway is a beautiful area and is about a 5-minute super easy walk where you can find the best day and night views of the New York skyline. Not to mention all the different restaurants that are within walking distance. Dianna's place is highly recommended for the commodity, communication, and well situated.", 'fantastic location
well equipped
super clean
excellent stay
highly recommend', 'This was our second time staying at Dianna‚Äôs place and once again, it was lovely! It‚Äôs cute and cozy, and had everything we could want or need during our stay. We will definitely stay again on our next trip to the states!', 'Very nice place and close to the bus', "The apartment was awesome! We would recommend it anytime! Well equipped and like the pictures, perfect for two people. Dianna was really kind and helpful throughout our stay. Even though there's no washing machine, there is a laundry closeby which we made use of during our 11 day stay.
Hoboken is a lovely town with great atmosphere and the location of the flat is ideal for exploring NYC too as both the NJ buses and the PATH train is nearby.", 'Wow! Dianna‚Äôs place was perfect. The location was so fun and very conveniently located near the PATH train to the city. Her place was clean, as pictured, smelled amazing and not to mention had so many amazing amenities available. I would stay here again, for sure! I feel very grateful to have found her place, the price point was great and well worth it.', 'The place is as on the pictures, now there is even a larger TV. ;-)
Everything was clean, tidy and you saw the love of decorating. We felt very comfortable.', 'Apartment is close to many restaurants and to the Path transport system to New York City. We especially enjoyed walking on the tree lined walkway by the Hudson River at night.
Apartment is at street level across from a park. Great for people watching, and was relatively quiet at night.
Kitchen was very well stocked for cooking.
The hosts are nearby and greeted us on arrival and helped with parking info.
It was the ideal location for us on this visit to NYC.', "The place was perfect, very nice decor, very clean it smelled very good, all the travel essentials were perfect, we didn't miss anything!
Bus stop 2 blocks from the, very easy to access when we understand how it works!", 'Really nice airbnb in Hoboken! We had everything we needed in the apartment. We can totally recommend Dianna and the airbnb for visiting NY. üóΩ‚ú®
We would come again!', 'Excellent accommodation for two for a trip to New York City. Various connections to Manhattan can be easily reached on foot in 5-10 minutes on foot and then again 30 minutes by path (train) or bus over üëçüèΩ
Accommodation was super clean and as described, you had your peace and quiet and in the area are some bars, restaurants, supermarkets and breakfast options.
Very friendly owners who have also responded to our wishes. We will be happy to come back. üòå', 'This cozy place was in a beautiful, very walkable location that had loads to do, yet was peaceful and serene. A perfect base for visiting the busy NYC - come home to recharge in peaceful Hoboken! Dianna was very responsive and friendly. We had a great time and would stay here again!', 'It is a wonderfully furnished small apartment with everything you could possibly need.

Thank you very much!', 'We loved our stay at Dianna‚Äôs place! It was beautifully designed and had everything we needed or could have wanted & more. We appreciated the small details, like the extra toothbrushes (which of course we had forgotten), lots of different teas and coffee, as well as cute robes to lounge in! The location was great- easily walkable to bars & restaurants, and the path to NYC. We would definitely stay again. Thank you Dianna!', 'Loved our stay in Hoboken at Dianna‚Äôs place. We didn‚Äôt need to contact the host‚Äôs for anything because everything went so smoothly . Will defiantly be looking to book again for our next trip.', 'Are stay was absolutely lovely! The location was beautiful and it was so easy to get into the city! The space was clean and beautifully decorated!', "Dianna's place is so cute, easily accessed, and affordable! I hope to be able to stay there again!", 'Kind and very nice', 'Dianna‚Äôs place is located in Hoboken New Jersey which is a very cute town very close from New York City. With bus it‚Äôs about 30 minutes or so. Hoboken is a very cute town with yummy food! Connection to airport was also not too bad, it took us about an hour and a half. It was a very cute house as well, very cozy. Only complaint is that there is some sound that‚Äôs echo‚Äôs from neighbour/upstairs people so if you are a light sleeper I would reconsider, however I personally did not have an issue and with the location, price and how cozy and nice the house is I would still defiantly stay again!', 'We loved the apartment! Super clean and nicely equipped. While you have to take the path to go to NY, I would definitely stay again. There are many shops in the area and we had a great time!', 'Good host', 'Amazing place!', 'Great studio appartement! Lovely and very clean and well equipped. The communication vas very easy.', 'Wow! I would definitely stay here again. It was close to the city, and with bus stops just a few blocks away. This is perfect for someone who is going to be spending a lot of time in the city and needs a place to hang their hat. Dianna did an amazing job decorating. The space was absolutely gorgeous! It had everything I needed and more.', 'Great place to stay 10/10 . Dianna was always ready for our comfort, even with festive dates. It has an excellent location of the dock and the terminal path‚Ä¶ We were very comfortable with three adults in the accommodation.
Price / quality !! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED', 'Great place to stay in Hoboken! Right across from a park which is nice and about a 5 min walk to main drag of town! PATH train was easy to use for a quick 20 or so min commute to either midtown manhattan or lower manhattan! Tim and Dianna are extremely nice and accommodating!', 'Great stay! Very good location close to the city!', 'Great stay at Dianna‚Äôs! The place has everything you need, very clean, comfortable, lots of pillow options, extras like water, coffee, and some food. Conveniently located (4mn walk to NYC bus or 12mn walk to PATH), lots of coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Amazing night view of Manhattan from the waterfront a 5mn walk away. Would definitely stay here again.', 'This was a great place for me to stay as I needed to hop in and out of Manhattan. The apartment was excellently put together and there was obviously a lot of thought put into being a good host. I still can‚Äôt figure out how they knew I had forgotten my toothbrush. Great amenities in a family oriented neighborhood and Hoboken has plenty to offer only a few blocks away. I would definitely stay again if I find myself in the area. Thank you', "Diana's place is in a great location of Hoboken. It is accessible to the PATH train and bus stop and has lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Her studio is very well decorated, clean, and has nice amenities (easy access with an electronic door lock, shampoo, conditioner, robes, coffee). Diana is very responsive and helpful.
My only compliant was the sleeping situation. While I understand it is a studio and a futon is a common solution for these smaller spaces, it was 2 cushions together where the crack lined up to at our hips. My boyfriend and I were not able to sleep well during our stay as we found ourselves consistently falling into the crack. A simple mattress pad could easily remedy this if they did not want to change out the futon for a real bed. Other than that this is a wonderful place to stay!", "Dianna's place was exactly as advertised-actually...better than advertised! Location is perfect! There's a park directly across the street, and every possible cuisine is within easy walking distance. Acme grocery store was also a short walk for supplies to cook our own meals in the very well-appointed kitchen. The designer touches throughout the apartment made us feel very much at home. Dianna quite literally has thought of everything you could possibly need. This was one of the easiest and most well-managed Airbnb's I have ever stayed in. An unmentioned benefit is the ease of access with a walker. The entrance is at ground level and there is only 1 very small step down into the apartment. Excellent stay, excellent host, highly recommend.", "The apartment has a very good location. It is within walking distance to the Path Train or the bus. Nearby is a street with many restaurants and shops, but it is still quiet.
Apartment is cosy and pleasantly furnished. Everything is very clean and the details are lovingly selected.
A good location for visiting New York if you don't want to be in the hustle and bustle of the big city in the evening.", 'Great host!', "The pictures of Diaana's studio online do not do justice when you see it in person. The attention to detail is superb and the place smells amazing. We knew it was supposed to rain the entire visit to NYC, yet we still forgot umbrellas, but to my surprise there were two umbrellas waiting for us at the door for our daily use. The location is perfect and there are so many places to choose from within walking distance, including a lovely restaurant/bar on the corner. The host were very attentive and accommodating making sure we knew how to get around Hoboken and NYC. I would definitely recommend Dianna's place and plan to return.", 'My daughter and I came from London for a shopping trip to NYC. This gorgeous little studio in the lovely Hoboken neighbourhood was delightful. We could easily walk to the PATH train taking in into Manhattan in just 2 stops.
The bed was super comfy and HUGE - plenty of room for me and my daughter to share. The soaps and shower products were delicious smelling and everything felt high quality and expensive.
We loved the neighbourhood and boutiques and restaurants as much as Brooklyn.
Would def recommend and would stay here again at the drop of a hat.', 'Very cute and clean place with all the first necessity items at disposal plus a couple more extras, definetly recommended!', "Dianna's place was great to stay in for three nights after arriving at JFK at 8pm. AirTrain to Jamaica Station, then Long Island Rail Road to Penn Station, and then Uber to Dianna's in New Jersey. Was easily doable for two 55+ newbies to the USA, and was cheaper than full taxi or Uber from JFK. Dianna's place is within walking distance to the main bus route in Hoboken and it was easy and pain free to get the 126 bus into and back from the Port Authority Bus Terminus in New York. Just make sure you download the New Jersey Bus app first, and use that to buy your tickets online before the bus arrives (then show the online/app ticket to the driver). For those of you wanting accommodation in the greater NY area, we would recommend Hoboken - easy travel, cost, and great views of the NY skyline from the waterfront. Thoroughly recommend Dianna's place as a good place to stay.", "Very well located apartment (2 steps from bus 126 to NYC, or NY Waterway if you want to get to NYC via ferry), with shops and restaurants you need. Congratulations to Dianna: This apartment is just perfect. It's nice, there's nothing missing, and you barely feel at home. Hoboken is a good choice for visiting NYC: after the hustle and bustle of the big city, Hoboken's tranquility came. And I'll be happy to come back. Here it is, it says!", "Very nice apartment, well appointed

title: Spacious private room minutes from NYC
all_reviews:
["We stayed at Maria's place for six nights. The house is exactly what you see on the pictures. It has anything you need for a few days! The neighbourhood was quiet and we never felt unsafe! There are also some good stores to eat breakfast a few steps away! There is Lidl supermarket five minutes away which was great for us! The transportation was very easy, only 15-20 minutes with NJ Transit from Port Authority Bus Terminal near Times Square, from where you can go anywhere you want. If I return, I would choose it again!", "Maria's stay at home has been very rewarding, the area in which it is located is one of easy access, safe and quiet; although the only negative point would be the high cost of crossing by bus to Manhattan, however, it is easy to get to the city, in just 20 minutes you are, and from there you can move. We don't take Metrocard, we've walked all of Manhattan and it's the best way to get to know the city, in 10 days we've used the subway 10 times.
It was usually an amazing and comfortable stay, I would recommend it to anyone. When we first entered the place I was super clean and we thank you for changing the towels and trash bags in the middle of the week. Just on the last day we coincided with one of the owners and he was a lovely man.
As a constructive criticism, I would add more light to the room in the entrance yard through the doors.
Everything else, it was great and just 5 minutes from the house there are incredible views of Manhattan", "Very well located. Buses pass very close to New York and the island of Manhattan. There are good restaurants nearby, especially the Tutti Frutti which has excellent breakfast options. Secure and quiet region. It's definitely worth it.", "Cheap and cheerful. Great location for getting in and out of NYC, quick bus ride to the bus terminal, which is fairly central. The place was quiet on a residential street away from the hustle and bustle.
Lacking some basic amenities such as glasses plates etc that we have come to expect from airbnbs (but that's not advertised on the listing so not knocking off points for that, just a warning to other guests!) There was some heavy rain during our stay, flash flood warnings and the water level up to the door of the entrance got concerningly high, upon leaving one afternoon we had to wade through completely soaking our shoes. Some water also appeared all over the bathroom floor which seemed to be caused by the heavy rain as we had no issue with the shower overflowing.
Overall not a bad place for a few nights", 'The house is fine and clean. In less than 30 minutes you are in NY. The neighborhood is very quiet, and they are friendly.', 'Really nice stay, the accommodation is clean and very quiet.
We are 15-20 minutes from Manhattan by bus with a great view of Manhattan 600m from the accommodation, really great!!!']

- The cheapest option for a trip booked a week out.

- There was free coffee and tea, along with some assorted cooking supplies/guest leftovers.
- Comfy bed
CONS
- For check-in, the host asks when you'll check in and then they leave the door open and the keys on a table. I would have preferred that keys were in a lock box, as I felt a bit pressured to check in at a time that worked best for the host.
- It is a basement and folks much taller than 6'1 (my height) may struggle as there is a pipe that runs the length of the basement over the bed and kitchenette.

title: Charming Brownstone Garden Suite w Outdoor Space
all_reviews:
['A fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Nice and quiet at night, everything you need nearby and a beautiful apartment with great amenities. highly recommend', "We had a lovely time in Brooklyn. Pamela's place was wonderful. Conveniently located. Especially love the outdoor garden/patio. Lots of charm!", 'Comfortable, character apartment in a superb location, close to multiple subway stations and walkable to Prospect Park and lots of shops, restaurant etc. check in/out was easy and communication good. On a quiet street in a very pleasant and safe area. An excellent choice for visiting both Brooklyn and Manhattan, would stay again.', 'The apartment is certainly spacious, and well-located, however the condition we found it in was extemely disappointing - far from the ‚Äúluxury‚Äù advertised.
The bedroom has very little natural light.
The floors and rugs were soiled with food scraps, dust and other rubbish. The couch is extremely worn, stained, dirty and uncomfortable.
After a long international flight a sachet of coffee and/or a tea bag would have been a welcoming touch. There was a small amount of coffee supplied but it was clearly stale, as in stuck to the bottom of the jar.
The single wine glass supplied was a champagne flute.
The toaster contained a messy build-up of crumbs and chunks.
Food was stuck to some of the cutlery.
The microwave and oven need a proper cleaning.
Some of our issues could have been addressed immediately, however the only action taken was to refund the cleaning fee.
While this was welcomed it did nothing to make our stay any more comfortable.
I would not recommend this apartment.', 'Beautiful location location was perfect for my needs very walkable definitely would recommend and stay there again', 'The apartment is in a perfect location for a stay in Brooklyn. Lots of shops, breweries, restaurants and bars in walking distance. Close to Atlantic Avenue/Barclays Stadium, which has trains out to Manhattan and down to Coney Island.
The apartment itself is exactly as described. Very easy to check in and check out.
Garden is lovely but too many bugs around for us to sit outside and relax once the rain had stopped!
Kitchen stocked with all utensils and oil, salt, etc that you might need during your stay.
We would happily stay here again!']

Extremely responsive and helpful
Check in
Clear instructions for check in and everything you need to know during your stay the host welcomed us personally in the unit
The unit
A beautiful unit in a high-rise building with one bedroom and one bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen with a washer and dryer in the unit. The unit had all the basic needs. Nespresso machine and capsules were complementary.
The neighborhood
It is what I like the most about my stay in a very quiet area on the upper West side 15 to 20 minute walk to Columbus Circle all basic needs including grocery store and a coffee shop and a nice pizza place all within 2 to 3 minutes walking distance
Summary

title: Lux Penthouse in Hudson Yards
all_reviews:
['Classic New York apartment with great views, river and city. Great size for 2 large bedrooms, perfect for exploring.', 'The house was just perfect. It was stylish and simple as shown in the photos.

Overall though, I‚Äôm satisfied with everything.', "This Hell's Kitchen Apartment was AMAZING! We had such a great stay and loved how spacious, stylish and clean the apartment was. the apartment is located in a luxury apartment tower, so it is secure.

His place is a rare gem in NYC because it is a quiet place, yet you are still in the middle of all the action. Both my brother and I live in NYC and know the city well - we are thankful for having found Marty's place for my parents to relax at when they come visit us!", 'Upper westside location can not be beat! Easy access, quiet place.', "Martin is a responsive host who facilitated an enjoyable stay. The location cannot be beat with easy access to the A,C,E and 1,2,3 subway lines. Getting to the theater district and points downtown was quick and super easy. There are numerous cafes and restaurants within a 10-minute walk in addition to Trader Joes, Whole Foods, and Target. This was the first time we didn't stay downtown or near the craziness of Times Square, and Martin's place was quiet by comparison. His apartment is a refuge of tranquility in what can be an overwhelming city. The bed is comfortable, and the shower is a wonderful treat. I recommend his place heartily.", 'I can‚Äôt emphasize enough how much I enjoyed my visit at Marty‚Äòs place. It was as comfortable and pleasant as could be. Perfect location, especially in that it is so close to Central Park. I look forward to returning.', "I stayed at Marty's listing for one week in July. His listing is absolutely lovely. It's in a central location, very close to the subway, so you can get around quickly. The place matched the description perfectly and I will be dreaming about the steam shower for many months to come.
Marty was a fantastic host, very responsive and friendly. He would check in and was quick to respond to any questions we had. 5 stars, would definitely stay again!", 'Marty is the best, most gracious host we‚Äôve ever had at an Airbnb - and we‚Äôve had some very good ones. He met our cab on the street and guided us into the apartment, and he was at our beck-and-call every time we needed him. The apartment was very secure and perfectly equipped with guests in mind. The steam shower is wonderful and powerful! The bedroom has plenty of storage and loads of extra blankets and pillows, and the bed is very comfortable. With an enclosed garden patio next to the bedroom, there was NO noise outside. The kitchen has everything you need - toaster oven, microwave, coffee maker and roomy fridge. It was the perfect space and location for us.', 'this is a fantastic Upper WestSide apartment, close to everything and especially transportation, numerous coffee places, Trader Joe‚Äôs and Whole Foods, and a short walk to both Central Park in Riverside Park. Marty is a fantastic host and a great communicator. The apartment is clean and well appointed. Will definitely stay there again when I am in New York.', 'Vert comfortable stay !', 'To say Marty was accommodating would be an understatement. He was so flexible and kind. Though brief, my stay was absolutely lovely in a sparkling clean, smartly designed space. What a memorable stay in all the right ways.', 'My partner and I stayed here for the weekend and found it to be the perfect spot for us! It was clean, in a convenient location and Marty the host was an absolute delight! We will certainly be coming back to this same apartment the next time we‚Äôre in town! Thank you for everything Marty!', 'This studio is a gem! Great upper west side location, clean, well-appointed, EXCELLENT shower, and comfortable. Thank you for your gracious hospitality, Marty. We will be back', 'This space is just as described, in a great neighborhood in the UWS. Visiting my son at Columbia was convenient and walkable. The space is clean, quiet, private, safe, and comfortable. Ideal for one person, could work for two. Marty is an excellent host - welcoming and communicative. This rental feels like an OG Airbnb - someone renting out a private part of their home. No corporations, rental agencies, or middle person involved. I will absolutely look for this space the next time I‚Äôm in NY.', 'If I could sum up my experience in one word, It would be enchanting !! As someone who appreciates even the smallest of details, I was truly impressed. From the moment I stepped into the Garden Guest suite, I felt completely at home. The suite exudes serenity and tranquility, making it the perfect peaceful retreat to relax, recharge and escape from the demands of daily life. It evokes a sense of sanctuary - a place to step away from the noise to find quiet, rest and rejuvenation. It‚Äôs more than just a place to stay; it‚Äôs restorative! It offered me both physical and mental relaxation, allowing me to fully unwind after a long stressful week ! I slept like a baby, and the garden - Oh, the garden! It was nothing short of magical! The space is wonderfully private, offering a quiet haven to unwind. I highly recommend this gem for anyone looking for a comfortable, cozy and restful stay. Marty, thank you !', "The location of the lower-level apartment is great and that's really the only appealing thing about it. The aesthetics are uninspiring. The furnishings are cheap looking and very used. The picture does not reflect accurately the furnishings inside. The outside garden is also filled with cheap dirty furniture. The garden itself is dirty, it looks like it hasn't been cleaned in a very long time. There's nothing inspiring about the garden which could and should be a great feature of the apartment. The blinds on the windows are broken; the mishmash of furnishings are old, torn or falling apart.", "We had a wonderful weekend at Marty's place. It is convenient to the subway station at Broadway and 96th so it is easy to get anywhere. We will certainly book again.", "Marty's flat did not disappoint. Along with the great location, proximity to transportation, cleanliness and comfort, Marty was helpful and responded immediatly with any questions or concerns. I look forward to our next trip to NYC and overnight stay.", 'We loved our stay! It‚Äôs a beautiful, very clean space with tons of room and all the amenities you‚Äôd need, and more! The location is perfect and convenient. You can easily access multiple subway lines and get to any part of the city with ease. Very close and quick walk to Central Park and a quick subway or Lyft ride to Rockefeller, Times Square, etc‚Ä¶
The steam shower is amazing! Such a luxury to enjoy after a long day exploring NYC. The area is cute, and quiet, and has a lot of options for food and drink nearby if you don‚Äôt want to venture out too far. Marty is a fantastic host! He made sure we had everything we needed and made our stay seamless! We can‚Äôt recommend this space enough. Thank you, Marty! We can‚Äôt wait to come back and stay again!', "Marty's studio on the uws is just perfect! Really clean, exactly as seen in the pictures, and yes - the shower is awesome! But it's truly the location that's hard to beat. Blocks away from everything (central Park, coffee shop, restaurants, Riverside park, subways to rest of NYC), but yet tucked away and quiet when you need a reprieve from the hustle and bustle. And, Marty is a great host. Really thoughtful - ready to help and accommodate your needs. he truly wants the guests to have the best stay possible! Highly recommend this place to anyone..", 'Perfect place to stay on the Upper West side. Highly recommend Marty and his place. Great host, super responsive. Not a self-service check-in process BUT getting the key from Marty was super easy and comfortable! Stay here!', 'This place is a real find. It was extremely clean, comfortable and quiet, and was set up in a way that made it possible to block out all outside light. Also it has a great backyard patio. I also appreciated just how responsive the owner, Marty, was to any questions I had.', "Marty's place was perfect for us. It was an extremely hot week in NYC, and the apartment was a cool oasis - very quiet, comfortable, and convenient.", "Martin's place was as advertised. Comfortable and quiet for NYC. Easy access to the subway station made for a great visit.", 'Had an awesome stay at Marty‚Äôs guest suite. The place was as advertised and Marty was very easy to communicate with. Would certainly book again.', 'Marty was a warm and welcoming host. The studio was perfect. He generously allowed me to have a late check out. I would love to stay there again the next time I‚Äôm in New York.', 'Marty‚Äôs place is just as advertised! We had a great stay. The place is in a great location. Marty is an excellent an excellent host. We will be back again.', 'Really nice studio on a quiet street on the Upper West Side. Close to decent transport links and the Park, so easy to get around. Great place for a few days in the city, and having the garden area to relax is a really nice option.', 'Marty‚Äôs place was absolutely wonderful and he was a great host. I will definitely be back again!', 'Walk to many locations and quick subway ride to everything else. Enjoy !', 'Nice place in a great neighborhood (great architecture!) with a friendly, accommodating host.', "I love the UWS. I have stayed all up and down this area. I love Marty's place for the proximity to Central Park. Subways, with a stop at 96th Street @ Central Park West, are easily accessible to the Theater District (not too many steps at either end.) I heartily recommend Marty's guest suite. I like to prepare some of my meals--many markets are available from Whole Foods, Trader Joe's to neighborhood groceries and most of all Farmer's Markets. Simply put, a great place to be in New York.", 'Marty is a kind gentleman and accommodating host.', 'Marty was a fantastic host and the studio exceeded our expectations. The neighborhood was quiet and within walking distance of just about anything you‚Äôd need. Will definitely be back.', "My wife and I enjoyed staying at Marty's place. We had total privacy given that the kitchen and bathroom are part of what I would describe as a studio garden apartment. Location is great and we enjoyed local restaurants and walking back from the MET through Central Park.
Beats staying in a hotel and gives one a feel for what it is like to live in the Upper West Side.", 'the place was nice, there was privacy and mart√≠n was available every time we looked for him for some questions', 'Very responsive host. Space was extremely clean and homey. Patio out back wonderful. Neighborhood was quiet and felt safe', 'We enjoyed our stay in this Upper West Side townhouse studio. It was great, very comfortable, and private. Walkable to Central Park, has many places to eat nearby, and is conveniently located near metro stations, which is always a plus. Marty was a wonderful host, very helpful and responsive! Would recommend it if you are looking to stay out of the hustle and bustle of NYC.', 'this is an amazing Airbnb, such great value for the price. everything is walkable and has lots of things to do. Marty was an amazing host, very proactive and helpful. I appreciated that he was flexible when I was delayed. will stay here again', 'Okay so I don‚Äôt know where to start because there are so many good things about this place.
So when me and my friend decided to stay longer in NY, we needed to find a new place. But you know why would you want another place when you know where is the best? Luckily Marty‚Äôs place was available at that time so we were able to extend our stay here.
I‚Äôve been using airbnb for many years now but I‚Äôve never had a place where offers you two water bottles for the stay. Just with this fact, you could tell how thoughtfully managed this place is.
On top of that, there is a TV with premium channels, a super comfy bed, a perfect shower booth, well equipped kitchen, a safe entrance, a beautiful backyard etc. I mean seriously Martin‚Äôs place has it all.
If you want to make your NY trip extraordinary, I highly recommend this place. Because you can‚Äôt go wrong with this air bnb!', 'Marty was an excellent host with many local suggestions. The neighborhood was quiet, walkable, and accessible to public transportation. We hope to stay again!']

title: Blue Bell | Affordable Private Room Manhattan
all_reviews: ['All great. title: Bright and cozy private suite close to Manhattan
all_reviews:
["This beautiful home in New Jersey Very cozy and equipped with everything you need.
Silvia was very kind and helpful.
It was a listing that exceeded my expectations. It was very convenient to go from New Jersey to New York (there is a bus stop right in front of the house), and the view and the night view were very good as I went to and from New York City. If you're traveling to New York, I recommend this place.", 'The place was amazing. Superbly located, you come home from bustling Manhattan in the evening and the bus stops absolutely right outside the door.
The apartment is very nicely furnished, has everything you need and is very clean.
I would come back and recommend anytime!!!', 'Clean nice modern place. I recommend', 'We enjoyed our stay very much, felt like at home. Sylvia answered very quickly and was very nice and helpful.', 'The features of the house and place as described, Sylvia is always attentive', 'Ee loved our stay! Beautiful home! we loved that the bus out front went directly into NYC.', 'Sylvia was so kind and everything was perfect. The place is cozy, clean, beautiful and easy to get to Manhattan. Very close to here is a park and a spectacular view of Manhattan. The neighborhood is calm and safe, the people are friendly. I highly recommend it.', 'Sylvia was awesome! Very responsive and helpful with navigating through the city. Would definitely recommend staying here while visiting the city!', 'Amazing stay for my girlfriend and I, Sylvia was very helpful throughout our whole trip and was very responsive leading up to and during our stay. As far as traveling to New York the bus that leads there is walking distance that feels very safe to roam whether is day or night. Check in was fast and easy as well as checkout. But the main thing that struck my girlfriend and I was the incredible hospitality that Sylvia offered for that making it a PERFECT stay. 5/5 stars and would definitely stay again.', 'Sylvia and her Bright and Cozy accomodations were perfect...what more can I say? Thank you so much, Sylvia, for everything!', 'This place is straight out of a fairy tale! Every detail has been carefully presented and well thought out. Great, cheap, frequent, bus into NYC, stop right outside the door!
GREAT place to stay and relax after a busy day in the city with aircon; handy for local shops; friendly , helpful and informative host; free parking; well equipped alround; very comfortable seating and dining area ;
comfortable bed; cereal, snacks, water and coffee provided...
Local views of NYC skyline across the Hudson River.', "Sylvia and her place felt like home away from home. I've been doing Air BnBs for 6 years now and this is by far one of the best experiences. Sylvia was a great communicator and the upstairs area felt like you had a whole place to yourself! It was also very comfortable. We brought our dog and the area was very walkable with her. I highly recommend it. I hope you have a happy trip while staying at this accommodation.
thank u sylvia i appreciate for everything! hope to see you again :)", 'Sylvia was a great host. Sylvia is a host who lives up to our expectations! A great place to stay in a beautiful home typical of New Jersey.
Thanks again!
We'll be back with pleasure!
I would this property.", 'The accommodation is in excellent condition, it was always tidy, clean and there was no noise, in reality it is very comfortable, the place of the accommodation is very safe, in front of the house is the bus stop, everything is very accessible, the host is always attentive and kind to our doubts and needs.', 'Sylvia is a great host, friendly and always willing to help! Everything looked like in the pictures. We had a great experience, we definitely going to come back!', 'Had a very nice stay!
Sylvia was incredibly friendly and always quick to respond to my questions. She really thought along with me, which made the stay extra enjoyable.
The location is perfect: the bus stops in front of the door and takes you to Times Square within half an hour. The instructions are clear and the bus runs regularly, making getting around town very easy.
Already with all a top experience! Highly recommendable.', 'Super great stay for a trip to NYC, and Sylvia was very accommodating. I would stay again.', 'A delightful stay at a chic condo in New Jersey! The lady owner was incredibly helpful, and the room was spotlessly clean. The stylish decor and attention to detail were impressive. Convenient location and a warm, welcoming atmosphere. Highly recommended!', 'Sylvia was an amazing host. Felt like staying with family. Clean safe & so convenient we loved our stay & will definitely stay again !', 'Great place, clean and comfy. Also the location is very good', 'Super nice hostess, as already described in the other comments. It all worked out and we even drove to the airport from an acquaintance of the host and his minivan at the end of our stay, as we could not find an Uber or taxi with child seat.
Sylvia is a good-hearted person, I highly recommend a visit/stay with her.', "It was so convenient to go to Manhattan because the bus stop to board the bus was only about 30m away and returning bus stop directly in front of the house. The journey took less than 25 mins to arrive at 42nd Street of Manhattan. Location of the house is perfect, a good neighbourhood to walk around with grocery stores and restaurants nearby. The room itself was homely, with clean sheets and towels, clean bathroom, big closet for storage and a variety of snacks including oatmeal, cup noodles, biscuits, chocolates etc which I didn't expect from a Airbnb rental. Amenities provided better than high end hotels. 3 types of hair dryers/hair straightener, 2 types of ironing tools, sufficient change of towels. Sylvia was very helpful and friendly, giving us instructions to get around the city. The only constraint was carrying 2 large luggages up 2 floors staircase as the room was located at the attic. So for the elderly and people with large/heavy luggage, this should be considered.", 'Very pleasant hostess, very pleasant area, great balance to the strenuous city. Thank you!', 'Sylvia is a really amiable person and whenever we had a question or needed advice she was available for help. We enjoyed our stay in North Bergen very much. The everyday Bus Ride to NYC offers you an awesome free view to the Manhattan Skyline. We loved that! You can get on and off the Bus Right in front of the House. One thing for sure: on my next Visit to NY, I will stay here again!
Thank you Sylvia for your warm Welcome :)', 'Above and beyond! Sylvia‚Äôs place was an amazing spot for a weekend getaway! A beautiful place to stay, cozy and with all the accommodations (even popcorn)! It is 10 min ride to Sojo Spa. And not even 2 minutes (walking distance) away from the NJ Transit, that will take you into NYC! Overall the location seemed very safe when traveling in the day or night. The room was exactly as described and our host Sylvia was very very welcoming and kind! Thank you once again Sylvia!', 'We enjoyed our stay here to visit NYC. Sylvia was so helpful in greeting us and providing tips on getting around. The space was perfect for me and my daughter to rest after long days of travel to the city. It was super convenient. I would select this space again! Highly recommend!', 'Sylvia was a great host. Very friendly and responsive. The place is lovely and was the perfect size for three of us. Coffee machine and a few snacks were so lovely to have waiting for us. The bathroom was fully stocked with fluffy towels and plenty of toiletries. The space has its own stairs so very private and a decent location in terms of the city. Only a 20 minute bus journey with the bus stop right outside the door and buses every 5 minutes. Was perfect for us and we spent every day in the city. Really enjoyed our stay would highly recommend if you‚Äôre looking to visit the city without being in the middle of the chaos!', 'Sylvia is a wonderful host! She is super nice and answers immediately on any concerns. The flat is tidy and fully equipped with everything which can be needed on a trip. We got even a coffee and snack bar for free! Two ACs made the visit very comfortable during the summer and 35 degrees heat. The floor and walls are well isolated so you can‚Äôt hear other people on the building. You can cook at home any dish you want (especially important for guest with special diets like celiac disease). Local grocery stores, post office, gyms, park and even Starbucks and Dunkin Donuts are in the neighborhood. The bus stop to Manhattan is literally in front of the building. Every day going there you can admire an astonishing view on New York on the other side of the river.', "We loved staying at Sylvia's place! The suite had everything we needed and was really well-designed and nicely decorated. Sylvia was super friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the quieter location and loved seeing the Manhattan skyline from the NJ side. The bus stop is steps away from the house and an easy 25 minute ride to Manhattan. We discovered that not all Ubers will take you over to Manhattan, but Sylvia helped us with that. Highly recommend staying here if you want your own suite with a kitchenette for a reasonable price!", 'Sylvia was extremely accommodating and quick to respond. One of the most down to earth and most thoughtful hosts I have ever booked with. The house was beautiful, the AC was cold, and the shower was probably the nicest I have ever used (much appreciated after a day of walking through NYC in July). If you have issues with stairs, definitely look elsewhere, although this was not at all a problem for us. Also, the closet mirror in the photos is too clean! title: Bright, Cozy room in Brooklyn
all_reviews:
["We felt right at home at Edgars place and had everything that we needed + a super sweet cat. üêà It was our first time in NYC and Edgar was super nice to talk to and gave us several tips and what to do and see in the city. üòä Only inconvenience for us was the closeness to the metro, we often had to take a bus (which sometimes just don't go even if the app says so) and so it took us around 45min-1h the get to/from Manhattan.", "Edgar is a very nice host who always took care of our well-being. We had several long conversations with him about New York and the history of the city. The cat is intimate, playful and also ensures a relaxed and sometimes fun stay at Edgar's place. If we were to travel to New York again, we would book a place with Edgar again without hesitation.", 'I had a good time in Edgars apartment. It is clean and has everything you need for a short stay. Edgar is a friendly host and gave me good tips where to find things in the area. It takes about 10 minutes to walk to the next subway station. From there you need about 30 minutes to get to Manhattan. So all in all I can recommend the place as a good "base camp" for a New York adventure.', 'Great place! The subway involves some transfers and a bit of a longer walk. Overall very worth it. Edgar was a great host and we were very comfortable here.', "Stayed at Edgar's for a night and was everything I needed for a quick trip to New York. Place was clean and Edgar was friendly, responsive and gave some great recs for me to explore the city (especially if you DJ or enjoy live music). Would definitely stay again next time I am in town!", 'We had a great stay! The apartment was clean and well-maintained, and all the amenities mentioned in the listing were readily available.
Edgar (the host) was easy-going and provided fantastic recommendations for local spots, which really enhanced our experience.
Communication was smooth upon arrival, although there was a minor hiccup beforehand. However, it was nothing major and didn‚Äôt affect our overall stay.
We highly recommend this place for anyone looking for a comfortable stay in Brooklyn!']

title: Affordable bedroom in Brooklyn townhouse.
all_reviews:
['Perfect one night stay with easy access to transport to city', 'All good with Julie, she was helpful at all times.', "I felt very comfortable and safe at Julie's place. The room was clean and bigger than the picture.
In addition, Julie, her husband and their little boy were very kind to me.
The location is also great and safe.", 'Great accommodation. Very nice hosts. I immediately felt at home.', "Very nice accommodation located in the picturesque, lively and authentic Caribbean neighborhood of Brooklyn, with all the local shops and services. A stone's throw from the subway; very convenient for visiting Manhattan and other neighborhoods in New York City. Julie is a very friendly, open but discreet person who helped us a lot to solve a luggage delay problem. Staying at her place was a real joy.", 'The host ignored my requests to drop off a bag early on the day of arrival.
There is no welcome page or owner advice about utilizing the kitchen or choosing a restaurant. The Wi-Fi ID and password are not provided in the living space.
The bedroom has two bar stools, but no table or trash receptacle. The bedside lamp on the chest of drawers cannot be reached while lying in bed. The bed frame wobbles, and the in-room air conditioning unit is noisy.
The latch of the bedroom doorknob does not fully retract. As a result, you are locked in unless the doorknob is turned and forcefully pulled toward you.
Outside the bedroom door at night, it is totally dark. There is no nightlight or nearby light switch.
The kitchen has no table or chairs. Because the living room / dining room area is cordoned off by closed doors, any meal must be eaten standing at the kitchen counter.
The window screen by the back door has a large tear.
The bathroom trash container is overflowing.']
