I tried to be quiet as there are other rooms but the house is a bit old and the doors squeak. I‚Äôd stay here again for an overnight stay. Oh, and it‚Äôs near public transportation.', "Yuhong's place was very clean and exactly as described. Check-in was very and flexible. I would stay there again any time. Thank you, Yuhong.", 'This house is near the Jamaica station and it is easy to get from here to the JFK airport. The room is not large, but still has enough space for one person and it is very clean and comfortable. Additionally, the surrounding community is peaceful and quiet at night. I will come back next time I visit NYC.', 'good value under constrained budgets', 'Excelent!', 'Have stayed multiple times at Yuhong‚Äôs place and good to stay for a night. Easily accessible by bus', 'A great place for transit nights.
Or if you just need a bed to lay down.
The apt got clean kitchen, shower and appliances. Laundromats are around the corner. It‚Äôs basically like a small hotel.', 'Yuhong‚Äôs place is perfect to stay for a night. Will stay again', 'Very clean room for a night stay', 'Clean, convenient, reasonably priced. Stayed one night as close to LGA & JFK.', 'I for the most part had a pleasant stay. The bed was clean which is most important, unfortunately the bathroom wasn‚Äôt properly cleaned during my 5 night stay and multiple guests in the other room were arriving and leaving without it being cleaned thoughtfully.', 'See you next time!', 'Very small but just what I needed for a cheap overnight stay. Very close to the airport', 'Matched the photos and there is a bus station nearby. it was very clean.', 'Excellent stay. Yuhong is really responsive, she let me leave my stuff before the check-in time. The place was really clean.', 'Yuhong is such a sweet host and very responsive! The room is cosy and clean and close to bus/train to manhattan. Thanks!!', "The location is good in that it's near the MTA and JFK. The interior is like the photos, and is clean and comfortable. The host is very responsive as well.", 'Superbe stay, the house was clean and all went well.
Thank you. Recommended for the price :)', 'Q10 bus to JfK steps away, train station nearby. Twin bed in the room I stayed. The place was nice and quiet. Train noise but I got to sleep good and I am a light sleeper. supermarket nearby. A little dark at night but didn‚Äôt see anything strange at night.']

title: Charming apartment in Manhattan - NYC!
all_reviews: ['Very close to the subway. First time in NYC and it felt safe and everyone was sweet and helpful. Will be rebooking for our next NYC trip.', 'Sebastian was a great host. He was really quick to reply whenever I had questions and he was very accommodating. The apartment was very clean and quiet. The instructions for getting into the building were clear. I had a great stay and I would definitely book again!', 'Really cute and a comfy bed! Easy access to subway.', "Sebastiano was a very responsive host. During my stay, the hot water boiler broke and being unable to solve the problem gave me an important discount. Host very willing to meet the customer's needs. The apartment is 1 bedroom with elevator on the 3rd floor. Quiet and bright equipped with every amenity. 2-block subway with comfortable 2/3 express train to downtown. Supermarket of any kind and genre in the immediate vicinity", 'The location is great and very close to getting onto the subway. Our host was helpful, friendly, and accommodating! The only downside is that the bathroom is a bit outdated and dirty.', 'Sebastian was an amazing host! Good proximity to the Metro. Very nice neighbors. It should come out better that there is only one room.\nGreat bed, duvet, and pillows. Sleep well.\nThank you for us Sebastian. Thanks for taking good care of us.']

title: 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath apartment in superb location
all_reviews:
['Great place and location.', "Doug's place was great! A thousand thanks!', 'This was perfect, the apartment is exactly as presented, all equipment works as expected, etc. Easy to get to Manhattan. All good. Doug is a great host - if we had questions, they were quick to answer. The apartment was perfect for us (2 couples) with nice kitchen and living room + 2 bathrooms and 2 bedrooms. Also not far from the skyline and very nice to walk down the pier in Hoboken. Little trouble from the traffic and the hustle and bustle in the apartment. Nice that there were coffee cups available. Doug was easily accessible and fast in his communication.', 'Doug is a perfect host. Answers was precise and quickly. The apartment is perfect in a silent area but with the bus stop to NY in front of the door.', 'This apartment is outstanding!

Highly recommend', 'Doug was an excellent and accommodating host. very clean & organized.
there‚Äôs a bus stop right outside the door.
one would not go hungry in this town - a plethora of restaurants.
the German Bakery is a delight - just 2 buildings over.', 'A strong recommodation. Doug‚Äôs place is excellent and even better than in pictures.', 'Wonderful place to stay in a really nice neighbourhood.

Ideal location for visiting NYC as a family, we alternated between the path train and the 126 bus depending on the day's programme. These 2 means of transport take you to the heart of Manhatten in less than 30 minutes.
We were able to park our rental car in the large municipal car park D (5 minutes walk).
We look forward to coming back.", '5 minutes from Path station, shops below the house, quiet apartment on the second floor, thoughtful decor and maximum cleanliness. Functional, contemporary interior with modern appliances in a typical old Hoboken building‚Äîthe best of both worlds. True two bedroom apartment with two full baths. Plenty of closet space. Very quiet at night in the bedrooms in the back, despite some street and restaurant noise in the front of the apartment. Host was accommodating and responsive. Overall, absolutely exceeded expectations‚Äîtruly. Would not hesitate to stay here again.', 'This was our first experience using an air B&B. Doug‚Äôs place was bright, clean and spacious for our party of four. The location on Washington Street was perfect for trips into NYC or for just hanging around in Hoboken grabbing a snack, dinner, or walk by the river.
The unit is four or five blocks from the train station for an easy ferry or train ride into the city.
The only minor negative, for us, was that one of the members of our party has some vertigo issues and the steps were a little steeper than we expected. I'd stay there again and recommend it to anyone.", 'great location. clean and easily accessible to many restaurants, etc. highly recommend', 'What a lovely spacious 2 bedroom 2 bath right in the heart of Hoboken! , even bigger than expected. It is very well located, the neighborhood is very nice and it is very easy to get to NY. Very clean space and very conveniently located to everything we needed. We stayed here for a concert in the city and the directions Doug gave us couldn‚Äôt have been easier. We tried a few restaurants and bars and everything was excellent. We will be recommending our friends and family to stay in Hoboken and this Air Bnb specifically.', 'We have stayed at this place several time. We enjoy the stay every time!', 'The apartment was bigger than what appeared in the photos. Spacious bedrooms. Excellent communication . Just a few chipped mugs need replacing. Doug was very helpful. Will stay there again.', 'When we arrived we were surprised by the condition of the stairwell whose carpet is very dirty and damaged. Maybe it will be renovated when the work on the 2nd floor apartment is finished....
On the other hand, when we passed the front door of the apartment (on the 1st floor) we were delighted: the apartment is well maintained, spacious, well-equipped. It's much nicer "in real life" than in the photos. The environment is relatively quiet. The living room opens to the street and the 2 bedrooms on the back. The apartment is a 10-minute walk from the path (subway to reach Manhattan) which is also appreciated.
Doug is a lovely and responsive host.
In short, we had a great stay and we would definitely recommend renting this apartment.', 'Very convenient location and super cool small businesses around. Next time it will be my first choice to stay if I need to be in NY.', 'Loved our stay!', 'A comfortable well appointed appartement perfect for 4 people. Located in a vibrant area of Hoboken and only 10 mins walk to the PATH to access Manhattan. It was nice and easy to get into Manhattan. A comfortable stay. Thank you.', 'Quieter than you‚Äôd expect for being right on Washington St. Bedrooms face the back so no street noise. Doug was very responsive and helpful to make our stay an excellent one.', 'Everything great', "Doug, we loved your appartment. Is was spacious, cozy, clean en everything we needed was available. The two bathrooms are a great plus with two almost grown up kids.
We had the best falafel from Mamoun's, dined twice at Grimaldi's and had a few beers at Louise & Jerry's across the street. Hoboken felt as a safe friendly place to come back to after a hecktick day in the cray Manhatten areas.
Thanks for making our stay in NYC an unforgettable experience!", 'This was our second stay at this place. We enjoyed the stay again. It is very clean, spacious, and close to stores, restaurants, public transportation.', "Doug's apartment is absolutely recommended. It corresponds 100% to the pictures in the ad, which is really rare for Airbnb. The apartment is spacious, clean and in a great location. Doug was always available and responded quickly. We (2 couples) had an amazing time. Thank you!", 'Super-clean & ideally located to the Hudson River, shops, nightlife, restaurants & PATH to NYC. Excellent communication by the owner. Highly recommend!
Thank you, Doug.', 'Doug‚Äôs place was great, a perfect location, out of the hustle and bustle of New York but an easy bus ride away.
The apartment itself was spacious and clean with everything you need. A Seven Eleven store is just a few minutes walk and there are plenty of places to grab a bite to eat.
The view of New York on the harbour is a must see and only a few minutes walk. We would definitely recommend to stay here even if your main destination is New York.', 'The listing is clean, in a perfect location, and has everything you need. Would recommend to anyone and hope to stay again.', 'We do not regret our choice. In addition, Doug allowed us to leave our luggage beyond the scheduled time. Thank you again', 'Doug‚Äôs place was perfectly situated. Short walk to the PATH. Great restaurants nearby. Bus to NYC right outside the door. The place was spotless and well appointed. Super comfy beds. Very quiet at night despite being on the main thoroughfare of Hoboken. Doug was so friendly and responsive. If we‚Äôre in Hoboken again, this is where we‚Äôll stay.', "Doug's place was great. Just what we were looking for! Awesome location and easy check in and out process. Doug was quick to respond to any messages. Overall, awesome!", 'The flat is in a great location and surprisingly spacious. Great for a city break in NYC.', "A convenient and value-for-money option close to three different sources of public transport (bus 126, PATH and the ferry) - it only takes 20 minutes to lower Manhattan and less than half an hour to midtown. Washington St is a main thoroughfare so the advantages are that it's close to cafes, whole food grocers and a fantastic German baker. The noise you'd expect from being on a busy street isn't intrusive and didn't stop us from sleeping. The apartment itself is spacious, clean and comfortable and we had everything we needed. Doug is a responsive, friendly host. Would definitely stay again.", 'Doug is a real Superhost!!!', "We had a wonderful time at Doug's apartment. It's nice that you're just outside of Manhattan, but you're there quickly with the bus stop (line 126) in front of the door. The kitchen was full of comforts and the bedrooms are quietly located at the rear of the property. Hoboken is a nice place and from the lively boulevard (within walking distance) you have beautiful views of the Manhattan skyline. We can very much recommend the apartment. With 2 teenagers, it was also nice to be able to use 2 bathrooms.", "Doug's place was a little gem right on the main strip of shops and bars. We had an amazing time and had everything we needed!", 'We were in town for a graduation during a week of a lot of activity and sky-high hotel prices -- this roomy, bright, spacious, nicely appointed apartment was an awesome alternative. Great location for bus or PATH into Manhattan. Definitely on the return list. Doug was precise and helpful exactly when needed.', 'The apparment was very nice, it was larger than expected and the location was very good. 12 minutes to the path and only 5 minutes to the river. Near by two supermarkets and lots of other shops and restaurants.', "An excellent spot for a family. Hoboken itself has its charms and great views across to Manhattan.
The PATH Train means you can get from Doug's to the financial district and up to 33rd St in no time. It was more convenient for us than being in Manhattan itself and we got a much bigger apartment. If you get home late, there is always somewhere open if you need food.
Doug is very proactive. It gave us great confidence knowing he was there to help. Thank you.", 'Great place! We brought the kids to NYC for 5 days and knew a hotel room would be too tight for all of us. Apartment was perfect for a family of 4. (There are even baby things in the closet, but our kids are older.) Clean, modern (a dishwasher and laundry in the city!!), easy access and communication. Just 4 blocks from the train and so many food options right outside your door. Bedrooms are on the back side of the building so quiet. We would totally stay there again when we come back to the city.']

title: Midtown Two-Bedrooms
all_reviews:
['Excellent location in New York.', 'Perfect location!

Price competitive

Great value, great location. 2 separate bedrooms + futon in living room. Tiny bathroom and Kitchenette. Elevator.', 'Apartment was absolutely perfect location to explore NYC - great restaurants, close to subway, walking distance to Broadway and easy access to uptown and downtown. The apartment was also perfectly located within the building, even on Friday night when it was loud on the street the apartment was quiet. Check in was super easy, we arrived early and bag check was easy and they let us in as soon as the apartment was cleaned. Henri kept in contact and has a fast response time. A really great spot, would recommend and look forward to coming back.']

title: Newly Renovated - Minutes from the City - Backyard
all_reviews:
['This was a bright and clean place in a convenient location. A great pizza place is within easy walking distance. The host was very helpful with everything.', 'Benjamins place was beautiful. It looked exactly like it did in the picture even better than I expected. It was equiped with everything you needed and I was pleased with my stay.', 'Overall, it was a great place to stay. Benjamin was very responsive going the extra mile to make sure we have what we need. I am from a big city, used to public transportation and wanted to save money by not taking a taxi. He sent me very clear instructions on how to find the apartment, which made it very easy. I strongly recommend his place for a stay in NYC.', 'I highly recommend this place. Benjamin was everything and more.', 'Benjamin was an incredible host! He was super accommodating and responsive. He made sure we had everything we needed and he was very understanding with a few questions/requests we had. His place was very comfortable, clean and just felt nice. We enjoyed the added bonus of the private patio and fire pit! The neighborhood is quiet and easy to get around. I would highly recommend and we would absolutely stay here again!', 'The place is excellent. It was conveniently located to nearby public transportation and very well kept. Benjamin was a very responsive and helpful host as well. Would return again', 'Very nice place with kitchen and living area which is hard to find in nyc. Super clean. Benjamin was very responsive to any questions. About 10 min walk to subway station (7 train). Neighborhood was a little industrial. Ideal spot for our US Open visit Overall very satisfied', 'Ben was an excellent host and had great communication throughout our stay. So glad I found this place!
Super clean, cozy, and close to public transport. We would stay here again & recommend !!', 'Clean and spacious. Benjamin was attentive and accessible.', "I have never used an Air BnB. I wasn't sure what to expect. The building, from the outside, is really different than the inside. The big living room, two big bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, and the best part, the outside area, complete with tables and chairs, a grill and a fire pit. I was only there for a weekend, but we are going back for a week at the holidays. Any time I needed to contact Benjamin with a question, he answered in a matter of minutes. Very nice place!! I have also referred a friend already. Thank you, Benjamin, for your hospitality.", 'Overall a great place to stay!', 'this place is awesome. Definitely worth the stay', 'Ben was a great host! He was very nice, helpful and responsive to my questions. The apartment was very neat and clean. It had everything that I needed to accommodate me during my stay. The train is a quick 4 blocks away. The location is a short walk over into Greenpoint, and also right by the BQE; so very helpful for driving into the city. Would definitely recommended this AirBnB to my friends and family!', 'Nice quiet and roomy place to stay, outside of both hipsterville and citychaosville. Kitchen and laundry - helpful for gypsy folk like me. Great communication and response with clear instructions!', "The apartment was truly a joy to stay in! My girlfriend & I stayed for about a month & a half upon moving to NYC to give us some time to search for long-term housing, and this ended up being the perfect spot. The apartment's location is very central with easy accessibility to Manhattan, Brooklyn, and other parts of Queens. And, with a fully stocked kitchen and a sizeable patio, the place had everything we needed to settle in comfortably. The apartment was very clean & cozy as well, which allowed us to feel at home.
Benjamin was also an amazing host. He was very friendly, communicative, and accommodating to any of our needs throughout our stay. He also works most of the day so we rarely ever saw him, providing us with a lot of privacy. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in NYC short or long-term.", 'Loved this place! Convenient enough to the trains and not in Manhattan. So when you‚Äôre done with that for the day, it‚Äôs a nice quiet retreat.
The patio was great for outdoor dining, and we‚Äôre used to an indoor outdoor lifestyle (being from the southwest) which I didn‚Äôt see in a lot of other listings. The place was immaculate and I felt at ease when we entered the space (full on home away from home).
Benjamin was GREAT! Quick to respond to any questions. I was having a little trouble going home, could have stayed longer.', 'We were very pleased. Everything worked out. 15-20 minutes walk to the subway station but there are also buses nearby.
Benjamin was very friendly and helpful. Also welcomed us nicely and put drinks in the fridge for us.
If we had an issue, Benjamin took care of it very quickly.
Highly recommended, good apartment, friendly host.', 'Perfect place to stay for checking out Brooklyn for a few days. The beds and bathroom are great.
The back patio is awesome!', 'Had a great stay going to the US Open', 'Benjamin was very communicative and accommodating during my stay here. The place was clean and had a lot of amenities. Would definitely stay again!', 'Great place to stay in the area, easy to get around.', "Awesome space, didn't spend much time there , but when we were there it was nice, quiet ,clean", 'Truly enjoyed my stay. the place was clean and tidy and was a nice little get away. I was looking for something close enough to the city to drive and also quiet enough and it ticked all the boxes. the outdoor space was great especially on a nice breezy NYC evening to sit and relax. Benjamin was responsive and all the directions were clear, definitely would see myself stopping by again.', "Excellent stay at Benjamin's, ground floor apartment, very spacious with 2 beautiful bedrooms, a living room and an equipped kitchen.Public transport is 10/15 minutes away on foot (metro, bus, etc.).The nearby area is mostly occupied by businesses but access to shops is easy.Benjamin was very responsive and very friendly.We really enjoyed this first stay in New York with my daughter.", 'Benjamin was very responsive and accommodating. Responded in the app within moments to any needs as well - everything was as described in the ad & was a perfect jumping off point for us to explore the rest of the city.
Very easy to check in and out. Backyard was a nice bonus.', 'Had a wonderful stay here, very nice and responsive host, spacious , cozy , comfortable bed and well equipped, highly recommended', 'Benjamin was an amazing host. Great space! The neighboorhood was very quite. The surrounding is industrial so not a peep at night. We walked the neighborhood after midnight from the subway with no problems. He provides a very easy check in and check out process. Benjamin was so helpful and was always available for questions with a very fast response.', 'Easy to walk to public transit. Away from the busyness of the city so was restful to come back to. Was clean and felt safe. Would recommend.', 'Great location for activities in the city and Brooklyn‚Ä¶ Benjamin was a great host, very responsive and helpful, and his place was amazing! Cool and comfortable, with an amazing little private backyard. Comfortable and clean. Thank you Benjamin for giving us a great place to lay our head in NYC!', "This was a great apartment just outside of Manhattan and it was super clean and we had lots of space to relax before and after a day in the city. Benjamin was super responsive and super helpful! The map view doesn't do the location justice. You are in a very tucked away location and it is very quiet at night time. There are not a lot of restaurants near by but we were there for the city so that was not a problem for us. We would grab coffee on the walk to the subway in the morning and be in Manhattan all day. It is about a mile walk to the station and it is a very easy walk and felt very safe. At night we would uber from the station to the Airbnb for about $7 because we were exhausted and didn't want to walk lol. We would stay here again."]

title: Cozy and Breathtaking Skyline View Condo
all_reviews:
["A lovely stay at Kenia and Rodrigo's place. A 20 minute bus ride to Times Square, clean and quiet. They were very responsive and understanding when we ran in to some problems with transportation and were late meeting them. And yes, the apartment is hot, but that is not controlled by the hosts. With ceiling fans and a few open windows it was not too bad. The view of the NYC skyline is amazing! Would stay here again.", 'Very kind ,helpful host. She answered all my questions right away. The view is beautiful. Equipped with everything,very nice apartment. I can only recommend it to everyone', 'If you plan a trip to New York this is a very highly recommended place with a die for View. First, the hosts are so Amazing: friendly, responsive, helpful and so caring .They waited for us In the apartment to make sure we settled in well and explained to us everything what we needed for our stay and lots of advice for our holiday. The apartment is in the Most Beautiful and safe place. Very easy to get to New York centre by bus , the bus stop is just in front of the block. The apartment has got everything you will need for your stay. Thank you so much for your hospitality and New York was Wonderful!!!', 'We loved our stay! As soon as we opened the door, we were charmed by the view of Manhattan, the cleanliness of the space, and the scent of freshness. We took advantage of the spectacular view both directly in the unit and on the street opposite. The bus took us to Port Authority in 15-20 minutes. We highly recommend this place!', 'Let‚Äôs start with the view of the city line! It was a joy waking up to the beautiful sunrise in your face!! The host was very nice. We were met by Kenia, she gave us a quick walk through and informed us about the area (stores, restaurants, and transportation) Bottled water was available in the refrigerator. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. I really loved the welcome note with our names in a frame. I know that‚Äôs cheesy but it‚Äôs the little things for me. I will definitely book with them again!! 5 out of 5!!!! Love Love Love!!!! The best Airbnb I‚Äôve stayed in, hands down.', "We had a great time at Kenia's and Rodrigo's place, communication was easy, quick and friendly. Highly recommended!", 'Our family loved The Home Away! It was clean, welcoming, and the view was incredible. The hosts thought of everything that would make our stay comfortable, and they were very responsive. The bus stop is just steps from the front door, making it easy to get into the city. We have nothing but wonderful things to say about our experience and our gracious hosts!', 'Apartment is beautiful, location excellent. There is bus access to get around New York.', 'We had a fantastic stay at this Airbnb! The location was perfect, making it super easy to get to the Big Apple. The place was spotlessly clean and well-maintained. We loved how convenient and comfortable everything was. Highly recommended!', "Had an amazing stay at this Airbnb with a thoughtful host. Instantly felt at home with a personalized name frame. Attention to detail was impressive ‚Äì provided eye masks, earplugs, and a local newspaper for a peaceful stay. Easy self-check-in, sparkling clean space, and a stocked fridge added to the comfort.
Highlight was the incredible view ‚Äì waking up to breathtaking scenery was a delight. Host's quick responses and dedication to ensuring a memorable stay were outstanding. A top-notch host, excellent accommodation, and prime location made my trip unforgettable.
Highly recommend this Airbnb! Can't wait to come back. Perfect for those who crave stunning views, top-notch amenities, and caring hosts for their next getaway.", 'we felt at home from the first moment. the view is breathtaking and the apartment very comfortable', 'We stayed 2 nights and it was a great place. The host are very responsible. The view is a killer. Next time I come to NYC I‚Äôll definitely stay here. As it is close to the NJ/NY water ways (ferry). 100x better than getting stuck in a car.
You get the nice view from Manhattan!', 'We had a wonderful time at Kenia‚Äôs apartment! It felt really homey, safe and relaxing - loved the radio and cute little ornaments throughout the place! The beds were super comfortable, the apartment was really spacious and clean, the kitchen had everything we needed (plus some really useful necessities in the cupboards), the views were absolutely stunning - we probably spent an hour each day watching sunrises and sunsets! :) Very glad there was a washing machine, washing powder and a drier - so useful when travelling with kids!!
Easy and cheap to get to Times Square by bus, although we took a ferry as well (steep steps to get up and down though) - more pricey but lovely views over Manhattan! JFK is 35/45 min ride away (70-90 dollars).
The only minor annoying thing was the noisy front bedroom, but I swapped for the other one with the person who isn‚Äôt a light sleeper like me!
Would definitely recommend and stay there again! Thank you, Kenia!', 'We absolutely loved this place! The hosts were so helpful and very communicative. The apartment looks exactly like the photos and is in an amazing location - quick & easy bus ride to Times Square. Very clean and spacious. Wonderful place, definitely recommend!', 'The apartment is absolutely gorgeous in New Jersey and the view of the skyline is just breathtaking, no matter what time of day or with what weather. We always got off the bus, which takes you very quickly and simply to close to the apartment, and looked for minutes. The same applies to the apartment, often we stayed longer on the windows when we wanted. The apartment itself is well and newly furnished, but the heating can apparently only be operated uniformly for the whole house, and it was really very warm. We often had to open the windows to ventilate and partly sat in the tshirt in the apartment even though it was very cold outside. You will have a capsule coffee machine and a kettle, also for cooking everything is there. A Lidl supermarket is 2 blocks away. The hosts were very nice and accommodating. We will come back very gladly!!!', "If I was to return to my my home states of NJ and NY, I would definitely rebook this Airbnb. Only negative about the 6 day stay, hosts should have mentioned that there is no elevator and there's a 3 floor walk up. My traveling companion has issues with walking. It was tough. Apart from that I had always wanted to stay in an abode in Weehawken overlooking the Hudson and the NY skyline. OMG. Fabulous fabulous fabulous. Ask about the ceiling fans.", 'Great place to stay - plenty of room and walking distance to restaurants/ supermarket/ ferry and 50 metres to bus stop taking 15 mins into the city . Perfect !!', 'Honestly one of the best Airbnb stays I have had in awhile. The host was extremely welcoming and nice. She gave us tips on things to do and watch out for in the city. The place was absolutely beautiful and was extremely clean. Floor was shiny clean. The bathroom was gorgeous. I recommend staying here. Absolutely worth it!', 'We felt very welcome and it was a pleasure staying here!', 'Nothing can beat the view of the Manhattan sky line..
it takes 2 minutes to the bus stop. Bus takes you in 15 minutes to Port Authority.
Taking a taxi past midnight from Manhattan to Weehawken was 60 usd (tip included.
Kenia and Rodrigo are very kind people. Felt at home immediately. We were there in this extremely hot weather but were able to keep the place cool enough.
We would go back if travels take us to the New York area. 10/10!', 'This comfortable apartment suited my family of five well. The view of NYC is spectacular and the neighborhood is quiet and pleasant. Easy comute by local bus into NYC and you can pay with cash on the bus (exact change not needed). Would happily recommend this apartment. We rented a car at the last minute and we were able to park nearby.', 'Their place gets the best views of Manhattan at all times. It is an ever changing landscape from dawn to dusk with that iconic skyline.
The only drawback of this place is the noise level which for us who come from a very quiet place was high. We do understand however, that this is part of New York, and not unique to this place.
Kenia is a great hostess, helpful and responsive.
The bus is literally a two minute walk away.', "Great place to stay and quick responses. From the landlady. :) unfortunately the heater was broken and it was very warm. But that was bearable and some issues were resolved right away. Thank you for the help. We'll be back.", 'It was a very nice journey. It is indeed very close to the bus which brought us to Time Square in 15-20 minutes. The skyline view is amazing and the park in front of the building as well. It was very comfortable and clean. Kenia and her family are very kind and super reactive.', "What a find Kenia and Rodrigo's place was.
Everything in the apartment you could want, it's clean and perfectly situated.
Kenia and Rodrigo are perfect hosts and very quickly respond to any questions. Would highly recommend this property and would have no hesitation in booking another stay.", "Great stay for us in this more than perfect apartment! The view is just fantastic, access is very quick from Manhattan.

The kitchen has good appliances, but the amenities of plates, cutlery etc. were rather meager.

Thanks to Kenya for the wonderful stay", 'A wonderful stay! Nice place in quiet Jersey, while you are in Time Square by bus. Lidl close by, handy for breakfast and food. Apartment is very clean and nice. Communication with host is great and very helpful.
Sleeping in the living room and street side room is noisy and fast light (bring a sleeping mask) but is fine. Absolutely recommended!', 'We had a great time, the apartment was spotless, Kenia welcomed us and gave a lot of good advice (we ate at the Beyti restaurant, it was excellent).
Manhattan is very easily accessible by bus.
And the view from the apartment is just amazing!', 'Amazing hosts, so friendly & helpful; Fab apartment, great location & WOW‚Ä¶what can I say the view of Manhattan‚Äôs skyline‚Ä¶just breathtaking!
Thanks for being such great hosts, would highly recommend!', 'Had an amazing NYC weekend staying at The Home Away. Incredible view. Host was super accommodating and responsive. We had a great time and enjoyed our stay immensely! We are already talking about a second visit to NYC, and we will definitely stay here again!', 'Our hosts were awesome. We loved it:)', "The apartment is perfectly located, larger than what's shown in the pictures, super clean and very well equipped. Hosts are extremely responsive and helpful. Worth every penny. Exceptional apartment with a breathtaking view
20-minute bus access to Times Square
Of course we'll go back for a next stay", 'Kenya was a fabulous host. The apartment was identical to photos. Super comfortable beds. Everything was very clean. THE VIEWS ARE UNBELIEVABLE. Highly recommend.', 'We stayed at this beautiful apartment for the second time. Absolutely recommended.', 'Our first New York/trip and then in such a dreamy place to stay. Incredible views of the Manhattan skyline. Bus stop was two minutes away, ferry to Midtown about 10. Great layout with large kitchen and two very nice bedrooms. We felt immediately comfortable and would book there again and again.', 'It was a house with a Manhattan view, so we were able to see the other scenery every morning and evening.', "We felt very comfortable in the apartment of Kenya and Rodrigo. The two hosts were very friendly and easily accessible. The apartment was as described. Everything is available to enjoy a relaxed holiday there. Shopping is a few blocks away. The bus to the city (line 128, 165, 166) to Port Authority almost runs from the front door. In about 15 to 20 minutes, you're in New York City.
The view of the New York skyline is breathtaking from the living room. We still loved sitting at the window in the evening after our return from town and enjoyed the view.
We can highly recommend the apartment and would love to come back again with another trip to New York.", 'walking distance to all the action in plaza midwood. so happy we stayed here', 'Very very clean, beautiful view, very comfortable and friendly neighborhood. The view of NYC was beautiful to wake up and look at everyday. Kenia and Rodrigo were wonderful hosts. We will definitely be back', 'Kenya and Rodrigo were very nice, always available and answered all questions quickly. The apartment was clean, the bus to Manhattan went one block away. The view from living room and bedroom was bombastic.
Everything was best, no problems', 'The pictures in the description doesn‚Äôt do justice! Beautiful skyline views! The apartment was stunning beautiful! Don‚Äôt hesitate to book this amazing property!', 'Kenia and Rodrigo are great, very dedicated hosts. The apartment is very well located and the view is exceptional!
I recommend it.', 'Kenia was great and very responsive. The place had a beautiful view and the bus was a five minute walk that takes you right into New York City and comes often. The key to get into the lobby was a little difficult to open it kept getting stuck so definitely something they need to fix. Also keep in mind you have to park on the street and parking is limited so we parked and used public transportation because if you leave and come back in parking is difficult to find. They give you a parking pass to park. The place was clean and well maintained. Would definitely come back. Loved our time there.', 'very nice apartment, well located 10-15 minutes from Manhattan by bus.
And what a view!!!
All the Skyline in front of you.
I would recommend it to anyone and will definitely be back.
Kenia and Rodrigo are very welcoming hosts and available if needed.
They are very farsighted and very attentive.', 'A great house to stay in. Fantastic views of Manhattan. Clean house with good facilities. A very friendly host, flexible check in times. We found it a wonderful place to return to in the evening. Knowing that there is a good bed and nice nice shower waiting for you.
Newyork was beautiful but the house was also a big 10. Thank you Kenia en Roderiques. Greets fam Enderle', 'Was absolutely amazing staying at Kenia and Rodrigos place. The view of the NYC skyline was gorgeous and more than we expected coming from the apartment.
However the highlight of the trip was the communication between Kenia and our party. She was incredibly accommodating providing us the parking passes for free, meeting us earlier than check in and providing us a later check out as well! She responds very quickly and is very accommodating for any issues.
Would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would love to come back!', 'Kenia and Rodrigo‚Äôs place is absolutely beautiful! It was so nice they took our luggage before check in so we did not have bring luggage bag around the city. Very helpful with every question I had and responded back so quickly. Felt very welcomed. If I could do more than 5 stars I would. Will definitely book again! Thank you Kenia and Rodrigo!!', 'We had an amazing stay in the apartment! The communication with Kenia was friendly, easy and super fast. We felt very welcome.
Everything looked like it was described. The apartment was very clean and easily reachable from New York. You can‚Äôt get a better skyline view.', 'Kenia and Rodrigo were excellent hosts. They even greeted us and showed us around at check in. They were so friendly and thoughtful. They take pride in their property. They are hands down the most responsive Airbnb hosts I‚Äôve ever experienced. Their place is awesome and the views to die for and so convenient to NYC. I highly recommend staying here.']

title: Newly Renovated - Minutes from the City - Backyard
all_reviews:
['This was a bright and clean place in a convenient location. A great pizza place is within easy walking distance. The host was very helpful with everything.', 'Benjamins place was beautiful. It looked exactly like it did in the picture even better than I expected. It was equiped with everything you needed and I was pleased with my stay.', 'Overall, it was a great place to stay. Benjamin was very responsive going the extra mile to make sure we have what we need. I am from a big city, used to public transportation and wanted to save money by not taking a taxi. He sent me very clear instructions on how to find the apartment, which made it very easy. I strongly recommend his place for a stay in NYC.', 'I highly recommend this place. Benjamin was everything and more.', 'Benjamin was an incredible host! He was super accommodating and responsive. He made sure we had everything we needed and he was very understanding with a few questions/requests we had. His place was very comfortable, clean and just felt nice. We enjoyed the added bonus of the private patio and fire pit! The neighborhood is quiet and easy to get around. I would highly recommend and we would absolutely stay here again!', 'The place is excellent. It was conveniently located to nearby public transportation and very well kept. Benjamin was a very responsive and helpful host as well. Would return again', 'Very nice place with kitchen and living area which is hard to find in nyc. Super clean. Benjamin was very responsive to any questions. About 10 min walk to subway station (7 train). Neighborhood was a little industrial. Ideal spot for our US Open visit Overall very satisfied', 'Ben was an excellent host and had great communication throughout our stay. So glad I found this place!
Super clean, cozy, and close to public transport. We would stay here again & recommend !!', 'Clean and spacious. Benjamin was attentive and accessible.', "I have never used an Air BnB. I wasn't sure what to expect. The building, from the outside, is really different than the inside. The big living room, two big bedrooms, bathroom, kitchen, and the best part, the outside area, complete with tables and chairs, a grill and a fire pit. I was only there for a weekend, but we are going back for a week at the holidays. Any time I needed to contact Benjamin with a question, he answered in a matter of minutes. Very nice place!! I have also referred a friend already. Thank you, Benjamin, for your hospitality.", 'Overall a great place to stay!', 'this place is awesome. Definitely worth the stay', 'Ben was a great host! He was very nice, helpful and responsive to my questions. The apartment was very neat and clean. It had everything that I needed to accommodate me during my stay. The train is a quick 4 blocks away. The location is a short walk over into Greenpoint, and also right by the BQE; so very helpful for driving into the city. Would definitely recommended this AirBnB to my friends and family!', 'Nice quiet and roomy place to stay, outside of both hipsterville and citychaosville. Kitchen and laundry - helpful for gypsy folk like me. Great communication and response with clear instructions!', "The apartment was truly a joy to stay in! My girlfriend & I stayed for about a month & a half upon moving to NYC to give us some time to search for long-term housing, and this ended up being the perfect spot. The apartment's location is very central with easy accessibility to Manhattan, Brooklyn, and other parts of Queens. And, with a fully stocked kitchen and a sizeable patio, the place had everything we needed to settle in comfortably. The apartment was very clean & cozy as well, which allowed us to feel at home.
Benjamin was also an amazing host. He was very friendly, communicative, and accommodating to any of our needs throughout our stay. He also works most of the day so we rarely ever saw him, providing us with a lot of privacy. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in NYC short or long-term.", 'Loved this place! Convenient enough to the trains and not in Manhattan. So when you‚Äôre done with that for the day, it‚Äôs a nice quiet retreat.
The patio was great for outdoor dining, and we‚Äôre used to an indoor outdoor lifestyle (being from the southwest) which I didn‚Äôt see in a lot of other listings. The place was immaculate and I felt at ease when we entered the space (full on home away from home).
Benjamin was GREAT! Quick to respond to any questions. I was having a little trouble going home, could have stayed longer.', 'We were very pleased. Everything worked out. 15-20 minutes walk to the subway station but there are also buses nearby.
Benjamin was very friendly and helpful. Also welcomed us nicely and put drinks in the fridge for us.
If we had an issue, Benjamin took care of it very quickly.
Highly recommended, good apartment, friendly host.', 'Perfect place to stay for checking out Brooklyn for a few days. The beds and bathroom are great.
The back patio is awesome!', 'Had a great stay going to the US Open', 'Benjamin was very communicative and accommodating during my stay here. The place was clean and had a lot of amenities. Would definitely stay again!', 'Great place to stay in the area, easy to get around.', "Awesome space, didn't spend much time there , but when we were there it was nice, quiet ,clean", 'Truly enjoyed my stay. the place was clean and tidy and was a nice little get away. I was looking for something close enough to the city to drive and also quiet enough and it ticked all the boxes. the outdoor space was great especially on a nice breezy NYC evening to sit and relax. Benjamin was responsive and all the directions were clear, definitely would see myself stopping by again.', "Excellent stay at Benjamin's, ground floor apartment, very spacious with 2 beautiful bedrooms, a living room and an equipped kitchen.Public transport is 10/15 minutes away on foot (metro, bus, etc.).The nearby area is mostly occupied by businesses but access to shops is easy.Benjamin was very responsive and very friendly.We really enjoyed this first stay in New York with my daughter.", 'Benjamin was very responsive and accommodating. Responded in the app within moments to any needs as well - everything was as described in the ad & was a perfect jumping off point for us to explore the rest of the city.
Very easy to check in and out. Backyard was a nice bonus.', 'Had a wonderful stay here, very nice and responsive host, spacious , cozy , comfortable bed and well equipped, highly recommended', 'Benjamin was an amazing host. Great space! The neighboorhood was very quite. The surrounding is industrial so not a peep at night. We walked the neighborhood after midnight from the subway with no problems. He provides a very easy check in and check out process. Benjamin was so helpful and was always available for questions with a very fast response.', 'Easy to walk to public transit. Away from the busyness of the city so was restful to come back to. Was clean and felt safe. Would recommend.', 'Great location for activities in the city and Brooklyn‚Ä¶ Benjamin was a great host, very responsive and helpful, and his place was amazing! Cool and comfortable, with an amazing little private backyard. Comfortable and clean. Thank you Benjamin for giving us a great place to lay our head in NYC!', "This was a great apartment just outside of Manhattan and it was super clean and we had lots of space to relax before and after a day in the city. Benjamin was super responsive and super helpful! The map view doesn't do the location justice. You are in a very tucked away location and it is very quiet at night time. There are not a lot of restaurants near by but we were there for the city so that was not a problem for us. We would grab coffee on the walk to the subway in the morning and be in Manhattan all day. It is about a mile walk to the station and it is a very easy walk and felt very safe. At night we would uber from the station to the Airbnb for about $7 because we were exhausted and didn't want to walk lol. We would stay here again."]

title: New luxury chic suite in NYC
all_reviews:
['Nia was a lovely host!! I can‚Äôt express enough how helpful she was from the time I was interested in booking right until I left her property. The home is as pictured & was tidy & clean. The bed was comfy & the sofa pulls out to make another bed! The space is perfect for two & was more than enough. Nia‚Äôs stylish decor was selfie ready, I would definitely revisit this gorgeous property & it helps that there are bars & restaurants right at her doorstep! Thank you again Nia.', 'cozy apartment in the heart of Brooklyn with plenty of shops, resturants, and stores within close walking distance
highly recommend', "We felt very well taken care of at the place for 4 days. Nia is a courteous host, communicated everything well in advance and was quickly accessible. It's all there that's needed. Very quiet to sleep in. Subway station Nostrand can be reached in 10 minutes and from there by Express Subway in 20 minutes in Manhattan. Perfect for a trip to New York. Thank you Nia.", 'Top apartment, very well maintained and everything you need is there - very happy to come back!!!', 'Nia‚Äôs place is the perfect Brooklyn stay- clean, comfortable, easy to get to. Highly recommend this gem of a spot!', 'Great stay and location! Awesome grocery store on the corner and train a 5-10 minute walk away. Space super modern and clean. Will definitely be back if staying in the area!', 'Thank you Nia!
We enjoyed our stay and will be back!', "Nia's place was perfect for my short stay in Brooklyn. It was extremely clean and Nia is very responsive. Highly recommended!", "Nia's place was in an ideal area of Brooklyn for me. Walkable to a handful of favorite restaurants and bars but also quick access to the train. Nia herself was very attentive and checkin was a breeze. I felt very comfortable during the entirety of the stay.", "We had a great family stay at Nia's apartment.
She is very responsive, attentive and welcoming. The apartment is quiet, clean, well-equipped and pleasant.
Nia makes every effort to make our stay as pleasant as possible and it works!
2 metro stations close to the property. Convenience store at the corner. Everything was perfect.", 'This was my first visit to New York but my stay experience was smooth from the beginning. Nia was responsive and helpful throughout the whole time and would check up on me to see if I needed anything, which I appreciated.
A beautiful home and a kind host. The home was as pictured; beautiful. I also enjoyed walking around the neighborhood, there was so much to do!
Overall, I enjoyed my stay and can see myself booking another stay here ·µïÃà', "Location was very good for what we were looking for, only few metro stops from Manhattan. Nia's father was nearby all the time, very helpful with everything. Big, spacious apartmant, with kitchen, bathroom and washing machine and dryer. Washing machine was not working, but there's another one in basement we could use.", 'Really appreciated the clear instructions for travel from the airport and entrance into the flat as we ended up arriving after midnight due to delayed flights. Metro stops are walkable- 6 blocks‚Ä¶ so about 10 minutes. We loved the restaurant Ras, which serves plant based Ethiopian food ( although lots of other yummy and close food choices are available that we enjoyed too.)
The flat is exactly as it appears in the pictures and it sits to the back of the building, which made it surprisingly quiet. The bed is firm and comfortable.
Nia has set up he home to be welcoming and communication is very responsive.', 'Lovely, pristine space. Great location. Nia was very responsive and flexible with my schedule.', "My stay at Nia's place was great! It was very nice to be near local shops and restaurants for late night bites. It was a bit further from the train that what was I expecting, but it was doable walk. Other than this we had an amazing stay!", 'This is a nice place and Nia is a great host. It was clean and well furnished, and looks like the pictures. The bed was comfortable. Nia was really responsive to all needs.
The only thing I would correct about the listing is that it is not merely ‚Äústeps away‚Äù from the subway: it is a 10 minute walk. This was not a huge deal for us, but if you have mobility issues or don‚Äôt like walking a lot in the heat or at night, keep this in mind. But overall, it‚Äôs a very nice place to stay.', 'Great apartment and Nia was a wonderful host!', 'Nia‚Äôs place was exactly what we needed for our trip to NYC. The apartment was decorated really nicely, comfortable and the air con very much appreciated.
Nia was always very responsive, friendly and flexible with our flight later in the day.
Thank you Nia', 'Nia‚Äôs apartment is beautiful. It has stylish and modern touches and was great for working from home. She was an attentive and kind host and during my stay I met her father Christopher who was so helpful and equally kinds The location is an easy walk to the AC and 2345 trains and short walk from Franklin. I had a wonderful stay and hope to be back!', 'Absolutely amazing host! She made me feel right at home, also her father who lives close by was extremely helpful, welcoming, and kind. Nia‚Äôs is a phenomenal host, and anyone would be lucky to stay at her accommodations.', 'I had some travel plans that delayed my stay but Nia was communicative and helpful throughout. The property was clean and exactly as pictured. Overall a lovely experience. Would recommend this property to anyone!', "I was very happy with the apartment, very well set up, liked how comfy the bed and sofa were. The attention to detail: night light, shower gels, shampoo, conditioner and hand pump soap. Mini air filter/air con (maybe). Clean kitchen. Nice fresh breeze. Felt very safe. Easy communication with the owner. Father of the owner nearby offered his help and was very friendly. Supermarket 1 minute away.
It was simply lovely and I'd recommend it for sure", "Nia's service was very very good", 'My boyfriend and I are delighted with our stay at Nia‚Äôs place. We found exactly what we were looking for: a private, clean, new, affordable apartment close to the metro station, allowing us to explore the city easily. Additionally, Nia is a very responsive, kind, and friendly host. The thoughtful touches, like having water in the fridge upon our arrival, lovely decorations, soft towels, and pleasantly scented shower gel, made us feel at home. All the windows face the inner yard, ensuring a peaceful environment without street noise, although occasionally, we could hear neighbors walking upstairs. The district where the apartment is located felt vibrant and lively, and we especially appreciated the apartment being within a walking distance to Prospect Park. Overall, it‚Äôs a fantastic place, and we highly recommend it!!!', "It was incredible, very nice, the Airbnb is just like in the photos, very clean, easy arrival, clear instructions, I would definitely stay at Nia's place again. I loved it!!!", 'Nice spacious apartment especially for NY. Kitchen is sparse. Don‚Äôt plan on cooking. Nice full sized fridge and freezer though. Comfy bed. AC worked great. Not much surface space for personal items in the bedroom and bathroom. I moved the decorations to I‚Äôve space for my bathroom and bedside items. No big deal.', 'This Airbnb was absolutely perfect for me and my girlfriend, it was spotless, she had everything that we needed and everything was walkable to get to wether I had to take the bus or get on the subway. The food place around the area were great as well. Definitely coming back to this place whenever I come back to NYC. Loved every bit of it!!', "Nia's place is exceptionally clean, roomy, and in a great location. Nia and her dad were always available for questions and gave great recommendations for the neighborhood. I wouldn't think twice about booking Nia's place again.", 'Our stay at Nia‚Äôs was really great! Crown Heights is a really cool diverse neighborhood that was really fun and within a close walk or subway ride from many other neighborhoods! Her place we very clean and tidy and the bed was very comfortable! We would definitely stay here again!', 'Close to daughter in Brooklyn. Walk to restaurants, close to subway.about 15 minute walk.', 'This apartment was very nice and clean.
We always felt very safe and while it is a very lively neighborhood, it was was always very quiet inside the building.
The location was easily reachable from both subway station by an about 10 minute walk.
We would definitely stay here again.', 'I recently had the pleasure of staying at Nia‚Äôs Airbnb, and it was a great experience.
Nia was always responsive. The place is comfortable and cozy. Exactly as depicted in the pictures. The apartment was clean and well organized.
One of the highlights of Nia‚Äôs place is its location. Being close to a metro station made it easy to explore the city.
If you are looking for a great place to stay, don‚Äôt hesitate to book with Nia.', "Nia's place is exactly as pictured and she's a responsive, friendly host.", 'Such an amazing place! Very comfy and felt like home. Everything was exactly like the pictures and description. The host communicated within a quick time period. There are honestly no complaints, I would recommend to anyone who can get their hands on this apartment. It was exceptionally clean, practically spotless. We had a fantastic stay, everything was close and convenient!', 'It is a great space and is very well connected, the subway is close by and it is easy to travel to all NY attractions.', 'Excellent communication, looks exactly like pictures. Has a nice hotel vibe (comfortable, clean, generic) with the amenities of a kitchen and more space. The coffee, drinks and snacks were a really welcome surprise. We found street parking quickly and you can walk to the subway fairly easily.', 'Nia‚Äôs apartment is a modern and spacious place. It is located close to a subway station that connects very well to the city. There are plenty of local restaurants and shops around, including a great supermarket. Nia has been an amazing host with clear instructions, her responsiveness before, throughout and after the stay was very helpful.', 'Great apartment. Very clean and cute. Nice and convenient neighborhood!', 'Nia has a great place. Clean and comfortable. We used it as a home base while going into manhattan for sightseeing.', 'I will definitely be returning here for my next visit to NY. Nia‚Äôs apartment is exactly the way it looks in her photos and she is indeed very responsive. I also had a great interaction with Liz who is in charge of cleaning the apartment. Liz and Nia were both very helpful during my stay!', 'Staying a month in NYC we needed to find the right Airbnb and we certainly did. This became our home away from home that we will fondly remember.
Here are some of the key reasons:
1. Apartment was as per pictures. Spotless, cosy and with a fully functioning kitchen where we cooked some great meals at home.
2. Building was very secure.
3. Public transport in every direction and so easy to use. We never got it wrong once using the MTA App. Walking and subway is the most effective way to get around and essential in saving a few dollars.
4. Great supermarkets and bottle shops all around as well as restaurants. Fresh produce is premium in this neighbourhood.
5. Nia was always so responsive, although because the apartment is so well prepared there was very little need for interaction.
Summary: If you‚Äôre looking for a wonderful NYC experience and a great apartment and host then this property is for you. Thank you Nia for our immersive holiday. We now consider ourselves honorary Brooklyners.', "The stay at Nia's Airbnb was perfect. The place was exactly as it was in the pictures. The bed and the sofa bed are super comfortable. The whole apartment was spotless and had everything you need for cooking. Nia was looking out for us and quickly resolved all our doubts. Recommended!", "This apartment is nice .It's close to restaurants and a supermarket . We truly enjoyed the area and hope to return soon. Thanks Nia", 'Loved the space, walkable to trains, great communication!', 'I really enjoyed my stay at Nia‚Äôs. It was really clean and looked just like the pictures. Location is a 10/10. So many restaurants to choose from all within walking distance. Downtown Brooklyn was only a 13 minute drive and parking was available right outside of the apartment. Nia was super nice and responsive. Overall, highly recommend. I‚Äôll definitely be back on my next visit to NYC !', "Our stay went well. Nia is a friendly and responsive host. Listing is as described and as shown in the photos. The accommodation is well located since several metro lines are nearby.
On the other hand, we expected an important restorative offer given the reviews we had read about the listing, which is really not the case.
We had very frequent noise disturbances especially at night, the neighbor above having made a lot of noise.
Finally, I imagine that all the people staying in the air b and b pay a cleaning fee (this was our case), so we expected to have a slightly cleaner apartment: stain on the floor between the sofa and the windows, the kitchen surfaces were not very clean either as well as the toilet. That's a shame.", 'Nias place is perfect! It‚Äôs just a few minutes walk from the subway station so it‚Äôs very easy to get to manhattan. There is also a really nice grocery store just a few blocks away that we walked to and grabbed a few things from. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. I would highly recommend this airbnb to anyone looking to visit New York', "We thoroughly enjoyed staying at Nia's chic suite in NYC! From accommodating our personal itinerary, to meeting the cleanly standards, my friend and I felt extremely comfortable staying here. Everyone in the surrounding area was very nice and welcoming. I highly recommend this place to anyone who is looking to stay in Brooklyn - I would absolutely stay here again!", 'Nia is a super host! We really enjoyed our stay. The place is newly renovated and was spotless clean, the place is ideal for a couple or solo traveler. Also, metro station Nostrand was few blocks away, but not too close, around 10 mins walking.
The neighborhood is were peaceful and nice. Key food supermarket was just in a few steps from the place. I would like to say special thanks to Nia‚Äôs father. We has very helpful in every situation we have faced during our stay.
Recommended place to other guests!', 'Nia‚Äôs place was comfortable & nicely decorated. She was very responsive,
flexible, and easy to communicate with. I would recommend her place.', 'We stayed for a week at Nia‚Äôs place and it was wonderful! Check in was easy, the space was comforting and clean, and above all else Nia was responsive and kind. We will definitely stay here again the next time we are in town!!', 'Thanks to Nia for this place, it was perfect for us during our stay!', 'Nia is a fantastic and responsive host. Her home was spotless and had everything I needed. Thank you very much, Nia!', 'Nia is a friendly and reliable host. Thanks to her assistance the check-in was smooth (we met her father who is a very nice men). The apartment is nice, clean and equipped with everything necessary (there is no washing machine, but you can arrange to use the laundry room in the house). Although the building is located in a very lively neighborhood, the apartment is quiet and good to relax and sleep in. Location is good - a walking distance to the train stop and metro station, with good connection to the Manhattan or the airport). Many shops and bars of different kind in the neighbourhood. It is in a very interesting part of Brooklyn, where every street is different from the others. We really enjoyed our short stay in NY, thanks in large part to the comfort of Nia¬¥s apartment. We can recommend it!', 'Nia's place was just perfect! It was affordable, close to the Metro, walking distance within a few blocks to delicious food (Mayfields--amazing! And Sweet Basil Thai food--the Pad Thai walose tos terrific, and Cotton Bean had perfect Americanos) and a quiet location. We walked many miles in Manhattan, and we were always happy to come back "home" to this apartment for it had a comfortable couch and a firm bed with good pillows. The kitchen had everything we needed to make light breakfasts, and the shower was perfect--even excellent soap options to use. We highly recommend Nia's place--she was most welcoming and always quick to respond to any messages. Stay here--absolutely worth it.', 'Nia‚Äôs place was great and perfect for our week long stay. The internet was fast for remote work, and great food and cafe options. We also went into the city most days and found it easy to do.', 'We had a great stay at Nia‚Äôs place - the flat was clean and conveniently located near lots of great bars and restaurants in Crown Heights. Also super easy to get into Manhattan on the subway!', 'I contacted them before I left and arrived late at night, and I received a quick reply and had peace of mind.The interior was very clean, cozy and comfortable.
I was contacted promptly, and I had a very good trip without worrying about anything.', "Extremely quiet unit in Crown Heights neighborhood. Close to subway and not too long of a ride into Manhattan. Bed was very comfortable and the bathroom shower was lovely. There's also a great grocery store just across the street. I travel to NYC several times a year and would definitely stay here again.", 'Thanks for the stay. We felt like home in the apartment. Everything was as described, clean and we enjoyed our stay. It was quiet and Nia was a great communicator. The area itself was ok although we have not felt 100% comfortable. Hence we used Franklin Ave as our subway stop (especially in the night).', 'We immediately felt at home. Everything was perfect, we would have loved to stay longer. The neighborhood is very kind and the transport connection is perfect. The supermarket diagonally opposite also leaves nothing to be desired.', 'Communication great from the minute we booked the reservation til we took the key from the lockbox to get in (great instructions for this). I felt at home the minute I walked in. Looked just like the photos. After a day in the city, it was so good to come back to this quiet, welcoming place. Wifi info clearly on the table when we walked in. Nia was quickly responsive to all requests and I would definitely come back here. Thanks, Nia']

title: Huge Bedroom w/bathroom next to Columbia U!
all_reviews: ["From Day 1 I was impressed with the room. It is big with the most comfortable bed in NYC. A plus. My only suggestion, move out a chair and put in a desk to eat on. The bathroom was spotless with a nice shower. The air conditioning was extremely efficient and always kept the room icy, plus, people sensitive to street noise won't hear a thing with the AC on. Ludina was a respectful and gracious host, always pleasant with a greeting and helpful with any questions. Any time I had a property issue, Alfredo took care of things. The neighbourhood is pure NYC, with personality and culture and the same kind of crazy dynamic as Naples, so be prepared for block parties and night-life every weekend. Luckily, there isn't a tourist in sight; lots of conveniences, including subways right up the block and crosstown buses. Morningside Park is a block away, so I enjoyed my mornings and evenings there, people watching. Every cool neighborhood is 15 minutes away by public transport. Highly recommended.", "Very good, excellent value, there are shops nearby, GAP, Marshall, Victoria Secrets etc. Excellent value, Ludina, Alfredo's mother Very attentive and reliable.", 'The room worked great for our trip. There was some difficulty entering the apartment, but luckily the host was often home to unlock the door. Other than that the place was a great stay.', "The room is so comfortable and the bathroom is super clean. We had a great time at our stay. We can't wait to come back! Thank you, Ludina üôåüèª", 'Ludina is a great hostess. The location of the place is also very well located.\nThe room is clean and the bed very comfortable Unfortunately, the windows were a bit leaking, so it was a bit noisier at night and above all cold.\nThe bathroom was fine, but it could have been cleaner, as there were a lot of foreign hair and mold on the shower wall.', 'Ludina was a great host! She let us leave our luggage at the apartment before the check-in time. She was very responsive and friendly. The place was just as described. We had use of our own private bathroom and the room was comfortable, equipped with its own heating/AC unit.']

title: Family Friendly Greenpoint Abode w/chef kitchen
all_reviews:
['Very spacious and comfortable apartment.', 'This is our second stay here. We love the neighborhood - many places and restaurants to explore, as well as visit our favorites from last visit.', 'The apartment was spacious, clean, and cozy. title: Upper East Side 1 Bedroom PRIME location
all_reviews:
['Jordan was a wonderful host! The home was comfortable and stylish. It was in a great location with lots to do within walking distance. We had a great stay, and I highly recommend staying here!! Thanks again Jordan!', 'This flat in the Upper Eastside is ideally situated for Central Park and the Museum Mile. There are coffee shops, restaurants, libraries and retail stores all within easy walking distance. Busses and taxis are numerous, but we also walked to and from the city.
The flat is on the eighth floor and has local views. The bathrooms and the kitchen are perfect and visitors will feel at home in the beautifully decorated flat. We loved our stay. A&G', 'Great place to stay in the upper east side. Nice and spacious and two bathrooms was a big plus. Would highly recommend.', 'Loved the ambience of the Apartment. The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful. The Doormen were very professional. Our Host was responsive. Our only issue was with the air conditioning unit in the bedroom, but we made the best of it. This was our first experience with Airbnb. We were very happy.', "Jordan's apartment is beautiful with great views and in an excellent location. The building staff and doormen are very welcoming and kind.", 'Best host ever!', 'I loved our stay! Beautiful apartment, spacious with great views and sunlight. Close to the park and not far from stores and food, etc. also on peaceful streets, and the flat was wonderfully decorated. Only note would be to people with active kids- there are a lot of beautiful knick knacks so you‚Äôd need to watch out!', "We had a great stay at Jordan's place on the Upper East Side. The location is fantastic, very close to Central Park and within walking distance of Midtown. The neighborhood is quiet and pleasant.
The apartment was spotless, well-equipped with excellent utilities, including a washer and dryer, and even had a baby cot for our 1.5-year-old son. Initially, the apartment didn't have a high chair, but Jordan went above and beyond by offering to deliver one for our baby and did so promptly.
Jordan's instructions for the place were clear, and he would have provided recommendations for nearby spots had we needed them.
We could have easily extended our stay and highly recommend Jordan as a great host for anyone. Thanks Jordan for making our stay enjoyable!", 'It was fantastic !!', 'Beautiful apartment, full of interesting furniture and art snd with wonderful views. Jordan couldn‚Äôt have been kinder. It was a magical week.', 'Fantastic place to stay for museum and park proximity. Beautiful neighborhood. Spacious, comfortable apartment with a great ambience.', 'Great stay in UES. Lots of character and windows. Wonderful location. Thanks!', "Jordan's Upper east side apartment was incredible!!! finding this gem in the upper east side was almost to good to be true. This is by far one of the best accommodations I have ever stayed in while visiting NYC and will surely be booking when I return.", 'I was completely comfortable in Jordan‚Äôs condo. I would love to stay here again many times!! Also, Jordan responds very quickly to texts and is very nice and friendly!! If I could give his place a 10, I would!!!', "Jordan's place is wonderful! Close to the park, spacious, and very clean. There is a 24/7 doorman who makes getting in and out easy. Overall would highly recommend Jordan's place.", 'Jordan‚Äôs apartment is super cool. Great location. Full cover equipments.
He recommends a place where he love such as french restaurant and cafe.
If i visit NY again, i want to stay Jordan‚Äôs apartment again! Thanks, Jordan!', 'First experience with Airbnb and it exceeded expectations.', 'Unbeatable location, great apartment, and organized, responsive hosts.', "This apartment is perfectly located for a NYC visit, bright with great windows, very comfortable, quiet. Location was prime for us due to near proximity to our son‚Äôs apartment, Central Park, and Upper East Side restaurants. Really liked the residential feel of the neighborhood. Jordan was very proactive at communication and on-line description of the property was very clear & accurate. We would very much like to return on a subsequent visit to NYC!', 'I can‚Äôt say enough about this apartment! We felt right at home here. The apartment was cozy and comfortable. title: Chez Jesse Vacation Spot - Loft

however, I think comes from the generally not too pleasantly smelling air in New York.
Communication was also great, Jesse always responded and helped. There was a small book on the desk with tips about New York.
All in all a great place to stay, so there are 5 stars.', 'All was exactly as described, with clean, modern facilities, making this a great spot to call home for our whirlwind weekend in NYC.', 'This perfect place , exactly like the photos , the subway is an 8 min walk and safe neighborhood born at the police presence building, if I go back to New York I would of course come back', 'Jesse has a beautiful home. The metro is very close.", 'Female travelers please be careful!

Please note that Airbnb does not handle neighborhood safety concerns.
The top reviews on this listing do not show any negative reviews about the location. It wasn‚Äôt until I scrolled further down that I saw some guest mentioning it. We loved your apartment, the cleanliness, the decoration and care of every detail.
You made us feel, my wife and I was at home and it was a tip for making the trunk easier for us to leave our luggage until the time of going to the airport.
New York City is a world apart and it was worth going to discover it, although the change from the euro to the dollar is a bit expensive, but traveling to NY city is like paying a treat and enjoying it as a couple.
However, I suffered a lot from legalizing the use of marijuana on the street. It affected me too much to have to inhale that substance everywhere, it has been a negative point of that big city, and it's unfortunate.
All in all, it's been a beautiful experience with the contrast of the hustle and bustle of the big block of Manhattan with the humility of those Harlem and Bronx neighborhoods.
We really enjoyed it and saw many iconic places in record time.", 'Extraordinary place will be my choice for my next trip to New York City.']

title: Charming apartment in Manhattan - NYC!
all_reviews: ['Very close to the subway. First time in NYC and it felt safe and everyone was sweet and helpful. Will be rebooking for our next NYC trip.', 'Sebastian was a great host. He was really quick to reply whenever I had questions and he was very accommodating. The apartment was very clean and quiet. The instructions for getting into the building were clear. I had a great stay and I would definitely book again!', 'Really cute and a comfy bed! Easy access to subway.', "Sebastiano was a very responsive host. During my stay, the hot water boiler broke and being unable to solve the problem gave me an important discount. Host very willing to meet the customer's needs. The apartment is 1 bedroom with elevator on the 3rd floor. Quiet and bright equipped with every amenity. 2-block subway with comfortable 2/3 express train to downtown. Supermarket of any kind and genre in the immediate vicinity", 'The location is great and very close to getting onto the subway. Our host was helpful, friendly, and accommodating! The only downside is that the bathroom is a bit outdated and dirty.', 'Sebastian was an amazing host! Good proximity to the Metro. Very nice neighbors. It should come out better that there is only one room.\nGreat bed, duvet, and pillows. Sleep well.\nThank you for us Sebastian. Thanks for taking good care of us.']
