So clean (which is so important for nyc). Great location. Had everything we needed! Shampoo, conditioner, steamer, fridge, you name it she had it! The bed was so comfortable. Wifi was great. Air conditioner made it nice and cold! Hot water when we showered!! We never had any issue sleeping. She has a white noise machine which is great, I saw some other reviews about how you can hear the cars and the owners through the attached townhouse, but I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs any reason to complain - it‚Äôs very minimal and after all this is NYC!! It‚Äôs safe with cameras outside the doors. Very private. Thank you so much Marjan for letting us stay at your beautiful home. 11/10 recommend!', 'Thanks again for an excellent stay, Marjan!', 'Everything was lovely and we enjoyed our stay.', 'Wonderful and comfortable! Highly recommend for a good night‚Äôs rest after enjoying your day in NYC!', "This is a small, street-facing basement studio on East 38th St. The location is very convenient for any midtown purpose, and just a few blocks from Grand Central station. The room is comfortable enough, although very compact. It doesn't get much outside light, since in order to have privacy, most people will prefer to keep the blinds down. The family living in the adjacent apartment were, fortunately, away for most of my stay, but the noise when they were home was considerable. Marjan's assistant Bianca was very gracious and easy to interact with, making check-in and check-out pleasant and smooth and flexible. Overall, I'd say this is a clean, no-frills convenient (although quite expensive) option for someone wanting to be in this part of Manhattan.", "Marjan's place is exactly as shown in the pictures. It really is a beautiful little studio! The location is great and has a secure camera system that is connected to the main townhouse. It alerts when the main front door is opened, so it is very secure. There is a connecting door between the studio and the townhouse that can only be locked from inside the townhouse. I recommend making sure that it is locked when you first check-in. Noise and conversations from the occupants of the townhouse can be heard very clearly in the studio. This wasn't really a problem for me, as I was out every day and only came back at night to sleep, but if you are sensitive to noise, this might be a problem for you.
The kitchen is a small nook with a mini fridge and microwave, so not a functioning kitchen that you can prepare meals in. The bed was super comfortable and the bathroom/shower was very nice as well. All in all, it was perfect for my needs and I would definitely stay there again!", 'Great apt', 'It was an amazing department. Perfect location and feels like my own home. If I travel again to NYC, I would be stay here again!!', 'A great place to stay in NYC. Walkable to many restaurants and sights and subway and Tran station close by. Cozy space with all the convenience amenities you‚Äôll need. Would definitely stay again! Felt very safe in the neighborhood.', 'Would definitely stay here again!', 'Marjan‚Äôs Airbnb was absolutely stunning and the location was perfect! The place was so clean and beautifully decorated.
Her assistant, Bianca, was in touch with us through out the stay to make sure we were comfortable and taken care of.
Location was perfect! Far away from crowds but within walking distance of a lot of attractions. We will come back and stay here for sure!
Thanks Marjan and Bianca!', 'Marjan and Bianca were very responsive, friendly and helpful. The studio was clean and comfortable, especially the bed was very comfortable.
The location was very convenient; Grand Central station was only 6 mins walk away, the bus stop was just down the street and the ferry to Brooklyn was just 10 - 12 mins walk away. I was able to find everything I needed around the corner; restaurants, cafes, shops etc. I highly recommend the croissants from Ten Thousand Coffee.
I just found the audio announcements from the entrance loud enough to wake up to it and the talks, even the phone vibration from upstairs were clearly hearable in the early mornings.', 'The wonderful area, very good service, comfortable and warm room.
All bright and tidy.
Very good predisposition of the host.
Removing it', 'Really the room is comfortable and the location is fantastic. We had everything nearby! We have to emphasize how comfortable the bed was!!! after a day walking around the city, a bed like this is very much appreciated. Thank you very much Marjan for the quick response to all my questions!', 'We stayed at Marjans townhouse from Wednesday through Sunday. It was easy to utilize the lock systems and we felt safe in the city. Marjan provided many restaurant recommendations for us and townhouse was within walking distance to grand central station making it easy to access the subway. Jackson Hole and Townhouse Diner were within walking distance and excellent meals! We enjoyed Zucker‚Äôs bagels in the morning. The townhouse was clean, minimal yet homey. It was nice to relax and watch tv in the evening and the neighbors were very quiet. Marjan provided everything we needed and was flexible and understanding when I messed up the checkout time.
Thank you !', "A very nice stay at Marjan's, close to everything and especially great central.
Nothing to say about the accommodation, impeccable bedding!
Very clean and beautiful decoration.
If we have a chance to come back, I would not hesitate to go to Marjan's place.
Thank you so much", 'Marjan was an extremely responsive, attentive host! Her space was well kept and very clean, easy check in/check out, safe neighborhood and an overall great stay. Highly recommend!', 'Perfect stay in a cozy apartment just a few walkable blocks from Grand Central. My wife is a picky retired interior designer and loved the apartment. Marjan was a friendly accommodating host who made sure we had everything we needed for a lovely 4 day stay in Manhattan.', 'The place is amazing in perfect location and Marjan is soooo helpful !
I suggest the place without any doubt :)', 'I booked Marjan‚Äôs studio for a long weekend, as I was in the city for a wedding and had the best experience imaginable. Midtown Manhattan is a great area to be in and located conveniently to parks, restaurants, bars and shopping either a walk or subway away.
Studio was clean, cozy and had the perfect layout for an extended stay. Wardrobe area was great to have! The white noise machine is the perfect addition instead of a fan and the AC made it very comfortable. Felt very safe and private! Would stay here again!!
Marjan was also very friendly and responsive, very much so enjoyed the stay! Thanks Marjan!', 'perfect.', 'Spent 5 nights at Marjans place and it was the perfect place to relax after stressful days. I highly recommend this lovely place for anyone looking for a comfortable spot for a New York trip.', 'This was a lovely New York Airbnb experience! Easy check-in, great location, clean and homey space. My friend and I got the best sleep of our lives in the bed ‚Äî it‚Äôs so cozy and warm! The bathroom and kitchenette were nice too. Marian was an excellent host and I‚Äôd recommend this stay to anyone!', "Extremely convenient and clean. I bet you won't find any hotel place as clean / convenient as what Marajan provides in such a central place, at least from my booking-place-research for my short trip. Definitely a recommendation for travelers who seek for NYC stay in middle Manhatten.", "This place totally makes NYC more like home but also really New York, I'm sure I'll live there again once I back to this city. Love it!!!", 'This is such a cozy place to stay in an excellent location. It‚Äôs clean, new, and with attention to details. Everything worked out perfectly, great communication. You feel like at home away from home, will definitely come back!', 'It is a very nice accommodation in New York. You can get a good price and facilities not too far from the surrounding attractions.', 'Exactly as pictured. Easy to walk to transit and taxis, just a few minutes to Grand Central Terminal. Very clean with a helpful kitchenette for breakfast and there are many restaurants nearby . A nice little studio to come home to after a day of walking around NYC. We enjoyed our week.', 'Fantastic place to stay while in NYC! Close to everything whether walking or catching the subway at 42nd St. The bed was so comfy and it had all you need for a single or couple‚Äôs getaway. Can‚Äôt wait to stay here again!', 'Fantastic stay, thanks Marjan!', 'Amazing place, walking distance to plenty of restaurants and the night light']

I recommend this accommodation!

title: Victorian 2 Bedrooms - Lower East Side /Action
all_reviews:
['Great host!! Excellent location of the apartment!!', 'Kylie was beyond helpful with anything we needed. for NYC this place is outstanding!!! everything you need with 2 bedrooms and a full bath and kitchen. Close to lots to do and easily walkable.', 'Location in the center of Chinatown and easy to walk to anything . So many food options and close to the subway if you need to get anywhere. Was clean and comfortable and that‚Äôs all you need in NYC', 'An excellent location, in China town- next to some of the best NYC dumplings, walking distance to all great locations of SoHo, Nolita, little Italy, Brooklyn bridge & more . D/B Subway across the park (5 min walk) very convenient location for getting around. For New York standards this was a great price for location.
It is definitely an area to be cautious around, a very homeless/ drug problem area especially at night. As Kylie mentioned they were completely harmless though, we stayed 6 nights & didn‚Äôt have any scary encounters. Just be vigilant.
Apartment itself was very clean and practical, had everything you need in terms of living- looks exactly like the photos. Bathroom water pressure excellent, air cons are great but noisy.
Host very responsive, but the rules don‚Äôt feel the most welcoming- however understand why and we had a great time!
Thanks Kylie üòä', 'We had a wonderful stay. The place is so conveniently located to visit the island.
Thank you!', 'Transportation is good. There is a pair of pigeons in the kitchen window every night']

title: Modern Style Meets Old World
all_reviews:
['Nice place, clean, hospitable, conveniently located next to the train and a grocery store.', 'Expect top-notch hospitality, a sparkling clean space and a peaceful place to relax!
Ps- The host‚Äôs went above and beyond, the bed was super comfortable, a true five star Air-Bnb. I hope to go back soon!', 'We would come back to Joaquin‚Äôs place in a heartbeat. Joaquin went above and beyond to make us welcome and comfortable, giving great recommendations and even fixing tea when my husband wasn‚Äôt feeling good.
The house was immaculate and stylishly decorated.', "Joaquin was such a wonderful, kind, responsive, and hospitable host! I felt right at home immediately and he was so thoughtful to help with things like my luggage and dishes and local recommendations. It felt like a cozy B&B. There is also a sweet as pie dog named Molly who lives there too!
Though I was too busy during my trip to really get to spend too much time in the space, Joaquin's home is just beautiful with such thoughtful aesthetic details and a focus on sustainability, which I really appreciated. The neighborhood is very easily accessible via subway and in a quiet residential area. I would definitely recommend him as a host to all!", 'welcoming host and digs', 'Joaquin and John have a one-of-kind space and are incredibly warm and welcoming hosts. My wife and I spent four nights and wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer. Sunset Park is easier to get to and from that you might think and is worth exploring while you are there. This is the best Air B&B in Brooklyn!', 'I had a wonderful stay with Joaquin! The house as well as the room is immaculate and tastefully decorated! The location is super easy to access via the subway. Joaquin is very welcoming, he waited for me outside his house as I arrived late in the evening and made coffee for me in the morning! I highly recommend stay with Joaquin!', 'Joanquin and John are warm and engaging hosts with lots of local knowledge. Their home is filled with beautiful items, especially art. The room is spacious and comfortable. Great coffee in the morning.', "Our days at Joaquin and John's place were great. They offered a beautiful place to stay, great hosting, and cozy surroundings! The place was very clean and the area felt safe. Joaquin was extremely caring and helpful. He was very keen for us to have the best stay possible and took the time to help with all our questions and more. Joaquin really brightened our stay in New York! We could not have wished for a better accommodation and can warmly recommend others to book this place.", 'My partner and I had a memorable week at Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs place. The house is a work of art while being comfy and having a friendly ambiance. Molly the dog is an added bonus . The little garden at the back is a small oasis.
We found the location very useful for access to public transport and local eateries in the largely Hispanic local area.
Joaquin is a warm, kind and engaging primary host and we felt we had found new friends by the time we left .
Thank you both for a wonderful bnb experience.
Highly recommended.', 'I came from Greece and stayed with Joaquin and Jon for one month. Of all the sites I‚Äôve seen posted on Airbnb and the one apartment I actually stayed prior to living with Joaquin and Jon, their place is without question the best. Really it has been like staying in a five-star hotel. I should know because as a stylist for many well-known people, I have stayed at some of the most elegant hotels in the world.

Everything is well appointed from design, to furnishings to amenities ‚Äì such that indeed makes you feel right at home. Though the pictures on Joaquin‚Äôs place on Airbnb are nice, these pictures don‚Äôt adequately capture the beauty of this place. This is a truly unique home, with an individual, creative and well-defined, sophisticated sense of aesthetics and design.

Joaquin and Jon live on a two-floor duplex. The kitchen/dining room area is beautifully and expertly laid out ‚Äì perfect for chefs and people who enjoy entertaining. It would be ideal to host a cooking TV show in their kitchen ‚Äì a new business idea for JoaquinJ

The Airbnb quarters are on the second floor where I enjoyed having a generously sized bedroom and modern private bathroom. The bedroom is blessed with three large bay windows that let in a lot of sunlight. The mattress is very firm and comfortable for a restful night of sleep. From the sheets, to the towels to the furnishings, the entire place, including my room and bathroom, are immaculate. I was continually amazed by just how beautifully and expertly designed every corner of the house is no matter where I looked.

Joaquin and Jon are very special, kind people who were respectful and solicitous of my needs and concerns. They addressed every issue I raised. Joaquin is an amazing cook, with an amazing sense of aesthetics. He is highly creative with a strong sense of style while at the same time is extremely professional. As an attorney he gave me a lot of advice in relocating here from Greece. Over a short period of time, Joaquin and I became friends ‚Äì cooking together, shopping and learning about culture and art. We made a habit of talking over coffee every morning. It was a lot of fun sharing Greek cuisine with Joaquin and Jon. In turn, I learned a lot about American sports from Jon, who also was very helpful. I also appreciated how they both respected my privacy.

I want to thank Joaquin and Jon for opening up their home and their hearts to me, welcoming me into this country and NYC. I look to continuing my friendship with them. Without reservation, this is the place to stay!!', "Joaquin and Jon have a beautiful home, and two very sweet dogs. As others have commented, I came into the city early one morning and Joaquin had coffee and breakfast waiting for me when I arrived, which was a welcome treat. Joaquin clearly works very hard to keep his home and garden an inviting space, to great effect.

There is a subway stop just 2 blocks away, which makes it simple to get just about anywhere in the city. I stayed with them while in the city on business, and it took me about 40-45 minutes to get from their home to the Flatiron District for work each day. Their neighborhood is a bit south of the more recently gentrified Brooklyn neighborhoods such as Park Slope, Williamsburg, etc., but the subway gives reasonably quick access to just about anywhere. This is important since dining options and sights/attractions are not as good in the immediately surrounding neighborhood as they are further north in Brooklyn or on Manhattan. But for the traveler that doesn't mind frequent journeys on the subway, Joaquin's is a lovely place to stay.", 'Joaquin‚Äôs place is a wonderful example of a true Airbnb. Everything as described, a lovely room with plenty of natural light, a good temperature, plenty of good bedding.
The Private bathroom is very welcome, it‚Äôs compact, immaculately clean and well appointed with modern fixtures and fittings.
Joaquin was fast to respond to communications, and provide some good local recommendations.
Thanks for a great stay!', "It was a wonderful stay. Joaqiun was the perfect host. The accommodation was sparkling clean and everything was well maintained. That's all we can. We would keep coming and can 100% recommend the place.", "Best Airbnb experience I have ever had in my life! Artworks are so beautifully curated that it almost felt like staying in a cute private gallery. The sheets and towels were clean and we had a private bathroom (also super clean) for our own. The hosts were super responsive and considerate as well!!! Thank you so much for hosting‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
We were also in love with Maggie ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è who doesn't want to stay in a nice airbnb house with an adorable dog???", 'This place is truly amazing! A spotlessly clean, beautifully decorated, spacious double room in a convenient location. The hosts were so friendly and kind, always making sure I was happy and enjoying my time in NY.
Thank you for welcoming me into your beautiful home and making my holiday so special.
A large double room in a beautiful house full of artwork. The location was great for sightseeing, and it was a quiet neighborhood where I felt very safe even if I went home late at night after watching Broadway shows. The hosts are also really kind. Highly recommended!', "Imagine that you enter one of the most beautiful homes you have ever seen, that you get a tasteful, spacious, well organized bright room with its own toilet/shower and access to the balcony and courtyard and also a fantastic relaxed and pleasant host, you have this accommodation. It's consistently fresh, generous, and thoughtful touches throughout. It never felt strange to move around the common areas like the kitchen, for example. Joaquin is very professional, warm and clear. If you hesitated to rent rooms in a home, this is the place to start! Great location a stone's throw from gorgeous Sunset Park with New York's finest views and coziest hangout.", 'This was my best experience!
The beautiful brownstone house is very comfortable, very well renovated, decorated with love, super clean and has a nice garden to rest or for having your meal. My room was very big, there is all inside you need and very nice furnished. The bed is very comfortable and the view from the windows is great. The neighbourhood is quite, so you can sleep very well. I had my own bathroom, perfect. Joaquin and Jon are super hosts. I was travelling alone and felt very welcome and safe. In the morning Joaquin made deliocious coffee or tea, when I had a cold. He is very helpful and warm-heated. Maggie, the old dog, is so cute and thankfull for caress. It felt like staying by friends. The subwaystation is close by, you can use the R or N Line to go to Manhattan. In the neighbourhood are many restaurants, a pharmacy, delis and supermarkets. The Sunset Park is at the end of the street and has a perfect view to the skyline of Manhattan. I highly recommend to stay here. I will come back as soon as possible. Thanks for your hospitality!!', 'Joaquin‚Äôs house is completely beautiful. It‚Äôs a real retreat from the busy city. The bedroom is big and comfortable with everything you need, and the bathroom is clean and perfect. Joaquin was so helpful and kind, always making sure I had what I need. If you are looking for somewhere close to the city for a short visit, I would choose somewhere more central, but this place is very quiet and was great for my 5 days trip. The subway is very close with good transport links, it takes 30-40 mins to get into the centre of Manhattan. I highly recommend this gorgeous house.', 'I had a wonderful time in Brooklyn. The house is beautiful and also beautifully decorated. I spent a whole week as a solo traveler there and it felt like a home away from home right away. My room was very spacious and I had a TV for myself as well as a bathroom. The bed is just perfect and the neighbourhood very quiet, so that I got a good quality sleep. The neighbourhood as well as the connection to Manhattan is really just great. The next supermarket was conveniently located just around the corner as well as many Mexican restaurants. I would highly recommend this place for a trip to this fantastic city.', 'From the booking experience to greeting us at the stoop when our Taxi arrived, to arranging a car service, hauling our luggage downstairs and hugging us goodbye, Joaquin was a consummate Host. Mornings were delicious cups of coffee, intelligent conversation, local info & expertise and puppy hugs from an adorable Labradoodle, Molly. The four-story Brownstone was gorgeous, clean and decorated with a ‚Äúqueer eye‚Äù of exquisite taste. We felt like we were living in a little part of Brooklyn history. The nearby neighborhood and park were fantastic, with access to food, bars and subways. We would stay here in a heartbeat and highly recommend. Thank you, Joaquin, John, and Molly for helping to make this trip a great one for these two homebodies.', 'Highly recommend this hidden gem down in Sunset Park. You can walk 7 blocks and jump on the express trains which will have you in Chelsea in about 20-22 minutes which was awesome for us! We know Brooklyn pretty well but never get to this ‚Äòhood. Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs home was BEAUTIFUL! Very thoughtfully decorated and our bedroom was he perfect size. Also, our bed was comfortable, sheets were extra soft and there was an Apple TV setup so we could enjoy Netflix, Hulu, HBO, etc. The 3rd floor skylights are also so nice and I don‚Äôt think (though I could be wrong) they made it into any of the listing‚Äôs pictures! Such a nice stay. Thanks guys!', "Joaquin's home is special. The pictures on the site don't do justice how thoughtfully curated each and every detail of design in the space has been selected to make it so cool. I was only there for a weekend, and I would have liked to stay longer. A treat! Highly recommend Joaquin + Jon as hosts.", 'This has to be my favorite Airbnb listing, hands down. Joaquin, John and Molly are incredible hosts and it was an absolute pleasure getting to know them. I like to think that the vision for Airbnb is "Home away from home" and with this listing you'd sometimes wish that this was your home.
The hosts were amiable, helpful, accommodating, well-versed(at least the topics I am interested in), and last but not the least, sweet. We had so many pleasant conversations and it was a perfect mix of private time and if you want someone to talk to. There is lots to-do in the neighborhood, and the commute to Manhattan is a piece of cake.
I would recommend them with my eyes closed and even would like to stay with them every time I am in NYC.', 'Joaquin‚Äôs place is super nice. You will have a room on the third floor of his brownstone, with your own bathroom down a short hallway. The room has big windows with a street view and the neighborhood felt very clean and safe. Joaquin was very welcoming, offering coffee, tea, and advice on where to go/how to get around. Would definitely stay again.', 'Convenience and comfort rolled into one!', 'Another great stay at this fantastic place. Joaquin went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable.', 'You can‚Äôt find anything more charming than this place in New York
The location is so convenient and safe and very close to Sunset Park for a stunning view of Manhattan.
I felt at home from the first moment, slept like a baby in the beautiful bedroom with lovely windows from which I could see the sunrise.
It was in one word PERFECT
Thank you John and Joaquin for your hospitality.', 'A tastefully decorated, meticulously clean home and garden on a quiet street. Joaquin really made my stay feel like I was at the home of a friend with great suggestions on dining and the local area.', 'Amazing air BnB. Friendly, accommodating host with great local food recommendations! The bed was so comfy and the room was huge! Great bathroom and a cute garden to sit in. We found the location perfect for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan. Would recommend!', 'Absolutely wonderful stay. Beautiful home, impeccably clean and organized, incredibly gracious hosts. Everything feels very warm and welcoming. Will definitely return.', 'Joaqu√≠n and John are great hosts, they are friendly and reliable - and dog Molly is a real cutie. Their home is beautiful, the room is nice and the bed spacious. Everything is very clean. This part of Brooklyn is lively with good takeaway food. I enjoyed my stay greatly and I highly recommend it.', 'Our first time in New York was made extra special thanks to our stay in Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs beautiful Brooklyn home. We were greeted with warm hospitality, adored their sweet dog Molly, and had some lovely conversations over cups of coffee in the morning. Their home is relaxing and incredibly styled ‚Äî it was full of stunning art in every corner, very clean, and the bed was also especially comfortable. Everything we needed was a short walk away, such as the stations, local deli, and the lovely Sunset Park with a great view of the city. We also really appreciated the recommendations and guidance that was provided throughout our trip. We would recommend anyone to stay here and would happily stay again next time! Thank you again for hosting us.', "Joaquin's place is really just a wonderful stay. It is extremely clean and well kept. Most importantly, Joaquin is a very friendly and caring person who is always wearing a smile and does the most that he can to make your enjoyable as it can be. The area is also very convenient with many good food options nearby, a supermarket on the same block, and a park just across the street.", 'I had a lovely stay - Joaquin was super friendly and helpful. The house is like an art gallery with so many beautiful and interesting objects and decorations and the room is spacious and comfortable. Having a/c in there was a big bonus. It was great to have a bathroom for my exclusive use and the house is really conveniently located for the subway.', 'joaquin is adorable', 'Joaquin & Jon‚Äôs home is an original Brooklyn Brownstone House full of character both inside & out. Joaquin is a perfect host - friendly & welcoming & so helpful to us as UK tourists. He helped us re navigating the underground trains & provided tips re where to go/what to see in the local area. Metro lines are within walking distance and we tried great Mexican food just around the corner. Thanks again for hosting us!', "This review is written about the experience the parents of one of my friends had. They were staying there because their son sustained a serious brain injury and was in the hospital nearby. I set them up with this rental and they had such a great experience.

Joaquin was an amazing host. From the moment they walked in, Joaquin made them feel so at home. The listing of this space doesn't even do it justice. The house is so beautiful- Joaquin and John have AMAZING taste in art and decor. Their dogs (Maggie and Bodi!) are also so adorable and lovely. Their stay felt like a true home and is somewhere anyone would be lucky to stay.

At a really scary point in this family's life, Joaquin was a tremendous comfort and ally. He listened to their story and took care of them when they needed it most. Not only a beautiful place to stay, but beautiful people to stay with.", 'This was by far the best Airbnb experience we‚Äôve ever had! Joaquin made us feel like home. The place is incredible. The house is spotless clean and gorgeous! Can‚Äôt wait to go back! I highly recommend this place!!! Thank you so much for everything!!!', 'Joaquin and John were extremely nice and friendly!
This was one of my best experiences at Airbnb and I highly recommend for your next trip to NYC.

Joaquin also showed me many things in NY, and we had great moments visiting museums and restaurants.

It was truly wonderful staying here!', "Joaquin 's home is beautifully decorated, immaculate, and situated in a safe and friendly neighborhood. Joaquin was fantastic I arrived at 7am and he was waiting for me with a fresh cup of coffee and same pastry. Neighborhood was great 2 blocks to the train station. To go any were in NY. The house is stunning and the location is perfect. You are quickly in the center of Manhattan
We had a very nice time and are grateful to have stayed at the place.
We will definitely come back to and next stay!', 'This experience was amazing. Joaquin was always friendly and was able to accommodate me. He offered tips about places to see and was just a pleasure. The room is nice with natural sunlight. The location is real close to the 45th st station which made traveling to the city easy.', "It was my first time to stay in an Airbnb as I normally take a hotel room when I travel but considering the rates in NYC during December, I considered it as one of my options. Glad that I did.
Joaquin was very responsive and detailed whenever I asked something prior to my arrival. I did not find hard time locating the place, it is just a 5-minute walk from the nearest subway station. The room is squeaky clean and very spacious with a wonderful view of the neighborhood. I had my own toilet which I really think was a big plus. Joaquin also offered daily free coffee in the morning.
It exceeded my expectation.", "What an amazing stay. The home is beautifully decorated, the room spacious with a comfortable bed, and a very modern and clean private bath. The neighborhood is very walkable with the closest train station a short walk away, and the express train station about 10 mins away in the other direction. It's a very safe area and I felt comfortable walking after dark as a lone female.
Joaquin, Jon and Molly were all wonderful hosts. Joaquin gives a great run through of the home upon arrival, Molly was full of kisses, and Jon gives great food recommendations. Joaquin is a very caring and experienced host, and seems to be prepared for anything that might be needed. The umbrella that he insisted I borrow is so much appreciated as it rained like crazy for two days straight.
Joaquin and I had amazing conversations and I love that l now have a new friend in him. I was sad to leave! Thank you to all three of them for a wonderful stay!", "My wife and I have travelled to New York several times before and generally stay for long periods of time. This time we decided to use AIRBNB. We chose Joaquin's and Jon's apartment for the location, price and the clear description of the place.

When we arrived, we received a BIG surprise. Everything turned out even better that it appeared on the web description. The room is really large and beautiful; the bed very pretty and comfortable; with everything described including tv with internet stream and wifi, as well as a private full bathroom. In other words, everything one can need.

The apartment is a brownstone, typical of what you hear about in Brooklyn. It was beautifully restored. It is really gorgeous. Every space is decorated with very good taste, with a lot of artwork to enjoy, from around the world. There is also a nice patio in back with a pretty garden.

In the same block we found a convenient supermarket, a deli with pretty good buffet and a well-sized park (Sunset Park) with an astonishing view of Manhattan. The subway station is only two blocks away and only takes about 20 minutes to Manhattan.

Joaquin is a great host: helpful, warm and interesting; concerned about our well being; but respectful of our space too. He offered us a delicious coffee every morning and, if you ask, as he did for us, he will cook a great breakfast too. I should also mention he offered to do the laundry in their washing machine--very convenient for long stays. Joaquin also provided convenient tips to enjoy the city much more. We also shared several interesting conversations with him, even ocasionally with a glass of wine. And he speaks Spanish fluently.

No doubt we recommend Joaquin's and Jon's place to anyone who is seeking to spend time in New York in a safe, well-located place that is quiet and elegant at the same time.", 'I booked the room for a month for my student sister who was doing medical elective in Brooklyn. Joaquin made sure that she is accommodated and safe from the day one. My sister was able to use the kitchen and other beautiful spaces in the house. Joaquin shared his dinners with her and made coffee every morning before she left for the hospital! Truly home-like experience. We are very grateful!', "A very stylish and impeccably clean space in a prime Brooklyn location. Most importantly, Joaquin and Jon were welcoming, warm and very hospitable. If you want to experience an authentic New York, here it is. Joaquin's dog Molly is super cute, we miss her already.
Hopefully see you soon and thanks for everything!
Kind regards,
Patrick & Rebecca", 'Rented the room for my mother who was visiting from out of town. Amazing space! Joaquin was an excellent host, quick to respond and sincerely kind. This will be our go to place whenever we have family in town. So happy to have found it. Could not recommend any higher!', 'Joaquin and John were incredibly friendly and accommodating! The place was clean and comfortable and in a lovely area of Brooklyn and very easy to navigate to the train system to explore other areas! Great recommendations!
Highly recommend staying here, would definitely stay again!', 'It‚Äôs my first time travelling to the States and staying at Airbnb, so I was a bit nervous about everything. Joaquin soon put me at ease. He showed me around the house and even the neighbourhood. I felt so welcomed right away when I met him. Jon was nice and friendly too. They have a dog, Molly. Their home is so beautiful. Full of art ‚Äì couldn‚Äôt help looking at the gallery walls and the Chinese vintage furniture. Love every corner of their home. The room was incredibly comfortable. I felt safe walking alone on streets which I think it‚Äôs important for a female solo traveler.
Joaquin and Jon made nice coffee every morning! Joaquin also would check up on me from time to time to make sure I was ok. I‚Äôm really grateful to them. Their warm hospitality made my stay a pleasure!', "I rented the room for my parents, who were visiting my wife and I, and our new newborn daughter for two weeks. Joaquin was a gracious host and he has a charming home that is well taken care of. The whole house is very tastefully decorated and you can tell Joaquin has put a lot of his loving attention into it. My parents had a private bedroom on the 3rd floor with a nice view of the street and a small private bathroom. The floor is shared with the host's master bedroom, bathroom, and office. Joaquin was extremely patient in showing my parents all the details of how to use everything in his home.

The house is well situated near all the Sunset Park attractions. It is very close to the subway and public buses, and the park itself is only half a block away. You also have easy access to Latin American restaurants on 5th Ave and Chinese and Southeast Asian places on 8th Ave. Any way you go, you're sure to have plentiful choices for affordable and tasty cuisine.

Lastly, Joaquin's two dogs were sweet and gentle. My mom is VERY afraid of dogs, so this was a concern for me. Somehow, by the end of her visit even she was OK with them. That was unprecedented!", 'The house is immaculate, beautiful, and so comforting which is exactly what I needed at this time. Minutes from the express train to Manhattan and literally a minute walk from one of the most beautiful parks in Brooklyn. Would recommend for anyone to stay here!', 'Great host, great dog, great stay!', 'Joaquin was highly accessible, very helpful and very flexible in terms of reception. The accommodation and neighborhoods are nice close to the subway to Manhattan and many restaurants. The accommodation is quiet and decorated with taste.
We highly recommend! Thank you Joaquin!', "Great accommodation and great welcome from Joaquin who gave us some great tips and was very considerate. If you're going to NYC, this RBNB IS the place!", 'Joaquin and Jon has a very sweet, cozy, tidy and unique house with Maggie, a very docile doggie. He served me coffee in every morning and will offer you extra unexpected services upon your need. Highly recommend!', 'I unconditionally recommend the room, location, and most of all, the hosts‚Äîhuman (Joaquin and Jon) and canine (Maggie and Bodie).', "Simply the biggest Airbnb I've ever stayed at so far. About the house: It is very well served by subway lines and about 30 minutes away by express train from southern Manhattan. The house is big, very well decorated, the bed is comfortable, the bed linens were very clean and the bathroom is big and nice. The home is clean, extremely comfortable and possibly one of the most beautiful homes I‚Äôve ever had the pleasure of staying in. I would definitely choose to stay here again if I make a trip down to New York in the future‚Äîit was awesome!!', "Joaquin is a wonderful host. He and Jon have a beautifully remodeled brownstone just half a block from Sunset Park. The guest bathroom is modern and immaculate. The house features a shady, restful back garden.
The park, which is famous for its views of NY harbor, itself is being refurbished. There is a subway stop just a block away from Joaquin's as well as several nearby bus routes. The house is half a block from a grocery store and close to coffee shops and small restaurants.
Joaquin is friendly and extremely hospitable. He will do his utmost to make your stay comfortable.", "I've had a wonderful stay in this AirBnB. Joaquin was easy to communicate with and an all round good bloke to talk to. Every morning he made me a nice coffee and had a good chat.
excellent location as it is close to subway and about 40min ride to Manhattan.
excellent decor and beautiful room and facilities aswell. I cannot recommend this place enough!
Molly the dog is adorable and loves a good pat.
Many thanks for the stay!", 'Our favorite place to stay in Brooklyn! Joaquin is great.', "It was an absolute pleasure to stay at Joaquin and John's gorgeous home, which was as great as their photos suggested. We weren't able to use their beautiful outdoor space due to the weather, but like the house overall, the private bedroom was lovely, spacious and well-decorated. Being in a low-key but lively residential neighbourhood was also a great change of pace after the frenzy of Manhattan, and the views from Sunset Park were wonderful. We'd definitely recommend visiting!", 'We had the most lovely stay and we definitely want to come back with more time. Joaquin not only had great tips for restaurants and places to see in Brooklyn and beyond, but also made us feel right at home. The house is gorgeous and there is so much art to discover. We had a blast.', "Stayed a Joaquin's place for 2 weeks. It worked out great. Close to where I needed to be. A grocery store, pharmacy and restaurants around the corner. The entire time was a great experience and I feel very fortunate to have stayed there!', 'This was a fantastic experience !
The house is a beautiful renovated brownstone located a few steps from Sunset Park (and close to Subway line N/R).

Joaquin and John are great hosts, very thoughtful.
I highly recommend to stay here. I hope to come back soon.
Thank you Joaquin and John for your hospitality.', 'We had such a great time at Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs home! They were both super friendly, welcoming and they made us feel at home at their place. Thank you, Joaquin and Jon--we look forward to coming back again and again!', "Great stay at Joaquin's, John and Molly's place who were very welcoming, warm and always smiling.
Joaquin took some time to advise us on places to visit and/or eat.

Morning coffee at the top", 'Definitely, one of the best experiences in Airbnb.
The room is extremely clean and beautiful. There are a lot of fascinating things in the house.
Joaquin is a wonderful host, I enjoyed talking with him, he gave me some advice about the travel plan and future plan.

If you are looking for a place in New York, it is definitely the best choice.', 'Joaquin‚Äôs home was definitely the best AB&B stay that I have ever experienced when visiting NYC! I hope that I would be fortunate to return on my next visit,
The location was perfect - close to Sunset Park, with fabulous restaurants nearby which were featured on an helpful and detailed list which was provided. The Subway station was just over a block away and the area was safe, even late at night!
His home had an elegant and charming decor. I especially enjoyed eating breakfast on the terrace, overlooking a beautiful garden. I was grateful for his kindness and hospitality.', "By far my favorite AirBnb experience! What a fabulous place and what wonderful hospitality. I couldn't recommend their place more! Please stay here!", 'Joaquin was a fantastic, friendly, helpful, and very attentative host - thank you for letting us stay in your beautiful home! The room was exactly as pictured and the flat was ideally situated, just a couple of minutes walk from the nearest subway. The only thing we would change would have been the squeaky (although beautiful) bed. Thank you again Joaquin for being so thoughtful and accommodating. We would definitely recommend :)', "The whole experience with Jon and Joaquin was absolutely amazing, from the moment that our booking was accepted communication was excellent. Joaquin offered tips and advice in advance of our stay which we found extremely helpful. Our room was simply breathtaking, it sits on the third floor of an approx one hundred year old Brownstone with its own private bathroom which was also beautiful, shampoo, conditioner and shower gel were supplied for us to use if we wished. Jon and Joaquin have renovated their home to an extremely high standard with passion and sensitivity to reflect its period charm, it is the perfect balance of old and new. You will be amazed at how beautiful it is, you are also free to enjoy their garden which is equally as beautiful. Their home is filled with light, love and laughter and we feel privileged to have been able to share their home albeit for a short time. I think we made quite good friends with Maggie and Bodhi, two very laid back dogs that it was also a pleasure to get to know. We were given so many helpful tips from where to eat, art galleries to visit the best use of the subway, you can only get this sort of advice from the people who live there. The subway was only two blocks away and felt very safe, you can purchase a 7 day unlimited pass for 30 dollars which is excellent value. There were endless restaurants, deli's and supermarkets nearby, some of the best sandwiches we have ever had. At the top of their street sits Sunset Park with a view that will render you speechless day or night, the park is used by many of the locals from walking their dogs to families using the children's area or vast groups enjoying their early morning exercising. We felt very sad to leave such a wonderful place but most importantly to leave two people who made us feel so welcome and have left us with the most incredible memories we can't thank you enough.", "Joaquin is a very lovely host who is eager to give advice and suggestions and is a really fun character - we're so happy to have met him and stayed in his beautiful artistic home with Jon, who was equally lovely, and their soppy old dog, Maggie. It was a peaceful haven away from the city. Well connected with two subways both within 10 mins walk. Comfy mattress. Cool enough to sleep well due to fan in the room. Powerful and refreshing shower. Gorgeous little garden to have a morning coffee in. Easy to tiptoe around if coming home late due to thick rugs throughout the house. Highly recommend staying in this home. We hope to go back!", "Joaquin and Jon were wonderful hosts. We would not have expected to meet such attentive and interesting people of the heart in our vacation.

In a dreamy home full of selected art and exciting little stories from around the world.
New York wouldn't have been half as beautiful without them and the cheerful woolly Molly.
We can't wait to see you again here in Brooklyn or maybe Berlin.
Thank you for your unforgettable hospitality!", "Staying at Joaquin's place was magical and so much more than I could have asked for. His home is immaculate, a work of art, and just overall peaceful. If you opt for breakfast, you will not regret it! It's also close to public transit that will take you swiftly into Manhattan , so many restaurants, and Prospect Park, which is lovely. I would highly recommend staying here, I will definitely be back :)", 'This beautiful home in Brooklyn is an absolutely wonderful place to stay. This home had a great vibe, a credit to its warm owners and the beautiful job they have done decorating and making every detail a welcoming one. The bathroom was spotless with a beautiful shower and the bedroom was spacious and comfortable. I highly recommend this location!', 'It was a great stay at Joaquin place. I would recommend it to anyone! The location is great and you can quickly get to Manhattan. It is also difficult to reach from the airport. The room is huge and clean and you have your own bathroom. I will definitely come back!', "Joaquin is a superhost, attentive and thoughtful. He has a beautiful home, my room was very comfortable and spacious, super comfortable bed and super clean. I was travelling alone and felt very safe and welcome. Would love to stay here again when I'm back in Brooklyn.", 'We had a really great time at Joaquin‚Äôs and John‚Äôs place. The check in was convenient and we did feel welcome right away. Joaquin has certainly put a lot of work in the house, the design, the interior and the backyard. Additionally, Joaquin made some coffee and tea for us and was really making sure that we were having a great time. The house, room and bathroom were very clean and we can certainly say that this Airbnb-experience was really superior. We would definitely love to come back.
Thank you for everything.', 'Wow, where to start- this was just the stay I needed. Joaquin was so kind and amenable while I visited for a week-long work trip. His place is a piece of art and the cleanest airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in! Molly the dog was so well-behaved and allowed for the best morning pets. Chatting with Joaquin in the morning and evening was a highlight of my days. He treats one as an old friend and the world is better for his fun and gracious spirit. Thank you for the best stay imaginable, Joaquin! And for making a new mama feel so at home!', 'The house and hosts are the bomb! Artistic, cozy interior with class. We felt super safe and welcomed the entire time.
Joaquin and John invite you to their home - so you are treated as family. Chit chats, updates, check-ins, extra offers such as doing the laundry for you.
The backyard with sun and squirrels was pure perfection. You feel like you are at home between your loud NY trips. It was so amazing.
We can‚Äôt wait to come back!']

title: Manhattan Cheap Sofabed
all_reviews:
["The location was great. Beautiful area a little quieter than in downtown. Many attractions such as MET, Central Park are within walking distance. Lots of shopping. The best part was the Metro 86Str. There are many trains and you can get to downtown quickly with the express.
The place is cozy, small. You have everything you need.
Yes the bed is in the living room and you share the apartment with others. At night it was very noisy when someone came home late or had to go to the toilet. And best to sleep with an eye mask. The screen doesn't help. You just get a little privacy.
Otherwise Min is very friendly and helpful.", "Given the crazy price of New York, finding a sofa bed in the heart of Manhattan for that price was a good choice for me.
The homeowner provided clear instructions and a timely response during the check-in process.
Because the sleeping sofa bed is in a common space, maybe privacy is a problem for some people, although I haven't had any trouble myself.
All in all, as a male visitor who only spent the night in New York, I think this home is a good financial choice", "I really enjoyed my stay in Min's apartment. It's not any extra comfortable but I slept well and there is everything you need ‚Äì exactly according to the description. Be prepared for sleeping in a shared space, which means guests from other rooms go through your place. But I didn't mind sharing the space, met interesting people and I also really appreciated the divider placed in the room, so that I could have at least some privacy when I needed. Min was super kind and helped me with everything I asked about, even lent me an umbrella when I didn't have one etc. The best thing is the location in the very centre of Manhattan ‚Äì you can get anywhere quite coveniently. And not to forget ‚Äì Min is a talented artist and the room is decorated with her paintings, so if you're a fan of art you'll definitely enjoy! :)", 'Convenient location.', 'convenient location, clean bed, small but smart space', 'The location was good, but definitely the place was quite small as it is a sofa bed. It was definitely a good cheaper option to stay in Manhattan area. The other people who were staying in the other rooms were good, so there were no problems']

title: Brownstone Studio
all_reviews:
["It's a comfortable, clean, and safe home. Very good communication and with several food stores and some fast food restaurants. Its location is extraordinary. You get pretty much anywhere from the subway station. I would definitely stay with Marlyn again", 'The unit is as described. Marlyn was responsive and flexible with my accommodations.

The area/building was on the noisy-side, so I would not recommend it for light sleepers. Otherwise, the unit is comfortable and is well represented in the description.', 'Love this spot, the area really pulls everything together. All tenants are quiet and host is great!', "This accommodation is located in Harlem, and when I came home in the evening, I felt threatened by a black person who was drugged by drugs asking for money.
The house was so old that the door on the first floor didn't open with the key of the house, so it was left outside for an hour. The host lives two hours away from the accommodation and cleaning, and Samaria, who lives two hours away from the accommodation, couldn't get help when there was an urgent matter. There was no shower stick in the bathroom, so it was uncomfortable when washing, and the host didn't disclose the photos of the dirty shower to the guest before booking. Especially, the accommodation is located on the side of the road where cars and bus garbage cars pass by, so it was very loud and too noisy to sleep well. Samara turned on the air conditioner to keep the house cool, but the host misunderstood what I left on and responded aggressively to me. The host was very unfriendly.
