She allowed us to check in as soon as we arrived in New York and added one hour to our check out time. She is very responsive and communicated very well. The place is very clean, quiet and peaceful. Highly recommended to anyone visiting New York.', 'Great location and great place. Don‚Äôt over think it. Very easy to stay and plenty of space.', 'We had a wonderful time at Chris‚Äò place! The building is in a very nice and located in vibrant neighbourhood with lots of nice places to eat and the subway station is literally in front of the building. A supermarket is next door.
Unfortunately we haven‚Äôt met Chris, who seems to be a very nice person. She was always very helpful and responded quickly. Absolutely recommend!', 'It was a wonderful time! Chris is a great host who really cares about her guests. Very convenient location - subway right next to the building. The room itself was perfect - privacy and comfort were 100% assured. Thank you for an awesome week in NY! üëèüèªüôÇ', 'We staid 12 nights and felt like at home, Chris was a great host and the apartment offers all we needed and is conveniently located right next to subway stations and bus stops.', 'The room was great, thank you very much for your attention - my daughter loved the bed... üòä', "Chris's home was a wonderful place to stay during our long weekend in the city. Our check-in was seamless, the apartment was tidy and comfortable, and Chris was easy to communicate with. The train station is just outside the building, and it's a few minutes walk to Central Park. Overall a fantastic host!", 'Chris‚Äôs place was perfect, great location right next to the Subway, great Jazz venues, and restaurants nearby. The place made you feel special and at home, couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to enjoy our first trip to New York.', "We were very lucky to find such an offer in the heart of New York. Very convenient location near Central Park, where you can walk or run. Close accessibility to the metro, with which you can be in the very epicenter of cultural events in 15-20 minutes. The apartment had all the amenities to make you feel at home. Chris is a wonderful and very interesting person who was very caring and friendly. We sometimes spent evenings together having dinner and talking about culture. Next time we're in New York, we know exactly where we'll stay!", 'My 2 student girls spent a month in this home. They felt safe and the location was ideal for going to college or visiting NY by subway but also shopping for food.
Central Park is within walking distance. Chris was a great host with a discreet but thoughtful presence. What a great chance you found.']

title: Large Private & Sunny Room in Beautiful Townhouse
all_reviews:
['Had everything one would need.', 'I was happy to be able to check in 2 hours earlier than expected! Everything was perfect', "I loved the location of the place. It was close to the subway L, M line and we could also take the Ferry if we wanted to. There are many delicious restaurants and cafes nearby, and you can walk to Domino park in the evening.
The bathroom was clean, and it was easy to use because it was right next to the room I stayed in. Hot water works well, and towels, shampoo, conditioner, body wash, and hair dryer are fully prepared. I even had an iPhone charger so I didn't have to use my charger.
The hosts Sam and Charlie asked me if I was comfortable and kept my privacy. Wilbur, who we encountered for a while, was an angel. ü•∞
It was a very satisfying stay, and I would like to stay again if I come to New York again next time. I recommend it to others!", 'One of the best Airbnb‚Äôs I‚Äôve stayed at. Great location for exploring Brooklyn and accessing the rest of the city. Would gladly stay again.', "Charlie and Sam were very kind!
There are amazing apartment
I recommend to stay
I'd like to stay here again
Thank you so much", 'It‚Äôs a nice place to stay especially for a person like me having a rest after a week business trip.', "I absolutely adored my stay at Charlie and Sam's home in Brooklyn. Close to restaurants, shops, sites, as well as public transit.
Highly recommend!", "Great spot for a one night stay. Hosts were so easy to communicate with and very helpful with any questions and requests. Only thing is that the room doesn't lock from the outside but the house is secure. Otherwise, definitely recommend.", 'Wonderful stay. The hosts were so friendly and welcoming. I loved the neighborhood too. I hope to visit again soon!', "Simply couldn't recommend Charlie & Sam's place highly enough. The space would immaculate and somehow managed to evoke a sense of peacefulness and calm in the middle of bustling Williamsburg! The space was a dream & I hope that I can visit again in the future. - 10/10!", 'A space to feel well in. High ceilings, bright room... Everything simple and carefully chosen: perfect towels, sheets, shampoo, sheets. . Half a block from most excellent lattes and pastries to go and three blocks from there to breakfast by the East river, feeling a spaciousness in the crowded city. Both Charlie and Sam warm and responsive to texts and clear about any instructions .Easy place to come and go from.. ps only a short walk to the Ferries that can take you from South Williamsburg to Manhattan.. Thank you!', 'I had a great stay! The location was easy to reach from JFK Airport by public transportation, taking about an hour. The neighborhood is beautiful and very well-kept. The bathroom is very spacious, the bed and pillows very comfortable, and the hosts offer filtered water available to drink, which you could help yourself to. In a small room, there was also the option to make coffee and tea. Would stay again here. Very charming room and lovely hosts!', "Great location! The room is clean and cute. Sam is a great host. She's thoughtful and easy to interact with.", "The room is peaceful in a way that I didn't expect. Looking out over the back garden, it feels secluded even though it is centrally located. The vibe is artistic, comfortable and homey. I loved it, and it was very close to key spots and to the waterfront which was great for early morning walks.", 'I loved staying with Charlie and Sam! The house is what you imagine from a New York Townhouse. Beside the great area (right next to Williamsburg Bridge) the house is warm and welcoming. I felt comfortable right from the start!', 'Super clean, nicely decorated, great bed, great linens, responsive hosts, no complaints!', "I had a great stay at Charlie and Sam's place and highly recommend staying there to discover Williamsburg. Large, bright and beautifully decorated room in a charming townhouse, ideally located to discover the neighborhood on foot. Very comfortable bedding, impeccable cleanliness.
Charlie and Sam were very responsive, gave me a lot of recommendations to make the most of my stay. I'd love to go back!", 'Beautiful building, fantastic location (within walking distance of countless amazing restaurants and coffeeshops), great interior‚Äîthe place had the vibe of a bespoke guesthouse. The bed was super comfortable. The bathroom was spotless. Also, the host was very easy to connect with. I now understand why this location is so highly rated. I would definitely stay here again.', 'Loved this place! Cool, calm and chill. Very easy self check in and out and lovely energy in the room!', "Charlie and Sam's place in Williamsburg, Brooklyn was a great place to stay to explore NYC. Their place was within walking distance to two subway stations and just blocks from the East River. The neighborhood was super hip with lots of great places to eat. Sam was very responsive to all inquiries and Charlie made some great suggestions for things to experience. The room was clean, private and very quiet. I really enjoyed my stay with them.", 'Cozy, lovely space', "Charlie's and Sam's home is an amazing refuge in bustling Williamsburg. I'm very happy with the experience.", 'It was nice experience, calm and clean. there was nice cafe and nice restaurant near the house.', 'I had a wonderful time staying at Charlie and Sam‚Äôs! Their home is fabulous, it‚Äôs very charming and beautifully designed. I felt especially cared for with the complementary water (which was delicious!) and soothing decor. Charlie and Sam have really thought of everything. Thank you for providing such a great space and inspiring experience! üíô', 'Their home is in a great location with great restaurants and coffee spots nearby. Inside it was very tidy and the bathroom had great amenities. I always had access to water, clean towels and the storage space in the cupboards was spacious enough for all my clothes. Charlie and Sam were very helpful and responsive when I needed help. And they gave clear instructions on things that are available in the house as well as recommendations for places to go to. I would stay here again on my next visit to New York and hope future guests enjoy their stay as much as I did!', 'Sam and Charlie‚Äôs Abnb rooms were impeccable! So beautiful, clean and calm with very comfortable beds and gorgeous Cotten bed linens. Sam was so helpful and keeps the entire place so clean and beautifully decorated. Thank you for a lovely experience in Brooklyn!', 'Everything was exactly as described. Charlie/Sam have great communication and provided clear directions and recommendations. Great experience.', 'Charlie and Sam were absolutely fantastic. The space was beautiful and I enjoyed a glimpse of life in a delightful neighborhood. Charlie and Sam were very thorough and thoughtful and I appreciate everything they did to make my stay enjoyable.', "A great place to stay ! Better have earplugs for the Williamsbourg bridge that is really near you but it didn't bother me. Everything is really clean and you have space to rest and eat. The hosts are really welcoming and available, giving personnal tips and answering any specific needs.
Thank you so much ! I'll definitely go back there whenever coming back to NYC :)", 'I‚Äôve never written a review before but this was the best experience I‚Äôve had staying at an airbnb. This was my first time traveling solo so I was nervous. They made me feel very comfortable and were very responsive. Sam was so friendly and made wonderful recommendations. I definitely want to go back! The room was stunning and so cozy. I originally planned on staying out late both of my nights but came back early just to enjoy my room and the space Sam‚Äôs created. Very lovely.', 'My stay was short but sweet (and savory), and I will hopefully be returning in the spring.', 'Had a great stay here! Charlie and Sam were inviting and relaxed, the place was super clean and tastefully decorated, very comfortable beds and linens. Felt like a guest but also had utmost privacy. Would definitely come again!', 'Very nice place to stay. I‚Äôll definitely try to book it in the future. The location is a huge plus and the host are responsive and very friendly.', 'I loved my stay! Sam was beyond helpful and communicative during check-in and throughout my stay. Even though I was staying in a room, I felt as though the space was so private! Beautiful amenities, very earthy feel to the whole space that I really appreciated! When I came back to the house in the evening, I felt as though I was out of the city, but when walking out in the morning, I was in the center of everything. A must visit!', 'Great place in a great neighborhood', 'Such a clean and beautiful place. I had a great stay and Sam and Charlie were so accommodating to my needs. Great spot to stay!', 'My first airbnb experience and it was a pleasant one. Would definitely stay here again if in the area and available', "I had a great stay at Charlie and Sam's. Check-in was easy, the place was clean, comfortable, and quiet, and they were very easy to reach and communicative. They're situated in a great spot too, which is always a plus. Would happily stay with them again!", 'Nice spot in a cool neighborhood. Charlie and Sam were warm and helpful hosts. I enjoyed my stay here.', 'Charlie and Sam were so friendly and helpful! They gave me my space but were quick to respond if I reached out with questions. They also gave me some great recommendations for local restaurants. Also the bed?? Absolute heaven. Sinking into that memory foam mattress at the end of the day was honestly one of the best parts of my trip. I would absolutely stay with them again!!!', 'Cool and spacious room located really well in the heart of Williamsburg! Easy commute, communication, check-in. Love to come back soon!', "An excellent place to stay! Charlie and Sam were very easy to communicate with and quick to respond. The whole stay was smooth and thoughtfully laid out. They're also located in a very nice location - convenient to public transit and walking distance to plenty of food, shopping, and night life. Would definitely stay here again!", 'I‚Äôve loved to stay in their house. Everything was so clean and sam and charlie were always there in case I needed something. I would repeat the experience in case I return to nyc. Thank you so much!!', 'Such a lovely space, super comfy bed, I loved staying here! Sam Charlie and little Wilber the dog are so sweet. I loved meeting them, and would definitely stay here again.', 'Great place! Would definitely stay again.', 'I loved staying with Charlie and Sam! The room was very comfortable and overlooked a beautiful garden. The place was quiet while still in close proximity to everything. Sam was also super helpful and responsive-- thank you, Sam! Overall, I loved staying here and absolutely would come back!', 'Sam‚Äôs place was really great. The room was very clean and cozy, and the location was quite convenient, basically you can walk into Manhattan over the bridge.
Sam was really helpful and did her best to make me feel at home. Thanks for the great stay, I highly recommend this place, especially for soli travelers.', 'This was a nice space to stay at. Hosts were great at communicating, along with friendly and helpful. The subway and bridge are both walkable from the unit. The place was very clean and spacious. I didn‚Äôt spend much time actually there, but I would definitely go back.', 'The room is clean and it is just like the picture described. Sam is also very nice. Gave lots of instructions on breakfast. Overall, would recommend!', 'I had a great time staying at Charlie & Sam‚Äôs. They were very responsive and helpful in all messages, giving instructions and local recommendations.
The place itself is beautiful and in such a great area, I highly recommend it for anyone wanting to see more of Brooklyn and feel more like a local when visiting NYC.', 'I recently stayed at an Airbnb house in Sam and Charlie‚Äôs place, and it was a fantastic experience!
The location was perfect, with easy access to attractions and public transportation. The house itself was clean, comfortable, and beautifully decorated. The host was friendly and accommodating, making the whole stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this Airbnb for anyone looking for a great place to stay in New York City!', 'Great location and perfect room for a single traveler. The shared bathroom worked out fine and the check in and check out was super easy. Was even allowed to leave my suitcase for a bit which was helpful. Also loved that they provide water for the room and plenty of towels', 'I had a wonderful stay at Charlie and Sam‚Äòs. Would absolutely return in the future!!', 'Had a very lovely stay with Sam & Charlie! The room was so calming and perfect for a weekend visiting friends and working remotely. Thank you both, I would definitely stay here again:)', "I had a great stay with Charlie and Sam! The room is spacious, quiet, and comfortable, and it's located in a cool neighborhood. There are lots of terrific restaurants in easy walking distance, as well as Domino Park, a riverfront park that's great for photos. Charlie and Sam are perfect hosts; very hospitable and communicative. They also provided helpful information about the area. I'd love to return!", 'Sam was very nice and it was a perfect room, pretty & cozy and nicely sized, in a great location in Williamsburg. Definitively recommend and I would also visit again.', 'Wow I loved this airbnb. It is top notch. Such a pretty house, gorgeous room. Amazingly comfortable. Surprisingly quiet for a busy part of Brooklyn. I slept so well. I cannot recommend highly enough. I felt lucky to be there. Thank you, Charlie and Sam!', "Sam and Charlie's place was a great little room in the heart of Williamsburg. Sam was very responsive and offered flexible options for checking in and out. She also provided some great recommendations for things to do in the area and local spots to eat and drink. As a solo traveler it was a great and central spot to stay.", 'I was there only 2 days but it was a great stay. It‚Äôs very clean and comfortable. The bathroom is perfectly clean and the shower gets really hot. The bed is also very comfortable and I like theres a full size mirror for getting ready in the room. Only 1 flight of stairs if you have suitcases. The subway stations are about 10 minutes walking. The bedroom door doesn‚Äôt lock from the outside though but the house seemed safe to leave valuables inside while gone. The hosts are really nice and also have a very cute dog as well! I would definitely recommend.', 'I had a wonderful stay. Incredibly inviting hosts and welcoming place to rest your head. Would happily book again next time I‚Äôm in town.', "Located on a quiet street with no car traffic during the day, Charlie and Sam's townhouse was a lovely respite during my trip to NYC. The hosts are very responsive and were kind enough to accommodate my needs. Check-in was an absolute breeze. I found the space to be a great environment to do computer work before running off to catch a train at either the nearby Bedford L or Marcy JMZ stops. I also very much appreciated the ample carafes of drinking water that Charlie and Sam provided‚Äì‚Äìcrucial during the city's hot and humid summers! I highly recommend.", 'Great value - would stay again in a heartbeat. The room is very private since it‚Äôs located on a floor above the rest of the living space. Also the bed is crazy comfortable. And importantly the apartment is extremely well located with a short walk to the J,M and L', 'Absolutely perfect stay for a solo weekend in Williamsburg. Communication was top notch and very helpful. Check in and coming and going was so simple.
Amazing walkable location.
Room was cozy, spacious, well kept, and bathroom was spotless, super functional. I did not want or need for a single thing while I was here!
Thank you Charlie and Sam', 'Charlie and Sam were fantastic hosts! Beautiful home. They were very responsive and helpful with any questions I had and had plenty of recommendations for places to eat in the area. Highly recommend staying here!', "Couldn't have asked for a more comfortable place to stay, nor more hospitable hosts. Beautiful, clean and well-located home.", 'I‚Äôve stayed here before and will stay again. I find this place safe, clean, attractive, and extremely comfortable. Charlie and Sam make the perfect hosts.', 'Great location, large and comfortable room and bed', 'Wonderful place, nice host and perfect location!', 'Charlie and Sam‚Äôs place is darling. It was on a quiet street with a great garden/backyard view from my window. Although all rooms are separate rentals, it felt very private. I stayed for just one night but would recommend short or long stays with the ample storage available. Their small yet personal touches were very much appreciated. 5-star!', 'Sam and Charlie go above and beyond to provide a relaxing and comfortable environment. All naturally created by their personas. Cannot recommend enough', 'Very nice room. Thank you for your kindness. I would definitely use you again.', 'I loved everything about my stay in this beautiful house in Williamsburg: the room is very stylish, comfy, and has an excellent vibe. Highly recommended!', 'A great place to stay in Brooklyn! Peaceful and comfortable. The hosts are very welcoming and responsive! I would absolutely stay here again.', "I have found lately that Airbnb is not as good a deal as hotels, but this is definitely the exception! I loved my stay here, and would happily return! Highly recommend - and Sam and Charlie were so communicative and helpful, the perfect hosts. It's also a nice way to get the more relaxed Brooklyn vibes without being too far from Manhattan. A perfect Airbnb!", 'Great place! Slept great as the bed felt like it was from a high end hotel. Very clean and I loved the decor in the room. Sam was very responsive and flexible with check-in time, as well as allowing me to store my luggage for a few hours after check-out. Highly recommended!', "2nd stay at Sam & Charlie's and still delighted by their cozy home and warm welcome. A true gem in the heart of Williamsburg. I totally recommend it!", "I had a great time at Charlie and Sam's place. The room was spotless, and I really appreciate the readily available filtered water down the hall. I'd definitely return in a heartbeat!", 'Great location and great neighborhood! Walking distance to so many good shops and restaurants. The room is very nice and comfortable too.', 'Great place for a solo traveler. Quiet, comfortable room. Spotlessly clean. Sam is friendly.
There is train noise but not too intense. Shower temperature regulation is a bit wonky.', "Charlie and Sam's place was the perfect spot for my first ever New York visit! Situated a 2 min walk from the start of the Williamsburg bridge, I enjoyed a run from Brooklyn into Manhattan each morning as well as easy commutes by public transport.
The area itself had far too many bars and restaurants for me to get through in my time there, which I can only fix by going back again soon!
The room itself was spacious, clean, trendy. The bathroom was shared with one other guest (who I never saw) and I definitely felt like I had like enough space.
Charlie and Sam were communicative, provided great recommendations in the area and were kind.
I would happily stay here again.", "Prime location- walkable distance to Williamsburg, Greenpoint, Lower east side etc..
Incredible hosts- Sam and Charlie are wonderful people, felt lucky to have met them, felt grateful to have their relaxing place to return to everyday. Sam even offered me an air purifier for my eczema condition.. thank you.
Sparkling clean bathroom and bedroom- Even though I was sharing the bathroom with another guest but I hardly see them.
Great privacy- the separate entrance for guests are very nice, to avoid feeling bad coming home at late night etc
Quiet and tranquil room- This room has a view of the nicely decorated cute backyard, nice getaway from the street noises however there isn't any direct sunlight which is a thumb up for people who is looking for a cooler room.
P.S - I ABSOLUTELY love the mornings sun bathing during breakfast at their backyard <3", 'Such a lovely haven tucked in a great part of the city! I would absolutely recommend staying here; so much attention to detail in the decor & adhering to the comfort of the guest. Incredible hosts :)', "Charlie & Sams place is very clean and modern. One of the best AirBnB experiences I've had.", "In my years of staying at Airbnbs -- this is my hosting account, but I've stayed at way more through my personal one -- I'd never stayed in a shared place, always a whole home. Charlie and Sam went out of their way to make me comfortable, and their townhouse in South Williamsburg was the perfect location. Walkable to the Bedford L or even closer to the Marcy Av JMZ. That neighborhood is packed with my old haunts and some new ones too. The room was exceptionally clean (I mean, for a turn-of-the-century townhouse) and the bathroom was equally clean. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again, and would recommend their spot to any friends or family. Thanks!", "Unfortunately, I was only able to book one night otherwise I would have liked to have stayed longer. The room is very nice ! Everything is so lovingly designed. Clean and has good energy . I slept very peacefully.
The bathroom is clean. The only thing to note is you have to climb a narrow staircase up to the rooms ( and also one to the front door) If you have heavy luggage with you, you should be prepared for it. But you can only do 2x ...
I'd love to come back !!", 'It was definitely a great stay, the host helped me a lot with carrying my heavy suitcase ( Thanks a lotü•π) !
Great location, comfortable bed, smooth communication:)', "What a great spot in Williamsburg and in New York in general! Not only is the room clean and comfortable, the shared bathroom was never an issue. The room felt very private and was a great place to rest after a long day. There are tons to do within short walking distance of Charlie and Sam's place and I easily can stay at their place for much longer.", "I've been staying at Charlie and Sam's every time I'm in NYC, and it is always perfectly clean, calm and comfortable, relaxing and homey. I had some issues with a couple of bookings and Charlie and Sam were so understanding and generous! Will keep coming back!", 'Charlie and Sam‚Äôs was amazing. Thank you for having me. The room was spotless and Selfie worthy was that gigantic mirror! The lights at night in the bathroom gave a romantic, moonlight vibe. I felt safe in the neighborhood and comfortable with walking around. The new Brooklyn has ten thousand coffee shops on every corner. What more can you ask for. $10 Expresso Martini anyone? I would love to stay there on my next visit to Brooklyn. 10 stars!', 'Another great Brooklyn Airbnb, I was excited to stay at this listing- it looked just like the pictures and was very clean and inviting. The host even had crystals on the bed and in the room, which I found very thoughtful. The only thing to be aware of is that the stairs leading to your room are a little older and lean, so I wouldn‚Äôt recommend attempting them after a night out lol Excellent location, if you‚Äôre looking for a quieter area from Bedford Ave, but many coffee shops etc nearby.', 'Great place to stay in Williamsburg, easy check in, lovely room and perfect location, very quiet but close to everything, would happily stay again.', 'Sam and Charlie are kind and gracious hosts. Their home is beautiful and cozy. Their neighborhood is perfect for walking, eating and shopping. I hope to return each year.', 'I don‚Äôt need to overcomplicate this review. 5 stars like everyone else. Great place, great location, great value. Would definitely stay here again', "Had a very pleasant stay. Hosts are cordial and the neighborhood was safe, I was walking alone around at 1 a.m. in the middle of the night, despite this being my first time in the city. The washroom was clean. The bed was spacious. The lighting is mostly adequate. The L train is convenient. All in all, it was a wonderful experience. I had no complaints and there's nothing more that I could've possibly asked for.", "My stay at Sam's and Charlies was a lovely experience. I would defiantly reccomend it. It different from any other Airbnb experience, as I was living with the hosts and interacting with them as part of my living experience. They were both warm and welcoming, I am new to the city, and it was a great landing point in a huge city of strangers.
What's more, Sam was super helpful with my bags, and helped me carry then up and down the stairs which was amazing. the house and location are lovely and the room was spotless. Sam was great with communication.", 'My stay at Sam & Charlie‚Äôs place was great - everything just as described, very clean and comfortable. Thanks so much!', 'I came to Brooklyn for a long weekend, and everything about Charlie and Sam‚Äôs place was perfect. The space and overall stay exceeded all expectations‚Äî great communication with the hosts, very clean, beautifully decorated, super comfortable bed, walkable to everything, and incredibly peaceful room. Highly recommend & would book again in a heartbeat.', 'The townhouse and room was super nice. Great location, peaceful, perfect for my needs. Sam was so friendly and communicative. Def would stay here again. Highly recommend!', 'I‚Äôve never traveled alone, I was a bit nervous - but staying here was the best decision I made! Vibrant neighborhood, Sam was very accessible with clear instruction and wonderful recommendations. The bed is more comfortable than my bed at home, and I felt I was staying on my own. Never ran into anyone coming in and out, felt like I had the place to myself. I felt safe, and will definitely be staying here again. Sam even offered I store my bags after checkout since my flight wasn‚Äôt until later in the day. I wish I could give it more than 5 stars! I so enjoyed my time.', 'Lovely, comfortable room in a great Williamsburg location.', 'Super short and sweet stay! Charlie and Sam were excellent hosts and the space was so pretty and comfortable.', "Sam and Charlie's cozy home was a absolute dreamy haven to stay at!... Tasteful interior, lovely details, peaceful cozy vibes, super comfy bed, topped with the warmest welcome. Walking distance from Bedford Avenue- main avenue in Williamsburg- the waterfront, Domino park, Williamsburg bridge and the subway, surrounded by bars, restaurants, shops. I totally recommend this GEM üß°", 'Great spot! Fun location and hosts communicated well', 'Loved staying here; located in a great spot, quieter than Manhatten, but close enough to ride the citibikes in. Lovely clean room, comfortable bed, communicative host.']

title: Lovely brownstone apartment close to NYC
all_reviews:
['Loved this apartment, it was a bit far from all the places we wanted to go but other than that we really enjoyed our stay and the host was super attentive! Would definitely stay here again', "Vlad's place was perfect - great location, easy walk to PATH train, and the living space was very clean and comfortable. Vlad was a very clear and responsive host. Would definitely stay here again", 'Vlad was super accommodating to our every need and was definitely responsive on short notice. We had everything we needed for our stay and felt at home even if it was for a short time. We‚Äôre convince that Jersey City is the place to be!', 'We absolutely loved Vlad‚Äôs place! Definitely recommend to anyone traveling to the area!', 'We absolutely love Vlad‚Äôs home. Everything was perfect. It was near to train station, convenience stores and 24hrs fast food. Interior of the house looks amazing. Vlad was always responsive and allows flexible check-in. We highly recommend his home to whoever is cmg to NYC.', 'Our group of 3 loved everything about the apartment. The layout is cozy and the space is tastefully decorated. I was already impressed when seeing the pictures on Airbnb but even more, impressed upon arrival.
My partner and I found the queen bed to be comfortable and our friend on the couch bed was satisfied with its comfort.
The neighborhood is charming with great food options within walking distance as well as beer and wine shops for those looking to pick up some drinks for the stay. I highly recommend WurstBar as a dinner option (for meat eaters).
We spent two days exploring New York and were able to easily travel into Manhattan via the PATH, the PATH station is a ten-minute walk from the Airbnb.
We had a rental car during our stay and we were always able to find parking within a couple of blocks from the Airbnb. There are signs stating required permits to park but we were never ticketed for parking in ‚Äúpermit zones‚Äù.
I highly recommend you stay here whether you want to explore New Jersey and/or New York.', "We enjoyed the days at Vlad's. The apartment was ideal, quiet yet central to the Path Station. No matter what problem arose, Vlad immediately helped. We fully recommend this location:)", 'We loved our stay in the beautiful townhouse. It is located near the PATH train towards New York. It is a short and easy walk and a short (frequent) ride towards Manhattan. Jersey City is lovely with great restaurants and shops and has a relaxed and friendly atmosphere. We always felt safe (me and my two teenage daughters). The house itself is super comfortable, luxiourious and spacious with the three of us. It has a fully equiped kitchen and was very clean. The apartment and garden were as beautiful as the pictures and we felt greatful that we were lucky enough to have found and were welcomed in this townhouse. Vlad is a 5 star host, friendly, helpful, proactive and always quick to respond! We highly recommend a stay at the townhouse and we certainly hope to return one day.', 'Glad‚Äôs place was perfect! Easy walk to great restaurants, coffee shops and subway. The neighborhood is very cute, clean and quiet. The apartment itself is great. Very comfortable and clean- we would definitely stay here again', 'The place is exactly as the picture , Vladimir was super responsive and he made sure our stay is up to our standards , lots of restaurants and shops around and the subway to nyc is literally 7 min away am a fast walker that‚Äôs why ‚Ä¶..
But it‚Äôs great spot to unwind after busy day in the city
Would defiantly stay here again any chance am in this area
Look no further this the place to get', 'Enjoyed our stay! It was a 5 star experience, zero complaints! The host is very friendly and attentive.', 'Great spot for our week in NYC! Congratulations to Vlad for this apartment renovated with care and taste, offering beautiful amenities. Special mention for the landscaped outdoors space! The historic JC neighborhood is very charming and two ‚ÄòPATH‚Äô from Manhattan.', "Vlad was a welcoming host. Very personable and professional. The house was up-to-date and spacious. The location's also great - 10m walk from PATH that takes tou to Manhattan + right near the vibrant Jersey City. Our family had a great time, and we highly recommend.", 'If you want to get the feel of living in the Big Apple then you could do no better than staying in this apartment. It is a peaceful bolt hole right next to the Metropolis of NYC. Jersey City is a great location in its own right with super views and great restaurants and bars. I would strongly recommend a stay at this property it has everything you could want and the owner is excellent.', 'Charming house in a quiet and beautiful neighborhood. The house is very technologically advanced, featuring smart home systems and high-speed internet, and furnished impeccably with stylish, modern furniture.
Vlad was also a spectacular host, always attentive and providing great local tips to enhance our stay.', 'Not only is Vlad‚Äôs home beautifully constructed, decorated, and spotlessly clean, it has all of the modern conveniences you need including central A/C (which makes a huge differences in the hot and humid days of summer!).
It‚Äôs also conveniently located near the Grove Street PATH offering easy access to the city, restaurants, and shopping.
Vlad was so kind, accommodating, communicative, incredibly responsive, and helpful throughout the entire process - I‚Äôll definitely be back!
Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beautiful, comfortable, and quiet get away in the city.', '1. Great host. Nothing to add.
2. Apartment is clean, modern and cozy
3. It has everything you need and even more for comfortable stay.
4. Walking distance to the park, restaurants, trains and everything you can think of.
5. Cozy and absolutely great neighborhood.
Our best Airbnb experience.
Thank you', 'We had a great stay at Vlad‚Äôs place. It was super clean, had great decor, and bed was comfortable. Entry was east and communication was excellent. We would happily stay again.', 'Beautifully decorated and clean space in a great Jersey City neighborhood. Within walking distance to lots of great shops, cafes and restaurants.', 'The apartment is amazing, perfect walkable distance to path trains, restaurants, supermarkets! Vlad was very responsive and kind too! Next time I will book again üòÄ', 'Our second stay at Vlad‚Äôs. Highly recommended.', 'Vlads home was a nice place to stay out of the hustle and bustle of the city. The home had great amenities like the outdoor space as well as the washer and dryer. The neighborhood was easily walkable and within an easy distance to the subway. Vlad answered all our questions quickly. We would definitely stay here again.', "The best offer for value \ money.
I even don't know how to share that felling when you come back from NY to this lovely green and fresh district with friendly people.
It is absolute treasure what we could find, we were feeling like at home all the time, and the design and how the owner make the place is something absolutely different from what we could expect from America and NY specially.
Vlad whenever we are in NY\NJ we are your guest for sure, glad to meet and speak with you while our stay", 'Vlad was a great host, very responsive, and the apartment is beautiful, was spotless, well located and had everything we needed. Highly recommended.', "Our stay at Vlad's was perfect, responsive to requests. We even ordered a high chair before we arrived
Clean apartment, tastefully arranged, and special mention for superb quality bedding
I definitely recommend this apartment thank you Vlad for this stay in JC!!", 'Great location in downtown JC, close to Path and heart of JC, Grove St. The spacious apartment is on the ground floor with modern decors and amenities. With a 10-day stay, we found the washer/driver and a well-equipped kitchen very useful. Vlad lives in the same building and remained responsive throughout the stay. Oh, a bonus is the beautiful backyard!', 'Elegant, very characteristic apartment in a brick building with a beautiful garden. Perfectly and quality furnished (excellent bed, discreet and efficient air conditioning, nice bathroom etc). Perfect for visiting Manhattan and at the same time deprived of the hustle and bustle of the metropolis. Vlad is an attentive, responsive, and helpful host.', 'It was a clean and well located place to stay.', 'A great apartment for a visit - my parents really enjoyed sitting in the garden with a coffee, and found the apartment very chic, clean and fit for their needs.', 'Perfect location, centrally located, and accessible to NYC. The place was very clean, comfortable, and well equipped. Thank you Vlad for an amazing stay, I would recommend this place to anyone!', "We (parents with a 12-year-old daughter) spent 8 nights in Vlad's apartment and recommend it without restrictions. Vlad is very friendly and responds quickly to all our questions. We felt comfortable and welcome at all times. The apartment was clean and is beautifully appointed. Everything you need is there. The bed is soft and there are different head cushions to choose from, but also the couch is very comfortable for sleeping. The path to the PATH is not too long and easy to handle even after a busy day sightseeing day in Manhattan. Shopping is in the neighborhood (Minimarket 7th Heaven for the basics just around the corner, Asia 99Ranch Market a few steps away with a big fruit and vegetable department, large shopping market ShopRite also within walking distance) and also Dunkin, MC Donalds and many small restaurants are in the area. We are looking forward to visit again:)", 'The photos don‚Äôt do this place justice. Fantastic accommodation, great location and host.
We will be back', 'What a great place to stay to for a NYC adventure: excellent connection with PATH train. The apartment‚Äòs technical standards are very high: airconditioning, washing, machine, shower, furniture and it was extraordinarily clean. We loved the nice spot in the yard for a cup of coffee in the morning.
Communication was very easy.', 'Great location, super communication, apartment is very cozy and functional. It was ideal for our family- adults + 2 kids.', 'The apartment is really close to to the Grove PATH station. Easy to get to from Newark airport and easy to get to WTC(about 15 min with 7 min walk). Appartment was clean and cozy. The owner put a lot of effort into making it stylish and guest friendly.', 'Book this home now! It is spotlessly clean, spacious, comfortable, and perfectly located. Within walking distance to the PATH into the Manhattan, the historic district with many restaurants & shops, and a lovely shaded park.
Vlad is quick to respond; a wonderful host. We plan to stay here again.', 'Wonderful experience in this space, felt like a home away from home. Very close to the trains and in a perfect location to explore Jersey City. Would definitely come back again', 'Vlad was a wonderful host and very proactive as when I asked if he had a clothes drying rack as we use them in Australia as opposed to dryers on occasion. He immediately text back and said that he had just put one in the unit.
We felt very safe and comfortable there. Vlad has thought of everything and we loved returning there at night after a hectic day of visiting NYC. Highly recommend.', 'The best Airbnb I stayed in so far over the 4 years I used Airbnb great host great space no words express how great the experience was can‚Äôt wait to stay again', 'Great stay at Vlad place! Place was as described and matched the pictures. Easy check in and Vlad is very responsive if you need anything! Location is great with restaurants nearby while street itself is quite! My family really enjoyed stay at Vlad place and would love to stay there again! Thank you for beautiful stay!', 'Really nice and comfortable place. Great host', "The property is about 5 min from the Path Station. From there, the trains go either to World Trade Center or 33rd Strasse.
We felt very comfortable, restaurants and shops nearby.
We'd love to come back.", 'Loved our stay! Vlad was a great host and answered all of our questions. The listing was just as described. The bed was so comfortable! 10 minute walk to Grove St Station which gets you to the NJ Path. Plenty of great restaurants in the area. I would definitely stay here again!', 'Vlad was extremely responsive and helpful. Apartment is in a great location - half a block from a nice neighborhood park, restaurants, public transportation around jersey city and into NYC. We had some great weather and it was nice to be able to sit outside a bit in the afternoon - which you wouldn‚Äôt get with a hotel. Street parking was easy (we secured a overnight parking pass through family). I would definitely stay again.', 'My family and I recently stayed here for our daughter‚Äôs 10th Birthday trip, and we truly enjoyed our stay. It‚Äôs was the perfect location, walkable neighborhood, very clean space, looks just like the photos. We arrived way before check-in time and was able to drop our bags off so we could explore w/o the extra baggage lol. We couldn‚Äôt ask for a better host! Would definitely book again when we‚Äôre in the city! Oh and the park down the street is so nice, was our favorite part of the trip!', 'My friend and I loved staying in this beautiful apartment as it was close enough to NYC. The host is very helpful and responsive; the apartment is very clean and comfy. Great to stay in New Jersey and get a beautiful view of Manhattan from Liberty State Park, and Subia‚Äôs (5min walk from the flat) has the most delicious vegan food!', 'Would stay here again!', 'Great stay. Quiet neighborhood. Fantastic experience.', 'Beautiful home, very clean and modern.
Bathroom was amazing. Nice location in jersey close walk to the subway easy to get to NYC.
There is NO oven though keep that in mind if planning to cook own meals.', 'Vlad‚Äôs space is truly a gem in the Jersey City area. The space itself is extremely tranquil and is extremely walkable to downtown Jersey City or the train to the city. We will absolutely be looking to stay here again when we visit friend in Jersey City again.', "We had a pleasant stay at Vlad's apartment for 3 nights. It was clean, spacious and matched up to the photos. Would definitely come again!", 'This is the first time we are in Jersey City so don‚Äôt know about the area. It‚Äôs a semi underground property and the road in front is under construction so a little bit hard to enter. However once entering the property it‚Äôs way above expectation. Rooms are spacious. Interior design is amazing. Furnitures and equipment are high quality and comfortable even with fancy high tech devices. More than enough supplies, towels, sheets, blanket, kitchenware. A nice backyard with chairs and benches look totally different from the front end. There is a small shopping mall nearby. Grove street station is 15 minutes walking distance and just one stop subway to Manhattan from there. Given the price it‚Äôs a great choice for a trip to New York.', "Wonderful all around! Vlad's place is just as beautiful in person. You can tell that when they (I assume fairly recently) remodeled they didn't cut corners and built it with nice finishes and touches.
Nice location with shops and restaurants all around + a short walk to the subway to take you to Manhattan in as little as 7 minutes.
Bed was very comfortable and the place was nicely appointed for travelers. Nest thermostat with central heating and cooling was really nice to have with the warm weather we had during our visit. Something you won't find at a lot of other rentals in the area. We had a wonderful stay and would love to come back again in the future.", 'Highly recommend staying here. Vlad was very responsive and flexible during our stay. The apartment is clean, well decorated, and in a great location in Jersey City. We even extended our stay an additional week because we felt so comfortable there. We would love to stay here again!', 'Vlad was friendly, proactive, and communicative. I very much appreciated the heated floors which helped with the unexpectedly rainy weather and the clear instructions on how to adjust them. The entire space was very clean and had everything one could need for a comfortable short or an extended stay. I also appreciated that the hot water in the (very clean!) shower stayed hot, which I know can be difficult in older buildings. Apartment was also very conveniently located and easy to walk to the PATH, restaurants, etc. I definitely recommend staying here!', '10/10 Location
10/10 Host
10/10 Beautiful apartment
Thank you for being a wonderful host Vlad. This was for me, by far the best stay ever.', "Large apartment, elegant, comfortable and very neat, located on a quiet street. Access to lovely garden. Perfect for our week-long stay in New York City.
Host who cares about guests' comfort.", 'We had four very nice nights and days in this beautiful accommodation! Anything you need is available and the apartment is exactly as in the pictures. Furthermore, it is well maintained and neatly cleaned. Before arrival you will receive clear instructions and Vladimir is very easily accessible in case there is anything.
We had a super nice stay! Thank you!', 'Apartment as described. Very functional and very beautiful decoration.
Vlad welcomed us very warmly and recommended us good places nearby.
I recommend it!!', 'Absolutely wonderful stay! Enjoyable walk to the PATH with easy access to NYC. Easy to find food and such nearby as well. The apartment was impeccable, very well maintained, and a relaxing respite after each day‚Äôs sight seeing.
Vlad was an exceptional host. He even went so far to check in on our safety during a crazy storm and help accommodate our luggage so we could spend a little extra time adventuring.
Will definitely stay again when the opportunity presents itself!', 'Amazing space & responsive host! Will definitely choose this listing again when we come back to Jersey City!', "We had an excellent stay at Vladimir's accommodation, the apartment is very comfortable, spacious and with all the necessary amenities. Excellent location", 'Lovely stylish place, walkable to the Path trains to NYC. Very quiet.', 'Vlad was a great host. During checkin he let us know he was available to help us with anything and made sure things were in order and going well.
Vlad showed he really enjoys and takes pride in the neighborhood he lives in and that made our stay more comfortable.
He was kind and thoughtful. During a short period of loud construction work on the street he invited us to his shared garden at the back of the unit where things would be quieter. It was gestures like these that made him stand out as a host.', 'We had a great time staying at Vlad‚Äôs. It indeed was a beautiful and clean house! Highly recommendüòÅ', 'Vlad was a great host. Very helpful and responsive. The apartment was incredible! Everything we needed to feel right at home. Beautiful area and walkable to Jersey City restaurants and the Path to Manhattan.', 'Immaculate apartment in a safe, quiet lovely area of New Jersey and very convenient to get places, 10 min walk to Grove st station which is only 7 mins on PATH train to WTC. Vlad was incredibly helpful with any questions we had and super responsive. Would highly recommend to anyone. Chris and Dee', "The place was immaculate with modern design and top-notch amenities. It's just a 10-minute walk away from PATH station.
However, we couldn't rate it a perfect 5 stars due to a few issues:
1.The property was on the ground floor of a 4-story brownstone building, and the hosts resided directly above, sharing the backyard. Unfortunately, the lack of privacy in the backyard made it unusable.
2.We were consistently disrupted by early morning noise, around 6:30 am, likely caused by children running on the second-floor. Given our time zone difference (traveling from the west coast), this was quite inconvenient.
3.Street construction during our stay led to water shut-offs one morning, delaying our activities. The host did apologize for this inconvenience.
4.We faced an unfriendly stance from the host regarding our service dog. Despite Airbnb policy permitting service dogs without host approval, the host had previously declined similar requests and was uncooperative.", 'Despite unfortunate events with the water pipes bursting in the street. Vlad accommodated all my needs and helped make our stay amazing. 10/10 and will definitely book again !!', 'We had such a nice stay here! The place is private and beautiful - and it‚Äôs so accessible to public transportation and restaurants. The interior of the place is spotless and modern.
Vlad is a great host, he‚Äôs very responsive and thoughtful! Highly recommend!', 'I had an amazing stay this weekend at this wonderful apartment. Vlad has mastered the art of accommodation. Everything you needed was there, the place is beautiful and so modern. The host is very responsive and followed up to ensure we had everything we needed. The place is clean and a great location close to many restaurants and bars or shopping whatever your preference. Would definitely recommend.', 'Vlad‚Äôs apartment was an oasis of calm comfort on a great street in Jersey city, convenient to Manhattan and to local restaurants and shops. The garden area is wonderful, the apartment very well equipped, clean, comfortable and everything well communicated. Thank you Vlad.', 'We loved our stay at this fantastic apartment! The space was amazing -- in fact, it looked brand new! You can tell Vlad takes great pride in the apartment. The living room was cozy and comfortable, the kitchen was functional and spotless, and the bedroom was great for a perfect night of rest. The heated floors were a nice touch during our winter stay. :) The location was a perfect jumping off point for visiting NYC, with just a quick train hop over to Manhattan. Vlad was a wonderful host, with lots of great communication and recommendations. We will definitely be visiting again during our next stay in the area!', 'Really lovely place, inside was modern and clean, and the air conditioning came in handy. The host responded quickly and was very helpful. No complaints.', 'Vladimir‚Äôs place is an awesome place to stay! Very clean interior and beautiful . Easy access to multiple shops. Will definitely be staying here again when visiting again .', 'We adored our week‚Äôs stay at Vlad‚Äôs place. Vlad was extremely responsive and check-in and check-out instructions were clear. The apartment was easy to find and easy to get into. The location of the space is great - it is walking distance to Grove Street station where you can get the PATH train into NYC (the trains were quite frequent) as well as a large Whole Foods (should you want to dine in for a night). We were also pleased with the view of the NYC skyline from Exchange Place (another PATH station within walking distance of the apartment). The apartment itself had every amenity we needed and was clean and comfortable - after a busy day of walking the City, it was lovely to come back to. I would highly recommend a stay at this AirBnb if you‚Äôre visiting New York!', 'This was such a beautiful and homey space, highly recommend! Everything was accurately described. the location is great for public transportation and theres plenty of shops and eateries nearby. We had a minor issue with a small appliance and Vlad was easily accessible and fixed our issue in a timely manner. If i ever end up back in Jersey City, ill definitely be looking this place up :)', 'Great location: PATH to NY is just in 10 minutes by foot, 2 big supermarkets are in 15 min by foot. You‚Äôll find a lot of small shops, restaurants just around the house. There is a beautiful park just in 2 minutes from the house. The apartment is clean, cozy and well equipped. The area is peaceful, calm and safe. Vlad is really a super host! It was a great stay for our family of 4 - 2 adults and 2 small kids. We‚Äôll definitely come again üëç', 'Very clean and the neighborhood was nice and easy to walk to wonderful restaurants! We had a great trip and used Vlads recommendations for food!', 'The place was cozy and clean,20 min away from Manhattan. Had everything you need for a perfect stay. We will definitely be back!', 'Beautiful & convenient brownstone home, short walk to path station & a lot of nice local bars & restaurants. Vlad was very helpful with recommendations and making sure that our needs were accommodated!', 'Vlad‚Äôs place was the perfect launch pad for our NYC vacation with my wife and two young kids (3 months and 3 years old). The space itself is beautiful, clean, and had all the amenities we needed (and more! Vlad had Capri Suns in the fridge for the kids and nespresso pods for us). It‚Äôs located in an amazing spot in Jersey City, one block away from a great park for the kids and a quick walk to restaurants and to the PATH train to NYC.
Vlad is a fantastic host. Always very responsive and thoughtful. We will definitely be coming back for future NYC trips!', 'Vlad‚Äôs place is great. Clean and comfortable with heated floors!
Everything you need is within walking distance. The Path Train is less than 10 minutes away and you can be in NYC in 15 minutes. We plan to return in the Fall and hope to stay here again. Cheers!', 'Vlad‚Äôs place is great - stylish, comfortable and clean. It‚Äôs got all the things you need, it‚Äôs in a great neighbourhood with great transport links into Manhattan close by and is a short taxi ride from Newark Airport.
My partner and I had a great stay and would recommend Vlad‚Äôs place to anyone visiting NYC!', 'Vlad‚Äôs house is very nice and the location is close to restaurants and the Path. We had a great time at Vlad‚Äôs place.', 'Felt like home!', 'The apartment is a functional and very beautiful space. From the moment you arrive, you feel very comfortable. The area seemed very secure, the access was super comfortable. The bedroom is the best since it has elements that allow you to have a pleasant rest, sheets of excellent quality, regulated light, garden view. Highly recommended', 'Perfectly located apartment in Jersey City. A few minutes walking to the metro to get to New York City.
Very clean. Everything as described in the advertisement.
Vlad was accessible and helpful throughout.
I will be back. :)', "in one word... Super. in 2 words ...F.. Super. don't miss the opportunity to visit Vlad's place.", 'Very accommodative person,
Great place and very nicely kept with a great cute patio.', 'This was my first time in Jersey City and it was great! The neighborhood has character with easy access to restaurants, a park, and trains/ferries to the city. Vlad‚Äôs apartment was very nice and very clean. We especially appreciated the availability of the outdoor space. I was traveling with my two kids- eight and ten. One shared the bed with me and the other took the sofa. The size was perfect for the three of us.', 'Beautiful apartment and thoughtful additions like a travel crib! Vlad was super responsive and everything was as described. Very stylish and modern! Short walk to great restaurants and public transit into NYC!', 'This is a beautiful garden-style apartment in a brownstone which offers amazing access to NYC and very stylish accommodations. The bed is extremely comfortable and the whole experience of staying at Vlad‚Äôs place is outstanding. Jersey City itself has wonderful restaurants and the apartment is close to Liberty State Park as well. I‚Äôm a super picky Airbnb customer and couldn‚Äôt have been more pleased with our decision to stay here.', 'We had a wonderful stay in Jersey City, the world‚Äôs best kept secret! Everything was perfect: the apartment was modern, spacious, clean & comfortable, getting into Manhattan was a doddle, the farmer‚Äôs market on Saturday was a great surprise, and Vlad could not have been clearer, kinder or more accommodating.', 'Awesome beautifully renovated apartment close to some great spots. Beautiful and safe neighborhood. Host was so friendly and checked in to make sure we were doing well - much appreciated.', 'Vlad‚Äôs place was amazing for our trip to NYC. The home was pristine and had a great TV and kitchen.
Located in a really quiet and peaceful part of Jersey City it made getting around the city and transiting over to NYC super easy and fast.
Vlad was super responsive super quick to help out and friendly. Would definitely stay again!', 'everything was amazing will definitely stay here again', 'The location was perfect walking distance to restaurants and bars in the area. The place was private, clean and very cozy. Would definitely recommend and come back when staying in Jersey.', 'Very much recommend. It‚Äôs a great apartment but what really made it so great is the area - such a safe friendly, pretty neighbourhood. I went to the supermarket at night alone and felt so safe walking home in the dark. Apartment was great had everything you could need. Quality shower. Comfy bed. Easy walk to PATH and access to Manhattan. I really recommend the walk down to Exchange Place it‚Äôs so pretty down there to get on the PATH. Glad to have stayed in Jersey City for our trip to NYC!', 'My family gathered in Jersey City for a family wedding. This was by far the nicest place of the 5 places rented for the long weekend.
We loved the open floor plan, the crisp uncluttered decor, and the walkability of the neighborhood.', 'BOOK AS FAST AS YOU CAN!
We stayed here for ten days, and we could have stayed another ten!
The apartment is amazing. The decor, the lighting, the furniture and everything else is so nice. You feel right at home when you walk in. The kitchen and bathroom has got everything you need. Best part? The outdoor space! It is gorgeous with flowers and lights - bring a bottle of wine, you will need it.
The area is absolutely beautiful. There‚Äôs a cute park filled with flowers at the end of the road. The waterfront is close by (and it stretches for miles left and right) and it offers the most beautiful sunrise in the city.
Vlad is definitely a super host! Attentive and a really nice guy. Make sure you read his recommendations for restaurants - he is on point!
We will definitely stay here again. Better sooner than later!', 'Loved this very modern garden unit located in an old building. Great residential location that is near a Path station and many great shops and restaurants. Vlad is very responsive and provides very clear instructions. Some areas that may impact some people: the bedroom does get a bit cold, but Vlad has a heater in the room to make it more comfortable. The noise upstairs is noticeable at times, but generally not too early or late. The quiet hours were respected. There are expectations for you to clean up for yourself (take out the garbage, wash the dishes), so that may not be ideal for those use to hotel lodging. For me, though I was fine with everything and would definitely stay here again.', 'We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in JC. This place was nothing short of amazing. You can tell a lot of love went into creating a beautiful and comfortable space for his guests. The bed was super comfortable (which is a big deal for me), the linen quality was great, and the entire place was a great vibe. I highly recommend staying if you‚Äôre ever in the area.', 'I enjoyed my stay. It is a very beautiful and peaceful home. Will definitely be back if I‚Äôm in Jersey!']

title: Cozy Studio Apt in Historic Brownstone
all_reviews:
['i loved my stay, good rental near the metro!', 'Very quiet place.', 'We loved our accommodations during our stay in NTC. Conveniently located and less than 2 blocks from the metro. The neighborhood was beautiful and very quiet.
Our host was quick to respond to questions and gave helpful tips regarding transit. Check out their travel guide suggestions! We loved our brunch at The Edge Harlem.', 'The accommodation is located 25 min from time square and 4 min from the nearest metro! Very good communication with Kakuna too, thank you!', "Peaceful apartment in a quiet and very nice area. Everything is close by, including the metro which is a stone's throw away, which is very convenient and very enjoyable after a long day wandering.
The big strong point of this apartment is Kakuna: it is full of good advice and hyper responsive, which greatly improved our stay!!!", 'This lovely studio was exactly what I needed for my week-long New York visit! It felt like a home-away-from home, and I was always happy to return to it after every city excursion.', 'We have a nice stay.Easy to rich the place with subway.The studio was clean,the kitchen has everything you need,including coffee,sugar,tee,etc.', "I found Kakuna's place perfect for my needs. I'm from New York and travel back and forth from Puerto Rico. I checked in at night and everything was as described. Maybe a block to walk from the subway and the lockbox/keys were easy to manage. I would love to do it again when I come back as it's a perfect location for where my office is and also many friends near the area.", 'Thank you for all your help and quick response to all our questions. We loved the place. Thank you!', 'This place was cozy and well kept. The subway entrance is across the street and that was very convenient. I would definitely stay there again. The host was very hospitable.', 'I did not meet the host in person but received check-in instructions for check-in promptly before arrival by email. Everything was very easy to handle. The neighbors were very friendly and helped me with my luggage too. Great location in Harlem right by the subway station. the place was as described and I was very satisfied. I can only recommend it!', "A very nice place and close to the metro station. We did a little longer about the lock and the neighbor happened to come by and asked very kindly if he could help us, this was not necessary, but put us at ease.
Highly recommended if you don't want to stay in the busy center of New York.
In addition, the host was also very helpful and clear in the answers. Here would be able and want to stay again if we come to New York again.", 'Kakuna was a fantastic host. Nice studio in a well-connected area.', 'Really small, cozy apartment situated in Harlem. Super close to the metro station, in a quiet and safe street. Easy to enter with the self check in and very well equipped. It was a little bit to hot during the night and ke kept the valve for radiator close, but except that very worth it for the price.', 'It was my first stay in Harlem. It was inspiring to be in a place so remarkable for African-American history. Historic Harlem is a few blocks away from good restaurants around W 115th to W 120th, moreover it is a 3-min walk to 135th St Subway Station, and from there you can reach easily all Manhattan. Kakuna answered all the questions I asked and it was much easier to get in than I initially supposed from the instructions I had received.', 'Fantastic place stay while exploring the city! Kakuna is a responsive and kind host. Thank you for the fantastic stay :)', 'I would return to this place anytime!', 'My stay at Kakuna‚Äôs place was simply wonderful! The location, close to the subway, made my travels around the city much easier. Kakuna was extremely polite and helpful, always willing to assist with tips and information about the city. Her home is very comfortable and has all the amenities for a great stay in New York. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a cozy and welcoming experience in the Big Apple!', 'I have no other review for this airbnb than amazing. The space is exactly as in the description, super clean and organized. Very well equipped. Kakuna is an super host, she gave all the instructions very clear and indications of restaurants and food markets close to the apartment. Also answered all messages very quickly. And for me what also makes a difference is how close it is to the subway station. No more than 5 minutes walking. I would stay here again for sure :)', 'Super good place in Harlem, has everything you need (the washing machine and dryer we‚Äôre perfect for us to help pack lightly) the place is quiet and 3 minutes on foot from the metro!', 'The descriptions and pictures are very accurate. The instructions were extremely clear, and we had zero problems. I didn‚Äôt need to contact the host for anything. The place is very accessible to subway and is walking distance from many things. The area is fairly safe and has a nice park a block away. The only thing that I was not fond of was the unit is below street level. This means that you can hear people walking by and some people stopped to talk. One group was having an argument on the phone we had to listen to for a good 10 minutes. It all happens during the day though, so it was fairly quiet at night. Overall this was a very convenient, clean, and nice place to stay. I appreciate the accuracy in the descriptions and clear instructions.', 'The stay was great. The apartment was very well appointed. Ideal sleeping possibilities for two persons. The location is great. You are in the center in 20 minutes.', 'Kakuna‚Äôs place is AMAZING!! It is so convenient to have the subway station only 2 minutes away by foot! She‚Äôs very responsive and helpful and her place is so cute! Staying in a little Brownstone home felt like we were locals and that was awesome! Her place is well equipped, the neighbourhood is quiet and we felt very safe. We highly recommend it! We‚Äôll be back!', 'Very cosy little space which had everything that was required. A little bit noisy amenities (fridge and pipe work) which affected our sleep but we understand the building is old. Very good transportation links, can certainly recommend.', 'Nice stay. Thank you!', 'This was a very good location in a safe neighborhood easy access and close to trains I traveled downtown each day for a workshop in the village. Also buses going on east and west side of town a block away. The apartment is clean quiet and well stocked with everything you may need. Kakuna‚Äôs guide was also very nice to have since I did not have much time to explore neighborhood.', 'This studio was the perfect spot for my NYC trip!', 'We were super comfortable in the apartment, kakuna superb with us at all times. We 100% recommend it.', "Very good accommodation, very well located close to line C in a nice quiet and secure area. Great for visiting Manhattan. The apartment is perfect for a couple, it is very clean (good smell of clean as soon as you enter!), the bedding is comfortable and there is everything you need in the closet if you are cold. Kitchen with all the amenities you need and bathroom with towels and supplies provided which is rare in an airbnb. Kakuna is very available and above all very accommodating, we had a last-minute contingency and she was very understanding. All his explanations for entering the accommodation were very clear as well as the operating instructions for the accommodation. Kakuna is really very friendly, the interaction with her is very simple and quick. We really enjoyed everything and we'll be back with pleasure!", 'Excellent price-quality . The apartment meets all needs and is very comfortable. title: West Village Renovated 1 Bed w/ in-unit Laundry
all_reviews:
['This is by far the best Airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed at. The apartment was gorgeously designed and it was like a zen oasis in the middle of Manhattan. It is also perfectly located in west village by the best restaurants and a short walk away from union square which is stunning. It was like staying in a five star hotel but with much more space. Taylor went above and beyond to make my time perfect and I can‚Äôt thank her enough. Couldn‚Äôt recommend more! Can‚Äôt wait to stay in this serene apartment again soon!', 'We had a great stay at Taylor‚Äôs place. The apartment is clean, elegant and well equipped. It was also surprisingly quiet, even for a rear unit, in such a busy spot. It couldn‚Äôt be anymore convenient - easy to walk anywhere downtown and so close to multiple trains. Taylor was a great host, responsive, accommodating, organized. They left us fresh flowers and wine as a welcome, and went out of the way to get an item we left behind back to us. Wonderful hosts and we think the place is a gem! We will defiantly put it first on our list for trips to NYC!', 'The apartment is beautifully renovated and furnished (and smells great too!). We were even met with fresh flowers in each room - a lovely, welcoming touch. Taylor was super proactive and, as former inhabitants of the Village, we loved his great list of recommendations (even found some new to us)! The location is right in the middle of the Village hubbub - fabulous for everything the Village as to offer and easy to get uptown quickly. A great find!', 'Fantastic apartment right in the heart of West Village. Loved the location, super walkable to everything. And Taylor was a great host. Taylor was super helpful and responsive with anything we needed. check in& check out was a breeze. We will definitely stay here again our next NY trip!', 'Great, clean and roomy space in the middle of lively W. Greenwich Village, walkable to everything you‚Äôd want to do. The apartment itself is quiet, extremely well decorated, and immaculately clean, featuring new furniture, modern renovations and artistic touches, which is a rare find in NYC.
The host was responsive and incredibly kind. I'll definitely be booking this apartment for my next visit! Highly recommend!!", 'Loved it!', "We had a lovely time at Taylor's place in West Village. Could not recommend more!', 'My husband had a wonderful stay in Taylor‚Äôs West Village apartment.

The location cannot be beat for a stay in NYC. A quiet, tree-lined walkable neighborhood with great places to eat and shop. Easy access to public transportation, but also well-located to walk to all the fun and cultural neighborhoods in lower Manhattan.
Taylor was an attentive and accommodating host. We highly recommend Taylor‚Äôs place for a NYC stay!', 'This felt more like a stay at a luxury hotel than an Airbnb. Will absolutely be returning.', "What an amazing 2 weeks staying at Taylor's place. It had everything I needed, great location, comfortable bed and felt like a home away from home. title: Manhattan Cozy Studio Near Empire State Building.
all_reviews: ["Kind of an odd place, almost like a dormitory for short term use. We were not there for more than a couple of days, so hadn't much use for the kitchen, but it seemed workable for someone staying longer (though the layout would have been more comfortable absent the excessive cabinet space). One issue for us was having no other available light sources other than the ceiling lights that lit the entire room- they could have used a floor lamp (or even a clamp on lamp for the headboard of the bed) to make the stay a little more comfortable. That being said, the affordability for downtown NYC was off the charts (about a third the cost of any hotel in the area). We would certainly stay there again.", 'Great location. We highly recommend it.', 'Great location. Everything as advertised.', 'Great stay, it‚Äôs a studio, as said in the description, but has everything you need! Worked great for us. Has soap, shampoo and toothpaste if you forget to bring some. Even has a stovetop espresso maker, which was a highlight for us as we love coffee. Clean, smelled clean and that water pressure from the shower is amazing. Also, a laundry room on the main floor.', 'Excellent location. Check in and out was easy.\nMy only complaint is I understand the price for such a small place is because of location, and it\'s in Manhatten. But I just feel like it costed more than it was worth still for 3 nights we stayed. Take that for what you will, I just know in other major cities I\'ve gone to and been to an Airbnb bottled water or ice was provided or a better array of stuff for coffee.\nSmall things, otherwise it was generally "quiet". Beds actually weren\'t too bad either and the water pressure was great in the shower. The bathroom was pretty dusty in some spots though. I only mention this because of the cleaning fee everyone gets charged, they just don\'t seem to dust which can work up your allergies.', 'Great location, quiet in the apartment. Back elevator was not identified as the one to use during check-in and had to do a lot of walking, turns, and steps while carrying luggage. There was no communication at check-in.']

title: Manhattan | Times Square l Central Park, New York
all_reviews:
['Apartment according to listing. Great location.', 'Mikalai was a superb host. Responsive, flexible, fave us several tips. i strongly recommend his apartment.
