Oreste is an available host who knows how to be discreet.", "Highly recommended!
Orestes and Chris's place is great. It is centrally located and you feel welcome and very comfortable with the two of you.
You can get to Manhattan by subway, no problem at night.
Private room and private big bathroom. The two live right above the room and Orestes works next to it. If there are any questions, they are there and help where possible. Supermarket, bakery, kiosk, dinner... Everything around the corner. We'll be happy to come back! üëçüèºüôÇ", 'Orestes genuinely seemed to care about our stay, which made us feel even more comfortable. It was also wonderful to have Gus greet us! To top everything off, we even saw them shooting Law and Order right across the house‚Äîit was really cool! All in all, a great experience, and we would definitely stay here again.', 'Wonderful stay at a very convenient location: subway stations and supermarkets are nearby, it takes approx 20 minutes to be in center of the most famous sightseeings.
We were out the whole 8 days, but wished we could have enjoyed the beautiful garden just a bit more :-).
It was quite hot in NY for the time of year, but luckily the room has a ceiling fan (and airco, but we did not use it).
We felt very much at home, and very safe. Orestes is so nice and relaxed, not to mention his taste for beautiful art and decoration. The bathroom is equipped with all extra convenient necessities like soaps, bodylotion and hairdryer.
On the last day we had lunch at the Court Square Diner which is open 24/7, just around the corner, which my daughter felt like a great ‚ÄúRiverdale‚Äù experience. Great food too!
Everybody in the neighborhood was nice and friendly. We hope to able to go back one day, and stay at this beautiful place again.', "Orestes was a very friendly host and good at giving tips without imposing themselves. Everything was very relaxed; Orestes is interested without being curious, which I found very pleasant.
The room was brighter than expected. The only unexpected thing was that the room and the bathroom are located along a hallway, which in turn leads to the open study of Orestes and to the stairs up, where Orestes lives. This also means that Orestes, who is a wonderful photographer, leaves his work, his half professional life open with confidence, even though he doesn't know his guests before. For us, this meant that we wanted to be especially respectful and considerate so as not to disappoint his trust.
My daughter (14) and I (50) slept wonderfully in the 160cm wide bed, the mattress is awesomeü§©! The LIC Corner Caf√© around the corner is a good tip! With the E or the 7, you are almost everywhere within a short time. Very quiet nights!", 'Right off the bat, Orestes is the best host I‚Äôve ever. Such a friendly guy. On day one he gave me and my friend a tour of the premises and had given us a lot of great recommendations on what to do throughout our stay. This included where to eat, what activities we can do, and which subways to take. He really went out of his way to make us feel comfortable and welcome as this was our first time at NYC.
The unit itself is clean and very organized and you can really tell that he went one step further as there was extra towels, toilet paper, etc. The outside patio area is beautiful and perfect for eating at or just lounging around. The bedroom we stayed in was more than enough space for two grown men and had all the essential amenities. The AC was clutch in the hot NYC summer heat! The bathroom was very nice and beats what you get at some hotels in my opinion. The neighborhood is totally safe as well. We came back late a few times and always felt like we can walk back safe.
Overall, Orestes had made this our home away from home with the unit and his recommendations. Us two island boys felt very comfortable even though it was our first time in NYC and Orestes had a big part to with it. Would recommend anyone to stay here and would definitely stay here again myself!', "I spent so comfertable in his house. First, he welcomed us with so kindness despite the late check-in time. And his house is near downtown, station, and airport.The location is perfect!!! I want to stay it again when I go to NY. I'm looking forward to see you Mr Orestes again. Thank you so much!!!", 'Orestes was a great host! Very responsive and friendly. Loved the location and convenience of being nearby a train station, Trader Joe‚Äôs and 24 hr diner!', 'Such a wonderful stay! We enjoyed our trip so much because of the ease of Orestes Airbnb. We can‚Äôt wait to come back', "This place is awesome. Orestes and his partner are wonderful hosts. We felt at home all the time. The room is very comfortable and the bathroom facilities were top class. Location couldn't be better, 4 subway lines nearby just a few stops away from Manhattan. We will be definitely staying here again whenever we need to be in NYC.
The place is great. Orestes and his partner are great hosts, we felt at home at all times. The room is spacious and comfortable, and the bathroom is very clean and modern. The area where the listing is located is unbeatable, with 4 metro lines nearby, Manhattan is very easily reached. We will definitely consider this place again in the future!", "A perfect stay at Orestes' stay! We spent 5 days there. Warm welcome, clean, comfortable location and conveniently located close to the metro. We are quickly everywhere with a view on the Skyline as a bonus. Orestes is an extremely thoughtful host and full of good advice. Just great for discovering NY, we highly recommend it. Thank you Orestes ü§ó", 'Orestes is very warm. spacious bedroom and bathroom. the outdoor courtyard is full of charm despite the seasonal mosquitoes.
I highly recommend this accommodation.
We had a fantastic week in NY.', 'Beautiful location in NYC friendly welcome, good quality bedding. But would need good cleaning under the bed and repairs', 'My friend and I had such a wonderful stay at Orestes‚Äô! Beautiful backyard, the room was clean and very cozy and we loved the interior design and art! The location was right close by to the subway so getting places was also very convenient! Thank you Orestes üòä', 'We had a such a great stay with Orestes and Cristian. They are both so kind and helpful and really amazing people.
The townhouse is very charming with arts on the walls, a cozy bedroom and a spacious bathroom. Also the garden was nice and cozy.
Train, shopping and diner just around the corner. Only ten minuts walk to the river, where you have a great view over Manhattan.
Thank you both for such a wonderful stay in New York. We will definitely come back.
Tina and Heidi', 'Great location, clean room/bathroom- very quiet neighborhood', 'Great location.
Close to subway', 'Thanks to Oreste and Chris for the great days. We felt very comfortable with you. GUS the dog is super sweet and has always greeted us. I can only recommend you.
kind regards Tanja and Catia', 'My favourite place to stay in NYC. It‚Äôs been 6 years now and always a pleasure to stay at Orestes‚Äô.', 'The location of the place is perfect. The subway stations are just around the corner (still only heard in the background) to the center of Manhattan there are 3 stations. Nice room, great bathroom and a very nice garden. Orestes is a nice and pleasant host. We would stay again every time!', 'Had a short and lovely stay at Orestes‚Äô place, really gorgeous, and quiet! Even though his place is less than 5 minutes from the subway station. A beautiful back yard ‚Ä¶ and we love Gus! (Gus is Orestes‚Äô dog.)
Lots of local stores and places to eat just a few minutes walk away.
A great refuge to come back to after a hard day‚Äôs walking round the sights - MOMA etc!', 'Orestes and Christian are wonderful friendly and nice people. Room, bathroom and the house are wonderful, cozy, quiet and comfortable. Orestes and Chris were always there when needed. The location is perfect. 5 Minutes to train 7 (10 Minutes to 42: Street). The area is great and safe. You can walk to the river and have the perfect Manhattan view. Beds are comfortable and big. There is tea, coffee , refrigerator and a microwave room. Supermarkets are right around the corner. There is also a nice d24h diner nearby.. Best part are the big room and bathroom and of course Orestes and Chris. The townhouse is amazing, I felt like I was living my main character life. The bed was a dream and a Casper mattress, the best sleep of my life. Love love love ‚ô•Ô∏è I will always treasure my stay here.', 'This was a great place to stay as we finished up our bike ride on the Erie Canal Trail. He accommodated storing our bikes in the back garden area. Orestes greeted us and made us feel right at home, was friendly and always had local recommendations for food and sightseeing. His place is historic and beautiful- on a quiet residential street. Would definitely stay again on future trips to NYC.', "We had a great time at Orestes! The accommodation is well located: quiet and close to the metro (it's 15 minutes in Grand Central). There are also quite a few shops nearby (Joe's trade, CVS, the famous Court Square Diner which is really good and not at home).
The room and the bath are spacious and clean.
Orestes and his partner are really friendly and attentive. He gave us some great tips for enjoying our stay in NYC.
This is an address that we recommend without hesitation!", 'Nice spacious room (nice bed) with separate bathroom with a huge shower. You may use the garden. Orestes is super friendly, hospitable and has many tips (are on his profile). Super close to several metro stations, so very easy to reach Manhattan. He was so sweet and welcoming. Unfortunately we didn't get to talk much since, one Orestes was sick and kept his distance as to not give it to us (much appreciated ;) naturally) and two, we were out all day, every day and basically just slept there.
The room was big with all the amenities we could possibly need and the bed was very comfortable.
The bathroom was great with a huge shower.
Would absolutely stay here again and again.", "A stay at Orestes is exactly what makes airbnb so special - living in a real, tastefully furnished home including contact with sympathetic, helpful, friendly and generous people.
We felt comfortable from the beginning, enjoyed every conversation, laughed a lot and we were thrilled about the central location, Trader Joe's just around the corner and the great alternative nightlife options in Long island City. Be sure to visit Gantry Plaza State Park overlooking the Manhattan skyline and have a beer at Culture Lab or 5th Hammer on your way back!
Orestes is a perfect host and a great person - you come as a tourist and leave as a friend.", "This is the PERFECT place to stay in New York! I really recommend without so much as a second thought!", 'Location is very good if you want to see other neighborhoods than Manhattan as well. Everything fits with the apartment. The only downside: You can only get to the bathroom via a public hallway.', "A great experience first time in NYC. Closest experience I've had was an AirBnB in Barcelona, but Orestes' place is nicer. Will stay again when I'm in the city.", "Orestes' place was amazing, very walkable to multiple subway lines making it easy and fast to get around. Orestes was also a very welcoming and a good host! We would love to stay here again!", "Certainly:
Staying at Oreste's residence proved to be a truly enchanting experience. It is a home adorned with meticulous care and attention to detail, nestled in a relaxing and welcoming environment, complemented by a beautifully manicured garden. The available bathroom offers all the necessary amenities, including a shower with rejuvenating qualities that refreshes after long journeys in the bustling metropolis. Despite being well-connected, the abode is situated away from the urban chaos, providing a refuge of inspiration and vitality in harmony with the dynamism of the city it resides in.
Thank you for allüåà", 'Great stay near Manhattan, lovely hosts. Beautiful terrace, quiet and a great escape from the day in the city. Definitely will be coming back.', "We LOVED our stay with Orestes. He is an extremely special person and his home was a wonderful refuge after busy days of sightseeing in Manhattan. He very kindly let us leave our luggage as we had a late flight. The bathroom is amazing; the bed very comfortable. It's quick and easy to get to midtown, Brooklyn and JFK. The area felt very safe. You must visit the diner and the Mexican.", 'Orestes has created a very special interior environment and an extraordinary, park-like garden. As Orestes jokes about the garden it‚Äôs like being in the country with the convenience of being able to order in Chinese food at a moment‚Äôs notice. The comfortable guest room is full of art and surely there‚Äôs a story behind each and every piece. Orestes, an architect and photographer is also an exhibit curator who participates in
and is knowledgeable about the local art scene. He also know everything about this quickly evolving neighborhood that generates excitement from a distinctive combination of glass and steel skyscrapers, gritty industrial sites and old brink factories and warehouses that are now being repurposed as trendy bars and eateries. Getting around by is inexpensive, convenient and fun. And then early in the morning or on return from a day‚Äôs urban exploration, there is nothing like relaxing in the large, leafy garden Orestes has nurtured over many years.', 'Orestes‚Äô place was lovely to stay at! The location is great, with easy access to the subway that gets you into central manhattan in no time. The room itself was cosy with everything we needed. The bathroom was fantastic - the shower is as good as it looks in the photos! It didn‚Äôt impact our experience much, but we did notice that the designated bathroom was used by others a few times during our stay. We hope to stay again next time we are in NY!', 'The apartment is very close to the subway, you can reach Manhattan within 10-15 minutes, also easy to get to JFK. The apartment is in a quiet street, so you can sleep well in this laud city. Orestes communicated always on a quick and clear way. It was a great help for us that we could left our bags in the apartment on the last day of our stay, because our plane departed late evening.', 'I had a great stay at Orestes‚Äô home. The house is beautiful, well cared for and full of artistry. The bathroom was a real treat, with a unique shower experience. (Will be tough to go back to my own shower!) The location was convenient to Brooklyn and downtown. Thanks again Orestes!', "We had a fantastic stay. The apartment is in a townhouse and is spacious and tidy. The garden is a great space to relax. A special space with lots of art and paintings, two good double beds and a fridge in the room and a spacious modern bathroom. The apartment has its own entrance.
The neighborhood is very cozy. Lots of restaurants, supermarkets and nice and quiet. There are two subway stations just around the corner, which makes it easy to get to Manhattan. It's also wonderful coming home after a day in Manhattan.
We really enjoyed this bnb and will definitely recommend it to our friends. We'll definitely be back again.
In short, a super apartment for your week in New York!", 'This is a special place. I feel lucky to have experienced New York as though staying with a very dear, well situated friend. Long Island City is a clean, quiet, and charming neighborhood. We felt very safe walking and exploring. Don‚Äôt miss dining at Top Quality, or any place Orestes suggests. He is the best kind of host, talented and humble, gracious and genuinely kind. Very approachable, but not intrusive. Comfortable bed, amazing shower, harmoniously decorated (fantastic art and photography everywhere!!) and an easy train ride from JFK. Was perfect for the two of us; we‚Äôll be back!', 'Great spot! Very convenient location, clean room, amazing shower.', 'Orestes was a fabulous host, friendly, was great to chat to and had plenty of spot-on recommendations.
We had a delicious burger at The Baroness, it‚Äôs a bit further than other spots but definitely worth it. We watched sunset by the Pepsi Cola Sign which was stunning to see the sun set over Manhattan.
Orestes was accomodating, responsive and checked in on us as we seen each other in the accomodation. Nothing but lovely things to say about Orestes.
The bedroom and bathroom are spacious, felt homely and were perfectly clean.', 'A wonderful property in a great location. Thoughtful and friendly hosts. Highly recommended.', "We stayed at Orestes's place for a week just before Christmas and are totally delighted. It was immediately like coming home. Orestes is a great person, and we also immediately closed his partner Chris and the gracious dog Gus. The room was not 100% optimally cleaned (a bit of dust) but it doesn't matter at all. It was just to feel good. Orestes is discreet and unobtrusive, but always there immediately when you have a question or need something. Since our suitcases unfortunately only arrived after 3 days or one did not arrive at all, he spontaneously put us T-shirts, brush and other things. Also, we received valuable tips for our excursions. The house has an ingenious situation. Around the corner there is a diner, a cozy cafe as well as supermarkets and especially the subway. You can also quickly get to Manhattan by the nearby ferry. Everything was amazing. Definitely recommend. I'm glad we were allowed to be there. Thanks!!!", 'Great location, comfortable bed, and very clean.', 'Amazing location, great shower, nice bed. Limited comms with the host so can‚Äôt comment. Overall the location was perfect for easy access to Manhattan.', 'My parents stayed at the place and were very comfortable and delighted to meet Orestes.', 'Thank you for having us Orestes! We really enjoyed our stay at your place! It was really nice :)', 'Pros: Orestes, our host, was very sweet and friendly and provided great recommendations. The location was nice, convenient and it felt safe. The art hanging in the room was neat to look at. The bed was comfortable. Gus, the guard dog, was a sweet protector.
Cons: The room was a bit cluttered and not well lit, it felt depressing almost. Especially since there was no tv for some background noise. We did have issues with the cleanliness of both the room and bathroom, which made me very uncomfortable during our stay. The soap/shampoo provided looked like it had been used by previous guests, thankfully, we brought our own toiletries.', 'In the place in Orestes we were able to feel at home. You can tell that the space is lovingly decorated and feels like a home.
Also, whenever we have had any questions or needed anything, Orestes has helped us.
It is a very well connected area by subway with Manhattan, very quiet, beautiful and with all the services by hand.
Hope to be back soon!', 'Very comfortable and clean room, quiet neighborhood and very close to metro 7 to access Manhattan in few minutes. nice restaurants in the streets around. Everything went perfect for us, I would recommend it to anybody visiting New York for few days!', 'We had a perfect week in NY. Orestes was always helpful with lots of individual tips. A highlight is the garden where we had breakfast every morning. A fantastic time, thank you for everything üòäüòäüòäMila, Steffi + Uli', 'Orestes was a friendly and warm host. The location and home are as beautiful and inviting as the photos and his recommendation for the ferry was a wonderful part of our trip. Next time we are in NY we will be staying here!', "Orestes is a very friendly person who didn't hesitate to recommend things to make the most of our trip.
The room is spacious and the bathroom too, it has two different metro lines less than 3 minutes away, nice and safe area! Totally recommended", 'Amazing house with lots of character and a superb location. And Orestes is a perfect host, super helpful, friendly and responsive. Highly recommended.', 'There were two of us and we needed 2 beds. One of them a sleeping couch. Very nice bathroom with walkable-shower.
In the room, everything is available. Refrigerator and mocha coffee maker at close to supermarket and metro station. Very convenient. And a very pleasant hosts. Highly recommended.', "The stay at Orestes's house was perfect. The location is excellent. It has good commerce and locals around. The room, very comfortable and Orestes has always been willing to help during our stay", 'Orestes and Cristiano were amazing all the time. Both are very kind and gentle. Everything is provided Until soap and body lotion, hair dryer and much more !!!!!!!!!!!
There was also coffee and the and sugar and also always flat water as much as you want
It feels very homely with Gus the lovely dog !", 'Very nice apartment in a typical setting close to Manhattan. We recommend it.', 'Orestes was very friendly, had great local recommendations, and helped us in a pinch when our plans changed unexpectedly. The back garden was a cozy & serene paradise. Conveniently located to the subway & great local food. We would love to stay here again!', 'great place,great location quite and safe.shower room is amazing,garden is lovely and quite also.Orestes is very helpful he will keep you right', 'this is the perfect location to stay in New York: just steps away from the train and only 2 stops to get to Manhattan. our host was kind and helpful I would definitely recommend staying here!', 'Had the best stay! Orestes was a fantastic host; he answered our many questions about attractions and directions. This area is located in a wonderful area with metro stations very close and also a short walk to a beautiful city view next to the river! Would absolutely stay again.', 'Great place to relax after a busy day in the city. You have your own beautiful bathroom and can use the relaxing garden. You‚Äôre also in no time in Manhattan thanks to the different subway lines that are nearby. We would absolutely come back here!', 'Great accommodation in a great location. There are many different restaurants within walking distance. You can get to Manhattan very quickly by subway.
Will recommend!', "Orestes' place is amazing. It's in a lovingly renovated and tastefully decorated townhouse. The room is in a basement apartment with a separate entrance and private bathroom. During warmer months, a private backyard is available for use. The place is on a quiet side street in Long Island City, a lively but not too lively Queens neighborhood one or three stops from Midtown Manhattan, depending on which subway you choose. Also conveniently close to LaGuardia or JFK airport. Several major subway lines can take you all over Queens, Brooklyn or Manhattan. Orestes is an excellent and very responsive host. A photographer, and former architect, he knows a lot about the local culture scene, in which he is actively involved. If you want them, he has great insights about local developments and New York in general and ample tips for places to visit and things to do. Highly recommended.", "There were two of us and we felt at home from the first moment. Great location to explore the city in any direction. I couldn't have imagined anything better for my first stay. Orestes and Chris are just great and extraordinary hosts. If I come back, just here.", 'Unlike Airbnb rentals where you have the whole place to yourself, the best experiences I‚Äôve had was always when I stayed in someone‚Äôs home. You can meet the local people and they give you good recommendations this way. As an artist, I appreciated Orestes‚Äô home, which was decorated with so much art. We loved the location: great neighborhood and easy to get around. Orestes is very responsive.', 'We have just come back from a weeks stay at Orestes beautiful home in LIC, Queens. We were greeted with a warm welcome and were made to feel at home. The room and bathroom are wonderful cozy, clean and spacious, with lots of wardrobe space.
The garden was an added bonus for morning coffee, the recommendations for local food and groceries are spot on, all the staff and restaurants we visited were friendly homemade food and well priced, the LIC corner cafe was our morning highlight.
The location is brilliant for getting into manhattan, a few stops and you arrive at key hotspots, grand central station, Times Square and Brooklyn. The views over the river from LIC are amazing. We will definitely return and have already recommended this place to many friends and family.
Thank you both for such a wonderful and memorable stay in New York!', 'This was an excellent first airbnb stay for us! Everything was clean and ready for us, the location was easy to find, and Orestes was friendly and helpful. The location was close to two train stations, which made getting around really easy. Our room was nice and quiet and cozy, and the bathroom was amazing. Aside from being close to public transport, there were also plenty of cafes, corner stores, food, and parks nearby. All in all, it was really a perfect location for a NYC stay!', "Orestes' house is a real invitation to relax because in addition to a beautiful garden, the decoration is tastefully done.
As a photographer we had the pleasure of doing a photo shoot with Orestes in the garden... üëç
Discreet and caring, he is good advice and really welcoming.
This is the type of Airbnb we love because we were able to share the world of a New York home.
Very easy to access from JFK airport with metro lines very close by.
We recommend unreservedly and hope to come back someday üòâ", "First of all, the location is really good. It was about a 20-minute drive to the center of Manhattan, and it was about 1.5 blocks to the subway station on several lines, so it was really easy to get around Manhattan.
The room is clean, the bathroom is very spacious and pleasant, just like the other reviews
However, I think you should only stay for 2 people, and 3 people are a lot. It's perfect for staying for 2 people. The size of the room is also spread out and there are two carriers. The room is a little dark, and there is no kitchen, but there is a microwave and a mini refrigerator.
The host is friendly and responds quickly to messages.
I highly recommend it!!", 'While we didn‚Äôt get to stay while Orestes was in town, the person he chose to stand in his place was wonderful. Orestes was very communicative as was the other person. My daughter asked if we could stay there the next time we were in town. We felt very safe both at the residence and walking around the neighborhood.', 'We appreciated the proximity to the subway and the good accessibility of different places in Manhattan. The bathroom is very spacious and the temporary use of the beautiful garden is very pleasant.
Orestes is a very pleasant landlord, the contact was nice and straightforward.', 'We loved staying at Orestes‚Äô place! The room was a good size for my friend and I, the bathroom is so spacious (hard to find in NYC), and the perfect location if you plan to travel via subway! Orestes was very kind - he greeted us at the door and showed us our space! Not only is his home beautiful, it also feels very homey and cozy. Would definitely try to stay here again next time I‚Äôm in NYC!', 'Wonderful townhouse close to public
transportation. Om the other side Its very relaxing to stay in a quiet neigborhood.
Orestes is a very nice host.', "Orestes was wonderful and I highly recommend his place. It's a quiet neighborhood with different subways being really close by. The room and bathroom were very tidy and had everything that we needed. Orestes was very easy to talk to and a great host.", "We had a great time at Orestes's place. The house is full of charm, besides being very well located. Ideal for visiting Manhattan. Orestes is very kind and really welcoming. We highly recommend it!", "Oreste's place is a wonderful to base yourself when in NYC. Super convenient to the subway, fabulous diner at the end of the street - BEST burger we ate in NYC there ! Within 15 minutes is the East River, stunning light show at night, and heaps of eating places, live music. The bed is super comfy and bathroom huge. Gorgeous art and tranquil garden space for your morning coffee. Would definitely stay here again. Thanks Oreste's (and Andreas !) for a lovely stay.", 'We could not have asked for a better host or location. Orestes was awesome! We did not feel like we had to worry about our safety in the area, and we were comfortable in his place, just like home.']

title: Cute studio apartment
all_reviews:
["Lisa's apartment is such a find! For the price point, it is pristine inside, in the heart of Manhattan. Key sites are all 15-25 mins walk away and there is so much (supermarkets, restaurants, bars, subways, coffee) right on your doorstep.
We had a great time and felt the photos don't do the place justice. The neighbourhood is loud in the day, sure, but we slept absolutely fine. The shower was great, as were the kitchen amenities. The bed is also really comfy. The projector is fantastic too!
Maybe some teeny tiny things - it would be helpful to know how to unlock the door to the apartment itself as there are maybe four locks, so we did spend a few minutes looking dodgy trying them all! Also, the blinds are not the easiest to move up/down - we were worried about breaking them so had to leave them down most of the time. Possibly a mini book for how to operate the flat would help, although these were only tiny improvements we'd suggest!
Fab value for an apartment and would come back!", 'The apartment was very comfortable and spacious, it was in a good location in a quiet neighborhood but still very well connected to the city. Lisa was very kind and answer every question that we made quickly and clear. It was a very good place to stay!', 'Lida was very helpful and attentive at all times. The apartment is perfect and super well located.
Great and clean space. Back for sure.', 'Great location. Apartment was bigger than we expected. Kitchen had enough plates etc for 2 people. Lots of storage and hangers. Washing machine in basement with app was useful. Good value for location.', 'We were glad to find Lisa‚Äôs place on a short term, when our first booking was cancelled. Lisa is a super fast responding host and was very flexible with every question we had. We even could check in early. The apartment is nice, very close to main sights and near to the subway.', 'good place with everything you need for a comfortable stay, the host always respond and help me when I needed it, the only thing that was a little uncomfortable were the blinds that let in daylight and the building smelled bad.']

title: Cozy Quiet Upgraded Prvt Rm in House in Brooklyn!
all_reviews:
['I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better experience than I had here. Every single thing, from location to the space to cost was perfect. You should not hesitate to reserve a room with Albert.', 'Had a great time, fully satisfied. Will return when I can!', 'A super interesting house with the warmest of welcomes :) :)', 'This is great value for New York, with a private sitting room and bedroom. If you enjoy walking, you can explore the local area of Park Slope as well as Prospect Park and central Brooklyn on foot. Also very handy to subway and local buses.
The house is quirky with a capital Q! Feels like a lived in family home and all the family members I met were extremely friendly.', "Had a lovely short stay at Albert and Elba's place. Short walk to Subway/ Trains and close to the centre of Park Slope. Room had an adjacent space with TV and coffee, comfy bed too. Shower was hot with good pressure. Albert and Co host Elba are very helpful and the interiors are beautifully eclectic. Very happy customer.", 'The space was better than I expected with a lot of privacy. Very nice stay, friendly hosts, and easy check in. Close to Brooklyn Methodist', 'Very at ease', 'Spacious bedroom with second living area, close to the subway and lots of great restaurants and bars in Park Slope. It‚Äôs a couple blocks from the park and I was able to run a couple times! Internet was super fast and there‚Äôs a place to easily work. Elba and her family are very sweet and helpful. It‚Äôs a great room to rent for a a stay in NY, especially if you know the area.', "This was a perfect place to stay! Spent most of my time out and about ‚Äî running in nearby Prospect Park and checking out the restaurants and shops along 5th & 7th avenues. Everyone was very accommodating when my flight was delayed several hours, pushing my arrival time to the Airbnb past midnight, and communication was great! I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.", "I spent 5 nights at Albert's place and felt right at home, so much better than a hotel! The house is very charming and vintage. For my stay I had the upstairs rooms and upstairs bathroom to myself and I felt very comfortable and safe there. Albert and his mother were warm and friendly, which made me feel like I was a long lost relative, who would be welcome in their home anytime. The neighborhood is also nice, with shops, diners, and the subway not too far away.", 'Friendly people in a characterful house in a convenient location!', '10/10, would stay again', 'Very friendly. Felt very at home. Great area, very safe and lots to do within walking distance. Thank you for a very comfortable stay.', 'Perfect for what I needed. A lot of privacy. Highly recommend going to Reyes Market nearby for the best Mexican food in NYC.', "As a long term resident Park Slope until recently, Albert's house was like visiting home. Everything was comfey, clean and perfect for my short trip to NYC. Thank you for the awesome stay!", "A very convenient, practical and no fuss place to rest my weary, jet-lagged bones. Albert's mother, Elba was charming and so very welcoming when I checked in. I then had minimal interaction with her daughter thereafter, but I was keeping strange hours due to my horrendous jet lag (40 hours in transit from Sydney via Fiji and LA!). This is definitely a no frills listing that would suit someone who is laid back and appreciates a rustic setting. It is adequate for a solo traveller and its location is very convenient to all amenities.
It suited my needs as a more affordable stop-gap between other accommodation as I found myself needing a quick bolt hole when my other hotel accommodation fell through. Thank you to Elba for making me feel welcome in her home and for making my stay a comfy and relaxed one.", "Enjoyed my stay. Elba greeted me she is very sweet and helpful. Didn't meet Albert. Nice location in Park Slope", 'Great stay at Albert‚Äòs! The place was spacious, clean and Albert very friendly. Really loved the neighborhood, close to the subway, restaurants, shops, Prospect Park & Green Wood Cemetery.', 'Great place - very warm family', 'Albert and his family are super sweet, thoughtful people! Very laid back vibe, with plenty of personal space to unwind from the city. It felt a lot like staying with relatives. Also cannot beat the price for Park Slope.', 'Well located spot: very convenient. Loved it!!', 'Good value for money', 'Exactly as described. Enjoy our stay and will stay with them again.', "This place was fantastic and so were Albert and Elba! So helpful and accommodating. Unfortunately I was in town to take a family member to a cancer center, but this place was exactly what I was looking for. Super comfy bed, slept like a baby. Ripping AC to fend off the muggy heat. Great bathroom. With my future visits I'll be looking for this place. Thank you Elba and Albert!", 'Place not as advertised, crowded, messy, no way to get in touch with host when problems encountered.', 'A lovely room in a great, centrally located place!', 'Albert was very welcoming and accommodating upon our arrival, especially considering the fact that we arrived relatively late due to delays from Baltimore. The room was clean and as expected. Check-out was smooth, as we were able to leave the keys and depart when convenient for us.', 'It was a pleasant trip and I would highly recommend this love place.', 'Nice place, subway to Manhattan is really close and Albert is really kind.', 'I had a wonderful stay at the home of Albert and his mother, who were warmly hospitable and very helpful. The location was perfect for my needs, within easy reach of public transport, in a safe and quiet area. I enjoyed having the freedom to come and go at whatever time I wished, and also enjoyed chatting with my host and his family. The facilities are as good as described, and better: the bed is very comfortable, and the room has aircon, a phone charging unit by the bed, and space to hang clothes and stow them in drawers. I loved having a bathroom for my own use, with an excellent shower, and the kind loan of an iron to de-wrinkle my clothes daily. I would love to stay here again on my next visit to New York.', 'Great location, great value. Albert and his mom were really nice. Lots of privacy. Good internet. Highly recommend.', 'Great location, comfortable home, nice to have 2 rooms and your own bath for a good price! Comfortable bed.', "Albert's place is a great deal. His mother was very nice, easy to communicate with and very sweet and accommodating. The AC unit in the bedroom was perfect for this summer stay. And the room was very quiet and comfortable. Highly recommended!", 'Great stay. Albert and Elba were quite welcoming. Place exactly as described. Comfortable bed and warm room (winter time so very appreciated.). Lots of nice small touches. Clean and safe feeling. The house is fascinating and the inside live plants are beautiful.', 'I had a great stay. Albert and his family are really nice and welcoming. The rooms are very confortable, and the location is great since it is a couple of blocks from the subway. I would definitely recommend it!', 'Great place and lovely people. You get a lot of privacy and it‚Äôs a great place to stay. Will stay there again when I go back to the area.', 'I would recommend this place to anyone interested in coming to New York, but wants to stay outside Manhattan. I had a great stay, very gracious and flexible host, close to transit, easy walk to subway, plenty of food in the area, and what can I say it was great.', "Great place, it's like a mini museum!", 'Elba and Son Albert are very friendly
and they made my stay extra special with several meals cooked by chef Robert (an extended family member).
thank you Elba and Albert.', 'A warm welcome and a very comfortable stay. The room (well, rooms) are clean and characterful and well appointed with handy extras such as a small fridge and charging points. Lots of privacy during the stay, and the location is perfect, being only a few blocks from the F train, with plenty of bars/restaurants on 4th & 5th Avenues. Highly recommended.', 'Convenient location for a quick stay with friendly hosts.', 'Great location for my purposes.', 'Albert, his mom, and uncle were all very welcoming. They were nice and accommodating. The place is clean and has almost everything you need. It is very close to the train station as well and grocery shops, restaurants, and laundry are within walking distance. Recommended place to stay!', 'Wonderful down to earth host. Everything I needed. Extra sitting room was nice. Coffee and cold water in fridge much appreciated. Great towels!!!', 'Friendly family, comfortable bed, and great location. I enjoyed my stay here.', "I had a fantastic stay at Albert's place. The room was full of little details that made it very convenient: a very comfortable bed, a small fridge, a fan, A/C, TV, a coffee machine... Albert's family are very kind and the house is a very nice area, Park Slope, which allows you to discover Brooklyn, a really interesting part of New York!", "This is a wonderful and interesting home. There were some small renovations, but the hosts were very upfront about it, and it wasn't an inconvenience at all. The rooms were cozy and clean. Quirky and altogether very charming and comfortable place. I will be staying there again!", "I spent a lovely week at Albert's. The space is large, the location is great and the family is wonderful. I especially loved meeting Albert's mother Elba, who treated me to her amazing cooking.", 'I had a great stay at this place. The hosts were friendly, thoughtful, and wonderful. I had a living room space on the 2nd floor in addition to the bedroom. They had kindly turned on the window AC 30mins before I arrived to keep the room cool. The bedroom is not facing the main street so I had restful sleep for the duration of the stay.', 'Exactly as described.', 'A wonderful place to stay. This was my second time staying here, and I was there about 2 weeks. There are cool antiques throughout the home and the whole place is very charming and comfortable and clean. The hosts, Albert and his mother, were very welcoming and made sure my stay was excellent. Definitely would recommend.', 'A great place to stay over the weekend! The bed was comfortable, there was a lock on the door and A/C. There are some nice places to eat in the area and the subway is close.', "Found this location to be much better than expected. It was nicely decorated and clean. Quaint and cozy would be an accurate description. Albert went far and beyond to make sure i was well taken cared of. Which was greatly appreciated. Questions were answered almost immediately. As to this was my 1st Airbnb so I was a bit nervous. Couldnt feel more comfortable with his staff and family more than hospitable Albert's mother was an awesome individual. Also Finding parking immediately when i got there. Minutes from the barclay and located at a location where there are plenty of stores. Not once did i feel threatened in the neighborhood after taking a 3 hour walk around town alone. Would definitely highly recommend and will book again at my next visit.", 'I had a great stay here. Exactly what I was looking for in terms of the amenities provided and location to the city. Would highly recommend booking here.', 'Cozy n quiet is the perfect description. Clean n elegant and it was a total pleasure staying there.', 'Great place, highly recommended!', 'Good location in Brooklyn. Nice family, will definitely stay again.', 'Very great location close to the subway and many nice restaurants. The room was comfortable. Elba was a very nice and helpful host in general.', "Had a great week at Albert's place in Park Slope. Cute, walkable neighborhood with lots of shops and restaurants nearby. Easy transportation links for Brooklyn and Manhattan. Very quiet in the bedroom at night even though it's a busy neighborhood. Excellent value.", 'I had a fantastic stay at Albert‚Äôs place. The best part was that it was clean, quiet, and private. The room is very spacious and the inclusion of the front room is also a great benefit. The whole time I felt safe and to be able to be that close to the city but work remotely was amazing. Thanks again!', 'The bedroom and front room are as described. Bathroom was very clean. Thanks to the additional front room the place is spacious enough to enjoy even a long term stay. I stayed for 3 weeks and the place was ideal for that. Additionally Albert is a very responsive host and promptly took care of anything that I needed even though he does not live on site. I can highly recommend him as host. The only thing that I didn‚Äôt like so much was that the place is a bit cluttered but that is really only a minor issue and I would definitely book a stay at Albert‚Äòs again! Definitely recommended!', 'Very clean, comfy and friendly!', "Very comfortable space and friendly hosts! Big bed, comfortable bathroom, great location. Two things to note are that you may be sharing the floor with another Airbnb guest (I wasn't this time), and if you're squeamish about bugs, there were several times I flicked ants off of me while I was sitting upstairs, LOL. Otherwise awesome stay!", 'I enjoyed my stay in this gorgeous place. Had a good time and made new friends. Definitely will recommend to my friends.
It‚Äôs like living in a small museum!', "When I arrived, my AirBnB host, Albert, met me at the door and showed me around his home, where his Mother and a cousin were living also. He gave me the keys to the front door, and to the bedroom where I would be sleeping. He told me about his employment as a social studies teacher with the NYC Board of Education, and mentioned that his Mother is also working with the NYCBOE.
Their house is cozy and welcoming. If you love reading you will never run out of books to read. The second-story room is well equipped with a television and wifi, although I never used either, and a very large and comfortable bed with a luxurious comforter. There were at least ten different towels from which to choose. The bathroom is rather elegant, with plenty of hot water. The first morning Albert's cousin made me a generous mug of mocha chocolate with steaming milk in European fashion, along with freshly baked cookies. I would love to stay at Albert's AirBnB again sometime soon.", "Fantastic stay! The room is spacious, clean, and well-decorated, and the home and family are top-notch. It's a classic Brooklyn townhome with caring, loving owners, close to local attractions as well as easy subway access to all of the city. I would absolutely stay again.", 'Wonderful home!!! Very nice and cozy!!! Would stay there again in a heart beat!', "I am a French artist photographer with a desire to make good images of New York. I made the right choice by choosing Albert's accommodation which is ideally located in Brooklyn in a quiet neighborhood with two subway stations at 5 minutes walk that take you directly to the center of Manhattan. The accommodation is quite large with a comfortable bed, I was very well received by Albert and Roberto we talked a lot about New York and South America where they are from. For a single person this accommodation is ideal.", 'Nice and friendly family. Had a pleasure staying with them for 3 months.', "Gracious and responsive hosts, pretty home, bathroom reserved for guests' use, quiet bedroom, convenient to subway and restaurants, ‚Ä¶ all good! Will (of Will & Jill)", 'The room and bathroom are so clean!
The hosts were super friendly and I just had the best week staying there!
The location is close to manhattan.
I would definitely stay here again when I‚Äôm back in NY!', "I was greeted by Elba, Albert's mom who lives on the premises. She is incredibly sweet and helpful and busy unpacking boxes so there is some clutter as you come in but the space you have is amazing. Its a separate bedroom and another room attached. Its a one flight walk up to your floor. The bathroom is kept clean, you have access to the kitchen and the location cant be beat. Few blocks in any direction you get anything you need. Its surprisingly quiet for being in the middle of the slope. Beautiful tree lined block but its Brooklyn, so if you have a car parking can be challenging. All in all a great stay, I would stay again.", 'The neighborhood is easily accessible by F. Manhattan subway is 20-30 minutes away. In the neighborhood there are all the amenities. We discovered a small bar on a street parallel to the main boulevard where the pizza is great. Attention the bar closes at 9 p.m.
a', 'I only used this space to sleep and shower and was out sightseeing the rest of the time. Unbeatable price! The bed is a spring mattress and very comfortable, and the memory foam pillow shaped for side sleepers was VERY appreciated. Although the second floor was shared with a family member during my stay, I couldnt hear them at all. Quiet, peaceful, comfy. Albert was very responsive with two small issues I encountered. Everyone was so nice. A word to the wise, the hot and cold taps in the shower are reversed! Great location and exactly what I needed while visiting family who live two blocks away. Thanks, Albert!', "This was a great location for my friends who live nearby and for getting into the city. The space itself is great--a large anteroom with television and a cozy bedroom. Each door has a lock if you want privacy--I think you get a room key but I never used (or tried) it. Staying here was a true Airbnb experience--it is someone's house, and I felt like I was visiting an aunt. Christmas decorations were going up so there was a lot going on but everyone was very friendly and responsive--really very much like family! The rest of the place is chockfull of furniture, pictures, memorabilia--it's someone's house after all. It also has lots of plants, which was nice. I also found my rooms very clean and not dusty, which can be tough in NY. There was no second lodger and the person living there was out for much of my stay so it felt very private.
If you want to go into the city or if you take the train to the place (as I did), I would recommend the 9th Street/4th Ave stop--it's about the same distance as the Prospect Ave stop but for some reason just felt easier to get to. Also it has both the F and the R in case one has track changes. Lots of restaurants and shops on Fifth and Seventh Aves.", "The accommodations are accurate. Lots to grab your attention and he feeling of a visit with family... We were really grateful for a friendly welcome to us last minute travelers. I didn't have much contact with the host, after that for our short stay, thought we did hear some lovely music playing from the living room piano.", "Albert's place is an excellent location and great value for the amount of space you have. Albert had fresh water bottles for me upon arrival, which was a very nice surprise. The bathroom was super clean, which I greatly appreciated. If you are very sensitive to noise, I would recommend inquiring about if there are any other guests on the 2nd floor. I appreciated staying at Albert's airbnb, it was a great landing pad while I started a new job.", 'Stayed here for 4 nights on my first ever visit to NYC. Very nice space and well accommodated, in a good part of town and not too far from the nearest subway stops. Pretty easily accessible and plenty of space for just me. Host was very responsive and friendly, overall a good visit!', 'Great location in BK - short walk to subway station, great value for level of privacy and hospitality. Would stay again and recommend.', 'Definitely I would like to revisit. Cozy room, peaceful neighborhood. Stations are close (Prospect Av, 4 Av), really convenient. And the most nice part is that hosts are so friendly, supportive. I appreciate it.']

title: Brooklyn Brownstone Suite, 5 min walk to Subway
all_reviews:
['Ashley is a great host, kind and supportive. The place is comfortable, and the location is very convenient ‚Äì would love to come back!', 'Ashley‚Äôs place is great for three people ‚Äî maybe even four. The apartment is well equipped, cozy and clean. The kitchen has enough for preparing a breakfast or a quick meal. The location is superb and I‚Äôd definitely stay again!', 'I really enjoyed my stay here! It was the perfect space for my weekend away. Communication was great and the space was super cute. Take note - there wasn‚Äôt a TV at the airbnb, so plan accordingly. Not a big deal, that‚Äôs just how my husband and I like to wind down after long travel days. We just used our laptop.
Highly recommend!! Will stay here again if I can.', 'Clean, quiet and green (trees outside & plants inside) apartment in a cool neighborhood. Try out Restaurant Zoca, 426 Marcus Garvey Blvd, which is around two corners, has very good food and is reasonably priced.

I would choose again Ashley's home", 'Very good stay in this apartment.
it takes 40 minutes to get to downtown Manhattan. However, we do not see the time pass especially after having walked a long time we always had room on the metro to sit down.

I my wife and son enjoy our stay in her Brooklyn apartment while visiting New York for four days and three nights prior to a return to Chiang mai Thailand.', 'Ashley was always ready to respond to our requests, kind and clear. The apartment is very clean and cozy. We felt like home. Located in a quiet neighborhood and close to a very convenient express subway stop to go to Manhattan. We would definitely go back.
Thanks to Ashley for the opportunity.
Rossella', 'Top notch all the way. It was clean and had everything. Super cute.
The bed was awesome.', 'Great place! And nice neighborhood. Would stay here again.', 'Quality stay with a responsive host who cares about!
Good improvements overall and close to the metro.
Problems: no shutters in the dining room/kitchen/living room/living room/bedroom.
Air conditioning malfunction in the room with the second bed at the time of the stay.
Thank you very much Ashley for hosting', 'The accommodation was very cozy and clean. As seen in the description and pictures. Ashley was very friendly and helpful at all times. Ashley was always quick to respond. We felt very comfortable in her apartment. The apartment is about a 5-minute walk from the metro from where you can easily reach Manhattan by train.', 'Very nice stay ‚Ä¶ perfect', 'Absolutely the place to be, right in the heart of this beautiful Brooklyn. Beautiful, peaceful , femme decor, lovely vibe. Ashley thought of everything!', 'Excellent place to stay in Brooklyn. Easy to reach by Metro. Nice restaurants around the place', 'The bed is extremely comfortable. The bedroom is quiet and large. The whole place is super clean and tasteful with an excellent guidebook. I highly recommend it.', 'Amazing location and hostess was nice', 'It was great place to stay. It had all amenities, good vibe and comfortable bed.', 'Great spot for visiting the city and for getting out to Long Island. Very enjoyable week.', 'A lovely little apartment in Brooklyn, excellent metro connection to Manhattan and JFK. In the apartment is all you need, we especially liked the water filter in the fridge, so you always have ice-cold drinking water, for which you can use tap water. The apartment is ideal for two people, three of us can get a little tight, we would have also wanted a closet. Ashley was always available immediately and very helpful. The area is "real NewYork", quite delightful, definitely time to stroll here in peace.', 'Great host, beautiful room, lots of amenities! Clean, comfortable and very peaceful!!!', 'Very comfortable and clean apartment!', "We have enjoyed ourselves very much at Ashley's. The house is in a great location, with great and fast conections to Manhattan. We'll surely come back!", "Ashley's explanation and response were immediate, and most amenities were well-equipped. However, the house was quiet and clean, and it was ideally located for traveling to both New York and Manhattan. Over a hotel, staying here gave us the true feeling of integrating with local New Yorkers in a residential environment. We would highly recommend staying here to anyone wanting to escape the Manhattan madness and staying in a more peaceful borough, but still with excellent transport links. ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è', 'Great place, true to the photos and impeccable , close to the subway in a very quiet area,Ashley is very responsive and very available . Too bad the apartment was very dirty and the furniture had a lot of dust. Sheets and towels if they were clean. Very dirty carpets as well. You can tell that it has not been cleaned and only changes the linens and towels.
The area is very good, good connection with subway to Manhattan. There are some rare people, but in general very good.', "Ashley's place was clean and comfortable, just as described, yes, but I think better. I'd recommend staying at Ashley's!", "Very spacious apartment which is not a common thing in NYC. Beautiful and calm neighborhood. Ashley's place has all you need and it's really cozy. Staying there again in Sept.', 'Ashley was a great host! She was very kind and quick to respond. The place itself was nice, comfortable, and affordable. Highly recommend!', 'Clean apartment, well-equipped and as described. The bed is very nice. The instructions for self check-in are very clear, Ashley was very responsive and flexible. The area is very nice and about a 30 min subway ride to mid Manhattan. Make sure you go to Saraghina Pizzeria around the corner for the best pizza you‚Äôve ever had.', 'Very good and nice stay.
Ashley is very responsive and welcoming.
The accommodation offered is exactly as described. Very clean.
Very close metro and small restaurants nearby.
Thank you Ashley', "Ashley has a really lovely apartment in a quiet, safe neighbourhood. Grocery stores, play areas, bars/cafes and the MTA network are all easily walkable (you can be Manhattan in half an hour door to sidewalk).
The only thing our kids (10, 14) would have preferred would be a television which is not in the apartment, but they had WiFi and phones so it wasn't too unbearable for them!
Ashley was friendly and very responsive to messages (virtually instantly) and was helpful finding us a place to watch a bit of sport, even though she was clear it wasn't her area of expertise.

Thanks Ashley üëç", 'Great place to stay and really enjoyed my time in the city! Would definitely book again and recommend to friends', 'Ashley has a charming home and accommodation. The area was quiet and is very well served by the Subway. Ashley is highly recommended', 'Perfect location, perfect boho urban decor, very clean and neat but also cozy and comfy. Ashley responded to any questions with in minutes and was very accommodating. I highly recommend this stay!', 'highly recommended', 'Ashley was very responsive, friendly, and easy to work with which was important to me since I like flexibility when I come and go. The living space was a good size and had a private entrance. Overall I had a great trip and loved coming back to a place that felt like home and fit my style, as a single woman, it was nice to have someone in the area I felt I could reach out to should any issues arise.', 'Excellent place!!! Very easy access and, close to the subway. Ashley was always available. Totally recommendable.', 'the place is the same as the photos , cozy and steps from the recommended metro', 'clean and very close to the subway', 'Everything excellent.! We loved it and the recommendations that it has of very good restaurants üôåüèΩüôåüèΩ the
Very good place', "This is a lovely space. Lots of nice light. Super clean. Kitchen area outfitted with all the basics needed to prepare snacks and light meals. The coffee and French press were greatly appreciated! Comfy bed in bedroom. There is also a single bed in living area but I was on my own. Space could easily accommodate two people - either a couple or two friends traveling together who each need their own bed. Everything very clean and lots of hot water. Great location - a couple of blocks from Utica Subway so easy to jump on the A or C trains and be in the city very quickly. There's plenty to do in Brooklyn as well. Although Ashley lives in the house, I did not meet her face to face; she was great to message and quick to respond. Very quiet neighbourhood and the house is quiet. There is no television, radio, etc. but now that everyone has a smart phone, we all travel with our own ways of accessing any external news or entertainment we want. There was dependable free wi-fi. Great space!", "Ashley's place was exactly as described-the bedroom even felt bigger than it looked in the pictures. The neighborhood was pretty and felt safe, nice neighbors. We easily found on-street parking nearby and were able to walk to the Metro and a nice restaurant for dinner. Great stay!", "We had a great stay at Ashley's place. The unit was exactly as described, and in a beautiful and walkable neighborhood.
Ashley was extremely responsive, and was quick to provide assistance and answer questions. I'd definitely stay again!", 'The apartment is clean and matches the photos.
Ashley is very available and accommodating. Thank you
Metro is a 5-minute walk away.', 'Very bright, spacious and pleasant apartment, close to the metro, in a quiet area with many shops.
The host is responsive, thoughtful, and provided lots of tips.
I will go back without hesitation!', 'Perfect location, close to the subway that gives access to all of New York.
The place is perfect for a couple and an extra person because a separate room.
Thank you Ashley.', 'Very cozy place and worth every dollar', "Ahsley we found it very briefly. Other communication was via AirBnB. Very quick response time to questions and concerns.
The apartment was as described, easily accessible, check in went smoothly.
The area is very quiet, you feel safe. Next door is a school and a church that rings at 8am but only for a short time.
Very comfortable beds, large rooms, you can live well with 4 people in it.
Thanks Ashley, we'll be happy to come back! :)", 'Great stay, had everything I needed! The street is beautiful and everything is a bus or subway ride away for exploring. There‚Äôs also a good number of spots nearby that are walkable as well!', 'The 2 room apartment is great. The room is very large and overlooks a wooded and quiet backyard. We appreciated the birds chirping harmoniously in the morning.
The neighborhood is residential but still has a number of fun activities and restaurants.
Manhattan is easily accessible by subway (about 45 minutes).
Ashley is very friendly, responds quickly and gives good advice. We recommend!', 'The apartment was bigger than I expected. The decor was really cool. The room was clean and quiet. Ashley was very quick to respond to messages and super accommodating re storing luggage outside of check in/out times. The area is lovely - right beside the subway to Manhattan/airport and lots of good food and bars nearby. Great stay, highly recommend!', 'Don‚Äôt hesitate, book this place! It is so nice!', 'Nice place. Priced well, good location to have access to all of NYC while also providing the ability to get away from chaos.', 'Very nice apartment. Stylishly furnished. Everything you need for a city trip. We felt right at home! Ashley open to all questions and very nice. You can get a taste of the New Yorker Local life here. Anytime again!', 'Nice little apartment. Ideal for us (father and daughter).
Very well connected with public transport (Duke Ellington: "Take the A train")', 'we had an excellent stay! an easy walk to the closest subway station and tons of delicious food and cafe options within a few blocks. very quiet, only the occasional siren that is to be expected in any city. accommodations exactly as described and pictured!', 'Ashley‚Äôs apartment is lovely! It‚Äôs located in a historic area in Brooklyn, and the subway (A express train and C local train) are both very nearby. You can get into Manhattan in ~30 mins. The apartment itself is very comfortable. Lots of space and everything you need. Ashley‚Äôs there to help with any issues, though I had none. Checking in and out were simple, and all her instructions very clear. I thoroughly enjoyed my stay and highly recommend.', "Ashley's apartment was a good base for visiting Manhattan or discovering Brooklyn. We felt at home from the beginning and were able to eat well thanks to the small shop opposite. Everything is lovingly furnished and our questions were answered very quickly. For us, the perfect place to explore New York and discover real Brooklyn life with great restaurants nearby and a good feeling of walking around the door in the evening.", 'Very good location, within walking distance of a subway station. Ashley is extremely helpful. Small minuses: 1. Not very convenient with a car (parking is forbidden at certain times and days on both sides of the street). We still managed to find a spot. 2. This being NY, occasionally you get cars with loud music cruising outside, and people speaking loudly and swearing on the sidewalk. Just to be a aware. ü§∑üèΩ', 'Great stay in BK, wonderful neighborhood, clean, neat, easy to get around, easy check in and clear instructions.', 'Very quiet and extremely clean place, as described. The metro is quickly accessible. We had a very good stay there. If we return to NYC, we will try to rent this place again.', 'Had a great time in this Brooklyn brownstone walkup as part of a larger New York vacation. The flat is easily accessible from the subway, and has a number of good tea, coffee, and food options very close by.
Ashley kept this large suite spotlessly clean for us, and we were very happy to stay here during our time in Brooklyn. Highly recommend!', 'it was great!', 'A beautiful, clean apartment with charm of the old building. You can tell that Ashley puts a lot of emphasis on your property. Everything you need is there, insider tips from Ashley are also right in the apartment. She is very quick to respond. We were also able to leave our luggage in the house after checkout, which helped us a lot.', 'Great stay! Ashley was super responsive and had a very clean place. Great for a couple or small group. Was perfect for my quick weekend in New York.', "It was a really good staying at Ashley's. The flat is big and the area nice. We could drop our luggage earlier and she answered really fast to our questions. Thanks!", 'Our second stay at Ashley‚Äôs and will stay again next year. 10 minute walk to the A Train express to Manhattan, quick and easy. Peaches and Zaca favorite restaurants in neighborhood. Apt. is spacious and comfortable. Full kitchen if you need it.', 'It is a very nice place to stay!
We loved the plants and also how the appartment was decorated.
The neighbourhood was ok. Felt safe.
There is the possibility to make some food in the little kitchen.
We loved the birds in the trees in the back garden.
The host reacted very quickly and freindly with messages but we would have liked a short encounter at the start of our stay.', 'This place was the perfect spot for me and my friend to call home for a short stay in the city. As described, it‚Äôs an apartment with plenty of privacy and also a terrific kitchen, very easy to find and perfect for getting out and about, too.', 'Great pleasant and nicely designed place. Lot of good food/drink in the neighborhood and easy access to subway. Ashley is an outstanding host.', "Ashley's place is a real home from home. Feels cozy and safe. Super clean and everything you could want available. Short walk to subway for Manhattan. Ashley is friendly and responsive. I would 100% recommend!", 'Fantastic place, host & location.', 'My daughter and I were extremely happy with our stay. It is such a cute apartment, we felt safe and at home. Ashley was there to greet us and provided us and even provide us with recommendations for dining. The apartment was clean, and she also provided some amenities to help you get settled in.
The neighborhood is walkable, and we felt safe moving around. and the metro into the city is within walking distance (two blocks)
All in all, I would recommend this location.', 'I was in town for a conference in Brooklyn. Ashley‚Äôs place was a steal! I was able to walk and get my nails done.
