She let me check in a few mins early and let me leave my luggage after checkout which was so helpful and appreciated. The spot was very nice.', 'Ashley made the whole process really easy, check in instructions very clear, appartment was lovely, very quick to respond to messages.', 'Ashley was a great host and staying at her property was wonderful. Everything was extremely clean, well stocked and organized. Ashley had very easy to understand instructions which made everything very convenient and easy for us. Getting into the city was very easy as well, as it was a 5 minute walk to the subway line. Highly recommend and would 100% love to stay again.', 'Great place to stay with good subway service, very nice apartment lots of space and multiple beds! Had an amazing time!']

title: Luxury 2BD 2Bath by Time sq & Hudson Yards
all_reviews: ['Great place - clean, comfortable and great location especially for the theater district.', 'Nar is great at communicating and answered any questions I had. The location is as pictured.', "Our stay at Nar's apartment was in one of the most luxurious buildings in the area, featuring an upscale lobby and attentive concierge service. The location is perfect, just a 10-minute walk to Times Square. The apartment matched the description, and Nar and his housemaid were always responsive. While a few lights and some electrical plugs could use a quick check-up, it did not detract from the overall wonderful experience. A nearly flawless place to stay for anyone visiting the city!", 'Enjoyed our stay! Great views!', 'A pristine luxury apartment with immaculate views of New York City.', "What an incredible view of this apartment I was fascinated. It was really beautiful sleeping with New York City in the background, it's like being in a movie. The place is super safe and private. Very good organization of the host."]

title: Hotel Room in Hudson Yards / King Size Private
all_reviews:
["The hotel is in a good location. As for the positives, we enjoyed the king size bed, private bathroom and location.
However, there are a few negative points not to be overlooked: it is impossible to turn on heating or air conditioning, as it makes an appalling noise. Our neighbors (it's not the hotel's fault) were noisy‚Ä¶ at 2:00 am‚Ä¶! It took another neighbor to scream in order to calm down.
Cleanliness was really limited. The heating is very dirty and the bathroom is not clean either (including the bathtub and the toilet...)
At the reception, we were well served: we were able to drop off our suitcases before check-in and the lady was friendly. On the other hand, beware of the gentleman, in the evening, who is very talkative (and will no longer remember you the next day...).
For check-out, we had to pay $10/suitcase to be able to walk before departure.
Also, remember to provide $100 security deposit and taxes that are not included (for 3 nights we paid about $85 USD).", 'Very friendly staff', 'Great stay! For sure thinking about checking in again.', 'This was a perfect place for a long weekend in Manhattan. Friendly front desk staff and a nice hotel/apartment rental vibe with just enough space for 2 in a great location close to Times Square. The space heater was a life saver on the cold days and the heat lamp in the bathroom is fantastic! The motion sensor lights were highly sensitive, but we were able to create a little fort to block the one in the sleeping area!
The room and location were perfect for my needs and I would absolutely stay again.', 'Room is as expected, shower was nice had great water pressure and the location of the hotel was excellent', 'This was absolutely, without a doubt - the most horrible Airbnb I have ever stayed in. I want to laugh while writing this review, of all the ways this hotel could make a young woman traveling alone feel unsafe - and how much it absolutely sucked.
1.) it was totally not clean. And by ‚Äúnot clean‚Äù‚Ä¶ I mean, cigarette burned carpet - cracked sink - totally grimy and basically impossible to walk on without feeling gross.
2.) it was either REALLY hot or REALLY cold in the room. There was little to no good temperature control, and I felt like I was suffocating. The window didn‚Äôt open, there was no fresh air.
3. The sheets were uncomfortable. Itchy and scratchy. Thin. The comforter was insubstantial, and to add insult to injury, the bed was kind‚Äôve stiff.
4.) Coffee in the morning was absolutely not even coffee. You know that instant stuff that tastes sort‚Äôve like horse piss that you drink when you‚Äôre on a camping trip? If you decide to stay here I‚Äôd suggest Bring YOUR own coffee because that crappy camping coffee it‚Äôs about 3 notches above what this hotel brews up in their toilet bowl in the morning.
4. I was on the 12th floor. As a single woman. There was no security around at all. Also the smoke alarm in my room ... had WIRES STICKING OUT OF IT. It was not a working smoke alarm, and I‚Äôm pretty sure this is ILLEGAL according to any state law. To top it off the hallway smelled like frat boy vomit and cigarette smoke. I was also fearful that someone could break into my room at any time.
5. Customer service / reception was pretty rude. Not the most rude people in the world - I wouldn‚Äôt want to work at this dump, either...but I would hardly call the attitude of the people at the front desk warm. After a five hour flight and a hell-ish journey through JFK, all I wanted was for the dude at the front desk to be kind - but was disappointed with his lack of warmth. There are way better places to stay. I would NOT spend my money here.']

title: Excellent location in Manhattan walk to all
all_reviews: ["Mathew's place was the perfect spot for my business trip to NYC. It was a lovely apartment, with a very friendly host, close to work and other amenities. I will definitely stay there again.", 'Matthew‚Äôs apartment was very conveniently located! Right around the corner from the 6 train (literally a 2 min walk) and also in the heart of the city, with so many bars and restaurants around! Keep in mind that the apartment is avenue facing, so it can get a bit noisy, but isn‚Äôt that a part of the NYC charm?', 'Perfect when you want a central home to stay overnight and start from to discover Manhattan. Extra plus for great hosting!', 'Great stay.', 'Amazing location! We walked to most of the places in Manhattan. The apartment is rather small to fit four people but we used it predominantly for sleeping. It‚Äôs not possible to do a whole lot of cooking if that‚Äôs what you‚Äôre looking for but for us it was okay as we only ate breakfast there and dined out.', 'Perfect little location in Manhattan for a enjoying a short trip.']

title: Charming apartment in Manhattan - NYC!
all_reviews: ['Very close to the subway. First time in NYC and it felt safe and everyone was sweet and helpful. Will be rebooking for our next NYC trip.', 'Sebastian was a great host. He was really quick to reply whenever I had questions and he was very accommodating. The apartment was very clean and quiet. The instructions for getting into the building were clear. I had a great stay and I would definitely book again!', 'Really cute and a comfy bed! Easy access to subway.', "Sebastiano was a very responsive host. During my stay, the hot water boiler broke and being unable to solve the problem gave me an important discount. Host very willing to meet the customer's needs. The apartment is 1 bedroom with elevator on the 3rd floor. Quiet and bright equipped with every amenity. 2-block subway with comfortable 2/3 express train to downtown. Supermarket of any kind and genre in the immediate vicinity", 'The location is great and very close to getting onto the subway. Our host was helpful, friendly, and accommodating! The only downside is that the bathroom is a bit outdated and dirty.', 'Sebastian was an amazing host! Good proximity to the Metro. Very nice neighbors. It should come out better that there is only one room.\nGreat bed, duvet, and pillows. Sleep well.\nThank you for us Sebastian. Thanks for taking good care of us.']

title: Manhattan Studio Near Empire State BLDG
all_reviews: ['Great location of the property, very close to the subway and many other amenities. Check-in and check-out was very easy and there was the possibility of leaving your luggage with a modest amount so you can still enjoy the hours before departure even after check-out.\nHansem was extremely friendly and helpful. The studio, even if small, perfectly reflected the description and had everything you needed to enjoy your stay in peace. Another positive note is the ventilation of the room: despite having only one window that does not open to the outside there was still an excellent adjustable temperature and a good recirculation for smells. Everything is very clean, including sheets, towels and dishes. I would definitely come back and recommend it to others!', 'A fairly central place, close to underground stations, path, sites of interest such as the empire state and time square among many more, a small but cozy place that undoubtedly meets the ones it offers. In my case, we stayed 5 people for 6 days and everything was wonderful', 'Great location! The place is comfortable and clean. Photos are accurate', 'Absolutely amazing location! A little snug but we expected that. It was clean and very convenient! Definitely recommend!!', "It's been a pleasure staying at your place. Have a good day", 'We loved staying in this apartment/room. It was very small but well equiped and very good located. Close to many highlights of the city (walking distance), and okay neighborhood. The beds were good and spacious. Also nice that there was a private shower & toilet and fridge & freezer in the room. Not too hot in the room even though there was no window (hard to guess the weather though). Good ventilation in the room and bathroom. Only negative point is that we only got 1 big towel for a stay of 1 week.']

title: Private GuestSUITE in a Landmark Brownstone
all_reviews:
['The old room is still a good remodel.', 'We loved our stay here! The place was beautiful and they had little extra touches like bamboo toothbrushes and robes that made it extra enjoyable. The area felt safe, was close to where we needed to be and also close to MTA stations to easily get downtown or to Brooklyn. I would stay here again and I would recommend to friends.', 'Beautiful place. Loved the design! Great kitchen and bathroom.Only thing we wish we had was a king bed! But the queen bed they have was comfortable!', 'Beautiful decor and plenty of amenities tucked away in a quiet neighborhood. Found parking right in front and had a good stay.', 'Excellent host and useful neighborhood tips', "We had a great stay at Doug's place. He was gracious enough to let us drop our bags off before check-in since our flight arrived early. Doug was a great communicator and made sure that our stay was pleasant and comfortable. Thanks Doug!", 'Beautiful place to stay in Harlem. Perfect for our first time visiting New York. Everything was pristine and beautiful. Bedroom was stunning. We really enjoyed our stay here and hope to stay here again.', 'Great place, quiet nights, close enough to all parts of NY', 'Douglas is a great host - responsive and super helpful with local suggestions. We were travelling with our toddler and he supplied the crib and some children‚Äôs books. Just to note, you go down stairs to access the entrance. The property is a close walk to Central Park where you can also access the Metro into town. There is also a park with swings close-by in addition to Central Park. It is quiet at night which was welcome in busy New York. The apartment has everything you need should you wish to cook at the property. The decor is divine! I would recommend staying here for a family trip to see the sights and sounds of NYC.', 'What a special place. My daughter and I loved our stay. The guest space was private, beautifully decorated, and comfortable. The hosts were kind and responsive and went above and beyond expectations. We are so thankful. We would definitely stay here again.', 'We really enjoyed our stay in Harlem. This is a beautiful apartment which is well maintained and spotlessly clean. Douglas is a great host who provided us with some great local recommendations. Harlem Shakes do the best burgers! I highly recommend this property and I hope to make a return visit soon.', 'Had a great time, Douglas and Monica were so nice and helpful when we had a couple questions. The place was perfect. Would definitely stay here again.', 'This airbnb is a treasure. Great interior, cozy and private, and easy access to all that Harlem and the city have to offer. Highly recommended!', 'We loved the neighborhood and proximity to great eats and transit.', 'The extra touches were outstanding, extra amenities making every thing easy, tea towels, coffee pods, charging station with cords, extra supplies in equipment, extra towels plus comfy beds and great shower !
Would come back.', 'This apartment made for a perfect stay. Really fun and thoughtful interior with hotel-like amenities that made the whole stay feel high-end and comfortable. Douglas was very responsive, friendly, and helpful. The apartment was spotless! Perfect location with a very easy walk to the 2/3 and 6 trains. Highly recommended!', 'My husband and I enjoyed our six day stay in Harlem! Walkable to Central Park and you can always jump on the subway and be in tribeca in a flash.
The space was wonderful. Bedroom was so cozy and comfortable. The room is away from the street so it‚Äôs also quiet. We stayed in winter and the heating was ample. We had no issues.
We also used the kitchen to cook and had everything that we needed.
Douglas was not only proactive, but very responsive and friendly when we saw him.
A great place to stay!', 'We had an incredible stay here! The hosts were exceptional and the space was just as described. We hope to stay here on our next visit to NYC!', 'Very cozy and clean. There is a subway station 10 minute walk away that can get you to midtown near Times Square and downtown near the Twin Tower monument. So if you pay $3 for the subway and $10 to Uber to the subway, you can save hundreds over staying in midtown.', 'Everything was perfect.', 'Nice neighborhood and good service by public transport. Located north of Central Park, good for visiting the Metropolitan Museum of Art and The Cloisters.', "Douglas's place was pure luxury! From the terry cloth robes to the comfy beds to the gorgeous decor - we felt spoiled! Clean, cool, comfortable - I would absolutely stay here again. Highly recommend!", 'We felt very good from the moment we went in the property, then we were welcomed with courtesy champagne!
Everything clean and working properly, we could rest and prepare for the next day.
Douglas gave us some great advice related to Harlem‚Äôs legendary music scene, by suggesting streets and.venues.
Overall very good vibe, we recommend it to everyone, Douglas and Monica were always kind and helpful!', 'Douglas was a very responsive and pleasant host. We were only in town for business but the ease of access to train stations and Douglas‚Äô recommendations made the stay a breeze.', 'Douglas was extremely responsive, the apartment was in pristine conditions, it was nice, quiet and beautiful. We had a great time and can definitely recommend this place to anyone. Thank you Douglas!', 'Douglas and Monica are fab hosts. They responded really quickly to queries and went out of their way to make us feel welcome.
The apartment is beautiful, comfortable and spacious enough for us to chill out there when the heat wave got too hot outside.
The location is a great base for getting to all the sights of NYC and I loved the fact I could walk to Central Park.', 'We felt right at home. We loved the location and the space. Would recommend!', 'Beautiful apartment in Harlem, close to public transport and parks', "Had a great time at Douglas's place. He was communicative and available if needed. He even checked in ahead of time to see if I needed any additional amenities for my young daughter.", 'Amazing stay in Harlem prime! The host has thought of everything and is extremely accommodating with recommendations to local Harlem eateries and points of interest. Our family loved the central and safe location right on Marcus Garvey Park and it was a pleasure to allow the kids to run around in the Park right across the street. The kitchen is very high end but admittedly, we ate out every night!', 'Very responsive and helpful, beautifully renovated place', 'Very clean well decorated place with thoughtful attention to detail.', 'This home is really beautiful. You could tell that there were some features that were super high-tech that I wish I had access to, but didn‚Äôt take away from the luxury at all. The street was very quiet and it was easy to find parking on Friday night right outside the apartment.', 'We enjoyed staying at this cozy little spot in Harlem. Comfortable, convenient, well appointed and well kept. The host was very accommodating and easy to communicate with. My wife and I would definitely stay here again!', 'We were very comfortable here and felt safe. We always took a cab or Uber back after dark to avoid walking late at night. The Subway stop was just a few blocks away. Staff had not left us extra towels and some were torn, but we managed and let Douglas know at check out.', "Absolutely exceptional Airbnb! Douglas and his wife Monica were exemplary hosts, communicating very quickly ahead of and during our stay. They live upstairs so were able to pop down and help us out very quickly when we had a little difficulty getting into the apartment.
The apartment itself is wonderful! They have thought of everything from cooking supplies to slippers and the decor is so beautiful. Including authentic Moroccan zelige tiles- gorgeous! It was impeccably clean.
The location is very convenient for a number of transport stops and restaurants, Whole Foods etc (and Douglas provided a very helpful local guide including some great recos). It's quiet during the day and evening despite being so central.
Could not recommend this Airbnb more! Thank you Douglas and Monica for a wonderful stay!", 'A great cozy place to stay! Metro was just a few blocks away and there was lots to do. The house looked very pretty from the inside, the beds were very comfortable also.', 'My husband and I enjoyed a lovely three nights in this charming brownstone in historic Harlem. We were moving our daughter into Barnard and looking for a peaceful, neighborhood spot at which to retreat from the bustle of the larger city. Douglas and Monica are thoughtful, responsive hosts with an eye for design who offered us a special window into Mount Morris Park living. We cannot wait to come back!', 'Cool and comfortable during a heat wave. Close to public transportation. Beautiful space and helpful, accommodating hosts. Great stay highly recommend.']

title: Mi casa es casa! Cozy & comfortable!
all_reviews:
['Arnol and Ruben were great! Very welcoming, friendly, and helpful. Over and above my usual airbnb experience.', 'The place is welcoming, cozy, and homely. Arnol and Ruben are always available for reaching out and trying their best to make the stay as comfortable as possible. They would like to communicate with the guests and even offer to cook us dinner sometimes. This is the best place we could ever imagine for staying in the Bronx and would definitely consider coming back for future visits as our first choice.', "Very nice experience having met Arnol and Rub√©n. They are very friendly people who make you feel at home. They are always willing to help you and give you the best tips on a city as big as NY. The house is a bit far from downtown, but it's completely worth checking in and feeling like you're in a home. Very happy with this experience.", "We felt like visiting a grandmother's house or aunty, not like Airbnb. It felt more than home. The host and people living in the house were super welcoming, friendly and nice. The room was cozy and clean. We loved the vibe of the house and the host", 'Arnol and Reuben are rated as super-hosts for a very good reason. Their warmth, kindness, and hospitality was so appreciated, and made my girlfriend and I feel as though we were not staying in an Airbnb, but the house of a close friend. The rental included a private room and a private bathroom that was located downstairs with our own personal key to open and close. Both very clean and comfortable. The air conditioned room kept us cool through the night and the shower was nice and hot on those cold rainy nights. The apartment was only a few minutes away from the Fordham station, and only a half hour train ride into Times Square. Needless to say, after a long, tiring day of walking, museums, and street food, it was always so nice to come home to Arnol‚Äôs and Reuben‚Äôs Airbnb. I highly recommend this rental, whether if staying for family or vacation, the service we received from these two gentleman are like nothing we‚Äôve experienced with prior Airbnb‚Äôs. Thank you Arnol and Reuben!', 'Arnol was amazing!!! Such a gracious host! The room was very clean and comfortable. Arnol made us feel at home. I highly recommend this spot if you are in the area and are in need of a room. This was my first Airbnb experience and I will definitely be booking again in the future!', "This must have been the best airbnb experience we've ever had! Arnol & Ruben are great and generous hosts - we also appreciated their tips about the city and American cuisine. The house was clean & cozy, the bed very comfortable. We would definitely love to stay here again!", 'Me and my boyfriend had an awesome time at Arnold place ! It felt like home ! They were wonderful hosts !', 'There are no words to describe the human warmth of Arnol and Ruben. That is in total harmony with their home that they open to guests to make you feel at home. totally recommended', 'Arnold is such a good host he is making breakfasts and diner for you he always asks if I need anything good place for stay in NYC.', "Staying with Arnol and his family is an amazing experience. They are people who make you feel special and are very attentive and friendly. I had an amazing time with them and Raul's tips for getting to know NY very much to see everything we wanted. Thank you very much guys and I look forward to seeing you in Guadalajara soon.", "My stay at Arnol/ Ruben's place during Holy week was truly exceptional .They made me feel as part of the family. And I must not forget Arnold's mother Berta! They went way beyond to make the weekend memorable.The room was very clean, modern, had everything I needed and more. I literally felt, as if I was at my own home. I give them five stars and I would highly recommend this wonderful place. They are super hosts!", 'Awesome hosts and awesome place. Description was accurate. Communication was great and even accommodated for me quickly on some last minute things. Hopeful to be back in NYC to get a chance to spend more time at place. Lots of fun Latin spots nearby (which I didn‚Äôt go to, but that on my way home after a late night of exploring, was def calling my name.) Arnol even left breakfast for me! Highly recommend.', 'We had a lovely stay at Mi Casa es Tu Casa! The hosts were super helpful and made us feel right at home. We loved the short walk to Arthur Avenue for many wonderful restaurants and the short walk to Fordham University. Overall, a great experience.', 'Arnol and Ruben (and their two cats) were great hosts -- they are friendly, helpful in their communications, good at popping corn and making omelettes, and they welcome you into their home like you were part of the family. The place is comfortable, very clean, and easy to get to. A wonderful stay all in all, and I hope to be able to visit them again -- definitely recommend!', 'This is our first time in New York and our first time in the Bronx. Since it‚Äôs our first time, we were a bit nervous about everything. Thanks to Arnol and Ruben for their amazing hospitality and for showing us this beautiful place! This is a very lovely little community, with music and various sounds happening every day, and super cool and friendly tenants, which made every day of our stay extremely enjoyable. We will recommend everyone to come and experience the Bronx, this wonderful community. We really enjoyed it and hope to come back someday!', 'Arnol is an excellent host. I think she loves having people staying in her home, and she tries to take the time to get to know them. Thank you so much for pampering us through the food. It was delicious! My wife and I are grateful for your help and making us feel at home... If you want a place with home heat, this is the place! title: Luxury apt near Hudson Yards and Times Square
all_reviews:
['We had a great stay in this beautiful apartment with spectacular views. We felt like true New Yorkers and loved every minute. Host was flexible about us arriving a bit early and allowed us to leave our bags in the apartment after check out because of our flight timings. All in all we have had a fab experience', 'Surprisingly quiet apartment with minimal but luxurious amenities. Worth every penny for the incredible round the clock views of the New York City skyline!', 'Excellent stay! All the main sites are nearby! The metro and bus are easy to access! Enjoyed.", 'The host was very responsive and friendly. The apartment looked exactly like the photos, and the apartment is in a prime location. Moreover, I liked how clean the apartment was, and all the linen and pillow cases were very clean. Would definitely stay here again.', 'We stayed here for 7 incredible nights the space was an amazing place to stay and the Host more than accommodating and always friendly. The apartment felt just like a home with comfortable beds and all the necessary accommodation. The WiFi was great and I was able to work efficiently from the apartment and the location was beyond ideal.
The best part of our stay was the accommodating and responsive host.
1. Due to a VERY delayed flight, we were unable to checkin before midnight but the host responded with clear key retrieval instructions and made our late arrival so easy and stress free.
2. Mid-stay we extended our trip and within moments the host edited our reservation and we were able to stay the needed extra night.
3. We had a few hours to kill between checkout and our next location. The host allowed us to store our luggage making our transition unencumbered. It was very appreciated.
I look forward to my next trip to NYC and will hope to stay here again.', 'My wife and I absolutely loved our stay here. The unit looked just like the photos with incredible views high up of the city. The location was perfect for us too as we walked to almost everything. Highly recommend and hope to be back again in the near future.', 'Thank you Steven and Nataliya for a first class experience! The pictures are exact and the view is even better in person! They provided every detail needed to cook every meal and we stayed inside more than we left, as it was truly a birdcage in the sky and we wanted to rest for the final week of our long trip, and this was the best "staycation" I could have asked for, as they made everything go smoothly from check-in to our departure back to California. The bathtub was divine and even the sheets were so nice that my mother-in-law tried to figure how to buy a set for home! I was thoroughly impressed and we can't wait to come back!!!', 'Great stay in a beautiful apartment with stunning views', "What a beautiful place to stay.

(Beautiful views have to be seen to be believed, photos don't do them justice).
I will definitely be revisiting the residence when I am in New York again.

title: Cuencanita Rooms
all_reviews:
["The host was very helpful, while not always possible, the host allowed me to check-in way earlier than the normal check-in time, although due to a flight cancellation I ended up checking-in late. The host provided detailed instructions to check-in, it was pretty easy to access my room. The room and the shared bathroom were very clean, they had a cleaning lady that would leave the bathroom spotless. The room was pretty decent with working AC, tv with lots of streaming services. There's a lot of privacy (which is great). It was also nice that the host checked in with me throughout my stay via message to make sure everything is ok, so I felt that they care about their guests!", "I was impressed by Angel's warm hospitality and Attention, accommodation was clean and comfortable, overall I would highly recommend Angel Place‚Ä¶..", 'The host is kind and friendly. The place is very quiet and safe. You can get to the station easily by bus. The bus stop is near the house. There are a lot of restaurants and supermarkets near the house. The room, kitchen, and bathroom are clean.', 'Ererything was fine. The bus station is just around the corner. Also the Subway is not to far away.', 'Great place to stay! Very close to the airport. The bus is right outside', 'Thank you so much for the stay, the accommodation was very clean and very quiet. I highly recommend it.', 'Very pleasant stay in the Queens. Easy, clean and convenient :)', "Room was small but comfy and clean, as were the shared amenities (kitchen/bathroom). Apart from the air traffic (it's *very* close to LaGuardia), the area is relatively quiet but also walkable (or very short bus ride) to more lively parts of Jackson Heights, and the closest grocery store is less than a block away. Communication with Angel was great, and I appreciate the cute welcome pack, their flexibility with check-in time and willingness to store my bags after check-out.", 'great location', 'The owners are so nice and really flexible. I came in with the bed nicely made as well as towels, soap, and a toothbrush/toothpaste. The bathroom was cleaned every day and the kitchen was pristine. I loved that there was a TV and a desk for as nice amenities. This was such a great price compared to other NYC hotels and airbnbs.
The location is very nice especially for me because I was going to Flushig where the US Open Tennis tournament takes place. I highly recommend getting the 7-day unlimited metro card as the bus nearby will take you directly to where you the subway station. Queens is much more spaced out than the rest of the city so it is so nice to walk around the neighborhood and not feel too crowded. LGA is also really close so you can take the train, bus, or even uber for affordable prices.', 'Great place', 'Very great location. Angel was communicative and easy to reach when needed. I enjoyed my stay!', 'It‚Äôs a good place to living it. Transportation, supermarkets, nearby LGA airport. Totally easy and convenient! Price is acceptable in this location', 'Great place--clean and easy to get into and out of. Nice neighborhood too.', 'The apartment was perfect üíó', "I had a great stay; the room is a good value for money. Very clean, and in a nice area - I'm a solo traveler and I felt safe coming back at any hour day or night. Angel was very helpful. Thanks !", "Great place- and very affordable. Only issue may be house not close to subway- like 15 min walk. I didn't mind walking - so it was great as surroundings were beautiful. If not you can always take bus to subway though. Also every roommate was very considerate. It was peacefully quiet. Definitely turned out to be one of my favorite places in NY.", 'Had a good stay for a few days in NY with very responsive host!', 'Very responsive host, easy to find
Correct and clear directions
and really very flexible check-in
A little small room, but still comfortable, and a tidy and clean bathroom!', 'Very good check-in and check-out system, just putting up the suitcase cost me up the staircase, the place is very clean.', 'Pretty good, the owner was nice, but I couldn‚Äôt find where is the hairdryer', 'A room in a quiet peaceful townhouse a 1 mile walk from the subway station. Very easy access to La Guardia airport. A great choice if you want to visit NYC and not break the bank on hotel costs.', 'The host was truly exceptional, providing a seamless check-in process and being incredibly attentive to my needs. They went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable.', 'My room was great, The bed was super comfortable! There were other tenants there but barely ever saw them. Friendly interactions when I did. Place was super clean! I recommend it, it‚Äôs close to bus stops and subway station. üôÇ', 'Great place! Literally have no complaints. It is about a 20 min walk to the subway but there are buses that can take you there. Close to LaGaurdia airport.', 'Amazing host very flexible and responsive', 'Even though we booked this place a day before our trip Angel took care of us, great communication and the place its just how photos look i would definitely recommend anyone to stay here.', 'Angel‚Äôs place was great! Everything was clean, private and comfortable and the location was 3min walking distance to the Q33 bus stop which takes to to the train station that‚Äôs connected to anywhere in the city! Plenty of city bike stations too. It‚Äôs also walking distance to the northern Blvd which has many restaurants, markets and more.', 'Very nice and spacious place. Super nice and responsive host. Great location. Overall very good.', 'Great host!', 'Everything was fine, calm neighborhood with near metro station (10-15 min. by walk) that will get you to city centre', 'So much comfortable and big and clean room ‚ú®üëåüèª', "Very nice stay.
The houses little out of the way from the subway (you have to take a bus or walk about 25 mins), and there might have been a slight problem with bugs in the apartment before (they set up some roach traps in the closet). But hey, it's New York right?
Otherwise everything was quite comfortable, and great for the price.", "Angel was a very responsive host. Any question was answered immediately. Loved the hot shower. Loved Queens! I'll stay here again.", 'I recommend it, good hosts, clean sheets and bathrooms, everything was spotless and respectful guests', 'I had a great time. Nice quiet residential neighborhood, spacious room and very clean. Getting to the subway is a bit of a hassle because you have to take a bus first, but for me the trade off was worth it.']

title: Full size private bedroom!

title: Windsor Palace (Fully Legal)
all_reviews:
['Beautifully, tastefully done, spacious apt in a great location. Highly recommend.', "Monica and Philip were so welcoming. Their place is a property recently renovated with great attention and charm. The environment is very secure. It's a little treasure in Brooklyn. We'll come back to that.", 'We had a very good stay.
Everything was compliant with the listing', 'Such a lovely apartment. Nice and clean. Newly renovated with the North European style which is simply and modern. My families like the place very much.
The host Monica is very friendly and easy to communicate, responds to our inquiries very quickly.
The location is also convenient with restaurants, grocery store, fruit stand, post office etc, all around the neighborhood.
We have a remarkable time here and would definitely recommend it to friends.', 'Our stay was great. Apartment was beautiful and the beds were so comfortable. The area was a great place to be. Close to the subways and filled with little shops and restaurants. We love it!', 'Beautiful spot and would definitely return.', 'wonderful place', 'I rented this place for my sister and her family during their visit, and Monica and Philip were wonderful hosts‚Äîfriendly and easy to communicate with. The home itself is stunning, spacious, peaceful, and likely one of the best Airbnbs I‚Äôve ever rented. The location in charming Windsor Terrace is ideal, with great restaurants, food spots, public transportation, and Prospect Park nearby. My sister instantly felt at home and absolutely loved the apartment, which made her stay truly special. I‚Äôm so glad I found this place and will definitely consider it again for future guests.', 'Great place! Nice location, good parking and cute!', 'I stayed with my family.It was a 3-year-old son and three, but it was very spacious and clean, close to the station, parks, shops, etc., and I enjoyed a full trip.I want to stay here again next time!Thank you!', 'Phillip and Monica were more than accommodating and very responsive. Their place is in a perfect location: a couple minutes walk to the subway, a grocery right downstairs, near many restaurants and bars, and on the corner of Prospect Park. The interior is minimalistic and clean, which makes for a comfortable stay.', 'Monica and Philip were great hosts! The apartment was clean and airy and comfortable, and everything was as advertised. Monica was very responsive and got back to me right away when I had questions. And the location right next to Prospect Park was excellent. I would definitely stay here again!', 'Awesome apartment in a great location! We felt like home and enjoyed the city so much! Thank you guys! ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'Great space, great location, great communication.', 'This place is perfectly situated for those who want access to the attractions in Manhattan but also want to return to a quieter place at night in which to relax. Prospect Park is a stone throw away for morning runs or walks, and the grocery store across the street is open late. As for the apartment itself, the kitchen and living room are huge and made it easy for six people to hang out together before heading out on the town. The bedrooms are a little small, but the beds are comfortable, and the place is very quiet. Getting to sleep was not a problem and we all slept very well! Philip and Monica were awesome as well, pleasant and super responsive!', 'Great space in the heart of a bustling community!', "Monica was very pleasant and responsive. Despite every requests and inquiries, Monica was there to respond and accommodate as much as she could. The Unit does have two levels of stairs which was fine for my folks but for those with complications with either knee or back please be informed. Monica does inform guests that there are stairs. The kitchen and living is absolutely amazing. There isn't an entertainment system such as a television for those who care for it, we were fine playing our music. Street Parking is hassle but that is that kind of area not the Unit. Overall Monica made this stay really great. The unit is quite beautiful and spacious but you have to see it to believe it.", 'we liked it so much we actually booked it again for a second stay', "We really enjoyed Monica and Philip's apartment. It is very spacious, convenient with laundry and two bathrooms, and has lovely new furniture and tasteful, recent renovation. Very comfortable beds and A/C works great. The windows give great natural light and block the outside noise incredibly well. Great location near the subway and Prospect Park. Would be happy to return!", 'Great stay, great location, excellent communication with host, clean, comfy beds‚Ä¶great stay!', "The place is beautiful, very big. You can see the touch of Monica, an architect: it is very spacious and bright, recently renovated, very functional and elegant, clean. It's a top floor (second floor above ground). We had a lot of 4 of us, with one room per head for the boys and a double bedroom for us. A great surprise is the TWO bathrooms: one full, and one with a toilet and small sink. Maybe there's only one small flaw: on the backyard side you hear a little 24-hour noise from a restaurant, but it's isolated from great new double-glazed windows. There's air conditioning.
The property is in a quiet and bourgeois area, literally 100 meters from the F subway that leads to Manhattan, through Broolkyn. In the area there are some well-stocked restaurants and supermarkets, and a stone's throw away Prospect Park, which is a beautiful park.
Monica was very kind and super responsive in responding to our small needs, very helpful and discreet.
Highly recommended!", 'We had a wonderful stay here.
The apartment met all our expectations. It was spacious, bright, clean, quiet and the bedding of good quality.
Monica and Philip accommodated us with our luggage so we could visit more easily on the day of our arrival and departure.
That was so much appreciated.
Would 100% recommend:)', 'second time staying here. very nice airbnb', 'Easy parking, lots of great places to visit/walk to, hosts were very responsive and helpful. Would absolutely come back.', 'Fantastic 3-bedroom near Prospect Park. Super comfortable for our group of 6. Newly renovated & well decorated; easy walking distance to lots of restaurants, cafes, subway, etc.', 'We had a wonderful time at Windsor Palace! The place looks the same as in the pictures and has everything you need - and more. The apartment is freshly renovated and tastefully furnished. There is air conditioning in every room and the beds are very comfortable. There is a bagelladen and a 24-hour supermarket just around the corner. The area is quiet and familiar to relax after a stressful day in Manhattan. It is the perfect place for a family vacation and highly recommended!', 'The apartment is wonderful: it has a very spacious kitchen room and three bedrooms (4 beds, two of them double and one bunk). We were 4 coworkers and it was perfect. If someone goes with their partner, they could also have stayed comfortably. It has light, good ventilation, very comfortable bathroom and service. They were very friendly, very quick to respond and everything works perfectly with them. The neighborhood is lovely, there are a lot of stores nearby and on the corner there is a 24 hour store that has everything. Highly, highly recommended. We were very sorry to say goodbye to such a nice apartment. We hope to be able to repeat someday for a longer period.', 'I was so thankful that they did their best to be confused due to the enactment of New York City law.', 'Great location and beautiful space.', "Monica & Philip were perfect hosts! Your apartment is located in the best location in Brookly. Shops, cafes, restaurants and the huge Prospect Park right around the corner. Also 2 metro lines (F,G) as well as many bus lines. A well-kept, quiet suburb with nice people, children and many dogs. The apartment itself blends seamlessly into this picture. On the 2nd floor of a typical townhouse you will find an almost luxurious apartment with 3 bedrooms, a large living and dining room, kitchen with anteroom - all with wooden floors, bathroom+toilet and an extra toilet . The air conditioning in the bedrooms also makes hot days bearable. In the backyard, there are quite noisy ventilation of the adjacent shops and restaurants, but these can no longer be heard when the windows are closed. We had a great night's sleep and more than enjoyed our stay! For NY visitors a gem and an absolute recommendation! Thanks again to Monica & Pfilip for having us as your guests.", 'Great location and space, has a nice kitchen and is very easy to get to prospect park and the subway.', 'Great place! Hosts were fantastic to deal with provided excellent instructions for check in/out etc.
Apt was very clean and spacious and as described. Best of all is the location! Walk to subway (F/G), prospect park, and the neighborhood has many great places too. Will be back for sure.', 'This was a great place to stay at! The area was really peaceful and it was very close to the train station! The place was also very roomy and Monica was a lovely host!']

title: Comfortable Private Room in Historic Park Slope
all_reviews:
['I loved the proximity of this comfortable apartment to beautiful Prospect Park and the local shopping areas of Park Slope. Marie-Line is a helpful and gracious host who offers a very attractive (and spotlessly-clean) alternative to standard hotel accommodation. The studio apartment is well-appointed with a handy closet space, a modern bathroom and small-but-functional kitchen area. I would definitely stay here again on future visits to Brooklyn.', 'Marie-Line‚Äôs place was exactly what my husband and I needed for our short stay. It‚Äôs a very comfortable studio; everything you need-even a desk; very clean. We were able to catch the bus and subway within a few blocks and walk to nearby bars and restaurants.', 'Wonderful stay! The neighborhood was great, a quiet side street between two more bustling streets full of shops and food with easy access to public transportation. There‚Äôs so much to do in the area! We explored the Saturday farmer‚Äôs market, walked to the Brooklyn museum and were pleasantly surprised by a neighborhood musical showcase! The room had all the necessities and was clean and comfortable, and the host family was exceedingly kind. A fantastic experience all together!', 'The stay was excellent, pleasant, comfortable and with many practicalities, exactly as described in the ad. I was well received by Marie-Line and communication was great. The neighborhood is quiet, great for walking. I recommend it to everyone who wants to visit Brooklyn.', 'We enjoyed staying here! The street itself, reminded me of the fictional Sesame St. It was filled with families and friendly faces. Highly recommended!', "Great stay at Marylin's who speaks French in addition taxi for the return to jfk found by these treatments unbeatable rate", 'A definite choice if you are in Brooklyn, the place was perfect for me in terms of everything. Nearby Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, and Brooklyn Botanical Garden. While technically a shared space, the Airbnb is right inside the door and feels like a private space. Marie-Line was responsive and the Airbnb was spotless and filled with beautiful art.', 'The housing is very good.
Marie Line is very attentive.', 'Convenient location to shops, restaurants and transit. Quiet block and private rental. Easy communication, quick responses and flexibility with check in/out. Nice, safe neighborhood. We walked home several times after midnight and felt very safe. this is a nice neighborhood. It‚Äôs also pretty quiet.
small cozy room. Just enough for 1 or 2 people.
Great shower .. water gets hot fast!

eat at Bagel Pub down the street. Trust us on this one. it‚Äôs amazing!', 'Mary-Line was very easy to communicate with, her space is clean and exactly as described. Thank you, Marie-Line.', 'Great spot to stay in Brooklyn, very walkable train near by and good food options. If you‚Äôre hesitant on staying in a room within a home, it never felt like we were intruding and it was an overall comfortable experience. It was so nice to have a safe place to come back to.', 'Had a wonderful stay at Marie Line‚Äôs place. Bed is very comfortable and the shower is quite big. Nothing to complain honestly. Great stay!', 'The perfect location in Brooklyn and a very comfortable room. Plenty things to do in close proximity to the location with easy access to prospect park and subway lines to manhattan and surrounds. Marie-Line is a wonderful host so warm and kind. I would highly recommend this location for anybody that wants a comfortable stay away from the hustle and bustle of Manhattan but with easy access to all areas of New York.', 'The room was clean/spacious and Marie was very accommodating with our very late arrival time. The only issue was the bedroom is next to the main living space for the household, so evenings and mornings were quite loud when there where children in the house.', 'Very nice host, great location, plenty of space for the two of us. Would highly recommend!', 'The place is in a great location. The neighborhood is nice and quiet, super well connected to Manhattan.
Marie-Line treated us very well at both the reception and the farewell, the times we met. We found a buzz the day we arrived and arrived later than we had discussed, Marie-Line was completely understanding and did not cause us any problems.
The room is cozy and good size, it is perfectly equipped. The bed was comfortable. Yes, for our taste we had a lot of heat, having to use the air conditioner all the time we were in the room, despite being the Christmas parties. Other than that, everything is perfect. We would definitely repeat.
Thank you, Marie-Line!', 'Would absolutely recommend for the price. Marie Lines place was a beautiful place and location. Easy to get around in the area and so close to almost everything. She was friendly and welcoming.', "We had 5 wonderful days at Marie-Line's place. The area and safe and had good access to the city. Restaurants and cafes are in the immediate vicinity. We would definitely come back.", 'Marie is a gracious host and keeps a really clean space. Would stay again.', 'Read all the other great reviews and I'll just say, "I agree." The room was immaculate; the shower was great; the bed was very comfortable; it was easy to control the room temperature. And centrally located in the heart of Park Slope. The street was very quiet. Some reviewers commented on thin walls but only twice was I aware of other people in the building and it was totally unobtrusive. I have stayed in quite a few Airbnb's in Park Slope over the years but Marie-Line's place is at the top of the list. I highly recommend staying here if you're visiting Park Slope. I'll definitely be back!', 'The room served our purpose well. Ample space and nice bathroom with spacious shower. Bed was very comfortable and the AC was much appreciated. Close to many restaurants & coffee shops. It is worth reminding that this unit does not have a private entrance - the door is just inside the shared entrance & hallway & is adjacent to the host‚Äôs living space. So any talking in the next room is heard through the walls. Much appreciated Marie-Line‚Äôs quick communication & willingness to help us out with last minute check-in.', 'We loved staying here. Everything was as described, and even better than I was expecting. Entry to the room was discreet and private enough that we felt comfortable coming and going, never in the way. The street is quiet, we slept great and felt very safe. We enjoyed the 5 minute walk to get coffee each morning, also close to several great cafes and restaurants. Conveniently located near the subway, even with our luggage, it was easy to get to. We will keep this listing on the rotation for future visits to the city!', 'Great stay. I‚Äôm from Brooklyn but even if I wasn‚Äôt, I would have been very comfortable at this residence. Marie is very accommodating and friendly so it made the stay even better. I hope I get to book this location next time.', 'Great stay! Close to public transit and restaurants.', 'Marie-Line was so patient as travel plans consistently fluctuated for us. It was clean, quiet, and perfect for our little stay in Park Slope. Wish we could have stayed longer!', 'Park Slope, Brooklyn is a great area. It‚Äôs fairly quiet and family oriented. This place was close to lots of restaurants and very convenient to at least 3 subway stations. We would easily stay here again and would highly recommend it to anyone else.', 'Our stay was great. Marie stayed up late to let us in and to make us feel welcome. The suite was super clean and in a fantastic part of town.', 'Location, location, location! Morning routine: walk to Cafe Regular around the corner for a great cappuccino and then head to Prospect Park, just a few blocks away, for a stroll. The room is close to everything in Park Slope and Prospect Heights, two fantastic neighborhoods with great restaurants, bars, cafes, and easy public transit to the rest of the city. Hosts were polite and quiet, and it was easy to come and go with privacy.', 'I was content with my stay at Marie‚Äôs place. It is a private room (with a bathroom) on the ground floor in a brownstone. The ground floor level worked for me perfectly since I came with a baby and stroller. Location was 5/5. Communication with Marie was 5/5. I think value for money is spot on!', 'I can see why Marie Line‚Äôs place is usually fully booked - it‚Äôs a well-appointed, comfortable and clean studio in a great Brooklyn neighborhood with plenty of restaurants and stores within walking distance. Unfortunately due to a medical issue I had to check out earlier than planned but I‚Äôm glad to have discovered this place and hope to return in the future.
Marie Line and her family were friendly and helpful. Overall, a very positive experience.', 'This is a very clean, quiet room in a Park Slope garden apartment, with an attached private bathroom. We felt very comfortable and communication was very clear. A great location at a reasonable price!', 'Marie was a great host- very friendly and responsive. The room looked just like the photos. The place was very clean and quiet and very cozy.', 'Very nice and comfortable space. It was a pretty safe and clean neighborhood, with easy access to major subway stations. The host was responsive and overall had a wonderful stay.', 'Great little find!
Located well for different subway stops.
Easy to get back to at night.
The host was welcoming but also left us to just come and go as we liked.
Comfy bed, Great shower. Warm and cosy!', "This is a lovely place to stay in Brooklyn. This was my first experience renting a private room rather than an entire unit. To my surprise, the room was extremely private and felt like a generous hotel room. The room has a kitchenette and a bathroom attached. You never have to share any common areas with the owners unless you'd like to.
The entire unit was clean, especially the bathroom. The shower was wonderful! The window air unit conditioner was more than sufficient. Marie-Line was very flexible with our check-in and check-out times.
This is a lovely place to stay in Brooklyn. It is more affordable than a full unit. Additionally, we did not feel like we were contributing to the housing crisis in NYC since we were renting a room rather than a full unit. It's in a great location and was perfect for our first trip back since moving from Brooklyn over a year ago.
Thanks Marie-Line!", 'Everything was perfect. The location, the accommodation and the hospitality. Thank you Marie Line.', 'Sweet clean place located in an excellent neighborhood near several subway lines. Also, it was on the ground floor so no stars to climb! While the entrance was shared with the owner, it felt like a private entrance as I hardly ever saw or heard them and the lockable door to the private bedroom/bath was a few steps inside the front door.', "We are incredibly pleased with our stay at Marie Line's. She was very friendly and helpful.
The room was nice and clean and the bed was very comfortable. AC was available, which was appreciated this hot summer week. The bathroom was also clean and fresh, with access to hand soap, body wash, and shampoo/conditioner. In the kitchen area there was a fridge, kettle, coffee maker. One
closet is available, with hangers, shelves and iron. Also an umbrella was available to borrow.
The street was very quiet and pleasant, yet close to cafes, restaurants and bars. Subway was available with a few minutes walking distance.
We had an incredible time at Park Slope and can warmly recommend Marie Line's accommodation!", 'Marie-Line was a great host. Her listing provided a comfortable stay. The location alone makes it totally worth it. Also, she was extremely flexible in accommodating our travel changes and needs. Thank you so much!', 'This room is super cute! Marie-Line was a great host. I‚Äôd definitely come back!', 'Was a nice stay, closer interaction with the family than the reviews & description lead on.', 'Ideal room & bath in Park Slope. Clean and well equipped- also comfy bed. Beautiful bathroom. Highly recommend.', "The studio was exactly as described. We shared a front door but there was no issue about privacy. Marie Line was helpful and knowing that she was there if needed was a real bonus. Park Slope is a delightful area with 5th and 7th's amazing collection of shops and places to eat. A perfect base from which to explore.", 'Everything was absolutely great! There was extra towels and trash bags. Bathroom and bed/mattress were pristine. Host was also very proactive in communications when we had a plane delay. 7-10 minute walk away from subway entrance.', 'As the home is located on a narrow road, and very close to a blind turn, the safest place to park is on the grass directly in front of the home, so that you can get both tires off the roadway.', "Very nice stay in Brooklyn at Marie-Line's. The location is ideal to find a little calm in NY, located close to many restaurants and supermarkets, and subway stations that serve Manhattan. Air conditioning (despite the noise) is a plus in case of high heat, as is the small very well-equipped kitchen. Thank you again!", 'thank you so much was great . everything was perfect ! will deff stay here again if needed (:', "The apartment is beautiful and great for a stay in New York. The Brooklyn neighborhood in which it is located has a lot of charm and pueblito transportation stops nearby to get around in comfort. There is a coffee shop nearby for breakfast which is great. The host is attentive, kind and nice. We were super well attended. We'll be back!", "My daughter and I had a fantastic time staying at Marie-Line's private room. It was beautiful, spacious, quiet, and thoughtfully designed to meet any guest's needs, including a useful food prep area, a large handicapped accessible bathroom, TV, lots of outlets to charge all of our devices, a desk for working, two large chairs that can be pulled together to make a sofa, and the most comfortable bed I have ever slept in! The location was convenient to everything, as well, with a short 7 minute walk to either the Q/B or 2/3 trains, and lots of wonderful restaurants to choose from just a block away on 7th or 5th Avenues. (GrubHub and Whole Foods will deliver food to you here, as well!) Marie-Line was a great host, and very quick to respond to my messages. Our 10-day stay here was absolute perfection, and we will now be booking this room every time we visit New York City. I am so thankful I found this special spot!", 'Enjoyed my stay, the host was kind and helpful. Overall a cozy, clean, and private space in a great location. Would definitely book again.', 'Perfect place. Perfect area. Bonus - a comfortable bed!', "I stayed at Marie-Line's place for 3 nights and it was a nice place to stay. I always love staying in Park Slope - safe, easy to get into the city, walkable, lots to do, and great places to eat close by. Marie-Line's place was clean, close to transit, private, and had everything you could need. In particular, I appreciated the private bathroom, free water bottles, iron, hair dryer, fan, and kettle. As a few other reviews mentioned, the pictures make the room seem bright and fresh but, in reality, it was a bit tired and there isn't a lot of natural light. I also found it was really hot in there at night but turning the fan on made a big difference. And finally, if you're a light sleeper, some of the noise from people walking by (on a Friday or Saturday night) could be a concern but ear plugs or turning on the fan can help with that. All in all, the last few things I mentioned here weren't a big deal for me and I appreciated having a clean, safe, comfortable and affordable place to stay.", 'We had a wonderful stay! Location is perfect - 5 minutes to the subway with direct lines to Manhattan, two breakfast places on the corner, quiet and peaceful at night. The bed was super comfortable, the place very clean. Nice big bathroom, big room, plenty storage space to unpack your bags. Easy access and the host was very friendly and responsive. We would definitely go back! Thanks!', 'I truly had a great experience staying at Marie‚Äôs apartment. She was immediately responsive to any requests I made and she is a wonderful person. The apartment had everything I needed. The bed was very comfortable and clean. The bathroom facilities were excellent. I will certainly go back to Marie‚Äôs place and recommend it strongly to anyone who wants a pleasant experience in Park Slope, Brooklyn.', "We spent 8 beautiful days at Marie-Line's place. She is a very nice and helpful landlady. The apartment was as described. The quiet location is very quickly in the center.
We would definitely come back.", 'The room is very comfortable and very well located for discovering New York. The neighborhood is family friendly and very nice. We recommend it!', 'Great location with restaurants and cafes nearby and situated very close to subway stations. Clean and neat accommodation.', 'Very nice room, but too warm. Had to run the ac to be comfortable.', 'Love the shower! Room is very toasty as it was the fall.', 'Great and cozy spot to stay in Brooklyn. Marie was really nice and welcoming. Definitely recommend this place to anyone.']

title: Hoboken Haven ‚Äì Heart of town!
all_reviews:
['Great location and great place to stay. As described by the host who was communicative and helpful for check in. Everything is a short walk from the place and the neighborhood is quite and cute!', 'Great quiet place and in walking distance to a ton of great spots in town.', 'Great apartment, clean, quiet. So easy to find and get into. Host extremely responsive. Everything close by, very walkable area. Would definitely use again.', 'A very comfortable and mono apartment. The village was nice and not dangerous. e
This is somewhat far from new york,however the metro is very fast and the distance to the subway is a nice walk through the village of 10 minutes.', "Had a great stay at AJ's place -- highly recommend!", 'AJ was an awesome host. His instructions were clear and easy, with attached pictures. Thank you Aj!', "The perfect apartment to be in NYC quickly and at the same time come to peace. By bus 126 (1 min walk) or the path (15 min) you are in the middle of Manhattan in less than half an hour. The location of the apartment in New Jersey is surrounded by everything you need! Supermarket (10 min), restaurants/bars (1min) and a perfect view over the Hudson River to New York (4min). This apartment is an old building, you can hear every step from the apartment above, as well as the water in the pipes. If that's bothering you, this apartment is not suitable for you! There were three of us in the apartment and very satisfied. The couch can be unfolded, so someone can easily sleep there. The apartment offers a lot of space and we'll be happy to come back ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Please note that New Jersey is another state and you need extra tickets for local transportation in NJ. NYC Metro tickets are not valid here üöÉ", 'Very clean and looked like the photos. A great bonus, which I wouldn‚Äôt have paid attention to in a listing, was a large full length mirror. Often something overlooked. AJ was very responsive even on Sunday evening when we wanted to watch some football and needed help signing in!
AJ made sure we were able to store our luggage before checking and even let us know when the place was ready and we were able to check in early
His place is on a quiet residential street but one block from shopping, restaurants and bars!
Two close coffee shops. About 5 or 6 blocks from pier A with a great view of nyc skyline. An easy 8 or 9 blocks to the Path with direct access to nyc. We went over 3 days in a row and 1 of those went over and back twice. So convenient.
If you are there on a Saturday be sure to stop in at The Ferryman, on the corner of Bloomfield and First - as soon as you walk in you‚Äôll feel like a local. Ask for Mickie the bartender and you‚Äôll have a fast friend.', 'Thursday time staying there, great everytime! Would highly recommend.', 'We had a wonderful stay! Highly recommend. The location is perfect as it is an easy walk to Washington Street but far enough away to be peaceful. The apartment was very clean and comfortable, the instructions were detailed and perfect, and AJ was a responsive host. Will definitely book this again.', 'AJ was an amazing host. I requested some additional stuff and he was able to deliver very quickly. Extremely responsive to everything. The place is in a prime location and exactly what I was looking for. I give the host and the place 5 stars!', 'Very nice and comfortable location in Hoboken, enjoyed my stay here, the apartment was just as it looks in pictures. Great restaurant and bars near by would definitely recommend', "I spent a couple of days at AJ's place in Hoboken. The location was convenient, with easy access to nearby restaurants and bars. AJ's attention to detail was evident throughout the house- cozy and inviting atmosphere for my stay. I would definitely consider staying here again in the future.", 'Very nice cozy and clean apartment! In a good, quiet area, the apartment has everything you need. The owner is very nice and responded quickly to all messages. Thank you very much, we will come back again!!!', 'Quiet, clean space in a perfect location. A short walk from the bus stop and plenty of great places to eat and shop in Hoboken. When I come back, this is where I‚Äôll stay!', 'Very responsive host, nice quiet area to stay.', 'We enjoyed our stay at AJ‚Äôs place! It had everything we needed for our short stay, including the Keurig coffee! The space was big enough for two adults and could probably accommodate a few more or kids. I loved how he included pictures with his check in directions! It made it super easy! We walked everywhere so the location is perfect for enjoying Hoboken or even going into NYC! Everything was clean and as described with some extra touches like body wash and shampoo!
We hope to return next year!', 'The house is really close to the main street in Hoboken, with buses going to Manhattan every 15 minutes.
The place was clean and comfy, we ask for more pillows and blankets and they gave it to us the same day. We had a great time in the house.
We really recommend it!', 'Great communication. Walkable to restaurants, bars, and the PATH train to NYC! Would stay again', 'Amazing stay - fantastic location - perfect host', "Traveling with my child was amazing and beautiful, as well as safety, to see the view of Manhattan. It was quiet and very easy to get to Manhattan with a lively neighborhood atmosphere.
In particular, AJ's response was quick, accurate, and very kind. I will go back to Korea with happy memories.
Be happy until I see you again. ‚ò∫Ô∏è", 'Such a cute, affordable apartment with easy access to Path to get to New York pretty quickly! The host is super responsive and quick to answer any questions you may have!', 'Excellent stay in Hoboken. Stunning views of Manhattan.', 'Beautiful, quiet apartments in a pretty and cozy neighborhood. We (3 women) felt very comfortable!
About the location: Hoboken is really beautiful and the view over the river on Manhattan is fantastic. However, you only make the "trip" to Manhattan once a day, because the way is - no matter what means of transportation (bus, ferry, subway) - quite strenuous.
To the apartment: It has everything you need. The apartment is clean and even quite large. The bed was comfortable. Only criticism: The "sleeping"sofa is a disaster! That's a shame because the apartment is actually perfect for 3 people. It would also be suitable for 4 people, but not with this sofa.', 'The apartment was in a convenient location and fit our purpose.', 'Very comfortable and clean apartment in a great location in Hoboken. The Host was friendly and always available when needed.', 'The Airbnb was very well maintained and was true to the description. It was easy to find and the location has good access to NYC!', 'Fabulous place. Clean and convenient.Owner was so helpful. All is great and i will rent again .
It is very utilitarian, so not much decorating. But not needed since i was barely there. Only thought is get an early shower as hot water runs out.
This one airbnb i would highly recommend . If you are going to Hoboken you cant do better.', "AJ was a super nice host! Always available and strive to ensure that everything contributes to our satisfaction.
I was in AJ's place with my two kids 9 and 11 years old and there was enough space for us in any case. The sofa is not the most comfortable, but my son did not bother it.
The accommodation is nicely decorated with everything needed.
Everything was great!", 'This is a beautiful apartment, in a great location. It is super convenient to everywhere you could possibly want to go in Hoboken, and only a short ride on the 126 Bus away from Manhattan. The unit was clean, tastefully decorated, and felt like home as soon as we stepped in the door. The host was incredibly kind, communicated clearly, and left detailed, helpful instructions.', 'It was a very satisfying place to stay! The hosts were very friendly and communicated promptly. The host provided us with anything we needed. The room was very tidy, spacious, and even better than the pictures. It was nice to be able to stay in such a nice house near Manhattan. Hoboken was also very beautiful. The park overlooking Manhattan is right in front of the house, and there were many restaurants and cafes nearby. It takes about 15 minutes to walk to the Path train station, and take bus 126 near the house in 20 minutes to get to Manhattan in 20 minutes. When you take bus 126, you can use it conveniently by downloading and paying in advance.
If I go to Manhattan, I want to visit again. Highly recommended!', 'Apartment was in a great area of Hoboken. Close to Washington with many restaurants and shops. Not far from the Path and a short walk to the walkway along the Hudson with great views of Manhattan.
Very quiet unit facing the back yard.', "AJ is a very hospitable host! His communication is proactive and clear, he makes an effort to go above and beyond for his guests. He's a great host!
The apartment is in an older building. It is clean and spacious space, and well located in a peaceful neighbourhood but not too far from great restaurants and bars in Hoboken!", 'We went to NJ to attend Uruguay¬¥s game at the Copa America and take the opportunity to have some rest and visit some nice places, it is super near Manhattan, super easy to get there and Hoboken itself is a super beautiful place, near the river with all the services you need at hand. AJ place is super comfortable, the kitchen is just out of a dream with the sun entering from the window while you are having breakfast, gorgeous.
We Highly recommend this place! 5 stars for AJ place', 'We enjoyed our stay at AJ Hudson‚Äôs place. The location is great and very walkable. It‚Äôs close by many restaurants and shops. We parked overnight at a parking garage that was about a 10 minute walk. The apartment had all the essentials.', 'We absolutely loved this home on the most perfect block in Hoboken. It was quaint, quiet, and the apartment was spacious and wonderful. We will definitely be back!', "Aj's apartment is very pleasant, clean and well-equipped. It is located in a very quiet residential area and on the edge of all amenities, you enjoy several shops and restaurants. The bus station is very close you arrive in Manhattan in 15 - 20 minutes depending on traffic. I highly recommend it and will come back to it. Thank you AJ", 'The apartment was really nice, we felt at home for our stay.', 'My second time there and it was amazing‚Ä¶great place. Would highly recommend', "AJ is a great host. Responsive and ready to help in best possible ways for all your needs. I had to keep by luggage for extra time and needed a extra bed for my son. AJ helped me out in no time. The house has all the amenities required for a great stay. it is close to washington street where you will be able to find all good restaurants. I strongly recommend staying at AJ's place.", 'Great place to stay! Within walking distance to tons of restaurants and the PATH train to New York. Easy to travel to the city every day and come back to somewhere quiet to spend the evening with all the food and coffee choices!', 'AJs instructions were super clear and easy to use. the place was very nice and conveniently located to restaurants and shops and coffee. AJ was easy to communicate with.', 'Accommodating host.', 'This is the second time I rented the place within a few weeks. The apartment did not disappoint. Close to public transport to NYC and walking distance to restaurants in Hoboken. AJ offered me the flexibility I needed and accommodated any special requests we had. It was a perfect place that I needed. We will def be renting here again!', 'Great experience', 'Very clean and neat. Beautiful buildings up and down the street. Some local restaurants around the block. Quiet neighborhood. Parking lots nearby.', 'A cute cozy place! In a safe neighborhood and would definitely come back :)', 'Great stay, AJ was very helpful', 'Lovely one bedroom apartment in the heart of Hoboken. Windows in every room, so tons of natural lighting. A very lovely vibe. TV was simple to connect to. Air conditioning was lovely. Will visit again.', 'The best place we‚Äôve stay while in NYC.
Very convenient to buy things to eat nearby and also convenient to get to the tourist spots with train( Path station) and by bus(126). Most of all, it‚Äôs really safe to stay, and if you wake up early, the scenery around is really beautiful. It‚Äôs worth to take a walk around.
I will definitely stay here again when the next trip to NYC.', 'One of my favorite Airbnbs that I have stayed at!! AJ was a great host and his home was wonderful. Super clean, free of clutter, comfy, had everything we needed, and location was PERFECT ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ú®', 'My husband and I had a wonderful time. The apartment was spacious, clean, and noise free. A lot of walkable restaurants and stores. Beautiful walks by the river. 10/10 recommend!', 'AJ was very easy to communicate with and responded very fast. we were given very clear check in and check out instructions.
The place is right next to Washington street with lots of restaurants and shops. About 15 minutes walk to Path.
Very quiet and peaceful.
The sofa bed was a bit uncomfortable to sleep on, but otherwise no complaints.', 'Great location and Aj was responsive and very helpful. The apartment itself was clean and very cozy. Great stay.', 'AJ was a great host, very communicative and had zero issues. Excellent location. The A/C window units worked well in both the living room and bedroom for the hot / humid days.
Two potential points of improvement:
- The couch in the living room is uncomfortable, and almost unusable despite looking nice. The padding is thin, and there are wood beams that stick out between each cushion, jamming into your back or ribs if you try to lie down on it. It could potentially be dangerous if you are unaware and try to lie down quickly.
- The kitchen is very bare of supplies and utilities, making cooking difficult.', "AJ was always attentive to our questions. The apartment is located in a quiet area with quite a few restaurants and shops. It was also close to the PATH station, buses and ferry. We 100% recommend this apartment. We'll definitely be back.", 'A truly gorgeous apartment with lovely light and interior design. A perfect home away from home in the big city üíñ', 'It is always a pleasure to stay at this property. It is always spotless, and is a great location whether you are staying in Hoboken or need to go into Manhattan or the rest of the city. The building and neighborhood are quite, but safe', 'Our stay in this condo was just perfect! Upon entry, you could smell how clean it was. The condo itself was very spacious and was decorated nicely. The bed was very comfortable. All linens that were provided smelled fresh and looked clean. The location of the condo was in the heart of Hoboken and gave us access to everything and anything we needed: good restaurants, pharmacy, parking garage, the PATH (their rail system to NYC), and stellar views nearby. The neighborhood was peaceful and safe. AJ was a superb host; he answered any questions and concerns we had within minutes. We would most definitely stay here again the next time we are in Hoboken.', 'Had a great stay‚Ä¶.AJ‚Äôs place is great and I will certianky be back!', 'Everything was great! Answered any questions we had immediately. Would recommend to anyone.', 'Aj thank you for the great stay! We completely enjoyed the area. Transportation was easily accessible and can take the bus into New York from Hoboken. Bus 126! Thank you again and I look forward to booking here again.', 'I was speechless when I walked through the door. The apartment is absolutely beautiful. So well appointed, spacious and clean. It is everything you need and more. The place is tucked in a quiet and gorgeous area of Hoboken, super close to PATH and the 126 bus (an easy 20 mins to central Manhattan). The town is very quaint and walkable with plenty of great dining and coffee options and beautiful parks with NYC skyline views along the Hudson River. AJ is an exceptional and responsive host that strives to make your experience as good as possible. He is quick to answer and even offers great local advice. This is the place to feel right at home. Highly recommend!']

title: Cozy Cambria
all_reviews:
['The place is immaculately clean and tastefully decorated. The host was very accommodating when I asked for different bed pillows.
What would be nice is a few more homey comforts: a couple of bottles of water, ice in the freezer, heavier weight bedding. Overall a good stay!', 'Madelyn‚Äôs place is a hidden gem in Cambria Heights! It was very clean and felt very safe. Our hosts even brought us food one night when they were having a family bbq. We really enjoyed our stay here, but spent quite a bit of time commuting into the city. Luckily there‚Äôs a bus just a few blocks away and we were able to access the trains throughout the day and night. Other than that, this was an absolute darling place to spend our holiday.', 'Soft bed and sofa nice tv full size fridge, would definitely stay again! Perfect for a couple.', 'The place is very tidy and cozy. You have everything you need. We never met the host, but communicated exclusively through the AirBnb chat. She responds quickly and helpful. You have to plan on going downtown for a good 60 minutes. We took an Uber to Queens Station every day (about 12$) and then used the LIRR to downtown (80$/week). This was the fastest way.', 'Madelyn was a great host and although I didn‚Äôt get to meet her, she was responsive to our concerns. The apartment was just as described and looked just as the pictures. It was clean, free of clutter and decorations were tasteful. My only complaint would be that I really wanted the heat to be a little higher which would have really given the apartment that cozy feeling. However, I am thankful for the accommodation and would definitely go back in the summer. Thanks Madelyn!
Neela', 'Great spot, I highly recommend', 'It was perfect', 'It was a beautiful house and a pleasant stay.', 'Very clean and nice stay.', 'Great place for a quick stay! Definitely recommend', 'The bed was SO comfortable! The entire place was so clean and exactly as advertised! I felt relaxed and right at home.', 'Extremely clean, neat and welcoming! It was a mini home away from home. Thank you!', 'Host Madelyn and co-host Carlos, are indeed extraordinary. Their airbnb is located in a quiet, clean suburban area in Queens NY. Is also true to advertisement, decor well thought-out with comfy bedding. If there be any need, always timely responses. This is my second time to occupy their resident. In my opinion this airbnb, which is Ideally situated only a short enough ride from the JFK airport, groceries, restaurants, ect.
