We had a great sleep and everything was as described in the listing. Thanks', 'Madelyn is a very friendly and responsive host. Home was extremely clean and the neighborhood felt very safe and nice . This place was exactly what I needed for my quick to NY.', "like others have said, this studio is like a small hotel room! very clean. bed and pillows soft and comfortable to fall asleep in but mattress on the soft side if you prefer a firmer mattress. quiet location, some stores and fast food places a 20 min walk. less accessible without a car. I went for a wedding 20 min away and didn't rent a car and Uber were $$$. but it was cheaper than a hotel and great quality so overall good stay.", 'The property was lovely and clean and very modern. Easy check in instructions and all the facilities you need. The bed was super comfy.
While the unit is in a lovely neighbourhood, it‚Äôs a LONG way from Manhattan and the city. By public transport the fastest time is 1 hour 30 minutes (which includes walking and trains). By Uber it‚Äôs about 50 minutes. It‚Äôs really not very convenient for visiting New York - so just something to bear in mind. We booked the property for 3 nights, but actually ended up booking a hotel in the city for the middle night simply to save on trips in and out of the city.
But all in all you can‚Äôt fault the property and would recommend if you don‚Äôt mind being a long way from Manhattan.', 'Great value. I would highly recommend this space if you‚Äôre staying in Queens or if you have a layover at JFK!', 'A perfect place to stay for our quick trip to New York! Bathroom was so clean, well-equipped kitchen and the bed was so comfy! Safe and good location to LIRR into the city. Thank you :)', 'Great place to stay. Very clean and cozy!', 'loved it! thanks so much!', 'Very cozy and clean ü•∞', 'everything was amazing, thank you very much!!', 'The hosts are very nice to deal with, and their apartment appears to be a fresh remodel. Very clean, lots of amenities (full kitchen, silverware and cooking utensils, full sized fridge, stove and microwave, iron and ironing board, hair drier, etc.). An ice tray with a few more essentials would be nice but overall fantastic stay!', 'Good small place but TV is a bit slow and outdated and kitchen is small. Our layover for our international flight from South africa was slightly delayed - I informed Madelyn about it and she was very accommodating.
Everything was as described in the listing.
We would definitely stay here again.", 'The place was awesome love it will come back if am in ny very peaceful no noise and it so convenient awesome place thanks guys', 'Nice place near USB Arena perfect for all events and easy access to the LIRR (train station)', 'Well taken care of, and a very reasonable price.', 'Good space and comfortable.', "Thank you for a wonderful comfortable peaceful stay. we found parking by the home so easy we didn't take any local transport as we had a hIre car but Madelyn provided some good instructions if we wished to take the Metro or LIRR.

the home was peaceful area and comfortable bed.
I would stay again if in NYC easy access to JFK in just 15 mins by car .", 'Great place very clean in a beautiful quiet neighborhood. Thank you so much - - Highly recommend!', 'Was very wonderful would recommend this place to anyone else would love to rent again!', 'Always thinking about this home when I need a BNB! I love it', 'Madelyn was a really nice host. She communicated with me about everything I needed to know and took my luggage in for a few hours so I can enjoy the city a little bit more. Would definitely book the place again', 'Looks just like the pictures. Quiet neighborhood. Comfortable space. You‚Äôll love it here!', 'First time traveling to NY and was very nervous on what to expect. Very quiet, safe, clean neighborhood that feels peaceful and comfortable. Only a bus and train ride to the big cities which is located conveniently close.

For my personal first airbnb experience? 10 out of 10 stars.
Thank you so much! =)', 'We stayed at Madelyn‚Äôs place for 1 night as we had an early flight to at JFK (20 minutes to the airport). title: Stylish apartment minutes from NYC
Private Room in Authentic Luxury Loft
all_reviews:
['Awesome place, very clean, 2 blocks from an L train stop, highly recommend!', 'Super stylish and comfy in a great location in Williamsburg a couple of blocks from the subway. Couldn‚Äôt haven‚Äôt asked for anything more. One of my best Airbnb stays.', "Great stay at Thomas's. He is very available for advice and recommendations. Flexible check-in and check-out when possible. The apartment is perfectly located right next to the subway 3 stops from Manhattan. Recommended.", 'A stylish pad, in a great area, with a cool cocoon-like loft bed.', 'Absolutely recommendable, I felt totally comfortable during my stay and everything was just perfect. Thomas is a fantastic host, very friendly and helpful. The loft is very nice and more than lovingly decorated, everything is very clean. There is a roof terrace with an incredible view. The area is great and the subway connection to Manhattan is easy and fast.', 'Great stylish space - perfect place to crash in Brooklyn', "Thomas's place is excellent, one of the best Airbnbs in NYC, and he is a great host. I'd highly recommend staying here for anyone visiting the city.", 'Upon entering Thomas‚Äô place I immediately fell in love with the beautiful, eclectic interior design. Each room was styled with attention to detail featuring well-maintained plants.
The place was easy to get to via an elevator and there were local train stations within walking distance to get to all boroughs of NYC.
Facilities included gym, laundromat, courtyard and a rooftop which provided stunning views of the Manhattan skyline.
Thomas was attentive to my needs and responsive. He only stayed 3 nights but was available to be contacted when he was away.
The main thing to be concerned about (depending on physical ability) is that the bed is in a loft about 3 metres (10 feet) high, and climbable using collapsible steps. This was not a deterrent for me but is the main thing to consider if you were less able-bodied.
I grew such an emotional attachment to the place that it was hard to leave! I highly recommend this place and would definitely return in future travels. Brilliant, Thomas!', "I had really great time in Thomas's apartment. Nice interior, very clean and most of all, nice neighborhood. Very recommended with a resonable price. Thomas was really kind, thank you for sweet greetings and nice conversations:)", 'The space is incredible, location is perfect, and Thomas is amazing. Couldn‚Äôt have been better!', 'Great host, Great area , great hospitality . Highly reccomended.', 'Thomas was a very accommodating and great host. He went above and beyond to make sure I had a great trip in Brooklyn. His place was beautiful and original!', 'Thomas‚Äôs home is fricking beautiful! Every piece of furniture and decor is so intentionally placed to make you feel comfortable and relaxed. His place is in such a good neighborhood, super close to the L train, super close to nice restaurants, and it feels very safe as well. Thomas is a very nice man and he made me feel so welcomed in New York!', 'It was reasonably far from Manhattan, so I was able to rest comfortably when I came back to the accommodation during my trip. The neighborhood is cleaner than Manhattan. It was close to the station, so it was easy to get around.
The bedroom is on the second floor, and the ladder was a little scary for me, but it was cozy.
I liked that the temperature and lighting were free to adjust in a private space and to be able to use the iMac.', 'Great spot! The office/lofted bed was plenty of space and the apartment is beautiful. Good location near L train. Great host very easy to get along with.', 'Thomas accommodated us when we have an emergency need for Airbnb. We requested very late in the night and Thomas responded so quickly the next morning for us to check in the next day. Super grateful to him. His place is so clean, neat, tidy, especially so calm and have a lot of character. Thank you so much for your hospitality Thomas!', "Thomas's apartment was well located, beautiful arranged, and I felt very comfortable living there.
Thomas was friendly and welcoming, I'd definitely stay here again!", 'Great host with a great apartment in a great area. Lots of Delis (Supermarkets), caf√©s, bars and restaurants in the area. L train to Manhattan was really close as well. I really enjoyed staying with Thomas whom I‚Äôve had great conversations with and will definitely consider staying here again for my next vacation in NYC :)', 'Thomas‚Äôs flat is a beautiful place to stay in brooklyn. The host is a very nice person.', 'My partner and I loved Thomas‚Äôs home. One of the most stylish Airbnb‚Äôs I‚Äôve stayed at. Beautiful natural lighting, a well maintained kitchen, and a great, hospitable host.', 'I had a really enjoyable stay at Thomas‚Äô place. Thomas was a lovely and accomodating host and we had wonderful, enlightening and interesting conversations. Of course, the place itself is stylish and clean and about a 4 minute walk to Graham avenue subway stop on the L line - so great location.
Definitely recommend.', "All is good and can't fault it.", "Thomas' apartment is one of the most beautiful homes that I have stayed in! Impeccably designed and just a joy to stay in. The apartment is in a great location that is very walkable to everything Williamsburg and an easy L train ride away from Manhattan. Also the Variety coffee shop a block away sells great $3 americanos! Unheard of in NYC. I would highly recommend and thoroughly enjoyed my stay there.", 'Thomas is a welcoming host with a beautiful apartment. The apartment leaves nothing to be desired, it is quiet, there is a pleasant atmosphere and the apartment is well connected to the L line. Thank you very much Thomas, I would come again and again.', 'We really enjoyed staying at this beautiful loft! The location is really amazing - so close to the train and with great places to eat around the neighborhood. It was our little hub after exploring Manhattan :)
If you want to stay in Brooklyn this is definitely it!
The space is really unique, with the bed up in the loft and so many fun decorations everywhere. It was really great to chat with Thomas as well; we had some deep conversations which were great.
The terrace is spectacular and I wish we had more time to hang out there.
Overall a great stay in a unique space. Thank you!', 'Decent price for what appears to be a nice apartment. But you get what you pay for.
The room itself affords very little personal space. The room is cluttered with books, knick knacks, and seemingly random objects occupying every surface and shelf, meaning there‚Äôs very limited space for one‚Äôs own personal effects.
The bed is marked in the listing as a queen, but I am only 6‚Äô and I had to sleep diagonally to fit without having to bend my legs. There‚Äôs also a metal pole that that protrudes just under the fabric right where your head should rest, which makes for an uncomfortable sleeping situation.
The desk setup is odd. Most of the space on the desk is occupied by the host‚Äôs own computer, and the expectation is that guests use that to work, using the guest login. I don‚Äôt know many people for whom this would be a feasible system, much less preferred - after a year+ of pandemic, anyone working remotely has their own laptop. This made for a cramped desk. The wifi router beneath the desk makes an extremely high pitched whirring sound, which requires one to wear headphones while working. Not a great working setup.
The lack of personal space continues when you exit the room, as the host‚Äôs own work desk is right outside. He is there working and taking calls during the day, and the walls are very thin, leaving little sense of privacy.
The common space is a cramped obstacle course. I tripped and cut my shin on the elevated dining console while getting water in the night. The fridge is 90% full with the hosts own stuff.
The host is very early to bed and early to rise (grinding coffee at 6am and in bed with lights out at 10pm). I came home late my second night staying here, and despite taking great care to make as little noise as possible (removing my shoes outside, going silently to the room then the bathroom, then immediately to bed), he confronted me the the next day claiming I woke him up, and was passive aggressive about my comings and goings the rest of my stay. I offered to buy him earplugs, but he declined.
I changed my plans to end my stay early partly because I was uncomfortable with the communication style and incompatible schedules. When I attempted to update my reservation, free up the nights I was no longer staying and allow him to get another guest in, he messaged me in the app that I had ‚Äúput him on the spot‚Äù and had created an uncomfortable situation for him.
I found living up to the expectations of the host not to be worth the low cost of the room. I regret not getting my own place. I would recommend this AirBnB only to someone traveling on business whose intended hours match the early to bed, early to rise sleep schedule of the host. On the plus side, it is very cheap, and the neighborhood is lovely.', 'Thomas was an amazing host. His place was designer eye candy from top to bottom! The location was ideal to explore Brooklyn and there were amazing restaurants at every turn. After my busy days Thomas‚Äôs place was a peaceful retreat, with a comfy bed! I got lucky to stay there!', "I had a great time staying at Thomas' beautifully designed loft. When I arrived Thomas greeted me with a warm welcome and led me through the apartment - it's just as advertised. Great location, Williamsburg, a hipster area with a quick connection to Manhattan. A supermarket is just around the corner, and the kitchen is well-equipped, in case you like cooking; otherwise, plentiful restaurants in the area. Note: you need to climb the ladder to get to the bed.", 'The place is beautiful and stylishly decorated, in a safe neighborhood. However, the bed is a steep staircase, which is a bit impractical, especially at night. You have to be quite fit, tall and careful.
This was the infrastructure and I think you can hardly imagine it from the pictures and description until you really see it. So far so fair.
Since it is a loft, I often felt like host Tom was disturbed by my presence. Once he complained about cooking even though I had only used a little olive oil.
On the one hand, he wants you to keep "quiet" and be quiet from 10 pm to 8 am, on the other hand, it is not really desirable if you cook at home and when he came home after 10 pm, he slammed the door loudly and was also not exactly considerate.
The communication was rather uncomfortable, and it gave the impression that he doesn't like guests. I was ultimately happy to be able to leave', 'Great location - great host!!', 'I had a really great stay. Awesome place, awesome location.', 'Thomas was one the best hosts I‚Äôve ever had! Kind, welcoming, available, warm, and a beautiful space to boot.', "Thomas's place is amazing! It's exactly what you see in the images and tbh even better. The location is great. Theres plenty of shops within walking distance and the trains to get around are also within walking distance. Thomas is a great host and he's super nice. I couldnt have asked for a better airbnb eperience in NY.", 'Style and design space. Smell delicate essence and it is super clean. Light and green beautiful plants everywhere which gives calm, nature, relax... Thomas is a fantastic person, so kindle, smart and cool. I will back again soon ! Thankssssssss SUPER RECOMMEND !', 'Thomas is a thoughtful, responsive host and his place is wonderful ! thanks!', 'The place is beautiful and stylish. Thomas is a great host, easy to communicate with and really polite. The loft is the real Brooklyn experience that you see in movies. The bed located upstairs that can be accessed with the ladder is really comfy. The office which was available for myself was just perfect size and really private. The views from the rooftop of the building are really amazing and for me worked as an extension of the flat since I would grab dinner upstairs and watch the sun going down behind the manhattan skyline. The location is also great, super close from granham station which gives you access to the city quickly as well as few steps away from downtown williansburg, which offers amazing restaurants and sight view to manhattan.
Overall I have a great time and would definitely recommend it. Thanks Thomas :)', "A unique experience, Thomas' house is a timeless gem in the quiet and trendy Williamsburg neighborhood. Furnished in detail and equipped with all comforts. Inside you can breathe an air of extreme tranquility and peace and Thomas is always attentive to help you meet your needs. The condominium is modern and well-attended. Don't miss this experience !!! Super recommended!", 'Thomas is a kind, exceptional host. His place is in a great location, has all the right touches for a young traveler looking to explore Brooklyn and get some peace in between trips out in the big city.', "The apartment is located in a very pleasant area with the subway nearby. Thomas' loft is very nice, very well decorated and very calm. Thomas is a very friendly and accommodating host who can give you goods plans and advices about some of the most pleasant places in the city. For all of these reasons I highly recommend this host and this place.", 'I can absolutely recommend staying at Thomas‚Äôs place ‚Äì the beautiful loft apartment is located close to subway stations, which makes it so easy for you to get to Manhattan and all the places. I felt very comfortable and safe during my stay! The apartment really has everything you need and you look for ‚Äì rooftop, gym, etc. Last but not least, Thomas was a great and reliable host! Would definitely stay here again! Thank you, Thomas!', 'My stay at Thomas‚Äôs apartment couldn‚Äôt be any better. The apartment is beautiful, well located, super clean and has all the necessary amenities. Thomas is a perfect host, gave the best tips to make my stay in NYC the best as possible, is easy to communicate with. I‚Äôm definitely refering his apartment to friends and family and anyone who wants to feel a bit about how is it to live in NYC/Brooklin.', "Thomas was a kind and wonderful host. He was always easy to reach and had great suggestions for places to go. There's lots of great food, coffee spots, and shopping options right outside the apartment. His home is very unique and perfectly styled. It was nice coming back to his space after a full day out in the city.
The location is perfect as it was right by the L to take you into Manhattan. Just note that the L is under construction with limited service (closed on weekends and shuts down at night), but the location was still great to explore other areas outside Manhattan.
I'd definitely recommend staying with Thomas.", 'Thomas was very accommodating and helpful with my stay if I needed anything and was communicative as well. Bed was comfortable as well, which is always a plus.', 'Thomas‚Äô place is really lovely, really interesting decor which makes for a unique stay. The location is great and the perfect base for exploring the city. He was a very friendly and helpful host.', 'A cool, unique place in a great location with easy access to the subway. The host Thomas ensured it was a great stay.', 'Thomas was a fantastic host. Friendly and knowledgeable.
His apartment is just a lovely space, with a great bathroom and excellent water pressure on the shower. The room is up a ladder, which for some may take some getting used to - for me, it was no problem whatsoever. The bed and bedding was excellent and I had a sound nights sleep every night.
I cannot rate Thomas and his apartment any higher. Definitely THE place to stay as the location is perfect for either exploring Brooklyn - or for heading into Manhattan. You are a couple of blocks from the L line subway, that takes to straight to Union Square where you can pick up other lines to go either uptown of downtown. Regardless, a short journey.
Thank you for being such a great host Thomas!', 'Thomas was an excellent host. Very kind, friendly, and hospitable. Would stay here again.', 'Thomas was an excellent host and communicated quickly when I messaged. The space is very comfortable and fun, nice and quiet, and located near plenty of great eateries, cafes, and metro stations to get you anywhere you need to be. Had a great trip and I would definitely stay there again. Thanks!', 'Nice space.', 'Nicely decorated apartement and great location (subway stations are nearby)', "Thomas' apartment is just incredible - the architecture, the interior design and the location. I am amazed how Thomas optimized the space in a practical and beautiful way. The building also has an amazing rooftop with views of the city skyline.
I felt really at home during my stay and appreciated the private room and the workplace. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, but being in Williamsburg there are also tons of amazing restaurants around. Also, it's only a short walk to the L-train that takes you right to Manhattan.", 'Private room with large bed! Good access to the metro, cafes, shops! Thomas is a very friendly and welcoming host! Glad you booked the room with him! Thank you so much!', 'Everything was on point and nice location!', 'Thomas was a great host. Interesting to chat with, and with a lot of recommendations on what-to-visit in NY to give us. The apartment was clean, located in a great neighborhood, very well furnished and decorated with perfect taste. I definitely recommend it!', "I couldn't have asked for a better set up for a my business trip. And on top of everything, I left with a few design ideas!", 'Such a wonderful, warm comfortable friendly atmosphere! I felt right at home, safe and Thomas was absolutely lovely. Thank you so much. I would absolutely stay here and recommend to anyone looking for a serene, respectful beautiful comfortable environment in one of the loveliest neighborhoods.', 'My stay was as advertised .
Mutual respect for cohabitation.
Proximity to the metro, very easy to get around and get around!
Quiet neighborhood, superb accommodation, very nice view of the Skyline from the roof top!!!
Everything was perfect for me!
Thank you, Thomas .', 'Wonderful stay, wonderful host!', 'Beautiful location and home', 'Thomas‚Äô apartment is absolutely beautiful and perfectly located, really easy to get into Manhattan and great for a wander around Brooklyn. The bedroom is a masterclass in efficient use of space, with the bed on a platform over your head and a ladder leading up to it.
The perfect place to stay for guests who keep the same hours as Thomas who is early to bed and an early riser (and of course are also able to get up and down the ladder without difficulty).', 'Safe and good location to major tourist site. Location is also safe to walk back at night too, good note for solo female traveller. Thomas‚Äô place has many facilities. I love the decoration of the place and the fact that there‚Äôs a work station for u. Oh do note it‚Äôs a loft so u would have to climb up and down! I was quite pleasant for this arrangement as it would be I would lie lesser on the bed üòÖ Would recommend and come back if there is :)', 'Thomas is a very enjoyable and super friendly guy. I have absolutely nothing to complain about. Everything was as described. The apartment is super nice and meticulously clean The area is safe and quiet. Highly recommended.', "Thomas's place is beautiful, comfortable, peaceful and spotless. I felt totally at home there. I couldn't have asked for a better place to go back to after a busy day in NY.", "Honestly the coolest place I've ever stayed in. Felt like an actual home rather than just a rental unit. Such a cool, vibey and spacious space very close to the Subway. Thomas was so friendly and communicative as well. Can't recommend this place enough - if you're staying in NYC I wouldn't bother looking elsewhere!", "Three words. What. A. Joy!! Staying at Thomas' place was like staying with a friend you've known forever. He has such an amazing spirit and was so much fun to chat with in the moments we ran into each other. His home is STUNNING and kept very clean. You'll feel right at home the moment you walk in. He gave me wonderful recommendations for where to eat, parks to visit nearby, etc. and all of his suggestions were A1. I literally tried all of them and they were great! The room is so comfortable and it's really nice to have an at home office space to work from. Everything you could need in the apartment is available. I used the kitchen area several times while there and even used the gym downstairs- which was great! The neighborhood is a very safe, walkable and friendly one with tons of restaurants and steps away from the train. Thank you Thomas for your warmth, hospitality and kindness. I would absolutely return in a heartbeat!", 'This is a great place to stay in Brooklyn. Thomas is an excellent host and his apartment is very nice. Close to subway too for east access to Manhattan. Thanks for your hospitality Thomas', "Fantastic location. Unique and spacious loft. Climbing to the bedroom loft area felt a tad treacherous at times so be careful (only because I had a minor wrist injury and you'll need both hands to climb.)", 'We had a lovely time staying at Thomas‚Äôs beautiful apartment. I love the neighbourhood. Close to walk to anything you need including the metro station.
The apartment itself is so homely and cozy. We loved the vibe and style. It had everything we needed. Also, thomas is super nice and very helpful. We really felt at home right away.
Oh and Nothing beats the awesome rooftop view !
Thank you for the great stay ‚òÄÔ∏è', "I had such a great time staying at Thomas's Airbnb in Brooklyn! The apartment was super clean and had everything I needed and more. As an interior designer, Thomas really knocked it out of the park with the decor - it was beautiful and so well done.
I especially appreciated the private room, which gave me the personal space I needed. But Thomas was also an excellent host: warm, always up for a chat and very accommodating.
The location was perfect too - there's a great array of nice food places around and it's also an easy subway ride into Manhattan. I would definitely recommend Thomas's place to anyone looking for a comfortable and convenient stay in Brooklyn. Thanks again Thomas for a great experience!", 'Absolutely loved my stay at Thomas‚Äôs place. What a beautiful and relaxing home- like an oasis in middle of Brooklyn. It was a great location. Walkable to many interesting areas and easy access to the subway. The elevator made getting our suitcases in very easy.
Would definitely recommend Thomas‚Äôs place!', 'slay the house boots down nyc!', 'I had a nice time staying at Thomas‚Äôs cozy place. It was close to the L which made getting around easy. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby, and the neighborhood was quiet.', 'Perfect stay in this Brooklyn/Willliamsburg gem! Thomas is a wonderful host, very kind and always fast in the response. The appartment is very comfortable, cozy but modern, wonderful furniture. Very special with the architecture and design, the roof top and Brooklyn and Manhattan Skyline views. Note you need to climb the ladder to get to your bed.
The neighbourhood is just great, try out the many coffee places or shops on Berry Street, or the view in Domino Park - all in walking distance. Manhattan Midtown is a 15 mins subway ride. Perfect location, really, if you like a just a little bit quieter in (almost) the center of NYC.']

title: Best Quiet Apartment / Union Square
all_reviews: ["very small apartment, more like a dorm than a single apartment. shower was hit and miss, pressure and hot water were almost non existent. I think this listing is more pointed towards early 20s travellers, than mid 40s. this is more comfort related than listing related.\noverall this place is value for money, but wasn't for us.", "This was the perfect place to stay for two nights with my friend. The location is ideal and makes it very easy to get around New York. If you're worried about the toilet being outside of the room itself, it gave us no trouble at all. It's right outside the door and there are several, and they're lockable. Had no issues! Plus, the shower is inside the room. Pon was a great, responsive host and really helpful with instructions and where to store luggage. A really wonderful spot for a short stay, or if you're not planning on being in the place for long and prefer to be outside exploring. Did everything we needed it to do, thanks so much!", 'Perfect NYC stay! Thank you, Pon!', "we had a very pleasant stay at this apartment. would absolutely recommend but only the bed is a bit squeaky unfortunately. you can't turn around without waking up your partner. all by all the awesome place in an even awesomer location", 'The excellent location, the best of the place without a doubt. Very close to everything that allows you to see the city without spending all day on the metro.', 'Everything was excellent! The location couldn‚Äôt been better. I was worried about the bathroom but it was pretty clean. I would definitely recommend this flat']

title: City Escape Stay at NYC l No Cleaning fee
all_reviews:
['I recently stayed at Kimpton Theta New York City and had a great experience. The standout feature of this hotel is its fantastic location ‚Äì right in the heart of the city, making it incredibly convenient to explore all the major attractions. The staff was welcoming, and the overall ambiance was comfortable. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a central place to stay in New York City!', 'Definitely booking again, perfect location, walking distance to all shopping stores.', 'Excellent location. Staff very friendly. Complimentary coffee was not complimentary.', 'Comfortable room. Very nice hotel. Great location close to theatres, restaurants, subway, Central Park, Times Square. We really enjoyed our stay and will book again.', 'Very nice place', "I'D GO BACK AGAIN IF I WENT TO NY AGAIAN.
POSITION IS IN THE MIDDLE OF EVERYTHING: ALL MAIN ATTRACTIONS ARE IN A WALKING DISTANCE
HOTEL WAS VERY CLEAN AND BRIGHT BUT AIR CONDITIONING IN COMMON AREAS WAS TREMENDOUSLY HIGH, IT WAS FREEZING.
I FOUND STAFF KIND AND HELPFUL, EXCEPT ONE OF A DOOR MEN, LIKE A BIT RUDE AND ANNOYED IF WE ASKED QUESTIONS. ANYWAY I LOVED EVERYONE FROM THE STAFF.
I CONSIDER THE PRICE TOO MUCH HIGH FOR ONLY BED, WITHOUT BREAKFAST.
ANYWAY, I WOULD SUGGEST THIS HOTEL IF YOU WANNA VISIT New York EASILY!"]

title: Modern Style Meets Old World
all_reviews:
['Nice place, clean, hospitable, conveniently located next to the train and a grocery store.', 'Expect top-notch hospitality, a sparkling clean space and a peaceful place to relax!
Ps- The host‚Äôs went above and beyond, the bed was super comfortable, a true five star Air-Bnb. I hope to go back soon!', 'We would come back to Joaquin‚Äôs place in a heartbeat. Joaquin went above and beyond to make us welcome and comfortable, giving great recommendations and even fixing tea when my husband wasn‚Äôt feeling good.
The house was immaculate and stylishly decorated.', "Joaquin was such a wonderful, kind, responsive, and hospitable host! I felt right at home immediately and he was so thoughtful to help with things like my luggage and dishes and local recommendations. It felt like a cozy B&B. There is also a sweet as pie dog named Molly who lives there too!
Though I was too busy during my trip to really get to spend too much time in the space, Joaquin's home is just beautiful with such thoughtful aesthetic details and a focus on sustainability, which I really appreciated. The neighborhood is very easily accessible via subway and in a quiet residential area. I would definitely recommend him as a host to all!", 'welcoming host and digs', 'Joaquin and John have a one-of-kind space and are incredibly warm and welcoming hosts. My wife and I spent four nights and wish we could‚Äôve stayed longer. Sunset Park is easier to get to and from that you might think and is worth exploring while you are there. This is the best Air B&B in Brooklyn!', 'I had a wonderful stay with Joaquin! The house as well as the room is immaculate and tastefully decorated! The location is super easy to access via the subway. Joaquin is very welcoming, he waited for me outside his house as I arrived late in the evening and made coffee for me in the morning! I highly recommend stay with Joaquin!', 'Joanquin and John are warm and engaging hosts with lots of local knowledge. Their home is filled with beautiful items, especially art. The room is spacious and comfortable. Great coffee in the morning.', "Our days at Joaquin and John's place were great. They offered a beautiful place to stay, great hosting, and cozy surroundings! The place was very clean and the area felt safe. Joaquin was extremely caring and helpful. He was very keen for us to have the best stay possible and took the time to help with all our questions and more. Joaquin really brightened our stay in New York! We could not have wished for a better accommodation and can warmly recommend others to book this place.", 'My partner and I had a memorable week at Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs place. The house is a work of art while being comfy and having a friendly ambiance. Molly the dog is an added bonus . The little garden at the back is a small oasis.
We found the location very useful for access to public transport and local eateries in the largely Hispanic local area.
Joaquin is a warm, kind and engaging primary host and we felt we had found new friends by the time we left .
Thank you both for a wonderful bnb experience.
Highly recommended.', 'I came from Greece and stayed with Joaquin and Jon for one month. Of all the sites I‚Äôve seen posted on Airbnb and the one apartment I actually stayed prior to living with Joaquin and Jon, their place is without question the best. Really it has been like staying in a five-star hotel. I should know because as a stylist for many well-known people, I have stayed at some of the most elegant hotels in the world.

Everything is well appointed from design, to furnishings to amenities ‚Äì such that indeed makes you feel right at home. Though the pictures on Joaquin‚Äôs place on Airbnb are nice, these pictures don‚Äôt adequately capture the beauty of this place. This is a truly unique home, with an individual, creative and well-defined, sophisticated sense of aesthetics and design.

Joaquin and Jon live on a two-floor duplex. The kitchen/dining room area is beautifully and expertly laid out ‚Äì perfect for chefs and people who enjoy entertaining. It would be ideal to host a cooking TV show in their kitchen ‚Äì a new business idea for JoaquinJ

The Airbnb quarters are on the second floor where I enjoyed having a generously sized bedroom and modern private bathroom. The bedroom is blessed with three large bay windows that let in a lot of sunlight. The mattress is very firm and comfortable for a restful night of sleep. From the sheets, to the towels to the furnishings, the entire place, including my room and bathroom, are immaculate. I was continually amazed by just how beautifully and expertly designed every corner of the house is no matter where I looked.

Joaquin and Jon are very special, kind people who were respectful and solicitous of my needs and concerns. They addressed every issue I raised. Joaquin is an amazing cook, with an amazing sense of aesthetics. He is highly creative with a strong sense of style while at the same time is extremely professional. As an attorney he gave me a lot of advice in relocating here from Greece. Over a short period of time, Joaquin and I became friends ‚Äì cooking together, shopping and learning about culture and art. We made a habit of talking over coffee every morning. It was a lot of fun sharing Greek cuisine with Joaquin and Jon. In turn, I learned a lot about American sports from Jon, who also was very helpful. I also appreciated how they both respected my privacy.

I want to thank Joaquin and Jon for opening up their home and their hearts to me, welcoming me into this country and NYC. I look to continuing my friendship with them. Without reservation, this is the place to stay!!', "Joaquin and Jon have a beautiful home, and two very sweet dogs. As others have commented, I came into the city early one morning and Joaquin had coffee and breakfast waiting for me when I arrived, which was a welcome treat. Joaquin clearly works very hard to keep his home and garden an inviting space, to great effect.

There is a subway stop just 2 blocks away, which makes it simple to get just about anywhere in the city. I stayed with them while in the city on business, and it took me about 40-45 minutes to get from their home to the Flatiron District for work each day. Their neighborhood is a bit south of the more recently gentrified Brooklyn neighborhoods such as Park Slope, Williamsburg, etc., but the subway gives reasonably quick access to just about anywhere. This is important since dining options and sights/attractions are not as good in the immediately surrounding neighborhood as they are further north in Brooklyn or on Manhattan. But for the traveler that doesn't mind frequent journeys on the subway, Joaquin's is a lovely place to stay.", 'Joaquin‚Äôs place is a wonderful example of a true Airbnb. Everything as described, a lovely room with plenty of natural light, a good temperature, plenty of good bedding.
The Private bathroom is very welcome, it‚Äôs compact, immaculately clean and well appointed with modern fixtures and fittings.
Joaquin was fast to respond to communications, and provide some good local recommendations.
Thanks for a great stay!', "It was a wonderful stay. Joaqiun was the perfect host. The accommodation was sparkling clean and everything was well maintained. That's all we can. We would keep coming and can 100% recommend the place.", "Best Airbnb experience I have ever had in my life! Artworks are so beautifully curated that it almost felt like staying in a cute private gallery. The sheets and towels were clean and we had a private bathroom (also super clean) for our own. The hosts were super responsive and considerate as well!!! Thank you so much for hosting‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
We were also in love with Maggie ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è who doesn't want to stay in a nice airbnb house with an adorable dog???", 'This place is truly amazing! A spotlessly clean, beautifully decorated, spacious double room in a convenient location. The hosts were so friendly and kind, always making sure I was happy and enjoying my time in NY.
Thank you for welcoming me into your beautiful home and making my holiday so special.
A large double room in a beautiful house full of artwork. The location was great for sightseeing, and it was a quiet neighborhood where I felt very safe even if I went home late at night after watching Broadway shows. The hosts are also really kind. Highly recommended!', "Imagine that you enter one of the most beautiful homes you have ever seen, that you get a tasteful, spacious, well organized bright room with its own toilet/shower and access to the balcony and courtyard and also a fantastic relaxed and pleasant host, you have this accommodation. It's consistently fresh, generous, and thoughtful touches throughout. It never felt strange to move around the common areas like the kitchen, for example. Joaquin is very professional, warm and clear. If you hesitated to rent rooms in a home, this is the place to start! Great location a stone's throw from gorgeous Sunset Park with New York's finest views and coziest hangout.", 'This was my best experience!
The beautiful brownstone house is very comfortable, very well renovated, decorated with love, super clean and has a nice garden to rest or for having your meal. My room was very big, there is all inside you need and very nice furnished. The bed is very comfortable and the view from the windows is great. The neighbourhood is quite, so you can sleep very well. I had my own bathroom, perfect. Joaquin and Jon are super hosts. I was travelling alone and felt very welcome and safe. In the morning Joaquin made deliocious coffee or tea, when I had a cold. He is very helpful and warm-heated. Maggie, the old dog, is so cute and thankfull for caress. It felt like staying by friends. The subwaystation is close by, you can use the R or N Line to go to Manhattan. In the neighbourhood are many restaurants, a pharmacy, delis and supermarkets. The Sunset Park is at the end of the street and has a perfect view to the skyline of Manhattan. I highly recommend to stay here. I will come back as soon as possible. Thanks for your hospitality!!', 'Joaquin‚Äôs house is completely beautiful. It‚Äôs a real retreat from the busy city. The bedroom is big and comfortable with everything you need, and the bathroom is clean and perfect. Joaquin was so helpful and kind, always making sure I had what I need. If you are looking for somewhere close to the city for a short visit, I would choose somewhere more central, but this place is very quiet and was great for my 5 days trip. The subway is very close with good transport links, it takes 30-40 mins to get into the centre of Manhattan. I highly recommend this gorgeous house.', 'I had a wonderful time in Brooklyn. The house is beautiful and also beautifully decorated. I spent a whole week as a solo traveler there and it felt like a home away from home right away. My room was very spacious and I had a TV for myself as well as a bathroom. The bed is just perfect and the neighbourhood very quiet, so that I got a good quality sleep. The neighbourhood as well as the connection to Manhattan is really just great. The next supermarket was conveniently located just around the corner as well as many Mexican restaurants. I would highly recommend this place for a trip to this fantastic city.', 'From the booking experience to greeting us at the stoop when our Taxi arrived, to arranging a car service, hauling our luggage downstairs and hugging us goodbye, Joaquin was a consummate Host. Mornings were delicious cups of coffee, intelligent conversation, local info & expertise and puppy hugs from an adorable Labradoodle, Molly. The four-story Brownstone was gorgeous, clean and decorated with a ‚Äúqueer eye‚Äù of exquisite taste. We felt like we were living in a little part of Brooklyn history. The nearby neighborhood and park were fantastic, with access to food, bars and subways. We would stay here in a heartbeat and highly recommend. Thank you, Joaquin, John, and Molly for helping to make this trip a great one for these two homebodies.', 'Highly recommend this hidden gem down in Sunset Park. You can walk 7 blocks and jump on the express trains which will have you in Chelsea in about 20-22 minutes which was awesome for us! We know Brooklyn pretty well but never get to this ‚Äòhood. Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs home was BEAUTIFUL! Very thoughtfully decorated and our bedroom was he perfect size. Also, our bed was comfortable, sheets were extra soft and there was an Apple TV setup so we could enjoy Netflix, Hulu, HBO, etc. The 3rd floor skylights are also so nice and I don‚Äôt think (though I could be wrong) they made it into any of the listing‚Äôs pictures! Such a nice stay. Thanks guys!', "Joaquin's home is special. The pictures on the site don't do justice how thoughtfully curated each and every detail of design in the space has been selected to make it so cool. I was only there for a weekend, and I would have liked to stay longer. A treat! Highly recommend Joaquin + Jon as hosts.", 'This has to be my favorite Airbnb listing, hands down. Joaquin, John and Molly are incredible hosts and it was an absolute pleasure getting to know them. I like to think that the vision for Airbnb is "Home away from home" and with this listing you'd sometimes wish that this was your home.
The hosts were amiable, helpful, accommodating, well-versed(at least the topics I am interested in), and last but not the least, sweet. We had so many pleasant conversations and it was a perfect mix of private time and if you want someone to talk to. There is lots to-do in the neighborhood, and the commute to Manhattan is a piece of cake.
I would recommend them with my eyes closed and even would like to stay with them every time I am in NYC.', 'Joaquin‚Äôs place is super nice. You will have a room on the third floor of his brownstone, with your own bathroom down a short hallway. The room has big windows with a street view and the neighborhood felt very clean and safe. Joaquin was very welcoming, offering coffee, tea, and advice on where to go/how to get around. Would definitely stay again.', 'Convenience and comfort rolled into one!', 'Another great stay at this fantastic place. Joaquin went above and beyond to make sure I was comfortable.', 'You can‚Äôt find anything more charming than this place in New York
The location is so convenient and safe and very close to Sunset Park for a stunning view of Manhattan.
I felt at home from the first moment, slept like a baby in the beautiful bedroom with lovely windows from which I could see the sunrise.
It was in one word PERFECT
Thank you John and Joaquin for your hospitality.', 'A tastefully decorated, meticulously clean home and garden on a quiet street. Joaquin really made my stay feel like I was at the home of a friend with great suggestions on dining and the local area.', 'Amazing air BnB. Friendly, accommodating host with great local food recommendations! The bed was so comfy and the room was huge! Great bathroom and a cute garden to sit in. We found the location perfect for exploring Brooklyn and Manhattan. Would recommend!', 'Absolutely wonderful stay. Beautiful home, impeccably clean and organized, incredibly gracious hosts. Everything feels very warm and welcoming. Will definitely return.', 'Joaqu√≠n and John are great hosts, they are friendly and reliable - and dog Molly is a real cutie. Their home is beautiful, the room is nice and the bed spacious. Everything is very clean. This part of Brooklyn is lively with good takeaway food. I enjoyed my stay greatly and I highly recommend it.', 'Our first time in New York was made extra special thanks to our stay in Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs beautiful Brooklyn home. We were greeted with warm hospitality, adored their sweet dog Molly, and had some lovely conversations over cups of coffee in the morning. Their home is relaxing and incredibly styled ‚Äî it was full of stunning art in every corner, very clean, and the bed was also especially comfortable. Everything we needed was a short walk away, such as the stations, local deli, and the lovely Sunset Park with a great view of the city. We also really appreciated the recommendations and guidance that was provided throughout our trip. We would recommend anyone to stay here and would happily stay again next time! Thank you again for hosting us.', "Joaquin's place is really just a wonderful stay. It is extremely clean and well kept. Most importantly, Joaquin is a very friendly and caring person who is always wearing a smile and does the most that he can to make your enjoyable as it can be. The area is also very convenient with many good food options nearby, a supermarket on the same block, and a park just across the street.", 'I had a lovely stay - Joaquin was super friendly and helpful. The house is like an art gallery with so many beautiful and interesting objects and decorations and the room is spacious and comfortable. Having a/c in there was a big bonus. It was great to have a bathroom for my exclusive use and the house is really conveniently located for the subway.', 'joaquin is adorable', 'Joaquin & Jon‚Äôs home is an original Brooklyn Brownstone House full of character both inside & out. Joaquin is a perfect host - friendly & welcoming & so helpful to us as UK tourists. He helped us re navigating the underground trains & provided tips re where to go/what to see in the local area. As we are dog lovers we instantly fell in love with their dog Molly & we enjoyed our chats with both Joaquin & Jon over coffee/tea & the occasional cooked breakfast. Very comfy bed ( we slept like logs) & gr8 facilities.
It‚Äôs easy to take the underground into NYC to do all the tourists things but we also enjoyed eating down the road at Cafe ZONA Sur (fresh, simple, local American food on 4th Avenue) and also experiencing the local vibe & the sunset over NYC skyline at Sunset park (a short walk up the hill from the house)
Joaquin also took us to a local Chinese restaurant called Lucky Eight on 8th Avenue in Brooklyn ‚Äúchina town‚Äù & the food was excellent & inexpensive. We would defo stay again.', 'I stayed here for two months while doing a summer internship. The house is beautiful, comfortable, and in a very convenient location. Joaquin, John, and Maggie made me feel like part of the family. I had a great time!', 'Joaquin and John (and Molly!!) were all amazing. So warm and accomodating, made sure I felt right at home. The space is equally unparalelled--from the art on the walls to the garden to the furniture: something magical in every corner. An unforgettable stay!!', "Perfect. I was looking for tranquility and comfort to face an intense week of study and it was lucky to find Joaquin's wonderful home, just 30 minutes from Central Park using the Express line. The place is nicely decorated, which makes you feel very comfortable. The room and bathroom have all the amenities, the bed is PERFECT for a tall person like me of 1.90 m, I have stayed in 5-star hotels with less amenities than this house. Joaqu√≠n was very attentive and understanding as due to commitments from my MBA I was very late to the house. The day I come back to NYC I hope to find Joaquin's place available again because I would love to repeat. Many thanks for everything Joaqu√≠n!", 'Fascinating house and furnishings with a gracious and attentive host.', "Thanks to Joaquin's welcome, we felt comfortable as soon as we arrived, and received good advice (restaurants, cultural activities, transportation) for our stay in NYC.
Joaquin and Jon are very attentive to the residents of their lovely home, full of charm and personality!
The accommodation, close to subway lines, is recommended for those who plan to stay outside of Manhattan.", 'If you‚Äôre looking for a place in Brooklyn, you‚Äôve found it. Phenomenal house with very accommodating hosts and Molly on guard. Be a pleasure to return.', "Joaquin and John have a really adorable home , which is even nicer than how it looks in the photos . I enjoyed gazing at each corner in detail , they are all pieses of art indeed. Surely my room is included as well . Thanks to Joaquin 's hospitality , I got even a cozy robe and all is needed for shower . With his New Yorker insider 's advice for hanging around , my first time NY trip had a very enjoyable starting . I think I ve seen unexpectedly much more than what I could be organised alone . I had a good time when chatting with Joaquin as well ( John was quite busy at work that period ) , about cooking , home decoration , travel experience , Joie di vivre ... My NY trip is unforgettable , rich in memeries of everywhere and this sweet place in Brooklyn . :)", 'Joaquin and Jon are generous, and gracious hosts. Their place is immaculate and very comfortable. Metro lines are within walking distance and we tried great Mexican food just around the corner. Thanks again for hosting us!', "This review is written about the experience the parents of one of my friends had. They were staying there because their son sustained a serious brain injury and was in the hospital nearby. I set them up with this rental and they had such a great experience.

Joaquin was an amazing host. From the moment they walked in, Joaquin made them feel so at home. He gave them a wonderful tour of the entire house, offered to make then coffee and breakfast every morning (for a small extra cost), and seemed truly interested in getting to know them. He also offered to walk the mom to the hospital to get her comfortable with the area. He helped her figure out the subway (which she was afraid of using because she was from Alabama!) and gave her great recommendations for places to eat.

The listing of this space doesn't even do it justice. The house is so beautiful- Joaquin and John have AMAZING taste in art and decor. Their dogs (Maggie and Bodi!) are also so adorable and lovely. Their stay felt like a true home and is somewhere anyone would be lucky to stay.

At a really scary point in this family's life, Joaquin was a tremendous comfort and ally. He listened to their story and took care of them when they needed it most. Not only a beautiful place to stay, but beautiful people to stay with.", 'This was by far the best Airbnb experience we‚Äôve ever had! Joaquin made us feel like home. The place is incredible. Beautifully decorated with a perfect bedroom and bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and he even thought of providing us with bathrobes, coffee in the morning and absolutely everything we needed and much more. We couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place and host to spend our 4 nights in Brooklyn. The subway station is also right around the corner. The day we left he got up extra early, gifted us with a wedding present since my fiance and I are getting married next week, took beautiful pictures of us and helped with the luggage. The house is spotless clean and gorgeous! Can‚Äôt wait to go back! I highly recommend this place!!! Thank you so much for everything!!!', 'Joaquin and John were extremely nice and friendly!
This was one of my best experiences at Airbnb and I highly recommend for your next trip to NYC.
The house is amazing, very spacious and clean; the room is beautiful with the a very comfortable bed and shower.
Joaquin also showed me many things in NY, and we had great moments visiting museums and restaurants.
Thank you very much for hosting me at your house, it was really a great experience!', 'All the reviews are true: this is a superspot, Joaquin a true superhost. The room, the attention to detail, Joaquin‚Äôs welcoming hospitality and care, it was all excellent.
Tucked away in a lovely corner on Sunset Park - but close to the subway - we thoroughly enjoyed the local feel of Brooklyn. But more than the commodities I think it was Joaquin himself making our stay one to cherish: He is simply the best. We miss him already.', 'I stayed in this Airbnb for 2 weeks while working at a nearby hospital. Jon and Joaquin were wonderful hosts. I felt right at home in their beautiful Airbnb. The space was perfect for my extended stay. Super comfortable bed, beautiful and clean bathroom, and fresh coffee in the mornings. There is so much to do in the area and it is just a short trip from manhattan. It was truly wonderful staying here!', "Joaquin 's home is beautifully decorated, immaculate, and situated in a safe and friendly neighborhood. From the moment we arrived it was clear that Joaquin takes great care of his space, but is magically able to make guests feel right at home. There were so many pieces of art and artifacts, that we were discovering new things all week. This Airbnb is an art lovers paradise. After the first day, we felt like we were staying with old friends. We had great conversations over coffee in the morning, and enjoyed meeting John when he arrived home from travel. Molly ( their dog) was very friendly and sweet and never a bother. Our privacy and space was respected at all times. Although it is always good to come home, it was hard to leave this beautiful space.", 'From the beginning to the end, our stay was a delight. The pictures do not do justice to the house, Joaquin and Jon decorated this havre de paix with an exquisite taste. Also I have to say I never been to a place this perfectly clean with an animal, and Mollie was so cute and well mannered :)
It was my first time in New York and definitely could not dream of a better place to stay. Joaquin was very helpful and accommodating, he took the time to get to know us and we loved every discussion we had all together. It literally feels like we stayed at a relative place. Un grand merci to both of you!', 'Joaquin and Jon were amazing! We felt right at home. They were both super friendly and gave us lots of recommendations of what to do, where to go, and what to eat. We loved staying with them. Plus, the house was so cute! No problems at all :)', "Could all of the other reviews be true? Is Joaquin's place truly as good as they say? The answer: absolutely yes. Impeccably clean, an incredibly comfortable bed, and exquisite decor (especially for the holidays)- you won't want to leave, even with lovely Sunset Park and the subway at your doorstep. I can't wait to come back.", 'Joaquin is a wonderful host with an incredible home! He made my trip truly something to remember. He‚Äôs very helpful and knowledgeable about his neighborhood. The room was cozy and clean and I will absolutely be returning! 10/10.', 'Joaquin was a great host and the house was seriously one of the best designed houses I‚Äôve ever stayed in through Airbnb. Their dogs are also really chill. I didn‚Äôt even mind that it was a private room compared to an entire apartment because it was such a great experience. I highly recommend staying here.', 'To begin the house, the room and the bed are fantastic!! 100% better than the pictures and very ‚Ä¶very comfortable. Joaquin was fantastic I arrived at 7am and he was waiting for me with a fresh cup of coffee and same pastry. Neighborhood was great 2 blocks to the train station. To go any were in NY. Overall my trip was great. I definite recommend this place it make me feel home.', 'Joaquin and Jon are wonderful people! We greatly enjoyed their hospitality . The house is stunning and the location is perfect. You are quickly in the center of Manhattan
We had a very nice time and are grateful to have stayed at the place.
We will definitely come back to and next stay!', 'This experience was amazing. Joaquin was always friendly and was able to accommodate me. He offered tips about places to see and was just a pleasure. The room is nice with natural sunlight. The location is real close to the 45th st station which made traveling to the city easy.', "It was my first time to stay in an Airbnb as I normally take a hotel room when I travel but considering the rates in NYC during December, I considered it as one of my options. Glad that I did.
Joaquin was very responsive and detailed whenever I asked something prior to my arrival. I did not find hard time locating the place, it is just a 5-minute walk from the nearest subway station. Joaquin then briefed me about the parts of the house where I can get access of, the nearby interesting places, etc. It's always a delight talking to him. Then I met their very adorable dog, Molly. I really enjoyed playing with her. She's so sweet. Later, I met Jon, who is equally accommodating and responsive as Joaquin. They all made my stay very pleasant and enjoyable.
The room is squeaky clean and very spacious with a wonderful view of the neighborhood. I had my own toilet which I really think was a big plus. Joaquin also offered daily free coffee in the morning.
It exceeded my expectation.", "What an amazing stay. The home is beautifully decorated, the room spacious with a comfortable bed, and a very modern and clean private bath. The neighborhood is very walkable with the closest train station a short walk away, and the express train station about 10 mins away in the other direction. It's a very safe area and I felt comfortable walking after dark as a lone female.
Joaquin, Jon and Molly were all wonderful hosts. Joaquin gives a great run through of the home upon arrival, Molly was full of kisses, and Jon gives great food recommendations. Joaquin is a very caring and experienced host, and seems to be prepared for anything that might be needed. The umbrella that he insisted I borrow is so much appreciated as it rained like crazy for two days straight.
Joaquin and I had amazing conversations and I love that l now have a new friend in him. I was sad to leave! Thank you to all three of them for a wonderful stay!", "My wife and I have travelled to New York several times before and generally stay for long periods of time. This time we decided to use AIRBNB. We chose Joaquin's and Jon's apartment for the location, price and the clear description of the place.

When we arrived, we received a BIG surprise. Everything turned out even better that it appeared on the web description. The room is really large and beautiful; the bed very pretty and comfortable; with everything described including tv with internet stream and wifi, as well as a private full bathroom. In other words, everything one can need.

The apartment is a brownstone, typical of what you hear about in Brooklyn. It was beautifully restored. It is really gorgeous. Every space is decorated with very good taste, with a lot of artwork to enjoy, from around the world. There is also a nice patio in back with a pretty garden.

In the same block we found a convenient supermarket, a deli with pretty good buffet and a well-sized park (Sunset Park) with an astonishing view of Manhattan. The subway station is only two blocks away and only takes about 20 minutes to Manhattan.

Joaquin is a great host: helpful, warm and interesting; concerned about our well being; but respectful of our space too. He offered us a delicious coffee every morning and, if you ask, as he did for us, he will cook a great breakfast too. I should also mention he offered to do the laundry in their washing machine--very convenient for long stays. Joaquin also provided convenient tips to enjoy the city much more. We also shared several interesting conversations with him, even ocasionally with a glass of wine. And he speaks Spanish fluently.

No doubt we recommend Joaquin's and Jon's place to anyone who is seeking to spend time in New York in a safe, well-located place that is quiet and elegant at the same time.", 'I booked the room for a month for my student sister who was doing medical elective in Brooklyn. Joaquin made sure that she is accommodated and safe from the day one. My sister was able to use the kitchen and other beautiful spaces in the house. Joaquin shared his dinners with her and made coffee every morning before she left for the hospital! Truly home-like experience. We are very grateful!', "A very stylish and impeccably clean space in a prime Brooklyn location. Most importantly, Joaquin and Jon were welcoming, warm and very hospitable. I had everything I needed and really didn't want to leave. Check in and check out was seamless. I will return. Thank you again.", "Joaquin made us feel very good right from the start! He is a wonderful host and very accommodating. The house is a wonderful New York-Brooklyn-style place and we felt right at home. We've experienced some Airbnb's and it's top on our list. We attach great importance to cleanliness, which we could find here without exception.
If you want to experience an authentic New York, here it is. Joaquin's dog Molly is super cute, we miss her already.
Hopefully see you soon and thanks for everything!
Kind regards,
Patrick & Rebecca", 'Rented the room for my mother who was visiting from out of town. Amazing space! Joaquin was an excellent host, quick to respond and sincerely kind. This will be our go to place whenever we have family in town. So happy to have found it. Could not recommend any higher!', 'Joaquin and John were incredibly friendly and accommodating! The place was clean and comfortable and in a lovely area of Brooklyn and very easy to navigate to the train system to explore other areas! Great recommendations!
Highly recommend staying here, would definitely stay again!', 'It‚Äôs my first time travelling to the States and staying at Airbnb, so I was a bit nervous about everything. Joaquin soon put me at ease. He showed me around the house and even the neighbourhood. I felt so welcomed right away when I met him. Jon was nice and friendly too. They have a dog, Molly. She is a sweetheart! I already miss her!
Their home is so beautiful. Full of art ‚Äì couldn‚Äôt help looking at the gallery walls and the Chinese vintage furniture. Love every corner of their home. The room was incredibly comfortable. And I was glad I had my own bathroom. All necessity was provided. Their home was situated near subway stations (D, N, Q, R & W lines), so it‚Äôs easy to go around the city. I felt safe walking alone on streets which I think it‚Äôs important for a female solo traveler.
Joaquin and Jon made nice coffee every morning! Joaquin also would check up on me from time to time to make sure I was ok. I‚Äôm really grateful to them. Their warm hospitality made my stay a pleasure!', "I rented the room for my parents, who were visiting my wife and I, and our new newborn daughter for two weeks. Joaquin was a gracious host and he has a charming home that is well taken care of. The whole house is very tastefully decorated and you can tell Joaquin has put a lot of his loving attention into it. My parents had a private bedroom on the 3rd floor with a nice view of the street and a small private bathroom. The floor is shared with the host's master bedroom, bathroom, and office. Joaquin was extremely patient in showing my parents all the details of how to use everything in his home.

The house is well situated near all the Sunset Park attractions. It is very close to the subway and public buses, and the park itself is only half a block away. You also have easy access to Latin American restaurants on 5th Ave and Chinese and Southeast Asian places on 8th Ave. Any way you go, you're sure to have plentiful choices for affordable and tasty cuisine.

Lastly, Joaquin's two dogs were sweet and gentle. My mom is VERY afraid of dogs, so this was a concern for me. Somehow, by the end of her visit even she was OK with them. That was unprecedented!", 'The house is immaculate, beautiful, and so comforting which is exactly what I needed at this time. Joaquin is so accommodating and let me check in whenever I wanted and was all around a fantastic, warm, and welcoming host. Also the location was perfect! Minutes from the express train to Manhattan and literally a minute walk from one of the most beautiful parks in Brooklyn. Would recommend for anyone to stay here!', 'Great host, great dog, great stay!', 'Joaquin was highly accessible, very helpful and very flexible in terms of reception. Room was very clean - everything tiptop. The house is very quiet and well developed with the subway. We highly recommend the place.', 'Excellent welcome from Joaquin who went above and beyond to make our stay a success and helped us organize our visits. In addition, we really enjoyed our many warm exchanges with Joaquin.
The accommodation and neighborhoods are nice close to the subway to Manhattan and many restaurants. The accommodation is quiet and decorated with taste.
We highly recommend! Thank you Joaquin!', "Great accommodation and great welcome from Joaquin who gave us some great tips and was very considerate. If you're going to NYC, this RBNB IS the place!", 'Joaquin and Jon has a very sweet, cozy, tidy and unique house with Maggie, a very docile doggie. Joaquin is a talented artist and good at interior design and house decoration, he has a lot of good stuff in every corner of the house and shared with me a lot and inspired me on house interior design. He served me coffee in every morning and will offer you extra unexpected services upon your need. Highly recommend!', 'I unconditionally recommend the room, location, and most of all, the hosts‚Äîhuman (Joaquin and Jon) and canine (Maggie and Bodie).', "Simply the biggest Airbnb I've ever stayed at so far. About the house: It is very well served by subway lines and about 30 minutes away by express train from southern Manhattan. The house is big, very well decorated, the bed is comfortable, the bed linens were very clean and the bathroom is big and nice. Near the house there is a very beautiful park from where you can enjoy from a distance south of Manhattan.
Joaquin and John are really special people, very kind and respectful. In addition, Joaquin has a keen taste for art. If you like reading and art, this is your place.
Joaquin is also a great cook, I ordered breakfast and every day he made healthy and tasty recipes.
Joaquin knows New York very well and got me to visit a place that was a dream for me. I am so grateful to have met John and Joaquin and staying at this location. It was a unique way to get to know the city. See you soon Joaquin!", 'I have truly nothing but amazing things to say about my stay with Joaquin and Jon (and Molly!). The home is clean, extremely comfortable and possibly one of the most beautiful homes I‚Äôve ever had the pleasure of staying in. Joaquin even took the time to make me a list of all the spots I should visit around New York, which was a saving grace of an itinerary for me! I would definitely choose to stay here again if I make a trip down to New York in the future‚Äîit was awesome!!', "Joaquin is a wonderful host. He and Jon have a beautifully remodeled brownstone just half a block from Sunset Park. The guest room is large, sunny, and air conditioned, its huge windows overlooking a tree lined street; it features a flat screen TV with NetFlix, plenty of storage space, and, of course, a comfortable double bed. The guest bathroom is modern and immaculate. The house features a shady, restful back garden.
The park, which is famous for its views of NY harbor, itself is being refurbished. There is a subway stop just a block away from Joaquin's as well as several nearby bus routes. The house is half a block from a grocery store and close to coffee shops and small restaurants.
Joaquin is friendly and extremely hospitable. He will do his utmost to make your stay comfortable.", "I've had a wonderful stay in this AirBnB. Joaquin was easy to communicate with and an all round good bloke to talk to. Every morning he made me a nice coffee and had a good chat.
excellent location as it is close to subway and about 40min ride to Manhattan.
excellent decor and beautiful room and facilities aswell. I cannot recommend this place enough!
Molly the dog is adorable and loves a good pat.
Many thanks for the stay!", 'Our favorite place to stay in Brooklyn! Joaquin is great.', "It was an absolute pleasure to stay at Joaquin and John's gorgeous home, which was as great as their photos suggested. They were fun and gracious hosts (thanks for the morning coffee, Joaquin!), and within a short time we felt very comfortable coming and going, chatting, and hanging out with Maggie, their dog. We weren't able to use their beautiful outdoor space due to the weather, but like the house overall, the private bedroom was lovely, spacious and well-decorated. Being in a low-key but lively residential neighbourhood was also a great change of pace after the frenzy of Manhattan, and the views from Sunset Park were wonderful. We'd definitely recommend visiting!", 'We had the most lovely stay and we definitely want to come back with more time. Joaquin not only had great tips for restaurants and places to see in Brooklyn and beyond, but also made us feel right at home. The house is gorgeous and there is so much art to discover. We had a blast.', "Stayed a Joaquin's place for 2 weeks. It worked out great. Close to where I needed to be. A grocery store, pharmacy and restaurants around the corner. Joaquin let me put some things in the frig and freezer and use the microwave and toaster oven since I was there for a bit. Joaquin could not have been nicer. Very personable and kind. When I suddenly became ill my 2nd week there he was very supportive. Jon was lovely too. But didn't see him to much as he was travelling himself. Maggie the dog is sweetheart! Only 2 short blocks to R and N train and buses close by. Will definitely stay again when back in the area. Thanks for everything!!", 'My first experience with airbnb and it was amazing! Jaoquin is an excellent host, easy to coordinate with, and completely helpful. The apartment was very clean and exactly as described in the listing, with great, modern, new construction. Being provided with the mini-bathroom amenities was a nice touch and reminiscent of nicer hotels. The deck in the back is a wonderful quiet space to relax, weather permitting. Really enjoyed all my time in this vibrant Brooklyn neighborhood. The subway is very close and easy access to Manhattan. The entire time was a great experience and I feel very fortunate to have stayed there!', 'This was a fantastic experience !
The house is a beautiful renovated brownstone located a few steps from Sunset Park (and close to Subway line N/R).
The house is super clean, very comfortable and tastefully decorated. All you need is provided here. Joaquin takes care of the place very meticulously. It is very pleasant to stay in a so well-kept house. I really loved the sophisticated design of the place. The house and the garden are peaceful, a perfect place to recharge your battery after an active day. I enjoyed chatting with Joaquin. He provided me good advice on various matters.
Joaquin and John are great hosts, very thoughtful.
I highly recommend to stay here. I hope to come back soon.
Thank you Joaquin and John for your hospitality.', 'We had such a great time at Joaquin and Jon‚Äôs home! They were both super friendly, welcoming and they made us feel at home at their place. Joaquin, who we spent most of our time with, made fresh coffee every morning and was great company. You can count on always having an interesting conversation with him :) the place is beautiful and located on a quiet street just two blocks from the subway, so very easy to get around. This place is perfect if you want to experience New York without being in the middle of the touristy areas. Highly recommend staying here!', 'Beautiful home, lovely hosts, relaxing and wonderful stay. Thank you, Joaquin and Jon--we look forward to coming back again and again!', "Great stay at Joaquin's, John and Molly's place who were very welcoming, warm and always smiling.
Joaquin took some time to advise us on places to visit and/or eat.
Metro station is a 3 min walk away with a direct line to Manhattan.
Nothing to say, everything was perfect.
Morning coffee at the top", 'Definitely, one of the best experiences in Airbnb.
The room is extremely clean and beautiful. There are a lot of fascinating things in the house.
Joaquin is a wonderful host, I enjoyed talking with him, he gave me some advice about the travel plan and future plan.
He helped me a lot , Thank you so much!
If you are looking for a place in New York, it is definitely the best choice.', 'Joaquin‚Äôs home was definitely the best AB&B stay that I have ever experienced when visiting NYC! I hope that I would be fortunate to return on my next visit,
The location was perfect - close to Sunset Park, with fabulous restaurants nearby which were featured on an helpful and detailed list which was provided. The Subway station was just over a block away and the area was safe, even late at night!
His home had an elegant and charming decor. I especially enjoyed eating breakfast on the terrace, overlooking a beautiful garden. My own bedroom was spacious, full of large windows, beautifully decorated. Also it was perfectly organised and clean, as was my private bathroom. Joaquin was even able to assist with my laundry, which was most appreciated.
I was grateful for his kindness and hospitality.', "By far my favorite AirBnb experience! What a fabulous place and what wonderful hospitality. I couldn't recommend their place more! Please stay here!", 'Joaquin was a fantastic, friendly, helpful, and very attentative host - thank you for letting us stay in your beautiful home! The room was exactly as pictured and the flat was ideally situated, just a couple of minutes walk from the nearest subway. The only thing we would change would have been the squeaky (although beautiful) bed. Thank you again Joaquin for being so thoughtful and accommodating. We would definitely recommend :)', "The whole experience with Jon and Joaquin was absolutely amazing, from the moment that our booking was accepted communication was excellent. Joaquin offered tips and advice in advance of our stay which we found extremely helpful. Our room was simply breathtaking, it sits on the third floor of an approx one hundred year old Brownstone with its own private bathroom which was also beautiful, shampoo, conditioner and shower gel were supplied for us to use if we wished. Jon and Joaquin have renovated their home to an extremely high standard with passion and sensitivity to reflect its period charm, it is the perfect balance of old and new. You will be amazed at how beautiful it is, you are also free to enjoy their garden which is equally as beautiful. Their home is filled with light, love and laughter and we feel privileged to have been able to share their home albeit for a short time. I think we made quite good friends with Maggie and Bodhi, two very laid back dogs that it was also a pleasure to get to know. We were given so many helpful tips from where to eat, art galleries to visit the best use of the subway, you can only get this sort of advice from the people who live there. The subway was only two blocks away and felt very safe, you can purchase a 7 day unlimited pass for 30 dollars which is excellent value. There were endless restaurants, deli's and supermarkets nearby, some of the best sandwiches we have ever had. At the top of their street sits Sunset Park with a view that will render you speechless day or night, the park is used by many of the locals from walking their dogs to families using the children's area or vast groups enjoying their early morning exercising. We felt very sad to leave such a wonderful place but most importantly to leave two people who made us feel so welcome and have left us with the most incredible memories we can't thank you enough.", "Joaquin is a very lovely host who is eager to give advice and suggestions and is a really fun character - we're so happy to have met him and stayed in his beautiful artistic home with Jon, who was equally lovely, and their soppy old dog, Maggie. It was a peaceful haven away from the city. Well connected with two subways both within 10 mins walk. Comfy mattress. Cool enough to sleep well due to fan in the room. Powerful and refreshing shower. Gorgeous little garden to have a morning coffee in. Easy to tiptoe around if coming home late due to thick rugs throughout the house. Highly recommend staying in this home. We hope to go back!", "Joaquin and Jon were wonderful hosts. We would not have expected to meet such attentive and interesting people of the heart in our vacation.
From the first moment we felt like we were with friends.
In a dreamy home full of selected art and exciting little stories from around the world.
New York wouldn't have been half as beautiful without them and the cheerful woolly Molly.
We can't wait to see you again here in Brooklyn or maybe Berlin.
Thank you for your unforgettable hospitality!", "Staying at Joaquin's place was magical and so much more than I could have asked for. His home is immaculate, a work of art, and just overall peaceful.
