If you opt for breakfast, you will not regret it! It's also close to public transit that will take you swiftly into Manhattan , so many restaurants, and Prospect Park, which is lovely. I would highly recommend staying here, I will definitely be back :)", 'This beautiful home in Brooklyn is an absolutely wonderful place to stay. Entrance to the subway was a quick walk of just a few blocks and getting in and out of the city was very easy thanks to the helpful tips provided on arrival. This home had a great vibe, a credit to its warm owners and the beautiful job they have done decorating and making every detail a welcoming one. The bathroom was spotless with a beautiful shower and the bedroom was spacious and comfortable. I highly recommend this location!', 'It was a great stay at Joaquin place. I would recommend it to anyone! The location is great and you can quickly get to Manhattan. It is also difficult to reach from the airport. The room is huge and clean and you have your own bathroom. Communication was great and very helpful with tips on where to go. He was always available and also available for morning and/or evening conversations over a cup of tea or wine. I will definitely come back!', "Joaquin is a superhost, attentive and thoughtful. He went above and beyond what I expected, for example he loaned me his stroller for the week to help me haul my work stuff around, made delicious coffee each morning and tea at night. He has a beautiful home, my room was very comfortable and spacious, super comfortable bed and super clean. I was travelling alone and felt very safe and welcome. Would love to stay here again when I'm back in Brooklyn.", 'We had a really great time at Joaquin‚Äôs and John‚Äôs place. The check in was convenient and we did feel welcome right away. Joaquin has certainly put a lot of work in the house, the design, the interior and the backyard. Additionally, Joaquin made some coffee and tea for us and was really making sure that we were having a great time. The house, room and bathroom were very clean and we can certainly say that this Airbnb-experience was really superior. We would definitely love to come back.
Thank you for everything.', 'Wow, where to start- this was just the stay I needed. Joaquin was so kind and amenable while I visited for a week-long work trip. His place is a piece of art and the cleanest airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in! Molly the dog was so well-behaved and allowed for the best morning pets. Chatting with Joaquin in the morning and evening was a highlight of my days. He treats one as an old friend and the world is better for his fun and gracious spirit. Thank you for the best stay imaginable, Joaquin! And for making a new mama feel so at home!', 'The house and hosts are the bomb! Artistic, cozy interior with class. We felt super safe and welcomed the entire time.
Joaquin and John invite you to their home - so you are treated as family. Chit chats, updates, check-ins, extra offers such as doing the laundry for you.
The backyard with sun and squirrels was pure perfection. You feel like you are at home between your loud NY trips. It was so amazing.
We can‚Äôt wait to come back!']

title: Peaceful Room in Williamsburg
all_reviews: ['The host was really nice, the place was comfortable and accesible.\nHad a great days there.', 'Great location! Amy was super nice and responsive. I really enjoyed my stay and will be back!', "The location is perfect. I've done several Airbnb in Manhattan, and Brooklyn Williamsburg is the most attractive. The subway to Manhattan is also very convenient. The accommodation is clean and the bed is nice. The bathroom is shared, but it's kept clean. I highly recommend it!", 'The place was super cute and the area amazing, definitely going back next time same place !', "Amy is a super host! The space is beautiful and comfy, definitely easy to feel at home. when I was there it was quiet also which was peaceful. Provided are towels, there's bath supplies, any amenities you'd need which are so great and make packing a little lighter : ) communication was so easy and always with quick response. Definitely will be staying here again my next stay in NY! thanks so much Amy!! üòä", 'Amy was an awesome host and both the room and bathroom were very clean! Would recommend Amy‚Äôs place to anyone who wants conveniently located place to stay and check out places in the city!', 'Amy was an incredible host and the room had everything I needed! She was incredibly nice in our interactions and responsive to my messages. The apartment had everything I needed and was a perfect spot from the subway in Williamsburg. I was especially glad to have my own keypad lock to access my room', "Simple place to stay in Williamsburg, and one of the most affordable we could find. Keep in mind it's an apartment shared with 3 other rooms for rent, all with one bathroom to share. I thought we'd be staying with Amy our host, thinking also we could have a local to ask for recommendations and such, but it's a shared AirBnB apartment. Not a huge deal if you know what to expect. The apartment was very clean, including the shared kitchen space, and the bathroom was also very clean despite sharing with the other 3 rooms. Clearly Amy is trying hard to make this a nicely run AirBnB property, because she seems to try hard to make the place nice for her guests. She was also very responsive the entire process, from booking, checking in, during the stay, and checking out. Location is right in Williamsburg, a few blocks from lots of cool stuff as well as different metros (subway lines, buses, etc). In general a pretty quiet street as well.", 'Amy is very good a I am satisfied.', "Couldn't ask for a better stay. If I could afford it, I would stay there longer!", 'comfortable place right with a lot of great restaurants near by. Amy was an excellent host', "Amy was a great Host, very responsive and kind. My room was very private and clean. I rarely saw another guest. Based on the great set of photos Amy sent, I didn't have any problems finding or accessing the apartment or room. The stay was a great value.", 'Great location with easy access to the subway as well as main high street of williamsburg. Nice little touch with some small toiletries too. Thanks Amy!']

title: Artist Ft Greene Brownstone - Best Block, Legal
all_reviews:
["We couldn't have a better experience in New York. The house is gorgeous, very clean and fully equipped. Miriam is one of the better hosts we have ever had. We loved having breakfast chatting with her and playing with her super sweet dog May. We enjoyed the neighborhood because it is really quiet with a nice park and a local atmosphere.", 'Just great!!!!!', 'We loved our stay at Miriam‚Äôs! Her house and the local area are lovey - lots of places to eat/drink and easy access into Manhattan. Miriam was so accommodating, we felt right at home and loved her pooch May. Staying here has really made our first time in NYC - thank you so much!', 'Miriam is a great host with an ideal room for those looking to stay in Brooklyn. She is responsive, friendly and offered us plenty of recommendations for the local area and beyond. The accommodation itself is as described, with loads of character, a large bedroom with AC and all within walking distance of the Brooklyn bridge should you want to avoid the subway. Would highly recommend.', 'This was my second stay at Miriam‚Äôs. I will be back. I love the neighborhood, the house itself, Miriam‚Äôs hospitality, her art‚Äî all of it. Just a lovely experience.', 'I had an amazing stay here ! Would definitely recommend', 'This is a great place for a cozy stay in a gorgeous Brooklyn neighborhood. Everything was as it was described, and Miriam is the sweetest host! She is friendly and helpful, with lots of local knowledge and great recommendations. I would stay here again.', 'Thank you Miriam, a wonderful stay', 'Thank you so Miriam for the wonderful stay! I felt at home and so comfortable. Such a lovely home and a perfect bedroom.. sunny, large, comfortable bed, desk and workspace. I highly recommend to others your home as a great place to stay!!! Not to mention, lovely to have Mays‚Äôs company üíï
Kind regards,
Peta', 'My stay with Miriam was my first time staying with an Airbnb host. Miriam made it an easy stay through our friendly interactions and her thoughtful recommendations. Miriam‚Äôs place felt welcoming and she is very accommodating.', "The perfect NY stay for us! Miriam's house is located in Fort Greene, a friendly and lively Brooklyn neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars, small stores. The subway connections were perfect, all parts of the city are easily accessible. We always found it relaxing to come back to Fort Greene and Miriam's beautiful home. She lives in a large landmark brownstone house on a quiet tree-lined street near the park. We had a very spacious and quiet room with a view of the garden and neighboring courtyards and slept wonderfully in the wide beds with very comfortable mattresses. In addition to having our own large bathroom, we had the opportunity to use Miriam's kitchen. The communication before or during the trip was perfect, Miriam is a great host, she is welcoming, accommodating and friendly and provided us with tips for restaurants and other activities. Many thanks dear Miriam for these wonderful 10 days. We felt completely at home and can highly recommend your accommodation.", 'Miriam is a super host indeed! She was nothing but helpful throughout my stay. Miriam met me on arrival and helped me with my bags. A friendly host who is more than happy to have a chat about your day and give you local recommendations. As a solo female traveller, I felt at home and the neighbourhood is extremely safe! I loved how quiet and peaceful Miriam‚Äôs home was. If I could give this beautiful home more than 5 stars - I would !', 'She was friendly, kind, and helpful. I definitely want to stay Miriam‚Äôs house again when I come back to NYC.
I really recommend this place. Great neighborhood! Thank you so much :)', 'Superb location near the park and a block to multiple subways for easy access to airports and sights. Also close to many restaurants and grocery stores. Beautiful classic brownstone with clean and quiet accommodations and very comfortable bed. Host was very helpful with directions and we loved having use of the kitchen and space in the fridge. Host was also flexible with keeping our bags there before and after checkout. She made us feel right at home and we highly recommend this wonderful spot in Brooklyn!', 'Miriam was a kind and gracious host! Her home was beautiful and cozy and welcoming, in an excellent location. We would absolutely stay here again- this is an excellent place to stay if you want a quiet, clean space to come home to after a day exploring the city.', 'Miriam, her daughter, and their dogs were so sweet. Their was home was warm with beautiful artwork and the bed was comfortable. I would happily stay here again.', 'Thanks. Great stay. Appreciated the extra covers. Was a little cool at night.', 'Miriam‚Äôs place in Brooklyn is a great place to stay, and Miriam is a friendly, helpful, and informative host. The location near Fort Greene Park is a real attraction, as is Miriam‚Äôs beautiful house. We loved staying in the neighbourhood, which is quiet, but has all the things you need within walking distance. Highly recommended.', 'Miriam‚Äôs place was everything I‚Äôd hoped for. First, the location cannot be beat. Easy access to major subways and plenty to walk to nearby. Fort Greene is beautiful and in particular Miriam‚Äôs street and brownstone are exceedingly spectacular. The back garden is an oasis and the interior of the home has all the character you‚Äôd expect from a brownstone. My bedroom overlooking the back garden was spacious, clean and very comfortable. Temperatures were mild so I was able to sleep with the windows open. Miriam was so welcoming and accommodating. Her communication was great, check in was easy and I enjoyed our conversations. Last but not least, May the mini poodle is sweet, loving and made my stay even more delightful. Thanks for the amazing stay.', 'Staying with Miriam was unbeatable. The location of the house is just great in a great neighborhood, easy to reach by various subways, yet located directly on a park. You have a quiet room to the beautiful backyard, which also opens a balcony, which is accessible from the kitchen and is beautiful for breakfast. The kitchen may also be used and, like the entire house, is very nice and uniquely furnished. Miriam is a great host who has great tips and makes you feel really welcome. Thank you so much for the wonderful week we were able to spend here!', 'We will be very happy to think about the intense days here. Miriam contributed to this with her friendly manner and her apartment. Thank you for that!', 'Miriam‚Äôs place is lovely! The location was amazing and exactly what you want when you stay in New York. The street the house is on is gorgeous.
The home is lovely too and so is the room you stay in. The room is very spacious with a nice view.
The A/C in the room was excellent and we were very happy to have it as it was hot in New York.
Miriam is a great host and very friendly. I forgot my retainers and she mailed them to me.
Would recommend this place to anyone!', 'First time solo traveling and staying in a bnb with a host. Miriam was so kind and communicative. She was very welcoming as was her dog haha. The room was great and had lots of charm. Very comfortable bed and clean room with a lot of outlets and natural light. Wish my stay was longer to both enjoy even more of Brooklyn and of Miriam‚Äôs place!', 'We love stay at Miriam‚Äôs and feel at home in her space. We enjoyed our trip so much and a big part of that is where we get some rest at the end of a busy day! Definitely recommend!!', "I used the accommodation so comfortably due to Miriam's warm and kind consideration.
And thanks to the cute and adorable puppy May, we make a lot of memories.

Definitely recommend this place!!', 'Always a welcoming stay, clean quiet, and comfortabe. Doug is a great host. The location is ideal whether you want to explore all that Brooklyn has to offer or jump on a subway to visit Manhattan. The space is clean and very comfortable and Doug makes it easy to come and go. You really can't go wrong if you choses Doug's accommodations. Enjoy!!!", 'Perfect location close to multiple subway and bus stations. Great restaurants, bars, caf√©s and shops in the area and Doug has loads of helpful recommendations. Communication was easy, quick and friendly. Doug invited us to one of his art shows and his place itself looks like one! Spacious, clean and well decorated apartment with all the amenities you‚Äôd need for a trip to NYC. Would love to come back any time!!', "Fantastic experience!
Doug is not only a super helpful and welcoming host but also an incredibly talented artist. I'm very glad I went upstairs to borrow a yoga mat as I got to see his great artwork and hear a bit about some of the many fantastic pieces directly from him.
If I ever need a place to stay in NY again I hope his beautiful and spacious front room is available again, I feel very lucky to have found such a gem in such a great location!", 'I make it a point to stay at Dougs place when I am in NYC. I really enjoy the layout of the apartment, the beautiful back garden, and accessibility to the subways for dining, shopping, and going into Manhattan. Doug is always a warm and friendly host and very helpful whenever I need him for information on how or where I can find something and how to get there.... My stay there is always a lovely experience. üòäüëåüëç', 'Another good stay. Clean and flexible. Always appreciate being able to drop off or pick up my luggage outside of checkin/out hours.', "It's literally the best. The previous reviews were so good that I made a reservation right away without much hesitation, and it was a space that really made me feel like home. Because the host paid a lot of attention, the temperature, cleanliness, coziness, and convenience of the room were all good. The friendly host carefully suggested an itinerary in New York, which was a great help to me as I was vague. I think it would be a great choice, especially if you want to spend some time in Brooklyn. The transportation to everything including downtown New York, Brooklyn, and the airport was very good, and I sincerely hope I have the opportunity to stay again.", "This is our second time staying with Doug and, once again, we couldn't have asked for more. Centrally located, plenty of subway & restaurant options within walking distance. Exactly what we needed!", 'Easy access from Newark or JFK.
Very comfortable bedding.
Quiet environment. Lots of shops nearby.
Big plus point only 3 stairs, ideal when you are a female who carries her suitcase of 25kgs alone...', 'Douglas meet as right after we arrived, welcomed and told us all the instructions, also recommended a few places for the best coffee, and food. The place was extra clean and nice. The location is very good, about 25 minutes away to walk from the Brooklyn bridge.
We would really recommend this place and we wish to come back next time!', 'Doug is always a great host that has great suggestions on what to do and is always welcoming.', 'We spent 10 days at Doug‚Äôs place and we felt welcomed and at home from the beginning. Doug gave us a helpful introduction into his home and the area. He informed us about the houserules to make sure everyone had the best stay. We booked the room by the street and enjoyed it very much. The window could be left open during the night since it‚Äôs a quiet area and since we are used to some city-noises, especially in the morning.
Doug has a beautiful backyard and was always friendly and helpful.
We will keep him and his home positive in mind.', "Doug's place is fantastic in addition to what it looks like in the photos (the garden is now much nicer and full of flowers!) and he explains in detail what to do and what is best not to do. He was always very helpful when I asked for help and let me use the refrigerator for things to eat. The location is great for MTAs, shops and everything else (just a short walk from Fort Greene Park's Sunday Market). I highly recommend Doug and his home.", 'Really wonderful place, highly recommended! Will come back if the opportunity arises.', 'Doug is a fantastic host. It was comfortable and met all my needs. Looking forward to returning here soon', 'perfect excellent', 'Dear Doug,
It was such a pleasure staying at your place. Thank you for your hospitality and warmth. You are a great host!
Your Airbnb is perfect for so many reasons: cleanliness, safety, easy access to restaurants and caf√©s, subway, and it‚Äôs very close to Manhattan. An excellent place at a very reasonable cost. On top of it, you are a great company and a kind-hearted person. Thank you for having me over.', "Had an incredible stay at Doug's place. Quite a unique, not to mention beautiful space in a special location. Doug was an outstanding host going above and beyond to ensure the stay was perfect. Thank you!", 'It was good and friendly. I want to use it again next time!', 'Doug is a friendly and helpful host. Great street and location close to lots of choice restaurants, coffee houses, a park, and within 10 minutes walk to 3-4 subway stations.', 'Doug is such a kind host and is very personable. It was a pleasure getting to talk with him. The apartment was in a quiet street but still only a few blocks to all the action of downtown Brooklyn. Check-in was smooth and the apartment itself was clean and spacious.', 'We had a fantastic stay in Brooklyn thanks to our wonderful host. The room was clean, and the bed was comfortable. What made our experience exceptional was Doug‚Äôs kindness and excellent food recommendations. His local insights added a special touch to our trip, making it truly memorable. Highly recommend staying here for a warm and welcoming Brooklyn experience!', 'Douglas was very helpful and his place was great', "Cleanest AirBnb I've ever been to!! Doug was very kind and was always there to give me tips for New York. The place has a strong roommate-vibe, but also feels like staying at a hotel with all the lovely Details Doug put into it. Thank you, definitely only staying here if I wanna see New York again!", "Great place to stay if you want to visit NYC and experience the city but be able to take a step away to a more quite side of town. There's still plenty to do in Brooklyn and lots of fantastic cafes and restaurants that Doug can recommend to you, so don't be shy and feel free to ask!", 'It was an excellent experience. A very Brooklyn-style home just 20 minutes from Manhattan by subway in a super quiet and safe neighborhood.
Douglas was very attentive and kind, he gave us recommendations for activities and restaurants, and he was attentive to our needs (ex. leave our bags on the last day for storage).
We are in love with the city, thanks to Douglas for making the experience unforgettable.', 'Great location, Douglas was a great host, would recommend staying!', 'Super host', 'I had an incredible month long stay here. The room and home were exactly as described and spotless when I arrived. Doug was proactive and made sure I had everything I needed throughout. The location is unbeatable and I cannot recommend a stay here enough!', 'Best location and host! Douglas went out of the way to accommodate my early arrival and late departure - thank you! The room, bathroom and common spaces were spotlessly clean. The room is big and spacious - and given that location is on a quiet street, I had a good rest every night. Douglas was also a great host, he made me feel incredibly welcomed and at home. He was always very responsive and constantly helped me out.
The neighborhood is lovely and safe, 4-7 min walking distance to multiple subway lines. It took me around the same time to get to the Manhattan tourist sites from Douglas‚Äôs place and when I stayed in midtown previously given the sheer number of subway lines that are accessible from the place. There were great coffee places, cafes and restaurants around - all of which Douglas had kindly recommended and they did not disappoint. I wished I had stayed longer to explore the neighborhood more. I often got home late, and had no issues walking around the neighborhood.', 'Enjoyed my stay with Doug in Fort Greene very much. The place is immaculate and beautifully decorated. Doug went out of his way to make sure all went smoothly for me. Fort Greene is an excellent home base for an NYC visit, with several subway lines right there. In addition the neighborhood has its own charm with its tree-lined blocks of brownstones and abundance of restaurants. Highly recommended!', 'Third time staying here! Douglas is one of the best hosts I‚Äôve encountered! Perfect communication. Room is as described and he is happy to make local recommendations while still respecting personal privacy.', 'Doug was an incredible host! He was very kind and responsive. He also gave great local recommendations and helped me out with navigating the transit system. The place is in a quiet street but is very close to MTA stations, bus stops and great cafes and restaurants. The accommodations itself were also wonderfully decorated and clean. I hope to come back again for a longer stay!', 'Doug and his place was an absolute gem! Doug went above and beyond with pretty. Ugh everything. He even ran around to help us find parking. His home was very clean, you would‚Äôve never know it was a shared bathroom! I would def recommend and will be back. Thank you Doug!', 'Amazing guest suite in one of my favorite neighborhoods In the city. Easy access to both G and C lines. Doug made me feel right at home and provided excellent recommendations and helpful tips!', "Douglas is a lovely, attentive, and unobtrusive man. Very responsive, he is good advice. The accommodation is surprisingly quiet for Brooklyn and very well located in relation to the subway. Many restaurants in the neighborhood and it's very close to Trader Joe's for small errands. Great place, I would highly recommend!", 'Clean and surprisingly spacious room in a well maintained house. Even has a nice backyard! Place was easy to find and is on a peaceful, but central location, and it was easy to get to everywhere from there. Host was professional, helpful and friendly with good tips.', 'A nice, clean, quiet place. The room full of a sense of art. It is pretty cozy. A good choice for a vacation.', 'Conveniently located in Brooklyn but on a quiet street. Host was friendly and helpful.', 'Douglas was a fantastic host, and had a lovely, well located space. enjoyed the local area, very walkable to NYC and Brooklyn. Doug is passionate about the area, NY, and filled with great tips and itinerary ideas!', 'Couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place for my time in NYC. Doug is the perfect host, his home is amazing and the surrounding neighborhood is one of the best I‚Äôve traversed in my times in NY. I hope to make this the regular on return visits‚Ä¶ thanks as always, Doug!', "The host is very helpful. I was my first time in New York. Very good communication, even though I didn't speak Angelic. Help that the host site is large. I'll be back. Thanks for everything:)", 'The stay at Doug‚Äôs place was so comfortable! Doug was super welcoming and helpful during check-in. He gave very detailed instructions on everything in the room and the house, and even provided recommendations for local restaurants. Nice and peaceful neighborhood. The room had everything I needed and the A/C worked well. Bathroom was super clean. Would definitely come back and stay again.', "Doug's place was really cute and in a wonderful location for those that love to explore what is around. There is a lot within walking distance, and if you need, there are many metro connections nearby as well. The space was incredible and is easily one of the best finds in the city. highly recommend!", 'Cosy, clean, easy to get to Manhattan but also in a nice neighborhood. Perfect for a single traveler, good value for money for New York', "The place is easy to find, in a great location with many train connections, easy to walk to the Brooklyn Bridge, very clean and spacious, feels safe even at night. Doug himself is great, had plenty of local tips and recommendations. He also responds very quickly to any messages. When I'm back in the city I'll probably stay here, especially with the price and location.", 'Doug was very accommodating, the space is very clean and spacious, and the neighborhood is very central', "I would recommend the Douglas place a lot. If I'm ever back to New York, I would definetelly check it again.
He's humble and easygoing, always ready to help on everything we needed. He showed us the whole place making it easy to feel like home. He was always asking about our plans and gave great recommendations.
The room we stayed in is quite big and it had everything we needed.
I would say that one of the best things also was the location. It has few metro/train stations around and thore are close enough that you can be in Manhattan in about 20-25min. Easy to get to JFK airport.
Overall a fantastic experience. Thank you Douglas!", 'We were not lacking for anything during our stay with Doug. He is hospitable and personable, his townhouse dwelling is beautifully decorated, and the street is quiet, which meant we had a restful night of sleep. We would love to return next time we‚Äôre in Brooklyn!', 'Pretty good stay, easy commute as well', 'I‚Äôve stayed here multiple times and Doug‚Äôs place one of my favorite places to stay in the city. So Clean, flexible and communicative. He is a wonderful artist so common area has a tasteful selection of his work and he is very welcoming. Which brings you back to what Airbnb was originally created for.
The room is large and spacious and the Unitas‚Äôs location is so close to many restaurants, groceries, a park and coffee shops. Also, walking distance from Atlantic Terminal where you can easily grab the LIRR to JFK. To LGA‚Ä¶ I‚Äôm not sure how to get there by public transportation but by taxi it was very affordable and convenient. It‚Äôs just so close to Downtown Brooklyn where you can have access any and everything, making it a convenient place to stay if you are heading into lower Manhattan as well. Highly recommend!', 'Great place, close to the subway. The area is fantastic. There are close by restaurants and things to do.', "The stay at Doug's was very nice. The location of his apartment is just great and Doug himself is also a very nice host. He was always able to give us good tips and it was fun to talk to him.", 'Can‚Äôt say enough good things about Doug as a host and his gorgeous Brownstone. Doug is an extremely thoughtful and thorough communicator and goes out of his way to make sure you have what you need.
I only wish I had more time to chat with him and talk about all of the gorgeous art in his home. Was in town for a quick, 2 night trip for a wedding that was a few blocks away, and also I had lost my voice. Next time I‚Äôm in the area I‚Äôll try to stay here.
Thanks Doug for thinking of it all and for providing such a peaceful oasis with thorough instructions for everything! :)', "Douglas house is very well located on Brooklyn, close to everything while at the same time, on a quiet street without much noise. The room has a good bed, a chair and a very comfortable desk.
Besides the room, the house is very clean, the toilet and kitchen are good, but you can't use the oven or stove, just the microwave.
Douglas lives there and is around the house most of the day. When I arrived, he asked me to close the doors quietly to avoid waking him up while he sleeps, place my keys next to the door so he knows when I'm home, put a towel on the floor when showering, close the shower curtains when finished, take off my shoes when entering the house, and dispose of banana peels in the compost he keeps in the freezer."]

title: Spacious Williamsburg Haven
all_reviews:
['Great week-long stay in NY. The apartment is perfect for 2 people, super clean and located in the heart of Williamsburg, on a quiet street and close to Bedford St. The neighborhood is ideal for those who want to be immersed by New Yorkers. Aviva was very welcoming, always available to answer our questions, I can only recommend staying there!', 'Aviva was an amazing host from start to finish. The place was spotless, looked just like the photos, great location (about 10 mins walk to the ferry or subway stations), and super confortable for a couple. I had to receive a couple of packages and Aviva helped me out with that right from the start. She was always responsive and kind, and allowed us to check in a bit earlier since our flight arrived super early. I can‚Äôt recommend her and this place enough!!', 'Aviva‚Äôs place was spacious, clean and cozy. Right in the heart of Williamsburg action!', 'Aviva‚Äôs place is so clean, cozy and a perfect location to explore all the great dining and shopping in Williamsburg. Blocks from the lovely Domino Park on the waterfront and close to the subway for a quick trip into Manhattan. Aviva is such a helpful host! Plenty of space for us and our baby!', "Aviva's place is beautiful and well stocked with all the necessities. It's walkable to everything in Williamsburg.
I found the unit cold though, so bring an extra sweater or some slippers.", 'Would absolutely stay here again. Loved being in this home, it felt spacious and had everything I needed for my stay. Aviva was a great host and super communicative as well!', 'Aviva was a wonderful host, and her place is lovely‚Äîvery well appointed with everything we needed, well located, and with a comfy bed and plenty of space.
Wifi was spotty but Aviva was proactive about getting it working!', 'Would absolutely stay again. Aviva was super proactive and responsive!', 'We absolutely loved our stay in this apartment. Clean, no clutter, nice decorations, and had great attention to detail. Brooklyn is an awesome city with so much to do and this place was in a great location. Walking distance to fun bars and great restaurants. Aviva was a great host and communicated well. We will be staying here again for sure!', 'I cannot say enough about our stay hear. Great comfortable bed and space. So easy to walk to so many great spots. We forgot our app!e charger Aviva lent us one. I lost my phone my last night there, Aviva called me an uber for 4:30am pickup. Super nice hostess. I hope this place is available next time I visit Brooklyn.', 'Cozy yet spacious, Aviva‚Äôs spot is in a fabulous location. The bed is heavenly and my only complaint is that I wish I could‚Äôve stayed longer.', 'Really easy check in, wonderful locations, and such thoughtful hosts!', 'Aviva‚Äôs place was perfect for a weekend trip to NYC. Spacious, in the middle of everything, and so so clean. Felt right at home, can‚Äôt wait to visit again!', 'Super clean and excellent location! Enjoyed the stay here.', 'Thanks', 'This was a great spot in Williamsburg, will definitely stay again!', 'The neighborhood was great. Restaurants, bars and public transportation are all walking distance away. The place was decent and clean. The host was responsive and helpful. There were some minor issues with noise from the host and her guests. We didn‚Äôt know the host was going to have a party our first night in the apt as she told us when we got there. Also, the heating in the Airbnb was Insufficient, but became a non issue once the weather warmed up for the rest of our stay.', 'We had a great stay here, the apartment has everything what we needed for our holiday. Aviva is an amazing host, she always reacted quickly, she is very helpful. Absolutely recommended.', 'perfect loft for a stay in brooklyn! aviva was the friendliest and most helpful host we have ever been able to experience! This apartment makes you feel like you are a brooklyn resident!', 'Aviva‚Äôs place was so cozy and she was helpful at check-in! Would definitely stay here again! Great place and it was spotless when we got there.', 'I‚Äôve been a guest in many Airbnb spaces and this has been one of the best. Host is very friendly and accommodating. The bed is extremely comfortable. You do get some city noise but not enough where it disrupted my sleep. Highly recommend!', 'Aviva‚Äôs place is the total best, she is a perfect host, the location could not be better. A must claim spot if available!', "I love staying at Aviva's! Big flat with plenty of sun for a garden level. Full kitchen with dishwasher, oven, cooking tools and ingredients. Plenty of towels, soaps, etc in the bathroom. Even a washer and drier. Location is perfect for Williamsburg, right near tons of restaurants and close to the subway. Would definitely stay again!", 'We had a great time in Williamsburg. The location of the apartment is amazing. Aviva was an amazing host. She was super friendly, responsive and extremely helpful. Thanks again for everything', 'Great base for visiting friends, close to everything! Thank you Aviva', "I had a delightful stay at Aviva's place. The apartment is a large studio with a private entrance with a well supplied kitchen if you plan to cook. The location is terrific; right in the center of gentrifying Williamsburg. It's a short walk to the East River where you have spectacular views of the Manhattan skyline plus attractive riverside parks. The area has abundant restaurants and bars which you can reach on foot. Aviva provided some restaurant recommendations which proved very reliable. Aviva is a very genial host, and she clearly goes out of her way to make her guests feel comfortable.", 'Aviva was a very responsive and responsible host. We had a hitch w the heating system caused by a sudden drop in NYC temperatures. She took care of the problem w/in 24 hours. Took us a little bit to get used to being just below street level (given the high foot traffic in Williamsburg generally) but the ‚Äúdream noise‚Äù radio clock easily solved that problem. My wife felt it was a very secure neighborhood with lots of good food and drink offered within easy walking range. And the discount for booking a long term (1 week) stay, made the price per night reasonable given all that the neighborhood offers.', 'Loved staying in Williamsburg! Great coffee shops and restaurants within walking distance. Aviva was a wonderful host, friendly and welcoming. Can‚Äôt recommend this place enough!', 'Our favorite place we‚Äôve stayed in Williamsburg so far and we visit every year! The studio is spacious and clean and you can‚Äôt beat the location. Blocks from bars, restaurants, shopping ‚Äî whatever you need. Aviva is also a wonderful host. She‚Äôs responsive and personable, and gave good local recommendations.', 'Great spot for a few days in NYC. Quick trip to Manhattan with lots to see/do locally in Brooklyn', 'Great location for our family trip! We will definitely stay here again in the future when we visit our kids in the city!', 'Place was great! Location is not much better, especially for the price..', 'Wonderful!
Perfect spot and kind host.', 'This was a great stay. There are so many shops and restaurants nearby and always something to fall into. Aviva is so lovely and helpful. The space is comfortable and quiet and perfect for an adventurous weekend.', 'Aviva‚Äôs place is the best little spot in Brooklyn. She is a great host, always helpful and communicative.', 'This was the perfect little weekend getaway in a wonderful location! The location was so easy and accessible. I loved being able to explore the neighborhood. As a single woman, I felt very comfortable traveling here by myself.', 'Aviva ensured that we had a great stay while here in NYC! She made sure that we had everything that we needed and did everything that she could to accommodate us and be helpful. The studio was very clean and was the perfect size for a weekend trip; Williamsburg is such a great neighborhood to stay in! I would 100% stay here again.', 'Aviva‚Äôs place was the perfect little getaway, it was nice and quant while being walkable and close to a lot of restaurants and shops. Aviva was responsive and their place was filled with everything that you would need.', "Aviva's place was absolutely amazing. Hands down, it is the best Airbnb I have ever stayed in (and I have stayed in many of them!). She has thought of everything, even down to a motion-sensitive night light that you have no idea is there until you need it in the middle of the night. I would stay here again in a heartbeat!", 'I loved my stay at Aviva‚Äôs place! Would love to return.', 'Aviva‚Äôs place was perfect for our 10 day stay! The place was clean and spacious and the bed was comfortable with beautiful cotton bedding and feather pillows. We also loved the big white fluffy towels! It really felt like home from home.
I would highly recommend this apartment for anyone visiting New York and would definitely stay here again.', 'Great stay!!', 'Aviva is a wonderful host that I‚Äôd highly recommend to other travellers. The apartment was clean and cosy, comfy beds, aircon etc. The kitchen is fully stocked with utensils, sharp knives, spices, oils and everything else you need to cook. I loved my stay here in the heart of Williamsburg. Aviva was great with all communication and anything else we needed for our stay.', 'Great location. Amenities true to listing and then some. Great communication.', 'Convenient location, spacious and clean - had everything we needed!', 'Aviva was an incredibly accommodating host and we had a wonderful stay in Williamsburg!
The apartment is an easy 10 minute walk from the Bedford subways stop with many amenities and restaurants in the surrounding area. The apartment was easy to find and access, impeccably clean and with a well-equipped kitchen and bathroom. The semi-basement apartment lets in lots of light from the front window and back window which opens onto a green little patio. The front window has black out curtains for the eve and the apartment always felt safe and private.
Would recommend to anyone visiting New York!', 'Had a great time. Problems caused by my inexperience with Airbnb.', 'This was a good spot to explore Brooklyn, easy access to the ferry service which was excellent and good places to eat nearby. We tried Xolo and 12 Chairs which were both good.
Aviva was really helpful and very responsive with any questions we had. Thank you.', 'Beautiful apartment in the center of Williamsburg - It feels like home!', 'Staying at Aviva‚Äôs place was great! It was in an amazing location, very clean & spacious, AC was nice, & she was super responsive. 10/10 experience!', "I used it on my honeymoon!

We stayed here on our honeymoon!
We had the best time in New York and were very happy to be able to stay there as if we were a local.
We'll definitely stay here again when we come to New York!", 'I already miss staying at Aviva‚Äôs studio! title: Big 1 Bedroom Brooklyn Ditmas Park
all_reviews:
['I really enjoyed staying here. It was clean, cozy, and the location was pretty perfect. Within walking distance to the subway and some great coffee shops/restaurants, the place really helped make my first trip to NY special. Melbourne was also incredibly quick at responding and sent very thorough instructions on how to access his place. I would definitely stay here again.', 'My stay was quite all right. Melbourne is a great host and when we arrived and had issues with WIFi and heating he promptly came to support us and did his best to improve our experience. The shower is quite amazing and the bed is comfy. The surroundings are very calm and easy to get to the subway line Q and B take you to Manhattan in about 30/40 minutes which is quite good. If it is your first time staying in NY you might prefer to be in Manhattan close to the buzz, but for me was nice to walk around an area of Brooklyn that still has some character. Also, Melbourne let us check out a bit later which was very good for us.', "Mel's place was great. Quiet, convenient, cozy, and extremely clean. The narrow staircase mentioned in some other reviews did not cause us any trouble at all. We did not get to meet Mel in person but the communication via messages was very efficient and clear. He was even kind enough to leave us some beverages in the refrigerator. We tried some breakfast places Mel recommended, and they were delightful. All in all a pleasant 3-night stay for us.", "We stayed at Melbourne's place for three nights and we really enjoyed it. The neighborhood was quiet and felt safe, the subway station and all the amenities (grocery shops, pharmacy etc.) were nearby. It takes about 40mins to get to Manhattan but we didn't mind the commute. Our room was huge and was very charming, had a private entry, a comfortable bed, AC, mini fridge (with some refreshments there, which was much appreciated). Melbourne was very helpful and gave us clear instructions and plenty of recommendations for places to eat (one of them was Milk and Honey which was a great breakfast/brunch spot and super close to the house). Would definitely stay here again. Thank you Melbourne for hosting us!", 'Our stay at Melbourne‚Äôs was great! The private entrance made the stay feel more private which we really enjoyed. The room looked as described in the offer and was equipped with essentials such as towels, toiletries and drinking water. The narrow stairs may be a bit difficult to climb with a bigger suitcase but is manageable.
The room is located around 5 minutes from the subway station which can take you to Manhattan in about 40 minutes.
Communication with the host was great and I would really recommend staying at Melbourne‚Äôs!', 'Close to the subway station that gives access to Manhattan and other points of New York. The neighborhood is quiet, with cafes, restaurants, and supermarkets nearby. The room is comfortable and clean. The shower was excellent. The internet works well. We felt comfortable and well-accommodated. If I have the opportunity, I certainly will return to Melbourne place.', 'If you‚Äôre looking for the perfect room for a couple days in the city - look no further! Melbourne has a wonderfully spacious room with a private bathroom just a couple blocks from the B and Q subway lines. Definitely a rare find! Besides good transportation options, you‚Äôll find a plethora of places to eat and/or get coffee. If you need to be in Manhattan - it‚Äôs no more than 40 mins by train.
As mentioned before, the room is very spacious. The bed has a memory foam mattress and there‚Äôs plenty of storage space. Melbourne also provides some free drinks. The bathroom is small, but squeaky clean.
Pro Tip #1: as stated in the listing there are multiple narrow (!) stairs to climb. Anything larger than a carry-on will be a hassle to bring upstairs.
Pro Tip #2: if you‚Äôre a light sleeper and/or sleep with the window(s) open, bring some noise canceling earplugs and an eye mask. The noise is not as bad as Manhattan - it‚Äôs a generally quiet neighborhood.
What else is there to say? Thank you for hosting me, Melbourne. I will definitely be back!', 'We had a great time here. Everything was very clean and we had everything we needed.', "Melbourne's place is so nice! We felt so at home. It's decorated very tastefully, and is an easy space to live in for a while. Melbourne was very thorough in his instructions and explanations and very responsive and friendly.", 'Perfect spot for us to stay while we visited the city. Easy access to the subway station. Extremely comfortable bed. Will stay again here if we come back!', 'Incredibly gracious and helpful host that responds in no time.
Very cosy room in a chill, safe and beautiful neighbourhood. Plenty of caf√©s and restaurants nearby, just the supermarkets are a bit further away (bodegas are really close but they are expensive).
