title: Romantic Artist Townhouse, 2 Bd Suite, 1 Bth
all_reviews:
['Jenny was wonderful! so accommodating and thoughtful. Her home is so charming and beautifully decorated, perfectly clean and very comfortable. You have the second floor of the home basically to yourself as the guests live on the third floor. It was the classic NYC brownstone experience. 5 stars, book with confidence.', 'Emily very friendly, who gives good practical explanations. Very good location 3 minutes from the metro, great markets and restaurants next to the house. No kitchen to make a meal but breakfast organized.
I recommend it.', 'Beautiful brownstone close to Central Park and a subway station. Enjoyed roaming the neighborhood. Very quiet and relaxing stay. Hosts were extremely prepared and kind.', 'Our 8 days in New York was all the better for having this wonderful base to come back to each day. Beautiful rooms, we felt welcomed and felt we could relax. The rooms were very spacious too. Absolutely everything we needed was provided so we were very happy with the value for money overall. We will always have very fond memories of our New York stay. Thank you Jenny.', 'We had a great stay at this beautiful home - a classic New York brownstone. The area is great with lots of restaurants on the doorstep and the less crowded part of Central Park a few blocks away.
Jenny was very responsive and helpful, and Taco the cat was a chatty and fun addition to our stay!
Highly recommend staying here, it was excellent.', 'We had a fantastic time at Emily‚Äôs a lovely place to stay. Emily and Jenny super helpful and great to talk too.
It‚Äôs a five minute walk to the substation to downtown, liked the local restaurants as well.
Would highly recommended it. We thought Taco the cat was a great little character.', 'This was a dream place to stay. So charming and our host thought of everything to make us comfortable. We all loved the charm, location and thoughtful details.', 'We absolutely loved staying in this amazing historic house. Jenny was so welcoming and trusting with her beautiful home. She gifted us beautiful cakes as a wedding anniversary gift. The rooms were all so spacious and comfortable. There is bags of space in which to relax. The pile of soft and fluffy towels in the bathroom was very generous. There are no kitchen facilities available but plenty of water, a kettle, a Nespresso machine, a range of tea-bags and a little fridge, mugs and cups etc. With so many great eateries so close by we enjoyed eating breakfast out. Barney Greengrass is an old classic and just around the corner, and was one of our favourites along with Osteria Accademia just uptown on Amsterdam. We were really impressed by the recommendations Jenny had carefully compiled. The proximity to Central Park and the subway was brilliant. We‚Äôd either walk across the park or head downtown on the subway when we ventured further afield. The neighbourhood felt super safe and friendly.', 'We had a wonderful time in New York and this lovely place was a big part of it. The cleanliness, communication and location were outstanding. Our host Jenny provided some gluten-free treats and a delicious blueberry pie, as well as plenty of suggestions for restaurants and things to do. The rooms were quiet and comfortable and full of charm. And when you sit on the bed in the green room and look out the window down to the garden, it‚Äôs just magical.', 'This place could not have been any better. Room/suite was perfect for our group. Such a great location and the host was super. Amazing pastries our first day, easiest of instructions for checking in, safe area with lots of food options close by, great communication, beautiful home and an adorable cat named Taco! (Don‚Äôt worry- hypoallergenic) - It was perfect ! Thank you!!üíú', 'It is a wonderful place to experience New York City. Location is exceptionally good and well connected. The hosts are very helpful and have thought of everything. The beautiful townhouse, which is lovingly preserved in its original state, still sets the crown on the whole. 10/10', 'What an amazing week in the Upper West Side - amazing amount of space and having the breakfast/lounging areas were great for us, as we prefer to eat in a lot. But there were plenty of restaurants around the house if you wanted. Close to the buses and subways, but very walkable as a base for exploring. The hosts were lovely and Taco the cat was super friendly. We would definitely recommend and would stay here again if ever in NYC :)', "I can't say enough great things about our stay with Emily and Jenny!
It was amazing to stay in such a gorgeous old brownstone on the Upper West Side and the inside was beautifully preserved and decorated.
It was spotless, very comfortable, and provided plenty of space for the four of us during our 5 day trip to NYC. In addition to the third floor, we felt very welcome in the second floor common space where there was a mini fridge and breakfast bar with espresso maker.
The location was excellent; very quiet and safe, within walking distance to many cafes and restaurants, and close to the subway and Central Park.
Jenny and her husband were a genuine pleasure to talk to and very knowledgeable about the area. Jenny also got us some delicious pastries from a local bakery the first day, which was such a thoughtful surprise!
It's no surprise that this Airbnb is so highly rated and I definitely would recommend it!", 'Such a beautiful home, the woodwork, art, decor, it was a dream to get to stay in a historic brownstone home a short walk from Central Park. We had plenty of privacy and also enjoyed the interactions with the hosts and their cat Taco. This was a far superior stay over a hotel.', 'Great location! Great hosts! Beautiful historic home. Emily and Jenny know the area and New York and give wonderful tips and guidance. I would love to stay with them again. Thank you for being part of a wonderful visit to New York.
J & K Walter', 'Wonderful rooms in an old mansion brownstone. Great location near restaurants, transportation and central park. Host was very attentive and friendly.', 'We had a wonderful stay. Great neighbourhood and also great property and hosts. Would repeat when in New York again.', 'We stayed with 4 people (26J/ Germany) at Emily and Jenny's place.
Even before we arrived, Jenny helped us find the best mode of transport for our arrival.
Arrived in the beautiful and well located residential area, we were warmly welcomed by Jenny and given a tour of the space.
The place is great, clean, and right on you, "New York feeling."
To the subway it is 4 minutes by foot.
Jenny was always available for questions or tips. We have used this offer and recommend this to other guests.
However, if you are not interested in interacting with the host, this is not a problem.
We enjoyed the time in New York very much and we were always happy to return to the property.
We would definitely come back!', 'It‚Äôs been one of the best places I have stayed when visiting New York.
Very closed to Central Park, the train station, great restaurants, museums, and more‚Ä¶It can‚Äôt get any better! It‚Äôs a lovely cozy and historical house. Made me feel like I was actually at home! Emily and her family made me feel welcomed and were very attentive. I just loved everything about this place. I would definitely go back!', 'Beautiful home in a great area. We had such a great time staying here and Jenny was a great host who made us feel comfortable and answered any questions we had.', 'The best place to stay in NY!
Rooms are so warm and clean, also they prepare everything for guests.
My mom was touched by dacaf coffee!
Thank you so much for your care‚ú®', 'This is a character property in the Upper West Side. Lovely accommodation, very spacious and comfortable. Jenny, Emily and Aldo were very hospitable and very helpful giving us suggestions of where to go when the Museums were closed because of Covid19. A lovely place to stay.', 'The place is a beautiful ‚Äúbrownstone‚Äù type house in the Upper West Side. Guest have two bedrooms and a separate bathroom, comprising the whole of one floor of the property, one flight of stairs above the entry level.
Emily and Jenny are very prompt in their communications, and provide personalised and helpful advice and tips regarding things to do in NYC.
Getting around is easy on the Subway, which is a short 5-7 minute walk from the front door. It‚Äôs only a few stops to Columbus Circle, and another few after that and you‚Äôre in Times Square. Alternatively, within a few minutes‚Äô walk you can be in Central Park.
We stayed there after the NYC marathon, and in retrospect we should have stayed there before the run - Emily‚Äôs place is perfectly placed only a few block from the area where you exit from the corrals after the finish line.', 'We had a great stay! The two separate rooms worked out perfectly for us. Ann', "The traditional brown stone house on the Upper West Side is beautiful, comfortable and very authentic. We had all we needed for our party of three, with two bedrooms and a private bathroom. Jennifer (Emily's daughter) is a great host. She surprised us with some nice snacks and a good selection of coffee and tea. Being a local, she provided us with valuable information on local restaurants and best times to go for dinner. Since the central park is so near, we decided to go for a nice run through the park and around the reservoir multiple times. Great way to start the day and with stunning views on the skyline in the early morning sun. We highly recommend Emily/Jennifer and their listing and will be happy to come back.", '2 block walk in either direction to get subway. 2 block walk to restaurants and supermarkets. We enjoyed central park just 2 blocks away. House has umbrellas to borrow and host provides written and oral advice on where to go and what to do. Great coffee and small frig provided.', "Great location, very near to buses & subways for all directions. Felt safe walking at night as area quiet. Comfy rooms & beds. Great Shower. Jenny always quick to answer when messaged, didn't see much of her which was a shame as would have liked to have spoken more but we were out a great deal of the time anyway. Absolute bonus having the floor with table, seats and sofa to have breakfast and sit down once back in. One small negative very squeaky floorboards which can't be helped as to the age of them but you did feel conscious of the noise. Also had to ask to have the door in-between the rooms to be closed as we could not manage it ourselves so it stayed closed so did have to go via the corridor to see each other but again it's the age of the fixtures as all original which was a joy to live in for a week as the wood panelling is beautiful,", "We loved the stay at the most amazing house and at just the right address - we were greeted with hospitality and helpfulness - the next time we come to NYC we hope there's room again - Top recommendations from here", 'We had a wonderful stay at this beautiful old brownstone on the Upper West Side. Our hosts were lovely and very helpful, but we still had lots of privacy. The bed was comfortable, the bathroom was clean, and we also very much enjoyed the tea parlor room on the entry floor. The location was safe and pretty and offered easy access to Central Park and lots of good restaurants. We also enjoyed the yummy baked goodies our hosts had for us upon arrival!', "emily and Jenny's home is well-deserved as a rare gem. For our first family trip in New York we couldn't of better dream! As a first step, we were hesitant to stay in our 12 nights at the hotel. So before the brownstone we had spent two nights at the hotel to enjoy the views from the East River on the skycrapers. Choosing to stay at Jenny's was the best decision we could make. Feeling at home in a typical house bordering Central Park is an amazing feeling. The house is beautiful. The two bedrooms (actually an entire floor with the bathroom) are splendid, impeccably clean and very comfortable. The entire 1st floor (tea room, breakfast room, fridge, coffee machine...) is available to guests, which gives the impression of having the house to yourself ( which is a little real). Unfortunately we didn't see much Jenny. She welcomed us with great kindness and immediately put us at ease (her discretion is remarkable). The area is nice with Central Park 150m away, nice restaurants (Bella Luna, good Italian, hearty and reasonable price level, the bodrum, very good Turkish...). There is also a whole food market 10 minutes to the north, good supermarket plan with lots of choices and the possibility of self-service composing your salad, hot dishes to pay for by weight (tjs more expensive than in France but real good plan to eat well, good and reasonable for the wallet). In fact, we can find this chain everywhere in the city, we can eat on site what we have bought in self-service, here no tip! To get back to Jenny's house: sit at the window of the team room and watch the street you will immediately be in an American film. Subway lines 1, C, B serve all of Manhattan and are a short walk away.
Our only regret: not having spent more time at home (there is so much to do in NYC) as we loved living there. Our wish: to return one day. üóΩ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'Charming, convenient, comfortable - and best of all, a thoughtful host who made us feel right at home. A definite do-over for our next fun visit to the city.', 'It was a lovely well kept place. Beautiful and stylish with friendly hosts. Couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything better.', 'Wonderful host, beautiful place and a fantastic location. My daughter and I had great memorable visit to NYC and our stay was very pleasant. Thank you!', "The host Jenny was very friendly and helpful in where we can go and see and how to get there. We also had some wonderful conversations with Jenny and Aldo on the theatre and arts and also shared what is going on in Sydney Australia and in NY. The accommodation and location is just as the photo's look and very comfortable. I would recommend them to everyone in Australia that is visiting NY. Lynn. Steve and I had the most wonderful time.", 'We had a very nice stay. Spacious and comfortable accommodation. Beautiful neighborhood. Several metro stations and buses ready, central Park has two streets...
thank you for the welcome', 'My family and I had a wonderful stay at Emily‚Äôs. She has a beautiful, comfortable home, and she goes out of her way to make sure that you have everything you need. Comfortable beds & bedding, super clean everywhere, and loads of space - a rarity for NYC!! The house is in a great location to subways, Central Park & restaurants. And we have a special love now for her amazing jumping, palindromic cat - Taco Cat.', 'PERFECT- Perfect location, quiet, convenient, super clean and comfortable. Check-in/out was easy and messages were answered immediately. We will absolutely stay here again!', 'Staying there is airbnbying like a new yorker uper westie local.
Hard to describe how beautiful was the experience of living in a Manhattan brownstone decorated with antiques.
Besides wonderful hosts, they speak German and Spanish
And as a cute plus, you can always play with Taco, their friendly siamese cat.
Highly recommended as our place of choice next time we visit Manhattan
taco', "Am√©lie and Jenny's place is the most special home we've stayed in yet. You can't even compare staying in a hotel. We actually lived in partnership with Jenny and her husband but full privacy. We had two whole floors to ourselves. In an authentic homemade New York atmosphere and with plenty of space we couldn't ask for more. Jenny was a wonderful host and took care of everything we asked for including laundry.
The location was absolutely- close to Central Park and 15 minutes by metro to the central areas. Cozy and quiet neighborhood but close to everywhere.
We will definitely come back here!", 'A wonderful place to stay. Incredibly clean, great location. The rooms are in an old Brownstone so the home has a wonderful
Old charm, making cozy and warm. The hosts are very friendly and take pride in their home. And rightly so. We so much appreciated the cleanliness and attention to details, such as extra towels and amenities. A great haven in the heart of the upper west side.', 'What an outstanding and awesome place Emily and her daughterJenny have. The neighborhood is beautiful, and the house is -what can I say- enigmatic. Jenny and her husband Aldo were such great, respectful, and communicative hosts; we had a lot more than we expected (even delicious pastries) in the common area just for my family and me.
Everything was clean and perfect in the rooms, bathroom, and living room. Speedy WiFi, AC, Fridge, toaster, and some food goodies were super handy in our stay.
Definitely, we will come back to keep exploring NYC!!
Thanks for being such amazing hosts. :)', 'Absolutely charming! It looks exactly like the pictures! The place is stunning, centrally located, and Emily and Jenny are such thoughtful hosts! There is tea, espresso and a little mini fridge. I would definitely recommend!', "This is a lovely place to stay, with a truly lovely host. The location really worked for us, it is in a quieter area, away from the hustle and bustle but has restaurants etc nearby. It is also really close to the subway and takes around 20-30 mins to most tourist attractions. Central park is also a short walk away. Although there are no kitchen facilities, there are lots of things provided including a coffee machine/kettle / fridge and a supply of filtered water. Everything we needed was provided. The beds are super comfy and there is LOADS of space. All bathroom basics including shampoo and shower gel are provided as well as a good supply of towels. The apartment was very clean and the air conditioning was super efficient. Jenny was a wonderful host and communication with her was quick and she was available to ask questions about anything. She gave us loads of good recommendations for places to eat which we enjoyed. She made our stay special and went above and beyond what you would expect from a host. We wouldn't hesitate to recommend this property, amazing value and a fabulous authentic New York experience. Thanks Jenny and Emily!", 'Great place, great host! Very nice place and great location!', "Emily's house in beautiful, very well located. Emily and her daughter welcome you in the best manner and give you all the tips you need to enjoy a unique stay in New York city.", 'We loved our stay at Emily‚Äôs place! The location in the upper west side made it convenient to museums, great restaurants, Broadway and more, yet was away from the crowds. The amount of space we had was incredible for NYC. Our hosts were awesome!', "If you are heading towards Manhattan I really suggest you drop everything and book this apartment. We spent a week in the city, my 16 year old daughter and myself, and enjoyed every second with this Upper West Side Jewel serving as our home away from home. Jenny was the sweetest and if you are theater lovers, pls remember to check out the framed letters of thanks from Neil Simon, Mike Nichols and other stage/ film legends - to Jenny'd dad, a theater legend in his own right. We can't wait to book this place again. Just give a reason, we dare ya!", 'If you are looking for a vintage style accommodation and super host near central park, look no further, this is the right place.', 'Nice place to stay at, it has all you need.', "We had an absolutely wonderful week in NYC staying at Emily's beautiful home. We were out much of the time but it was lovely to come back to comfortable beds, lovely bedding & fluffy towels! Great location for central park & the subway is only a 5 min walk.", 'I cannot recommend this apartment highly enough, it is absolutely wonderful and I can‚Äôt imagine a more special place to stay in New York. When my two friends Breda, Rosie and I started our search for a place to base ourselves during a 3 night stay in Manhattan we whittled the ‚Äòmaybes‚Äô down to about 7 or 8 places, including apartments and a couple of hotels. Jenny and Emily responded to all our queries promptly and very informatively which supported us in making the decision to book their particular townhouse. All I can say is we definitely made the right decision and were so privileged to stay in a beautiful traditional brownstone townhouse, two blocks from both Central Park and the subway. Jenny was there to meet us on our arrival and was just so warm and lovely, telling us about the history of her beautifully-maintained characterful home, recommending restaurants, theatre and music events whilst inviting us to use the coffee maker, kettle, water cooler, toaster and fridge for the duration of our stay (provided in the foyer and sitting area at entry level to the property). The two bedrooms on the next floor up easily accommodated three separate sleepers in very comfortable beds fitted with quality bed linen and the separate shower/ toilet on the same floor was spotlessly-maintained and well-equipped with towels, a hairdryer etc. There are plenty of cupboards and closets available in both bedrooms and also hanging space in the entrance hall, adding to the home from home feel and reducing the inevitable clutter that arises from three 50-something year olds sharing a space! The property is an absolute haven of peace and tranquility in a stylish residential street of brownstone townhouses in the midst of Manhattan and the setting or the property itself could not be more perfect. The townhouse is within 5 minutes walk of wonderful restaurants including Kirsh for breakfast and pastries and Barney Greengrass for brunch, both on Amsterdam Avenue and Bela Luna on Columbus Avenue for dinner. Jenny took the time to chat to us before our yellow cab transfer to JFK and was so interesting and kind; we each feel her personality added to the magical experience of this trip. Thank you, Jenny and Emily, for making our trip so perfect in your exceptionally beautiful home.
Breda, Rosie and Sinead
Stayed January 2020', 'Staying at Jennys and Emilys home was pure pleasure. The rooms are huge, the beds super comfy, everything is perfectly clean - there is even a little tea/coffee bar downstairs. The location is just perfect - within minutes you‚Äòll get to lines 1 and C plus we really enjoyed the neighborhood. When in NY again we will definitely come back. Thanks again Emily and Jenny for giving us a ‚Äûhome‚Äú away from home.', "Emily and Jenny's home was one of
the highlights of our NYC trip! It was simply
beautiful. The woodworking, furniture, and
decor was gorgeous. We were looking to
stay in a brownstone in a local area that was
not touristy, and this was the perfect place.
Jenny was the nicest hostess and provided
us with handy info about restaurants, attractions,
etc, We truly enjoyed our comfortable stay in
this beautiful airbnb and will definitely recommend
it to others.", 'Excellent staying experienced! We checked in before Christmas, and the host put a lot of effort into decorating the home, including the Christmas tree and balloons. There are many great restaurants nearby and the location is perfect if you plan to visit the Central Park and Museums.', "A beautiful house that I wanna own and live at least once in my lifetime. Jenny is the best host I've ever met.. I'll be back if I have a chance to visit NY again!", 'This was our first trip to NYC as a family and it was so nice to call this gorgeous brownstone ‚Äúhome‚Äù for a few days. It was perfect for our family of four. Our teenage boys shared one room with separate beds, and my wife and I were in the adjoining room.
The neighborhood was quiet and morning walks at Central Park (only 2 blocks away) were wonderful. The subway was very close as well, making it easy to travel to all of the lower Manhattan attractions.
Jenny and Aldo were gracious hosts! They gave us great recommendations, and Taco the cat was welcoming, too!
Pizza Pete‚Äôs, Jacob‚Äôs Pickles, and Bella Luna were walkable favorite food spots. A Starbucks was around the corner, too. We‚Äôd recommend their place to anyone!', 'Amazing air B&b. Would highly recommend staying here, great location and Emily the host was fantastic.', 'This house is beautiful, well kept and very comfortable. The two bedrooms were perfect to come back to and rest after a busy day of traipsing all over the city. Proximity to the park, the subway, and lots of great restaurants makes it such a great home base. Jenny was lovely to communicate with and the common areas were stocked with tea and coffee and filtered water. Overall this was a great space that I hope to return to!', 'Rare upper west side location in a classic NYC brownstone and charming on-site hosts.', "This place is everything one might be looking for for the neighborhood experience, with absolute comfort. You can walk to so many beautiful sights, and when you're tired, the host has made it a serene home for rest--with all day espresso, space to unwind. She thought of everything and then some. The home itself was a highlight of our trip. Thank you!!", 'Emily's place was a perfect combination of location, hospitality and efficiency. She is very thorough and helpful with "insider" tips on how to get the best a from a NYC vacation. Despite the fact it's a shared space we felt right at home at her place--just the right amount of privacy and host interaction. Thanks so much for having us!', 'We spent a wonderful week in Emily‚Äôs house.
The house is beautiful and and decorated with taste and authentic antiques. The location on upper west side is perfect. Very close to two subway stations. Right next to Central Park. There are plenty of restaurants, cafes and grocery stores around the house.
The communication with Jenny (Emily‚Äôs daughter) was smooth and she was very helpful.
We can‚Äôt wait for our next visit!', 'If perfection was a picture! This was the best ive slept in years. The host was amazing. New York should show this place in a magazine', 'Hosts were extremely responsive to questions and super friendly. Location was great for subway stop and area felt very safe. The house itself is beautifully decorated and full of character. Jenny‚Äôs local recommendations were spot on!', 'There were three of us and family who visited. We had a lovely time. Emily, Jenny and Aldo were most helpful, the location meant that we could avail of all kinds of cuisines, walk in Central Park every morning and get to downtown on the metro easily. Would highly recommend.', "I loved Emily + Jenny's place. They really go out of their way to make you feel like a resident of the UWS. From amenities to space and communication, everything was easy and comfortable.", 'Emily‚Äôs space is comfortable, safe, quiet, clean & private. She provided water, beverages, bakery, refrigerator & utensils. Top notch hospitality & hosting‚Ä¶thank you!', 'A wonderful stay in an archetypal brownstone. Very helpful and friendly hosts.', 'Loved our time! Awesome pastries and tea selection.', "My family and I would all recommend this Airbnb. Great location for subway connections to other parts of Manhatten.
The house had a great feel. There were two stand out things on the mantlepiece.....you'll have to go there to find out what they are.
Jenny was great and helpful.
No negatives.", 'What an amazing place to stay. Historic home impeccably maintained. Jenny is the best host we‚Äôve ever had. She took care of everything in this house. So responsive and gracious. The location is perfect only 2 blocks to central park and easy walking distance to natural history museum and The Met. This place blew away our expectations, i cant recommend it more. Great coffee and tea set up in the living room area was so convenient with everything you need. What a wonderful way to spend a weekend in new york.', 'The brownstone is in a great location to museums, Central Park, public transportation, and different options for dining be it Mexican, Mediterranean, etc. or formal to casual. The building is on a quiet block for NYC and inside architecturally gives the flavor of how homes used to be built with high, vaulted ceilings, large windows, stylized woodwork and long hallways north to south optimizing the space the brownstone occupies. The comfortable bedding and soft towels were a plus. The host met us and took us around when we arrived. She also graciously left us a pastry breakfast our first morning there along with coffee, tea and hot and cold water from a dispenser. A real taste of NYC upper west side living!', 'Emily and her daughter, Jenny, made sure we had everything we needed from start to finish. They provided pastries and a variety of drinks for breakfast and were very helpful with suggestions and directions for the things we wanted to do. We loved the house, so historic and fascinating and quaint. Would definitely visit again.', 'Perfect hosts, the house is gorgeous and the location is prime. We couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied with our stay.', 'Beautiful home and lovely hosts. Jenny was so accommodating when cancelled flights delayed arrival and departure. This helped make the holiday stress free which was very much appreciated. Lots of amenities provided for guests, including toiletries.
The place is near good transport links and a short walk to Central Park and some excellent restaurants.
And finally, the review would not be complete without a special shout out for the very friendly resident cat!
All in all a wonderful stay, and would highly recommend. Thank you Jenny.', 'Lovely home and gracious host. Interesting history of the home and family. Loved our stay there.', "Most charming place to stay, can't believe how lucky we were to find this. Emily was such a kind host giving us multiple tips on where to eat and what to see. A huge success wherever we went. It was a father with two sons trip (20y and 15y). Would come back anytime to this wonderful place.", 'Thank you, Emily, for sharing you lovely, interesting and beautiful Brownstone home with me for a most enjoyable week. You have a lovely and quiet neighborhood and your suggestions on local restaurants were most helpful. I loved being able to go downstairs in the mornings and make a cup of coffee and relax in you interesting parlor. I was greeted with such warmth and graciousness into your home that it made me want to come back soon.', 'We loved staying here, beautiful old house full of interesting things. Spacious, homely and comfortable. Hosts very welcoming, left us some good tips of what to do and see, and let us check out later which was really appreciated, especially with the stormy weather! Unlimited cool filtered water and coffee pods a bonus ! Great local area with lovely restaurants. Thank you, we go home with lovely memories', 'PERFECT! We were greeted upon arrival with a tour and easy to follow instructions for living in the beautiful and interesting space provided. The host indicated her open availability for questions or any needs should any arise. We fully enjoyed our stay‚Ä¶great neighborhood, easy access to transportation and good food. we look forward to our next visit.', 'Extremely nice and helpful hosts. The apartment is in a perfect location close to Central Park. Clean and lovingly furnished. Highly recommended.', 'This place is amazing! Beautifully decorated, nice and quit area with a direct subway line both uptown and downtown, and great aminities as coffee and water and a small refrigerator. We loved staying at Emily and Jenny‚Äôs.', "Jenny and Emily hosted very well. The facilities inside the house are also very antique and beautiful. Jenny always asked and checked if there was anything uncomfortable while we were staying in this house, which was very impressive. It was my first trip to New York and I think I spent it in a really nice house, so it's meaningful and I'll stay here again for the next chance! Thank you so much to them! And they are very good musicians. Also there is a cat in the house and it is really nice and cute.", 'We loved our stay at Emily‚Äôs! The house was more spacious than any hotel in NYC that we‚Äôve stayed in before and was perfect for our family and is great value. We loved the character of the house and neighbourhood and was a haven to return to for a cup of tea at the end of the day and she generously provided cakes for us. It was walkable to two subways and Emily provided great local info for food and activities. We were recommended Emily‚Äôs place to stay by friends who have also stayed with their family and am passing the recommendation on to friends and work colleagues.', 'What an absolute delight. My wife, adult daughter, and I visited New York for a week, and we couldn‚Äôt have dreamed of a better location, a richer experience, or a more welcoming host. Jenny not only made sure we had everything we needed; she also has top-notch recommendations for dining, entertainment, off-the-beaten path sights, and getting around New York. The living space is ample, comfortable, and quiet. This is a beautiful home with a rich history, and hosts who are amazing and talented people. All the reviews are spot-on ‚Äì just a great, great experience. We truly look forward to visiting again. Thank you!', 'Lovely and quite place with a great host. Close to Central Park and to metro. This will be my home in NY for future. Perfect', 'This is a great location that is walkable to so many things. The host was so friendly and treated us like friends that were there for a visit. There is plenty of privacy, and you basically have two floors of the house to yourself. Coming and going is easy and you can‚Äôt really hear the other people in the home at all.
There was a printout with all kinds of activity and restaurant recommendations and tips on getting around. The beds were comfy and everything was really clean. This is a really charming little brownstone! We would stay here again!', 'Emily‚Äôs place was amazing! We had an incredible stay. Her and Jenny were very responsive and understanding throughout our time. The space is beautifully decorated, the beds were comfortable, the rooms were spacious and there was everything you could need. The location is very close to the subway and the park and felt peaceful and safe. We will definitely be returning. I couldn‚Äôt recommend more!', 'We had an amazing stay. I can strongly recommend to stay in the apartment. All you need for a full NYC stay is available and the hospitality of the hosts is outstanding.', 'Awesome City and a beautiful appartement with a super nice host, little snacks with good connection to the city center / downtown. Big plus for every Jazzmusic-fan :)', 'We liked it very much, quiet central location.', 'Jenny, Aldo, and Taco were a great family.
Her house everything was perfect! (location, rooms, restaurants)
If I visit New York again next time, I will definitely stat there again.
My daughter and me missed Taco(cat) a lot!', "Jenny's and Emily's place was very clean, comfortable, and spacious. The bathroom was spotless, linens were clean and fresh, and the beds comfortable. It was wonderful to be in a space with such big, beautiful windows that also was nice and warm (we visited early March, so although fairly cool outside, it was delightfully warm and cozy inside with radiators). There was always fresh drinking water, tea, and good coffee available. Location was great - a 5 min walk to a major subway line. We could get wherever we wanted in the city on the subway, and it was nice to have a place with a neighborhoody feel to come back to as home-base. Jenny was a great host: flexible and a good, responsive communicator. She took time upon our arrival to answer all our questions and help us get settled. She clearly took care in ensuring we had a good stay. And we did! We were guests in her home, and there was mutual respect for/a good balance between communication and privacy.", "Emily's place is in an area that feels safe and accessible to many local eateries. The Subway and Bus Lines are less than a 10 minute walk. The west side of Central Park is also a short walk away. The area is quiet and peaceful. The time we were there felt comfortable and though our host lived there, they remained out of sight, as if they weren't there. I recommend anyone planning a trip to Manhattan should stay here. The price is worth it, much better than a hotel, and more comfortable. Our host was exceptional.", 'We stayed at Emily‚Äôs house for a few days and it was just georgeous. Everything was perfect, it was very private. Emily‚Äôs daughter Jenny prepared many informations for us and she was always available in case you have any questions or need help. The house itself has a real character and is a typical N.Y. Brownstone. We felt very comfortable and definitely would like to come back. In the last couple of years we often booked via AirBnb our holiday homes and this one was one of the best stays we ever had. Thank you so much for your warm hospitality, Jenny!', 'We always love staying here. It‚Äôs convenient to subway and Central Park and has many great restaurants within blocks.', 'I highly recommend staying here while you visit the city. The hospitality, the beautiful location and a beautiful brownstone makes your stay in the big city that much easier.', 'Great location and comfortable place. The host was very helpful and friendly. In a perfect world‚Ä¶the accommodations would include a small refrigerator, coffee maker and microwave üòä
We would definitely return! We had a great time!', 'What an amazing experience. I have never stayed anywhere with such gracious hospitality. Beautiful clean brownstone.I just cant say enough about how well we Loved Jenny and her beautiful home and kindness.', 'Emily and Jenny are perfect hosts! Always responsive and super nice. The accommodation is super nice, is great to know the city, and there are a lot of good restaurants, cafes and dinners. We enjoyed our stay and had a great time - thanks again and best regards üññ', 'This is a beautiful, historic brownstone on the Upper West Side. It is within walking distance of many great places to eat, the metro, and Central Park. Jenny and Emily really are wonderful, hospitable (super!) hosts. The house is full of charm and you have the second and third floors to roam around. After we checked in, Jenny showed us around our spaces and then we didn‚Äôt see them again. It was a great choice for a long weekend in NY.', 'Apartment as described, easy to reach by metro (several lines nearby) and less than 10 minutes from Central Park (close to the tank).
The beds are very cozy and the rooms nice. Jenny welcomed us with great kindness and was attentive.', 'Perfect location for a real experience of Manhattan living while visiting New York. Exceptional property and very gracious, communicative hosts. Immaculately kept and a great neighbourhood. We had a very memorable family visit here and would highly recommend this as a place to stay. We hope to return soon.', 'Fantastic stay in a wonderful brownstone in a great location minutes away from central park and within walking distance to most of the museums. Hosts couldn‚Äôt have been more helpful and we were spoilt with amazing pastries during our stay. Can‚Äôt recommend highly enough.']

title: King Suite in Townhouse
all_reviews:
['My girlfriend did the check in for us, and she had a great experience meeting Eric! He was very welcoming and helpful. His place is beautiful and close to metros around that will help you reach anywhere you want to go in the city!
I would definitely recommend this place for anyone that‚Äôs looking to spend time close to the city, but still prefers a quiet and private place to spend their evenings!', 'Eric welcomed us very nicely and showed us everything in the house exactly. The room was very large and beautiful and there was nothing missing! The bathroom had to be shared, however, we never noticed that the bathroom was used by others. We felt very comfortable.', "Wonderful place to stay!
Pro:
- Eric was very responsive
- Very spacious room and looks exactly like the pictures
- More than enough towels and linen
- Provided free bottled water, juice, snacks, and instant food
- The surrounding area was quiet and very close to the subway
- Even though you're sharing the bathroom with the host, Eric only uses it early in the morning
Con:
- Wasn't sure if this was a shoes-off household, but the floor was kinda dusty in the room
- Since it is an old building, the floors are really thin and you can hear people walking on the upper floor. Wasn't a problem for us, but might be a problem for people who are light sleepers", 'We stayed at Eric‚Äôs house on our most recent trip to NYC because we were going to see a couple Yankees games. It was super convenient for us. Eric was an attentive host but still provided lots of privacy.', 'Everything was good. Next time I go to New York, I will go again.', "Apartment in a classic house in The Bronx neighborhood. The apartment is spacious and occupies one floor of the property. It's bright with a street view, the king size bed is comfortable.
Eric met us on arrival and explained the instructions on how to access the house and other useful details.
One street away is the main street with local shops and there is also a nearby shopping mall with a large supermarket. The subway station is 5 minutes away and in 20 minutes you can reach Manhattan. It's a great option to enjoy New York and discover the Bronx neighborhood.
Thank you to Eric for his kindness and flexibility for arrival and departure."]

title: One King room at Brooklyn
all_reviews: ['This is a nice hotel room in a nice hotel in downtown Brooklyn. There are a ton of shops and restaurants nearby, and the subway is close too. Check-in was easy and there is a good restaurant and bar in the hotel itself.', 'Convenient to subways, shopping and restaurants. Front desk folks were friendly and efficient.', 'The room and bathroom were impeccably clean and exceeded our expectations. In terms of the common spaces, the gym was clean and well equipped and the lobby was great to work from. All the front desk staff were very friendly and helpful. There are also two cafes steps from the hotel which were nice to work from as well. The surrounding area felt safe to walk late at night. Overall, 10/10 experience and would stay here again!', 'This hotel is in a great neighborhood with plenty good restaurants close by and shopping, it also in a great location to take the subway with many train options just down the street. Hotel is modern, clean and very friendly staff.', 'This hotel was a lot bigger than expected! The front desk workers were very nice and helpful with everything. The rooms are pretty quiet for the most part. I was very comfortable with no issues at all. The rooms were very clean. It was the best place to stay for a getaway from home. Not to mention it was very close to a lot of restaurants, stores, and even museums. I really enjoyed my stay and when I come back to visit I will be booking again. Thank you!', 'Great stay, only issue was all the hidden fees.']

title: Luxury condo with stunning Manhattan skyline view
all_reviews:
['Loved this apartment. It‚Äôs elegant and stylish and very close to subway, I was in Times Square in 13-14 minutes. The view of Manhattan from the balcony is gorgeous. Perfect for individuals and families. The host is also very attentive and communicative.', 'Great host, quick to reply.', 'Just a beautiful apartment. Lovely view especially at night. Loved the style of the space and how modern it is. Really nice host. Will book again for my next trip.', 'Beautiful condo, with beautiful view. Lots of restaurants at walking distance.
Super responsive and accommodating.
Will definitely be back!', 'Very responsive with excellent communication. Spacious apartment in nice building and easy accessibility to subway. Appreciate the hospitality!!', 'Both Humberto and his property were fantastic! Reservations on the front end were professional and efficient. Humberto met us at the property upon check in and provided a thorough tour/orientation, and offered travel tips and dining recommendations. He also checked in during our stay to ensure everything was perfect. The space is gorgeous, well maintained and close to everything. Staying together in one space was leagues better than any NYC hotel we have stayed in. Can‚Äôt wait to return.', 'It‚Äôs the second time we go to Humberto‚Äôs house, and it‚Äôs definitely the perfect spot in New York, near from the subway, 5 min walking. In 30 minutes you are at Times Square for example! Many good stores around, like Whole Foods, where you can find best foods and many other things, it‚Äôs also near of many outlets stores, like Nike Gap, where best sales is! You are choosing the best stay in New York!', 'Spectacular view. Amazing host. Close to restaurants and Whole Foods. 3 min walk to subway. Overall, great experience. Highly recommend.', "We had a great time here, and Ali was super easy to book with and helped us get up to speed with the apartment right away. He answered all of my questions promptly before booking, and made sure we were comfortable and settled in once we got there. He also checked in to make sure were having a good stay. Spacious and roomy for a group of friends or family. The place is very stylish with a great ambiance. Comfortable beds, sofas and chairs to lounge and sleep in. Plenty of linens and extra towels. The view was amazing, with a fantastic and expansive balcony that you could even grill on, which isn't super common in NYC. Building had a nice gym with plenty of equipment, and the place is near most of the best restaurants / attractions / movie theater in Harlem. Its also a few blocks from Whole Foods and has a supermarket of its own right downstairs. Also close to the major subway lines. Great hosts, location and apartment! Would definitely stay here again!", 'Absolutely Amazing all the way around. The host and the place are all you could ask for ! 20 out of 10 . We will definitely be back.', 'An absolutely amazing host. Very quick responses and was very attentive making sure that we settled in comfortably. Provided suggestions for things to do and places to eat. The apartment was amazing also. Very clean and spacious. Bathrooms are beautiful and the balcony gives you a great view of the downtown skyline. 10/10 and I would definitely stay here again!', 'Good. Loved it. Will stay again next time.', '5 stars across the board. Ali & Humberto were great hosts that made everything easy while staying at their place. Ali did a great job of communicating and making sure that the stay I had was exceptional. The house is very homey and beautiful with a sense of 80‚Äôs and 90‚Äôs luxury while also having a modern touch. The view from the patio is immaculate as well. Will definitely be staying at Ali‚Äôs and Humberto‚Äôs place the next time in NYC.', 'Perfect spot near the metro with a lot of space and equipment! Very good for family!
Bruno Belgium', "The room is absolutely stunning and spotless. The location is fantastic, making travel a breeze. I can reach the subway in just a few minutes' walk and get to any place I want to go.
Ali has been incredibly helpful and patient in solving any issues I've had. My trip to New York has been perfect because of this.
I'll definitely stay here again when I come to New York in the future.", 'Enjoyed our stay. Ali extremely helpful and responsive. Enjoyed coffee and amazing views on private rooftop.', "I overwhelmingly recommend the host and the apartment. It's beautiful, the Manhattan skyline is beautiful and the host is incredible. Absolutely will request another visit alone. The apartment is perfect for a visit to NYC.", 'Such a beautiful home base for a stay in NYC!', "Humberto and Ali have a very nice apartment, very well maintained and tastefully furnished. It is very well equipped and the bedding is comfortable. Beautiful balcony with beautiful views of the city. The apartment is close to shops and the metro. Central Park and Time Spare are also within walking distance for people who like to walk around. The neighborhood is quiet and pleasant. Communication was very easy, Ali is always available even very early in the morning or late at night. Ali and Humberto were also flexible for dropping off and picking up luggage, which we greatly appreciated. We had a great time, I recommend Humberto and Ali's apartment!", 'Had a great stay!
Host was great =)', 'Ali was very professional and helpful. The place was beautiful and super convenient. Top choice in the area']

title: Cozy Room in the Heart of NYC!
all_reviews: ['very good location and roommate is nice, the place is very noisy because the building is very old.', 'Great crash pad in such a convenient and central location.', 'I stayed in this apartment for 2 weeks. Great value for Manhattan. I am a woman who was traveling solo and enjoyed the location in a central and secure neighborhood.\nThe room matches the description, small but comfortable with a good air conditioning system. The kitchen and the bathroom deserve a little refresh but are quite clean and functional. In addition, Mikey who shares the other room in the apartment is friendly and friendly. To all people who are on a budget and want to stay in Manhattan I recommend 100%', 'What you see is what you get - a simple crashpad in a great location!', 'Great location!', 'horrible place, the bed was horrible.\nI was only in the place for 5 minutes and I went to a hotel']

title: Modern and Spacious 2- Bedroom Condo/NEAR NYC
all_reviews:
['This place looks just like it did on the photos, super clean and everything you would need for a short stay. The place is located just outside main Manhattan but it‚Äôs so easy to get a bus in (the bus I located 1 min walk from the flat and we never waited longer than 2 mins for the bus which take you straight to Times Square)
Maissel was great, she lives out of state but she was quick to respond to everything & sent someone over within the hour to replace batteries on the electric door.
Personally I loved staying here as it‚Äôs just a stone throw away from the city but you can escape the chaos of it all in this quite flat. Aldi super market 10 min away, amazing bagel place just down the road and liquor stores easy to get to as well. HIGHLY recommend to stay here üòÅ', 'Nicely decorated apartment, functional and well located, just one bus stop away from NYC.', 'This is a great find ten minutes away from Times Square. Save some $$ and stay here instead in the city!', 'We spent 6 nights with 2 teenagers. The location of the apartment is perfect! 2 min walk to first bus stop. Buses run very often. In less than 10 minutes we are in NY by bus.
A laundromat is a few minutes walk from the apartment. Very convenient too.
A supermarket is also within walking distance.
The accommodation is impeccable. Maissel is very good tips and very responsive in communication. We had a great time in Avignon. I highly recommend it!', 'Maissel was always at our disposal and attentive to our stay, he provided us with the permission to park and left us a folder with the things that could be done in the area. The apartment was spotless, we loved the decorations (excellent taste), beds and all the super comfortable furniture, literally around the corner from the apartment is the bus stop that leads to NY, it is the last stop in 15 minutes if there is no traffic, the cost is about $3 or $4 per person. Excellent location, if at some point I return to NJ for sure I would rent it again. The place is just as shown in the photos.', 'We Stayed here for 8 days and it was so relaxing to come home after a busy day in New York to a super clean and comfy apartment.
New York is just a 10minute bus ride, which is easily caught at the end of the road.
There is some road noise but no more than expected from staying on the outskirts of a major city.
We felt comfortable walking around the local area after dark. I highly recommend the view point at Hamilton Park on Boulevard East, the views both day and night of New York are something special.
The ferry from Hoboken or Weehawken too Downtown New York make a great change from the bus and tube.
Overall, we had a great time.
Thanks again.', 'Great Airbnb! Just a short Uber ride to the harbor and into NYC. My friends and I attended a convention at the Javits center and this was a perfect location.', "Pleasant stay at Maissel's, very comfortable apartment. Everything is provided for the toilet (towels, shower gel) and for breakfast (coffee)!
Very easy access to New York with the NJ transit bus that passes by the accommodation and very often, great!
Thank you for everything! I would highly recommend it.", 'Great location. Easy check in system. Updated and clean place. Only a tunnel away from NYC. Bargain!!', 'Would have been helpful to get a later check out or provide luggage storage possibilities as our flight was in the night', 'Great location to the city, nice and spacious, updated interiors, and Maissel was very responsive.', 'I have stayed 3 nights at Maissel place for NYC marathon. It was perfect. Close to Manhattan by NJ bus. The flat is clean, well equipped and modern. Communication was perfect and Maissel was very reactive to answer my questions
Thank you', "Maissel's place was just perfect for us.
Spacious enough for 3 adults (one is a teenager but size-wise ), clean, warm, and well equipped. The shower is great with abundant hot water running, the kitchen has a dream oven and everything. The building itself looks rather simple but Maissel's place is very nice.
It took us a bit of time to understand the bus system, as the NJ transit website (and Port authority) is not so straightforward for foreigners like us. But once we understood how it works, it was no problem. We waited no more than 5 min to get on a bus to NY.
The view from the waterfront, Hamilton park was just stunning! Nice supermarket within 10-20 minutes walk.
Thank you very much Maissel.
We enjoyed our stay .", 'Well decorated, clean and good location apartment. The bus to New York is a 3-minute walk away and it passes buses very often. It takes 15 minutes to get to New York. 2 supermarkets to do your shopping 8 minutes on foot. Towels and beds made upon arrival. TVs on the walls in both bedrooms and in the living room. Convenient kitchen. Road noise is not inconvenient.
Maissel is responsive to the phone.
Just a dishwasher and a washing machine are missing.
I highly recommend this place.', 'The place was clean and the beds were comfortable. The kitchen had all amenities and the place was spotless. It was a short commute to NYC in a port authority bus. I would definitely recommend', 'We had a great time and it was a lovely stay!!', 'thanks', 'A very nice place to stay if you want to spend your days in NYC !! No complaints from us! If you are sensitive to outside noise from the traffic would suggest ear plugs but we slept great!', "Great stay! The apartment is bigger than you could imagine in the photos. Very good comfort except the noise from the road that goes to New York: it's bothersome at night and so you have to provide earplugs.
For the rest, the beds are very comfortable, there are large closets, the kitchen is very well equipped, the TVs are great. For people with limited mobility attention as there are a few steps to get into the apartment and there is no shower it is a bathtub.
For the location it's great: the buses are next door (be careful, these are NJ Transit goals and not those in New York). The app is not necessarily available on all mobile phones, so it's best to buy tickets at the Port Authority Bus Terminal. Likewise be careful of the numbers as not all stop on the return New York -> Union City. The 123 always stops for the others it is better to ask the driver. There are buses very frequently and at any time even in the night.
Close to the apartment there are several restaurants and grocery stores. There's also a Whole Foods for those who want organic, especially (but not just!). In addition, you have a beautiful view of New York.
A very good choice for a very good value for money in a city where everything is overpriced.
In addition, Maissel is available and responds quickly. So this is a great place to visit New York!", 'We came to NYC for a quick family Christmas trip. Maissels place was perfect! We are a family of five which includes a 19 year old, 17 year old and a 10 month old. There was enough space for all of us. Very family friendly and so easy to get to and from Manhattan by bus. It was super clean. Maissel texted to make sure everything was okay during our trip. All in all a great experience! We would definitely come back and stay here.', 'Maissel was great host. She was very communicative and gave us tips and suggestions on what to do around the area. Her place was perfect. I would definitely recommend her place.', 'The space had everything we needed for a comfortable stay, and then some. One highlight was the well-stocked kitchen, complete with coffee supplies ‚Äì a lifesaver for those slow mornings or cozy evenings in.
Additionally, the ease of finding parking was a pleasant surprise, eliminating any unnecessary stress from our trip.', 'Great place to say if you will be traveling into NYC and don‚Äôt mind paying the Lincoln tunnel toll fee. Spacious enough for 3 people and Maissel was very proactive with food and store recommendations.', 'Great location for us since we were trying to avoid high prices during a weekend in Manhattan. Quick access to the Lincoln Tunnel made commuting downtown easy. The unit was very clean and while not large was more spacious than expected. Would recommend if you are looking for an alternative to a Manhattan hotel.', 'Although we were concerned initially about getting to and from the property. It was actually very easy. That could be a little clearer on the description of the property. All the kitchen equipment was new and the property was clean and fresh. The beds were really comfortable. Thank you for letting us stay at your lovely
Property.', 'Very beautiful and cozy apartment as promised.', 'The apartment was perfectly located and extremely clean! The host was friendly, helpful, and was quick to answer messages. I would most definitely stay here again.', 'Had a great stay at this lovely apartment.
Place was spotless and had everything you need to enjoy your stay.
Was only a quick walk to the bus stop to get the bus to the heart of Manhattan .
Local area had some nice eating places within a 10 min walk.
would recommend this place.', 'An excellent place to stay with family. One minute away from the NJ bus stop that they drop you off at midtown Manhattan in 10 minutes. The area is very quiet and safe. And the apartment is very comfortable and clean. Everything you need to spend a week.
Special attention from Maissel. Awaiting from us and very resolved with an incident, outside of it, that we had the day of return.
5 star home.', 'Had a super nice stay. Host is thoughtful and even brought new towels.
NYC 10 min by bus whose bus stop is a 1-minute walk.', "location is critical in NY and environs. And Maissels place is quite superb. it's a hop, skip and jump away from the bus stop that takes you right into Port Authority in NYC from where everything is closeby.
Maissels place is exactly as described. we didn't use the place much except to sleep, and have coffee.
the best piece was Maissel. what a responsive, helpful, proactive host. can't recommend them enough.
strongly recommended", 'We had nice and short visit, thank you for accommodating us on a short notice', 'Great place to stay. Hope to stay again.', 'Great location and host was lovely', 'Great place to stay, 10 minutes walk to the ferry to get you into New York. Some noise at night but expected being so close to NY. Maissel is very kind and proactive in offering directions and suggestions.', 'My siblings and I stayed at Maissel‚Äôs for a 3 night stop to visit NY city! It was such a great place and location. If I‚Äôm ever visiting NYC or NJ area, I would definitely like to stay here again and would recommend it to anyone who wants to do the same.', "Location is awesome if you are visiting NYC, it's only a 10-15 minute bus ride with buses constantly going by. The place is very clean and is stocked with lots of necessities including coffee which was really nice. The bed linens were very clean and tons of bath towels were provided. Additionally, there was a nearby apartment (upstairs?) with a dog that barked continuously throughout the day and early morning, making it challenging to sleep in (outside of the owner's control, but simply sharing).
Nonetheless, the positives outweighed the negatives, and I would absolutely stay here again!", 'Great stay & great host! Super close to NYC!', 'Will stay again !', 'Things were great and it met our needs. A spacious apartment and comfortable furniture.', "My family and I really enjoyed our stay at Maissel's place. I look forward to it.üëçüèª', "This AirBnb was exactly how it was described and how the pictures looked. VERY nice place...like a small condo but enough space to lounge and have time away from others if need be, since there were two bedrooms plus the living room and dining room off the living room. Maissel communicated back and forth with me easily when I was booking the place and a few times during our stay when I had questions. There are convenient bus stops nearby, as well as a great mom & pop store one block away. We didn't discover it until the last day. Wished we would have sooner! We would definetely stay here again. Two side notes...if you're not used to city noise, bring ear plugs. You can hear quite a bit of noise at night, but once I put in my ear plugs, I slept well. Also, the kitchen has the bare essentials but could use more dish towels, some oven mitts, and mixing bowls. Overall, just a wonderful place!", 'Very nice apartment. Tastefully decorated. Only a couple meters away from the bus station for NYC.
Very friendly and helpful. Check in easy and well thought through.
Kitchen has everything you need. Shopping in the immediate vicinity.
I would like to come back', 'Place was great, exactly how the pictures show, comfortable and super close to bus stop to easily pop into NYC. Maissel was very responsive and helpful. Would recommend for your visit to NYC if you don‚Äôt want to stay right in Manhattan.', 'Amazing space. Clean and had everything we needed. Also super close to the city. MAJOR PLUS', 'This was our third stay at Maissel‚Äôs place. It‚Äôs a nice place with everything we need. Very convenient for us. We will be to staying here again in the future, if it‚Äôs available.', 'This place was such a great find and perfect for exploring. Just a short bus ride and you are downtown with buses so regular we never waited more than a few minutes. Fare is $3.50 each way. The bus arrives and leaves from the port authority which can be a bit confusing initially.
Apartment itself is spotless, with new kitchen and bathroom, supplied with everything you need.
Maissel was the perfect host, he answered any queries we had with extra info and even checked we were ok after a quake warning (we felt nothing!).
I would really recommend as a great value option.', 'excellent location. get bus to NYC x1 stop and same on return
excellent option. accomodation clean and comfortable', 'Lovely place if you want to be close to manhattan. Easy access to bus that takes you to NY. Also lovely to stay so close to Hudson River. I can on the waterfront every day!', 'Maissel was very available to help us throughout the stay. The place is well kept and pleasant. No neighborhood problems. Very nice bedding and silky sheets. Bus stop for New York very close. For the return, request the Palisade Avenue stop. A very good place to stay on holidays.', 'Great location and pristine apartment. We had a fantastic stay.', 'Very clean, true to images posted, easy to get to and from the city using public transportation. Would definitely stay here again!', 'Place is just advertised! Favorite part was location.. one bus stop away from Manhattan. Maissel was very accommodating to any requests and always available via messages. Would recommend.', 'Awesome place, great host, convenient to Manhattan.']

Such a kind soul, checked on us if we were alright during the day. Had some nice recommendations for NYC and shared a really good wine and coffee with us! Everything was great! Thank you so much, we had a really good time thanks to you! ü•∞', 'Carl is very friendly and caring. I absolutely felt at home. He is an excellent host. One of my most favorite Airbnb stays. Definitely will stay at Carl‚Äôs if I go back to NYC.', 'We visited NY for the first time and fell in love with it. We stayed at Carl‚Äôs and our stay couldn‚Äôt have been better. He gave us a lot of good advices and they were all fantastic. Carl is so nice, we already miss him! Have a glas of wine with Carl on his terrace, it makes your trip unforgettable!', 'Carl was simply AMAZING!!!!!!!! What a beautiful soul and human being. The apartment was gorgeous and the terrace is absolutely beautiful. Clean, simple, organized! I just loved it. Carl left us things to have some breakfast in the morning was constantly texting me to make sure we were good and did not need anything.. He was just absolutely amazing. I would def go back there. Thank you sooo much for being so incredible!', 'Carl is a very welcoming host who can quickly become your friend!
The apartment is very comfortable, very clean and feels like home.
The kitchen is fully equipped, and everything was perfect.
Thanks again', 'Carl is very nice :)', 'Carl is the sweetest host, he knew all of the local spots to see and will make you feel right at home in his beautifully curated apartment. I would definitely love to stay again someday.', 'Carl is a very welcoming host and we had a wonderful stay at his place. Everything was impeccable! üôÇ Carl is very responsive, friendly, gives very good tips and very good addresses! It was a real pleasure to have a host like him üôÇ The room was very clean as well as the bathroom, everything was very nice! In addition, Carl was very flexible and accommodating during our arrival and departure üôÇ', "Absolutely loved staying with Carl! He was extremely communicative and super responsive both before I checked in and during my stay. Loved the apartment and appreciated how close it was to the 2/3. The bed was really comfortable, and I honestly felt right at home. I'd definitely stay here again the next time I'm in New York!", "I recently had the pleasure of staying at Carl's Airbnb and I must say, it was an incredible experience. Carl was excellent from start to finish, making sure we had everything we needed and more. He even went out of his way to help us with entry and exit from the apartment when we were having trouble getting there due to unforeseen circumstances.
The apartment itself was impeccably decorated with a beautiful aesthetic that showed off Carl's impeccable taste. Not only was it stylish, but it was also incredibly clean and well-maintained, making us feel right at home from the moment we arrived.
The space was very comfortable and had all the amenities we needed for a pleasant stay. The bed was cozy and the living area was spacious enough for us to relax and unwind after a long day exploring the city.
Overall, Carl was amazing and made our stay truly unforgettable. I highly recommend Carl's Airbnb to anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and welcoming home away from home.", 'Where to start ?
Carl's appartment is luminous, incredibly clean and confortable, beautifully decorated with a great taste in art. You'll find everything you need and more.

But above all, the main asset to the place is Carl himself. Best host EVER ! He made us feel at home, made sure we had everything we needed and felt comfortable. It was so nice to share a glass of wine together and to chat about New York, travels and life.
As we say in french, it's a "p√©pite", a place not to be missed !
Hope to see you again in Paris Carl !', "Carl is an excellent host, very helpful but also tactful, who ensured that we made the most of our visit to the city. We didn't have time to enjoy the balcony, but it ilooks terrific. The bed was a full double and very comfortable. We wouldn't hesitate to stay there again, when we are next in New York."]

title: Stylish Loft in East Midtown NYC! #4402
all_reviews: ['Nice location and good space. title: Cozy Private Room. 15 min to Manhattan (Marilyn)
all_reviews:
['Good location that was quiet and close to the subway for easy access to Manhattan. The room was a good size for new york and had functionality for storage. I would have liked to see the room a little cleaner. There was a grease stain on the sheet, thick dust on top of the picture over the bed, spots on the wall and lampshade. There is also no bed frame so just a mattress and box spring on the floor. I felt safe and is a good option if you mainly just need a place to sleep while visiting NYC.', "The facilities, location, and price are all satisfactory! It was close to the subway station, so it was quick and easy to get to Manhattan. The surroundings are nice and quiet.
It was also nice to use the shared kitchen and bathroom! I stayed with about 2 or 3 teams during my stay, and there was no inconvenience:) Often there was a rating of 'the bathroom wasn't clean', but I think that's different for everyone. I didn't feel uncomfortable.
There is also a large grocery store within a 10-minute walk, so I used it conveniently. There are also a lot of Korean ingredients from Korean Martra!
Above all, the accommodation in the center of Manhattan was very expensive, but Andres's place is lower than that, and the facilities are goodüëç!", 'Andres was friendly and quick to respond to messages. This cute room is great for a single traveler or couple. Located in a neighborhood full of restaurants, shops, a theater, and public transit... it has it all! I will definitely be coming back to this listing for my next time in the city!', 'good location', 'I had a delightful stay! Highly recommended host! Thank you.', "Our stay was very pleasant. Andres allowed us to leave our backpacks in the house since we arrived very early. The place is quiet, pleasant and with everything you need. It's very close to the subway so it's very easy to get around. We highly recommend the place."]

title: Chic and Modern Bed Stuy 2br
all_reviews:

title: Brooklyn Retreat for Cat Lovers - with backyard!
all_reviews:
['I only stayed with Christophe and Felix for 4 days with my two children (12 and 13 years). We felt like at home from the first moment. Everything was as described, we were always able to ask questions, but also had our privacy. The cats are really very sweet, they would never scratch or bite and enjoy any petting. Many thanks to Christophe and Felix for the little piece of peace and quiet and home in a city as vibrant as New York.', 'Not only the place is super comfortable, private and has a nice garden, but the hosts and the two queens Tana and Asimi (gorgeous cats) made us felt right at home. Also the neighborhood is beautiful, has a lot to offer, and the apartment is right next to Prospect Park which was my favorite park of NYC by far!
I would come back to Christophe‚Äôs place every time I‚Äôm in the city :)', 'Really good place!', "Our stay at Christophe's was perfect. Very friendly and well-stocked neighborhood.
The cats are adorable and super cuddly.
Accessible apartment, well equipped.
We will be back with pleasure, for the apartment and cats üòâ
Thanks to Christophe for his responsiveness.", 'Everything has been great. The neighborhood is beautiful, you have two metro stops next to the apartment that take you anywhere in Manhattan. The cats are adorable (especially Asimi) make you feel at home when you get to walk around NY. You have supermarkets very close by (I recommend the Union Market which is a pass) and the Prospect Park is next door, it is huge and with a great atmosphere. Communication with Christophe was perfect and smooth. Not a pega.', 'Christophe was a great host, always ready to help whenever we had questions. The apartment was in a very lovely neighbourhood in Brooklyn. :)', 'I loved my stay at Christoph‚Äôs
The location is in one of the nieces areas of Brooklyn, coffee places, restaurants, metro stations all just down the street. The botanical garden and Brooklyn museum also walking distance.
The bed is comfy, the room is nice and warm specially in the very cold weather we had the luck to have in our trip.
CATS!! You must love cats. This 2 sisters only want love and we had love to give. I will miss them so much
Definitely recommended
Definitely coming back.', "My partner and I had such a wonderful stay. Christophe and Felix's apartment is gorgeous, with plenty of sunlight. They were so thorough in letting us know the area -- complete with a stacked binder of nearby attractions, restaurants, and history! We had the great pleasure of meeting their cats, too, who are the sweetest greeters and exemplified the warmth of the atmosphere. Thank you for everything! Their air bnb service will stay on my radar for the next visit, and I'm going to sing their praises to anyone who is looking to stay in Brooklyn.", 'Christophe was a fantastic host, as friendly and welcoming as it gets. He is a true citizen of the world, who welcomes guests from all over the world, with the spirit of a friend. We were warmly welcomed and felt right at home, but we also had space and privacy. The location in beautiful tree-lined Park Slope is as good as it gets.
Also, as I am also a busy Airbnb host, I am interested in other hosting styles. One thing that is truly a marvel is Christophe‚Äôs elaborate guidebook! It has a wide variety of recommendations with pictures, descriptions, and even QR codes, in three languages!
Highly recommend accommodation among the charming brownstones and independent businesses of Park Slope Brooklyn.', 'Clean and well located accommodation, easy to access which allows you to navigate all of NY with the subway the bus etc.
The little ones were too cute, we took good care of them they are affectionate.
The neighborhood is great, it also allows you to see something other than Manhattan and the life of New Yorkers!
A great experience! See you soon ‚úåÔ∏è
Thank you so much to both of you!', 'The location is ideal - so close to amazing restaurants, caf√©s, metro stops, and prospect park! We were there during a major heat wave and were very comfortable inside. The shower has good water pressure, the kitchen is spacious, and the cats who share the apartment with you are the sweetest! Christophe was super friendly and responsive!', 'Loved staying here. 1st floor is ideal with luggage. The closets are great if you overpack like I do :).
The fridge in the bedroom is perfect for water and anything you want to store.
Bathroom is shared but never even thought about that.
Everything was so thought out and suggestions for the area were perfect! The cats make you feel at home if you are missing your 4 legged kids.
I all about showers and the and the pressure was amazing. Check in and check out of was so easy. Usually there are hoops to follow through but not here.
Location location. You can get to 2 different stations in minutes.
Yes we would stay here again.', 'Everything went well at the accommodation, Christophe, although not very present, was friendly by message throughout the stay. F√©lix was there and was friendly too when we met throughout our 2 weeks.
The location is ideal with access to the subway lines serving all of Manhattan within a 5-minute walk, small cafes next door, and is located in a quiet area.
The room is large enough for two with suitcases. Air conditioning was welcome. Be careful for those who need total black, the shutters are not completely closed because of the air conditioning block. However, this is decent given that the window overlooks a very small, not very bright inner courtyard.
Listing is as expected, the terrace and rooftop are a big plus.
We just found the apartment a little dirty after a week, but then a cleaning was done. Cleaning in the bathroom would have been nice.
Overall, I recommend it!', 'Very quiet room, ideal neighborhood to cross Manhattan and Brooklyn and Queens.', 'This listing is great. It was a great place for me and my two friends on a budget. Christophe and Felix are extremely nice and helpful hosts. The cats are so sweet and cuddly.', 'I had a great stay at Christophe‚Äôs place. The small apartment is located in a super nice area of Brooklyn, close to tons of cafes/bars/restaurants. You can choose between 4-5 great cafes to get your morning coffee within 1-2 blocks! Also very well connected to manhattan/airports/ etc just a short walk from the subway. Prospect park is also a short walk away. The room/bed was very comfortable and I benefited from the well-equipped kitchen. Christophe is a super friendly and responsive host. Would recommend 100%!', 'Very well located accommodation in Brooklyn. Approximately 1/2 hour by subway from Manhattan to Times Square and 35 to 40 minutes from Central Park.

Thank you Christophe and Felix', 'Amazing location and the cats are so so lovely! We had an amazing stay!:)', 'Christophe‚Äôs place was just immaculate. I hope to stay with my daughter to be accompanied by a cat.Thank you so much Tuna and Asimi for the warmth.This is the best place you can find in New York if you are a cat person.', 'I loved this apartment. Christophe and F√©lix are super friendly guys. I enjoyed chatting with them so much. The communication was extraordinarily good and I got some nice recommendations.

I highly recommend this Airbnb. One of the best I have ever been to so far. Thank you a lot, Christophe and F√©lix', 'We had a great time here. Perfect spot to get into the city while still having the luxury to relax outside the hustle and bustle.
