I would recommend the place to visit New York and its surroundings', 'As described. It exceeds expectations in every way. I would definitely stay here again.
Very neat apartment, it does justice to the pictures. Very comfortable. I host two months in winter and the cold was never a problem. The heating is very good, the entire building is very temperado always.
Super friendly and helpful hosts. Ready to help you and with many recommendations that serve to make the most of the trip. The two cats are a sweetness and enhance the experience.
Excellent accessibility to the different subways, and an omnibus stop at the door, it is very simple and quick to get to Manhattan.
The neighborhood is very nice, it feels very safe even at night. It has all basic amenities very close by. Some of the Brooklyn gems are definitely worth exploring.
Thank you for the experience. We highly recommend it.', 'Great spot! Lovely hosts :)', "My son and I had a great 6-day stay at Christophe's place, a stay we had planned for 9 months. Throughout this period, Christophe was helpful, responsive and very effective for all our questions.
The accommodation is as pictured, nicely decorated with taste, beautiful garden, nice rooftup, impeccable bathroom, and nice room with lots of storage, fridge, small desk and comfortable bed. No noise in the surroundings, the apartment does not overlook the street side. We met Christophe who is really super nice. The location is great, very close to several subway lines that take you to Manhattan in 15-20 minutes, and several quality shops within 100m and many more just further away. Super nice neighborhood, secure, with typical buildings. In short, the perfect apartment to visit Manhattan while being in Brooklyn in a lively area. Feel free to book.", "A real New York experience!
The building is amazing, especially you can't miss the rooftop, it has a very nice patio to have a nice time, and is located in a very quiet and nice neighborhood, full of restaurants and shops for whatever you need.
The train stations are really close and only about 3 stops from Manhattan.
The reason for our trip was a concert, held at Barclays Center, and it was very nice to find that it was only 10 minutes or less walking to the house, and we felt safe doing it at night.
Christophe is a very attentive, helpful, and respectful person, and leaves you the instructions and recommendations very clear üôÇ
And ok is other to say that kittens are an ace up the sleeve for this roomüò∏
Highly recommended to visit them!", 'Tanah and Asimi were so cute and the accommodation was clean! The hosts were really friendly and kind when they needed help. I want to go again next time.üòÅüòÅ', 'Amazing location, really clean and homely bedroom. Hosts are really friendly and very accommodating!!', 'Beautiful, quiet surroundings with many good cafes and restaurants, we had a great time. You can get to Manhattan relatively quickly. The photos of the accommodation and the equipment corresponded to the description, we had everything we needed. Chris and Felix were always kind and helpful, and their cats are simply amazing. Thank you!', 'great location and neighborhood. and very friendly cats!', 'Very beautiful and safe neighborhood and a very pleasant host', 'Lovely visit! Would definitely stay again', "a really lovely Brooklyn apartment in Brooklyn. Christophe and F√©lix are welcoming hosts. The room is comfortable. The metro is a stone's throw away. Breakfast at Cousin's John next door is great. In short, I would recommend this listing for your stay in NYC", 'I would have given this stay five stars if it wasn‚Äôt for the instructions for getting in. The description of the keys was wrong and the description of the location of the lock box misleading. Once inside everything was clean, quiet and pleasant. The cats were adorable and almost worth the stay themselves', 'Christophe was very friendly and welcoming. The neighborhood is safe and walkable, with nearby access to the subway. The apartment itself was clean, comfortable, and all necessary amenities were provided. Best of all were the cats!! They are super friendly and will come into your room to ask for pets, so if you‚Äôre a cat person, this is a great place!', 'Christophe and F√©lix are super nice and welcoming! And the cats Tana and Asimi are absolutely adorable. After a tiring business trip, staying at their place made me feel like going back home :) Thank you Christophe!', 'Great stay, all the other excellent reviews were correct!', 'The apartment is exactly as described. We felt very comfortable. Great location, very easily accessible by metro.
Christophe was very helpful and the cats super sweet.
i highly recommend it to the host.', "I had a lovely stay at Christophe and Felix's airbnb!! Sweet clean place with everything I needed for my night.
I LOVED the surrounding neighborhood - felt very safe as a solo female traveler and tons of cute cafes, restaurants, and shops of all kind. And super close to Prospect Park! I also loved getting to go on the roof of this airbnb apartment - what a perk to see that skyline at sunset!!!
The two kitties are very chatty and will want to constantly engage with you and be pet. I couldn't have been happier about this, but not for everyone I guess ;) Also, I noticed in their house manual in person some expectations about feeding their cats if the hosts are gone - I did not see this included in the original airbnb description so it's something to be aware of and communicate with hosts about. In my case, hosts were there so it was not relevant for me.
Thank you C and F - would happily come back!", 'Clean, comfortable, convenient. Great neighborhood. Friendly, interesting, engaging, welcoming hosts. As helpful as you need. In the middle of everything and a quiet oasis. Definitely recommended!', 'A big thank you to Christophe and F√©lix for hosting us.
They are very accommodating, very friendly and responsive guests, very friendly and responsive people
If you like cats this place is for you; they are adorable and very cuddly
Private courtyard, very nice
Easy access and several choices of activities and restaurants that hosts will be happy to recommend
We will come back without hesitating! üòä', 'Christophe and Felix‚Äôs place was amazing!!!! Super clean, easy to find parking, central location, and extremely kind hosts. The kitties will win your heart! Worth every penny, would definitely come back', "We had a great stay at Christophe and F√©lix's place. We did not have the chance to meet Christophe who even at a distance was extremely helpful and responsive. As for F√©lix, it's a man's love! We don't even speak to you about their two adorable cats... Stay at the top in a quiet environment that is super well placed and which allows a little breath in New York energy.", 'What is more to say about Christophe‚Äôs apartment that has not already been largely said by other travellers?? It was all perfect. We had an amazing stay. Christophe and Felix are great hosts. We loved the cats too :)
If you are planning to come to NY, this is the best location to stay. This area of Brooklyn is quiet and safe which is more than welcomed after a busy day in Manhattan. At the same time there are great restaurants and bars as well as supermarkets in walking distance. I don‚Äôt think you can find a better alternative to visit NY. Thank you Christophe, Felix , Tana and Assini. Hope to see you one day again (in Milan for the Salone del mobile maybe?)
H√©l√®ne and Janel', 'Christophe and F√©lix are exceptional hosts. Attentive to our every need.
The apartment is conveniently located close to all metro to reach the center.
Thank you so much for this week
Gawin L√©ana and Sabrina', 'We had a really good time at Christophe‚Äòs and Felix place.
Super friendly hosts, it was very cosy and we loved the two cute and cuddly cats.
The location of the accommodation was great, just a few minutes from the subway to walk and a good area of Brooklyn.
There are many options for food and also supermarkets near the accommodation.
We would definitely come again.', 'Its a lovely place to stay in nyc with cute cats, they are super friendly. It is very easy to access to manhattan or brooklyn area from the place literally mta station is 5 mins walk from the place. And the host are super friendly and place is exactly the same as it in the photos. I will definitely recommend if you are a cat lover and want to spend some quality time in nyc.', 'Great place to stay. Easy and convenient. Good value. Good host.', 'The place and especially the location are great. You can reach the metro in 5 minutes, a top bagel shop is right across the street, supermarkets are also about a 5 - 8 minute walk away and you can be in Manhattan in 30 minutes. In general, the surroundings for the metropolis are very quiet and also absolutely safe and harmless at night.
The accommodation offers everything you need, although the room is quite compact. Sometimes it can get a little warm in the room due to the size, but the climate in the room helps. The garden is particularly noteworthy and highly recommended, especially in the morning.
The cats are VERY outgoing and sometimes a little louder than you think at first. Here and there, there are also scratch marks (e.g. bedding) to be discovered, but nothing that is actively hindering or disturbing.
Christophe is very friendly and absolutely trustworthy.
Great host! Recommended.
Thanks a lot! :)', "Definitely love Christophe's place! The location is just great, a couple blocks away from Q line that can take me to Manhattan straight away. Neighborhood is also nice. And the room was great! My toddler son loves the cats and played with them many times. If you're looking for place to stay in Brooklyn, Christophe's is the right pick üòä", 'Thank you for staying at your lovely home with your cute cats!', 'Great place, fantastic communication, all expectations are set very well. Also I loved the cats!', 'We had a wonderful time at Christophe‚Äôs place. He and Felix were great hosts. We felt so comfortable and right at home. We had privacy but also got to have some wonderful conversations with them! Their cats were lovely, so sweet and sociable. We would absolutely come back again!!', 'I had a wonderful time at Christophe‚Äôs place even though I was only there for a day. I didn‚Äôt get a chance to meet him but he was an excellent communicator and made sure I had everything I needed and answered all questions I had. He allowed me to check in a little earlier because I gotten to NYC earier than expected. He keeps a book full of recommendations, places to visit and the area is very quiet and walkable. All in all it was a 10/10 experience and I‚Äôd recommend to anyone visiting here to book', 'Beautiful apartment, Tana and Asimi (the cats) are super friendly and lovely. We loved the neighbourhood and the house, it is easy to go to Manhattan but also Brooklyn is great.
Christophe and Felix are very kind and helpful.
We strongly recommend the place!', "Very good stay at Christophe's place.
Christophe gave us great advice!
Thank you very much for the welcome.", 'Christophe and Felix were wonderful hosts, and their kitties were an absolute delight! The location is immensely convenient for any public transit or delicious meals, the outdoor space is quiet and beautiful, and the bedroom was a perfect little sleeping space for us at night. We spent most of our trip out walking around and going to shows, but we always loved coming home to the cozy digs (and the most adorable cats EVER.) 10/10 would recommend, it‚Äôs an absolute steal for the area!', 'We had a great stay!! The location is great with lots of restaurants nearby as well as close access to the subway. Christophe, Felix, and the cats were very friendly and welcoming!', 'Super friendly hosts, comfortable room, and very friendly cats. Highly recommend staying here.', 'Recommended 100%, very good location,
thank you very much üê±üê±', 'We loved staying here! The hosts were kind, the cats are so friendly, and the location is wonderful. We especially enjoyed the rooftop access. I‚Äôd highly recommend it here', "We couldn't have asked for more from our stay with Christophe, F√©lix, and their two sweetheart cats. They're gracious, communicative, and helpful hosts and their lovely apartment is wonderfully located, clean, convenient to transit, well-equipped with thoughtful touches, and occupied by two of the most outgoing and affectionate cats I've had the pleasure to meet while traveling. My partner and I were very comfortable staying here as a queer couple and would heartily recommend Christophe's place (or return again ourselves!)", 'Had to cancel, but nice fellows.', 'Wonderful experience! Comfortable room, central location in Park Slope, friendly hosts, beautiful cats, highly recommend!', 'Great location in Park Slope. less than 10 mins to the train. Loved the restaurants around the place. The rooftop view is to die for. Loved spending time up there. Not too far from Manhattan as well.', 'We had a wonderful time! Christophe was so welcoming and friendly. The accommodation is located in a very nice neighbourhood, with everything you need in walking distance. Coffee shops, deli‚Äôs, restaurants and a metro stop close by. We loved the garden and the roof terrace, which is rare to find in NY. We would definitely recommend staying here, especially if you love cats!', 'Great place to stay, I totally recommend staying here as the hosts are really helpful!']

title: Best of the west! Sunny,quiet&huge! Ideal location
all_reviews:
['Apartment is as pictured. Modest sized, 1 bedroom apartment.
In a great location: close to park, subway, shopping, and restaurants.', 'Nice staying. Position is great. Very clean apt. Host has been always reachable! Thank you Gil', 'Great place to stay in NYC, we would definitely recommend!', 'I had beautiful stay with my children. Quiet and safe place.
The bedroom was quiet and sofabed was also comfortable.
I want to stay again. Thanks.', 'Charming, stylish apartment just off Central Park and close to public transportation. Quiet neighborhood filled with great restaurants. Host is extremely responsive and helpful. Wonderful place!', 'Great location and apartment is just as it is in the pictures. Convenient to everything', 'Great location and neighborhood', 'Excellent spot ‚Äî super well-located, great UWS access. Good amenities, we felt well set up for our vacation.', 'Experienced a true "home away from home" in the Upper West Side with a fantastic location! This rental is just minutes from Central Park, the 86th Street subway station, and within walking distance (less than a mile) of the MET, as well as numerous restaurants including Joe Coffee Company, Starbucks, Motorino Pizza, Mamoun's Falafel, and Wau. Additionally, there are convenient grocery shopping options such as Gristedes and a nearby laundromat, Park West Laundromat.
During our 9-night/10-day stay, we were able to enjoy the comforts of home and appreciated the early check-in, as our red-eye flight arrived early in the morning. The provided umbrella also came in handy during a couple of rainy days. Overall, it was a truly memorable stay and we would definitely choose to stay here again if we return to NYC.', 'Great location, spacious and clean UWS home, right next to the best restaurants yet super quiet! On the 2nd fl of walk up building.', 'We stayed for a week, combining work meetings with visits with friends and family and going to fun places in NYC. The place was extremely convenient - very easy to pop downstairs for coffee or a meal, so many good restaurants around for anyone‚Äôs taste.
The apartment was as described. Had everything we needed. Strong internet signal if you need to work from home. Great shower. The couch in the living room unfolds and can accommodate 2 people. There are a number of places within short walking distance that would have your laundry done by evening if you drop it in the morning.
The host was very responsive with any questions.
Thank you for enabling a very enjoyable stay!', 'Look no further - this is the place. A real gem on the UWS. Tastefully-appointed 1BR. Feels airy and spacious. Exposed brick in the kitchen gives it a lofty feel. Big points for the bed and bedding: so comfortable. And you simply can‚Äôt beat the location: beautiful tree-lined street. A block from Central Park. Two blocks from the subway. Steps from dozens of restaurants. Across the street from great coffee shops and H&H Bagels. A block from Amsterdam St. and places like Jacob‚Äôs Pickles and my new favorite Thai place: Land. I stayed here for two weeks and it felt like home. I already miss it, and will return.', 'This is a great place! Fully equipped, roomy, clean, comfy, nice large bedroom, nice TV with cable, very close to restaurants, groceries, Central Park, so convienent. Amit is very helpful and always happy to help. This the 3rd Airbnb I have stayed at in this area and the best one. I would love to come back and hope to return soon. Thank you for a great stay! Best, Marilyn', 'Great location. Comfortable apartment. Great response to our needs', 'We had a great stay and had everything we needed. Location is great with numerous restaurants, grocery stores and shops within a very short distance. Close to subway and Central Park. Would definitely come back.', "Gil's apartment is in a great location next to Central Park and close to many restaurants. They were filming Lyle Lyle Crocodile up the street, and it was fun to watching Javier Bardem and Constance Wu at work. A real NYC experience. It was a great week.", 'Nice place, close to many shops and cafes.
East walk to Central Park and Natural History Museum, which was a big plus.
Felt very safe walking around with kids, even later into the night. Quiet,
Yet so close to the action! Gil was kind and accommodating‚Ä¶.', 'The apartment is very well located in a quiet area near Central Park and close to all amenities (restaurants, subway stations, museums, etc.).
The apartment is well-equipped and the host is responsive and accommodating.', 'This is one of the absolute best places you will find on the UWS! It is Ideally located and very close to anything you could possibly want including shopping, Central Park, restaurants etc.', 'Second time I‚Äôve stayed at this place. Great location near the park and subway, a thousand restaurants right outside your door. Toaster was broken, but that‚Äôs the only thing that was wrong, hardly a deal breaker. I‚Äôd stay here again in a minute, and probably will.', 'The apartment is in a great location. The streets lined with historic apartments are very nice and the walk to Central Park is great.
The location of the apartment is so calm that you can relax when you come back from sightseeing.
We stayed for two adults and two children, but were wide enough. There is no elevator, but it was not too hard to raise or lower the stroller. We made meals in earnest for our children, so I felt that the cooking tools were a bit short. But if you travel normally and have breakfast, there will be no problem at all.
The residents of the apartment were all kind and helped me kindly when I had a minor trouble. Amit responded immediately to our questions and helped us. It was really nice to stay at this apartment. Thanks Amit and Gil.', 'Perfect location! We really enjoyed our stay. A short walk to the subway station which was important to us so that we could meet with our daughter who lives 4 subway stops away. Spent one evening having dinner outside with a wine, cheese and fruit spread that we bought from Gristedes, the grocery store less than one block away, on a picnic table in Central Park; again only one block away. Kitchen was well equipped. Temps reached 94 one day during our visit and the 2 window A/C units worked just fine.', 'The apartment was perfect for my wife and myself for a 2 week stay in the upper west side. The description on Airbnb is extremely accurate‚Ä¶.the unit is comfortable and very bright. The host, Gil, has everything you probably will need for your stay. It‚Äôs located in a vibrant part of the city‚Ä¶..a short walk to 2 subway lines, tons of restaurants, Central Park, Trader Joe‚Äôs and our new grandbaby!', 'Great location, with a bounty of good restaurants (with social distance salons outdoors) literally out the door. 7 min walk to 2 subway stations. Perfectly located near Central Park and Museum of Natural History. Place itself is fine for 2 adults. Host was very responsive and able to handle everything by text and phone. Mind the flight of stairs to get to the flat; no elevator. We stayed one week and would be happy to return.', 'Overall we had a good stay. Amit met us at check-in, helped carry our bags up, showed us the space, and gave some great local recommendations. The location was incredibly convenient for exploring the city, right by the park, restaurants, shops etc. The apartment was a good size - my wife and I stayed w our toddler and the apartment had a travel crib that was perfect, and being on the second story meant not too many steps to deal with.
There were a few small issues that surfaced during our stay (refrigerator happened to pick that week to die and the sink picked that week to spring a leak), but we really appreciated how incredibly responsive Amit was at responding to these issues. Problems can happen anytime, what‚Äôs more important is how the owner addresses them and Amit was truly excellent in this regard!! So this wasn‚Äôt a perfect stay for us, but at the same time I wholeheartedly recommend it to others!', 'Amazing space. Clean, beautiful, perfect. Excellent location. Gil and Amit are perfect hosts. Amit is so helpful. Available, knowledgeable, supportive. I cannot recommend this space more highly. You will be amazed. We had an amazing experience', 'Gil‚Äôs apartment was everything we wanted, great location, all amenities were included to make a wonderful vacation. Gil was very responsive and went above and beyond helping us with both our check in and check out of the apartment. We spent a week in NYC and his apartment was perfect for our family of 4. Right next to so many great places to eat and easy access to the subways and Central Park. We would highly recommend staying here!', 'What an amazing place. Great location close to CP and close to just about everything on the UWS. Coffee shop and great restaurants right outside. As well as grocery stores 2min walk. Super quiet cute apartment. Amit was there to meet us at check in and was so helpful with anything we needed.', 'Excellent location by Central Park, subway stations, and restaurants. The apartment was clean, spacious and comfortable. Gil responded quickly and was flexible with check in.', 'This place has all you need for a NYC stay. Great, great location and spacious for New York. Easy access, secure building and responsive and flexible hosts. We had a worry free, comfortable stay and that‚Äôs not always a surety in New York! If you‚Äôre looking to stay on the UWS, Gil‚Äôs place is a fine option. I would stay again.', 'Gil was great! Easy check in and check out and very responsive! Would highly recommend.', 'The apartment was great, and we loved the location by Central Park and the proximity to the subway. This is a great spot for someone wanting quiet privacy and yet a great launching point to see the city.', 'Wonderful home! Centrally located and very clean.', 'Location is perfect if you‚Äôve been to NYC before (or just want to avoid midtown) and want to stay in a more residential, quieter neighbourhood but have all the NYC conveniences at your doorstep. So so so close to Central Park! And lots of great shopping and restaurants. Apartment itself is large and quiet, with AC and a well set out kitchen and living room. Would definitely stay again!', "This is the recommended apartment in NYC.It is also conveniently located because it is close to a subway station.Although there is no elevator, the owner helped with his luggage at the time of check-in.Excellent hospitality for the owner!
We had very nice stay at Gil's apartment. We were traveling with our 2 years old daughter and it was so nice that we could walk to Central Park everyday . The location was so nice where there were so many nice restaurants and cafe and friendly neighbors. The only difficult thing for us was there was no elevator in the apartment but the owner was so helpful that he helped us bring luggages to our room when we checked-in. We would definitely come back!", 'Great location right next to Central Park, easy access to 1 and BC trains. Great restaurants and things to do. Place is on 1st floor, walk up, like most NY apartments. Gil is easy to connect with. We had a great time. Added to our saved locations for future travels to NYC.', 'The location and setup of this apartment was really great. Access was easy and Gil was very helpful. The kitchen and dining space worked well for us, and the living room pull out bed was comfortable', 'What a fabulous apartment in a great location! You can easily get around NYC with close-by subway stops and buses. Central Park is a block away. If you‚Äôve already visited the main first-time visitor ‚Äúmust-see‚Äôs,‚Äù there is plenty to do and see on the Upper East Side. This is a quiet neighborhood, and the bedroom being away from the street is especially quiet, dark as well. With all that and the comfortable bed, you will sleep like a dream! The kitchen is small but well equipped. During the week we stayed, we ate almost all our breakfasts in and cooked several dinners and had everything we needed. There are many great restaurants within a short walk. Our favorite was Bustan‚Äôs on Amsterdam. There is a Trader Joe‚Äôs 7 short blocks away, and other closer grocery stores. There is air-con in the living room and bedroom so we were comfortable. Loved the HOT water as well as the great water pressure in the shower. Can‚Äôt wait for our next visit!', 'My husband and I stayed here for a week and were so happy with the place. It was in a beautiful brownstone and so charming. The bed was comfortable and the shower was great. Had a Kitchen you could actually use and good air-conditioning.
Those are great points but don‚Äôt compare to the excellent location and convenience of this apartment. It is a short walk to the end of the block to Central Park and the street is very quiet.
We were delighted with the numerous restaurants nearby. Good restaurants too! We laughed when we decided to get a latte and google maps pointed to 2 spots within a one minute walk from us. If you want to cook at home there is a supermarket less that 5 minutes away. We loved that.
Last but not least, communication was so good. We never had to wait long for any reply and appreciated the late evening meeting when we arrived at the apartment. Checkin and check-out was very easy. There is a single flight of stairs to get up to the apartment.
Five stars all around. Thanks so much.', 'We loved the place and had a wonderful time. Great location, small but very convenient, terrific hosts - helpful, courteous, flexible and responsive. Highly recommended.', 'The place is conveniently located, with a comfortable mattress.
And Gil was flexible when we asked for an early arrival.', 'We thoroughly enjoyed Gil‚Äôs place! It is quite large and comfortable, with uncluttered pleasant decor and lots of light. The bed gave us a good night‚Äôs sleep every night with plenty of room around it for dressing or working. Since we stayed two weeks, we also appreciated plenty of closet space and space in the bathroom medicine cabinet so we could really move in, as well as an extra closet for coats, back packs, etc. The kitchen is small, but well equipped, and a good grocery store is right around the corner. Of course there are so many nice places to eat within walking distance and the park and metro are 1 block away. We practically lived in the park!', 'Great location, one block from Central Park and a subway station. Great upper west side neighborhood close to tons of restaurants. Cozy clean apartment with everything you could possibly need. Gil couldn‚Äôt stop the rain but I‚Äôm not going to hold it against him. The best way to see New York is to stay in a place like this.', "We stayed at Gil's place over the holidays and had a great stay it was as advertised and actually better than we rxpected. The location is fantastic and incredibly very quiet at night which is unusual in the city
Definitely highly recommended", 'Superb apartment - Gil was a dynamite host! Place was impeccable, had all the creature comforts and plenty of space and storage. Comfortable bed. Fantastic location, quiet street but right near the action. Gil was consistently responsive and flexible. Highly recommend and can‚Äôt wait to stay again!', 'Gil‚Äôs apartment is in a fantastic location. 1 block from Central Park. Close to great restaurants, Joe‚Äôs coffee shop and the subway. Only 1 floor walk up which is great for New York. Amit met us on arrival and was very hospitable and available for questions and help through out our stay. The apartment was clean and well stocked with cutlery and cooking appliances which was helpful for preparing quick meals for our young kids. The only one small negative for those sensitive to light in the early mornings was the blinds in the living room (which we used a second bedroom with the sofa bed) are quite sheer and therefore it gets light very early in the morning. The bedroom is spacious however with good block out blinds. Overall we had a great stay and would recommend this apartment to others. Thank you Gil and Amit', 'Gil is great. He is quick to respond to questions and very accommodating. Would recommend for sure!', 'Gil‚Äôs apartment was perfect for our NYC stay with our grandson. It is spacious and comfortable, with a roomy main bedroom and plenty of room in the living/dining area, as well as a well equipped and supplied kitchen. The living room sofa makes into a large bed for one or two, still leaving room to move around the space. The apartment is on the 2nd floor, with 17 steps up from the entrance, so if mobility is a challenge, this place might not work, but otherwise it has much to recommend it.
We loved the location on the upper West Side, just 1 block East to the subway on Central Park West and 2 blocks West to the subway on Broadway. Between them you can get anywhere in the city you want to go. There are many restaurants within a block or two and a big market just across Columbus St.
The apartment and neighborhood felt very safe, and outside noise was never a problem.', 'Good location. Spacious apartment. Would highly recommend.', 'Just perfect. Everything good I had read before staying in Gil‚Äôs UWS apartment is completely true.
Location, comfort, features, attention to detail, quality... everything is unbeatable.
But on top of that Gil and Amit were the best since day 0.
Accesible, commited, warm and professional.
Thank guys! You made a nice trip intolk', 'Very well located apartment, typical of the upper West side with a bright living room.', 'Nice light filled apartment in a beautiful brownstone building in the upper west side. The host was super nice and helpful with local tips. Place was nice and spacious with nice hardwood floors and pretty good furniture. Only cons were that the bed was a little stiff.', 'Gil was a fantastic host. Great apartment! Great location! AAA+++ We will be back :)', 'This is a great flat in a very good location. It is quiet and comfortable, and has everything guests need, including very good heating and air conditioning which was perfect in the changeable autumn weather. I was met personally when arriving - thank you Amit - and Amit was always available if we had any questions not only about the flat but about new York too. We would certainly book again.', 'You can‚Äôt really understate the value of the location. A block from the park, close to public transit, easy to get a car downtown. There is a big market on Sundays down the road so We ate in some with fresh ingredients we bought and the kitchen is well stocked to cook anything. Comfy bed and the bedroom is bigger than I expected. My 2 kids slept on their air beds in the bedroom next to the bed. It provided a great stay for our family of 4 with 2 small kids.', 'Responsive hosts, great location, and clean facilities - what‚Äôs not to love? 5 stars all around, and I hope to stay again soon!', 'Such a great time at this Upper West Side apartment. Great location, so much right outside the door, easy subway access to get to midtown and downtown. Will definitely stay here on next NYC trip.', 'The apartment is wonderfully located near the subway, restaurants, grocery stores, and more. It is comfortable, clean, and well furnished with kitchen needs, soap, shampoo, cleaning supplies, and more. The apartment is up one flight of stairs. The building was pretty quiet and easy to navigate. Gil waa very responsive and great to deal with. I give this apartment high marks--would definitely stay there again!', 'Of the three Airbnb places that I have rented, this by far was the best. Everything about the unit was fabulous and fit my needs perfectly. Gil was the best at helping solve a TV issue - the provider was down - to Margarita giving me a tour of the unit. Best place ever.', 'Wonderful corner of Upper West side, close to everything you can think of! Surprisingly quiet and very well appointed.', 'This was our third time staying at Gil's apartment on West 85th Avenue in Manhattan and it was as delightful as were our past visits. The reader is encouraged to read our past two reviews concerning the apartment to learn about the amenities of the neighborhood but a block from Central Park and within a short walking distance from the museums, entertainment venues, great restaurants and interesting shopping districts. Our visit to the Big Apple to spend Thanksgiving with our infant grandson and family living but a few blocks away was greatly enhanced by having our own private digs so close at which to rest from babysitting duties in the evenings. In addition to the local attractions, we took long walks throughout the City to see additional sites (the Trade Center Memorial, the Highline elevated garden walk, Little Island Park, etc., that we had missed during previous visits to N.Y., as well as to other burrows of the great City, Harlem, Hell's Kitchen, Greenwich Village, Midtown, etc. All in all, a wonderful time; made particularly enjoyable by having such a comfortable a "Home away from Home" at our disposal. Highest recommendations! We shall look forward to our return in the near future!', 'Great beautiful apartment in a very nice neighborhood.', 'A lovely, roomy, and stylish apartment in a great location. Very helpful and considerate host. You will enjoy staying in this New York apartment.', "Gil's place was a terrific location. His place is very easy to be in; nice wood floors, modern small kitchen,a/c works beautifully.", 'Gil‚Äôs apartment is perfect and I loved my stay there. Amit who welcomed me could not be more charming and helpful. The apartment‚Äôs location is amazing and it is nicely decorated, comfortable and has everything you could possibly need. I will definitely be back!', 'Great location within Upper West Side. Apartment was very clean and comfortable. Perfect for two people.', 'Comfortable, sunny and enjoyable apartment in the heart of the Upper West Side.
We enjoyed our time and the host made us feel very welcome and was extremely accommodating!', 'Great place at upper west . Right at the park. Highly recommend', 'it was an amazing stay! really nice apartment in a very lovely neighborhood. really easy and quick communication. the apartment had everything we needed and more. thanks!', "Gil's place is great! Equipped with more than enough to stay in and cook. But you probably won't want to since fine restaurants are right around the corner. Central Park is a block away, the neighborhood is cozy, the AC units work well and the place was remarkably quiet. We would stay again!", 'Having stayed at a good number of different Airbnb rentals over the past several years visiting our daughter twice yearly on New York‚Äôs Westside, we would judge Gil‚Äôs place as one the best in terms of cleanliness, comfort and convenience. The one floor walk-up is located but a block from Central Park and an easy walk to the Delacorte Theater (Shakespeare in the Park), the American Museum of Natural History, the Metropolitan Museum of Art, Lincoln Center (New York City Ballet), etc., not to mention great local dinning (Vin Sur Vingt ‚Äì French wine and cuisine; Noi Due Caf√© ‚Äì Kosher Italian; Jacob‚Äôs Pickles ‚Äì Southern + beer; Sushi Nonaka ‚Äì Omasake; etc., ec.) and lots of high end shopping. As advertised, the apartment is spacious (for Manhattan), bright and a sanctuary of peace nestled in the bosom of an energized city. Everything is convenient, the kitchen well appointed and perfect for preparation of a home cooked meal. Everything had been thought of to make our stay pleasant and as comfortable as being at home. But the best point was the hospitality of our host, Gil; he patiently talked us through operation of the extensive entertainment system and even sent his manager on a Sunday evening (Rudy, who was both charming and efficient) to fix a blown light switch and otherwise promptly attended to our every need at the mere placement of a telephone call ‚Äì he made our stay so pleasant that we have already reserved the place for our next planned visit to the Big Apple in November. In a word: OUTSTANDING!!', 'Great location - comfortable apartment in a brownstone walk-up, excellent for two persons. The apartment is right on the corner of Columbus Ave, with markets, coffee shop and laundry/dry cleaner nearby. It has a practical kitchen and the living room has abundant light. The building was sufficiently quiet and the queen size bed comfortable (although the apartment floor slightly tilts causing us to roll over to the left side of the bed‚Ä¶). Only attention point was the Soviet-style building heating that was blazing in the bedroom despite outside temperature of 70 degrees. With some engineering effort, we managed to turn it off.', 'Gil‚Äôs place is located in the busy and fun Upper West Side with every amenity possible is within walking distance. I appreciated the buildings clean hallways, and easy walk up to the second floor.', 'Lovely stay at Gil‚Äôs place. Very quiet apartment, few minutes from Central Park. We had a great stay and will be back again. Thank you for hosting us.', 'Terrific Upper West Side location ‚Äî clean, quiet and comfortable. Perfect for a couple.', 'Great location. Great apartment. Great communication. It was perfect for a week in Manhattan for our young family of 4.', "Great Location! Very clean space and Gil was great to work with. He made the check-in process flawless and overall communication was exceptional. We will definitely use Gil's place again on return trips to NYC.", 'Great location and Gil was very helpful and accommodation. Thanks for a great stay!', 'Great location in the UWS! Near to everything and is perfectly located on a quiet street. Gil is quick to respond and helps make your stay enjoyable. Highly recommend and would definitely stay again!', 'This is our second time staying here and it was as perfect this time as last time. Fantastic location near Central Park and subway station and lots of great nearby dining options make this a perfect apartment for a New York vacation. The host is super responsive and helpful. Highly recommend!', 'We had a great time at Gil‚Äôs place. Everything was as exactly as described. Location was close to subway, which made it easy to get around town. At the same time, both the street and the apartment were quiet, which was very relaxing to come back to at the end of the day. The apartment was very clean, beds were comfortable, and the WiFi was strong enough for both work and streaming tv/movies. We really appreciated the air conditioners on the hot and humid days. And we cooked some basic meals in the kitchen easily. Overall, it worked perfectly for our needs. I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôll stay in a NY hotel again, if we have the chance to stay at Gil‚Äôs.', 'Great location and furnishings.', "Gil's place was awesome the water filter in the fridge was a nice touch, shower water pressure was great. All the shampoos, body wash, toilet paper and cleaning products, fully stocked.
POSITION, POSITION,POSITION !! A really cute place with so much to offer in a safe neighborhood. Only a 3 min walk to Central Park & reservoir running track, 5 min walk to subway station on either line. Convenience store 3 min walk and Viand restaurant down steps & 1 door away for brekky, lunch or dinner, where one serve can feed 3, not to mention so many other great restaurant choices from all different cuisines. You don't need taxis here !! just the subway and a good pair of runners. Its walking distance to museums and even across a few blocks to the Hudson river. We walked everywhere except for when we had our suitcases. It was so much better than any hotel space was small but with separate living, bathroom & bedroom (the Bed was so comfortable).
The Modular lounge with the pull out foot rest / additional bed was great too. We were very comfortable here. Although we didn't get to meet Gil, we were greeted by his associate Amit who couldn't have been a better help. He was so engaged and willing to help us at any point of call. We will definitely return if ever in New York again. Thankyou.", "I had the pleasure of staying in Gil's home for two weeks, while I visited my daughter at Columbia University. His location has a convenient subway line to her school, but I often found myself walking the easy 40 minutes each way. The minute you step outside the building you are in a hot-spot of fantastic restaurants and businesses. It is an extremely safe neighborhood filled with strollers, and lots of people walking dogs. Everything you need is right there!
I stayed for two weeks and got to know the neighbor across the hall that has lived there since the 1970's. She was lovely, as well as everyone else in the building. I was able to order something online from Amazon, and it was left at the entrance with all the other packages. I felt like a real local. ;)
My stay was during July, when temperatures reached the 100's for several days. The humidity was staggering. I'm a long time Northern California resident and worried that the window units would not be enough to keep me comfortable. I was wrong. Both units worked great, and cooled off the apartment beautifully.
The house is completely stocked, with generous bedding, cleaning supplies, and enough kitchen necessities to cook most any meal.
I highly recommend this place!", 'Gil was communicative, friendly, and helpful. The location was perfect for a small family. The neighborhood is quiet and clean, as was the apartment building. The apartment had everything we needed for a week-long stay. I worked while my family played and it was convenient for all of us. The subway was easily accessible and Ubers had no issue locating the address.', 'As described and value in Manhattan.', "Absolutely excellent location! Very comfortable. Fully supplied kitchen. Lots of light and nice views out of the windows. Excellent communication and easy check-in. 5 stars in every way! We've stayed in numerous apartments in the UWS on home exchanges, as well as having rented a few airbnb apartments. None were better located or any nicer than Gil's place. We highly recommend it. The next time we plan a trip to New York, Gil's apartment will be our #1 choice.", 'My husband I really enjoyed staying at Gil‚Äôs apartment. The location is great; lots of places to eat and also to shop for food. And easy access to subways and buses. The apartment itself is lovely and very comfortable and quiet. Well appointed kitchen made it easy to fix our own breakfasts before heading out each day. Gil‚Äôs assistant, Amit, is exceptionally kind - he was prompt in answering our questions and always available. We hope to stay here again when we are back in the city.', 'Comfortable apartment. Very convenient to Central Park and very walkable to lots of restaurants. TV with chrome cast was a nice bonus.', 'We enjoyed our stay in Gil‚Äôs place in New York for one month. Nice appartment, lot of stores and restaurants around. Confortable place.', 'This is a great location on the Upper West Side. We loved being two blocks from both the subway and Central Park!! There are also several good restaurants within a block. We got metro cards and used the subway each day so this location is perfect! We felt completely safe the entire time. We also loved having a full refrigerator and kitchen so we could make coffee and have breakfast without eating out all the time. The bed is really comfortable which is important after a long day of walking and sightseeing. We loved being part of a neighborhood during our week in New York. So much better than a hotel.', 'Our family had a great stay! The subway was an easy walk for our young kiddos and there are so many restaurants, shops, coffee, bagels and anything you‚Äôd want from a NYC stay just outside the apartment. Gil is a great host and the apartment has everything you need and more. Highly recommend!', "This apartment is the best place that we've stayed at in all of our visits to New York (and we visit often). Amit greeted us on arrival and went above and beyond the call of duty in making sure that we had everything we needed and made numerous suggestions to make our stay as pleasant as can be. The apartment is wonderful, clean and spacious, and the location is ideal... Thank you Gil and Amit for a wonderful stay in New York.", 'We enjoyed our time at Gil‚Äôs place. Both he and his assistant were extremely responsive. The location was excellent with great access to Central Park, museums, restaurants, and transportation.
We would certainly stay there again.', 'Great location near central park upper west side. Quiet. Good accomodation but
In the winter central heating far too hot can not be tuned down
Obligation to keep the windows opened or to use air conditioning to get a correct temperature.', 'The apartment is centrally located. Owner is easy to communicate. Had a great time staying in his apartment and will definitely stay there again.', 'Great apartment and location! Gil was a very responsive host.', 'Great place! Wonderful part of the UWS close to Natural History Museum, Central Park, Zabars and tons of great restaurants within blocks.
Don‚Äôt stay in a hotel, stay here, really one of the best locations to experience NYC like a local while still having easy access to go see the big attractions if that‚Äôs your thing.
Food recommendation: Tasca on Columbus (less than a block away) has a great small plates/tapas menu, Spanish with a Caribbean flair. Great seafood, delicious and interesting cocktails, and great service.
FYI for anyone with mobility issues - It‚Äôs a walk up but just one flight of stairs to go up.', 'Amazing place. Amazing location. Amazing host. We had an incredible time in NYC. The place was phenomenal and Gil was a perfect host. We cannot wait to visit again!!', "Gil's spacious and sunny apartment is in a great location, steps from restaurants, stores, and Central Park. It is very comfortable, well-appointed, and sparklingly clean. We had a great time there and would definitely recommend to anybody who would like to spend some time in the UWS.", 'Great location, comfortable, clean and well stocked apartment, seventeen stairs after the entry. Could use a dresser and another bedside table, but plenty of space overall. Gil‚Äôs assistant Margarita met us at the apt, let us in, and showed us around the place. The check in was completely seamless, and he was flexible in letting us check out a little later to better coordinate with our flight home. Couldn‚Äôt be better location, a few steps from Columbus Ave and loads of restaurants and stores. We‚Äôd love to come back to Gil‚Äôs place next time we‚Äôre in NYC!', 'This apartment is a great location, on the Upper West Side. It‚Äôs a second story walk-up facing a quiet street. Many restaurants are nearby as is Central Park!', "Great renovated apartment in great location in immaculate condition. It is between Columbus and Central Park West on W 85th, near Central Park and only 20-40 short blocks to museums and theaters.
This second floor walk-up is large by NYC standards with street views from a sunny living, dining and kitchen space. The very quiet and dark bedroom is in back. There's plenty of space to unpack and the kitchen is quite efficient. There are 10-15 restaurants within two blocks and many other services very close by.", 'I‚Äôve stayed at Gil‚Äôs place a number of times and have always had wonderful experiences there. The apartment is lovely and the location is a dream - close to Central Park, the subway and lots of great restaurants. Gil is a great communicator and is very responsive. Highly recommend!']

We recommend !', 'My stay was what I would call an A Plus. Hosts were kind, welcoming and the place was spotlessly clean.', 'The apartment was super clean and in a good location. title: CLASSIC GUEST ROOM - UWS Townhouse
all_reviews:

I would highly recommend staying at Leslie‚Äôs when your in NYC.', 'A wonderful room with light and ensuite bathroom.

supermarket around the corner for breakfast or takeout foods.

title: Quiet Escape | Times Square. Sightseeing
all_reviews: ['Nice room, good vibe in the lobby/cafe, great location!', 'Great location. Blocks from subway lines 1 and 2 for getting to Times Square and Downtown. Across street from CVS for anything you forget.\nThe unit we stayed in was a corner unit and had great light and decent street views.', 'I booked a last minute trip for NYFW and This hotel exceeded my expectations. The staff were really nice and the room was extremely clean. They get bonus points for the bedding, it was so comfortable, I slept like a baby. I definitely had a great experience and will book again.', 'good location good lobby very practical', 'Enjoyed my 5 night stay. Nice room and location. Staff friendly and responsive. Recommended!', 'Wonderful']

title: Large Sunlit Room in Super Charming 1861 Townhouse
all_reviews:
["Charlie and Sam's brownstone is a lovely place to stay, with unique historical character and aesthetic as well as everything I needed on a practical level. The bed was perfectly comfortable -- I slept like a baby. The lighting lovely, artwork authentic, bathroom clean. I never saw or heard guest staying in bedroom right next to mine.
I greatly enjoyed proximity to Williamsburg Bridge. I was able walk across it daily to reach downtown Manhattan where I showed 3 programs of films met with colleagues and celebrated in the evening. At night I took a Lyft to get home in minutes.
Truly this is a gem of an Airbnb for individuals traveling solo.
I'm sure I'll be back!", 'Lovely stay thank you', 'Wonderfull bedroom, the location is excellent, and the place was very comfy. Totally recommend this place!!', 'This house and my room were beautiful, clean and very comfortable. I love the quiet buzz of the neighborhood at the base of the Williamsburg bridge. Butler‚Äôs on the corner and 12 Chairs, a 7 minute walk, were my regular dinner and breakfast restaurants. Sam, the hostess was delightful. Thank you.', 'Great place to stay for solo traveller in Williamsburg. Fantastic hosts with all the small details thought about. Would definitely stay again!', 'I loved my stay at Charlie and Sam‚Äôs beautiful place. When I fly to Brooklyn again, I will definitely book with them again.', 'I really enjoyed staying with Sam and Charlie! They were very responsive and helpful. The room I stayed in was peaceful and clean. Shared bathroom was very clean as well. Location is nice in Williamsburg. Lots to walk around and do! Overall, would definitely recommend!', 'Thank you so much for all your help! So kind and helpful!! I will book again.', 'A nice spacious room and a clean shared bathroom with one other guest. A few minutes walk to Metro for easy access to Manhatten and JFK. Very responsive hosts and easy, flexible entry. I enjoyed my stay and I hope I will stay there again.', "I've never seen such a perfect airbnb like sam's. So cozy and everything was perfectly equipped. Thank you sam! You made my ny trip so amazing.", "Can't say enough good things about this place. Great hosts, great location. Personally I found the design elements to be the best part. Closet with hangers, filtered water on the dresser, towels on the desk. Never had to scramble, everything was right there. Gets nice morning light. Clean. Easy five stars.", 'Charlie and Sams place was amazing - so clean and welcoming i felt right at home in the room. I really appreciated the small personal touches and the tasteful lighting in the bedroom. Bathroom was super clean as well. I felt very safe during my whole stay, they seemed like lovely people, and there was a small manual lock from the inside on the door which made me feel nice given that its being shared with another bnb guest. Thank you charlie and sam!! I would definitely stay again', 'Really perfect spot in a great location! My room was very comfortable, clean and cozy. Sam was super kind and helpful (I didn‚Äôt meet Charlie).', 'A lovely space, very clean, lots of little touches, like available filtered water, that make it worth the price.', 'Easy check-in with the code. The room is very nice, clean and furnished with great care. The neighborhood is great.', "I arrived in the late afternoon, and once inside was greeted with muted lighting and lovely art. My room was beautiful, and was cleverly designed with indirect lighting throughout, which I find soothing and relaxing. The Williamsburg Bridge is at the end of the block, and though I heard it, I wasn't ever bothered by traffic or subway noise. Being a block from Bedford Ave meant lots of cool restos, stores, and cafes close by. Samantha was wonderfully communicative about the house, comings and goings, etc. My only hitch was that she seemed surprised I wanted to make meals in the kitchen, and that left me initially feeling self-conscious about using it. But once we established communication about it, balancing our needs, it worked out well.", 'This spacious and sunny room in Brooklyn is right on the doorstep of buzzing Williamsburg and easy to get into Manhattan too.
A very tasteful interior, beautiful linen and supply of filtered water made my stay a pleasant experience.
A very comfy bed, but beware of the sticking-out metal legs though.
Sharing the bathroom with other guests went smoothly.
The entrance set-up is non invasive and makes you feel independent.
The host is responsive, professional and efficient.', 'Very easy folks to work with- prompt communication. Lovely home that is both clean and spacious.', 'Stayed a few days for Fashion Week. This was not far from the stations and a comfortable place to stay. Super friendly hosts. Highly recommend.', 'Charlie and Sam were great hosts. Available when needed but otherwise in the background. Very accommodating to my leaving my luggage after check out until later in the day as I had a later flight.
I would definitely stay there again.', 'My recommendations!
Nice host, nice large room in an old house with creative atmosphere. Great location in trendy Williamsburg.', 'I really enjoyed my stay with Sam and Charlie! I was in NY for awhile, about 9 days, and was really taking a risk on staying there for so long, but it ended up being perfect. The location is great if you‚Äôre looking to explore Williamsburg and the city. I really enjoyed being able to walk across the Williamsburg bridge into the city since Sam‚Äôs place was only a block or two away from the entrance. Pretty much anywhere you‚Äôd want to go was at most a 30 minute train ride away. Sam and Charlie were both wonderful hosts. They were available when I needed them, but the room and separate entrance also allows you a lot of space to yourself. There is a bar and coffee spot right across the street, lots of great restaurants, shops just a few blocks away, and domino park is right there too if you want to take a quick walk and catch a nice sunset. Highlyyyyy recommend staying here for anyone looking to really integrate yourself into the city!', 'Sam and Charlie let me check in and leave my bags a little early before check in time which was very nice and considerate! Can't recommend enough.", 'I had the pleasure of staying at this charming house away on a quite street, close proximity to Williamsburg Bridge. I appreciated the ample and clean space, making it easy to settle in and feel at home during my stay.', 'Great stay in a great location. The room was very cosy and Samantha has been a great host.', 'I would absolutely book again with Charlie and Sam. Their place is walkable from the Marcy Ave station and quiet and private! I throughly enjoyed my stay. Great hosts and room!', 'I had a wonderful time. The house and room were lovely, with plenty of excellent restaurants and stores within walking distance. There was also a stunning park nearby, and the area felt very safe. I really enjoyed my stay. Charlie and Sam was wonderful üòÅ', 'Had such a perfect stay at Charlie and Sam‚Äôs that I‚Äôm staying there again! Room was really comfortable and cozy. Bathroom was also super clean. As a germaphobe it was much appreciated :) Thank you!!', 'I had a very lovely stay at Charlie and Sam‚Äôs. The room looked and felt very cozy, made me feel like I‚Äôm at home, and it‚Äôs on the morning sun side too!
The bed is very comfortable to get a good night‚Äôs sleep after a long day of exploring the city.
The hosts were very kind to suggest a couple of places to eat and how to get about, which came in handy, and quick to response if I had any questions.
Overall a great experience, close to everything that might come to mind, and really good location to get the local feel of the neighbourhood.
10/10 recommend! x', 'Before arrival already good contact with Sam concerning check-in.
Several good recommendations regarding places to see ( did all of them ).', "Charlie and Sam's place was everything I hoped for. it was my first time in New York, and they were incredibly kind and provided great recommendations. The room itself was just like the pictures and absolutely beautiful. I enjoyed the writer's desk, and the bed was super comfortable. The location is a short distance to Domino Park, which I enjoyed taking a walk through each day. It's a very walkable area, and there is easy public transport into Manhattan as well. While this is a shared space, I always felt I had enough space for my privacy. I would absolutely stay here again and recommend it to anyone staying in the area.", "It was a perfectly ideal place to stay! It was safe and pleasant, and you can enjoy a good cafe 30 seconds across the street in the early morning, and the way back from Bedford Station late at night is beautiful and very safe. I love the shops and cafes near Domino Park and Bedford Avenue. It's good enough to stay in this neighborhood without sightseeing in Manhattan for a day or so. I was so satisfied. There was always clean water to drink, and I was able to use the bathroom without any inconvenience.
* There are steep stairs, so if your luggage is large and heavy, it can be difficult, but it won't be too much of an issue. It's not just fashion that makes you uncomfortable with activities when checking in and out.", "Charlie and Sam were accommodating, wonderful hosts. They always responded quickly, and you can't get better communicators on this platform than them. Your experience with them will be pleasant and exceed your expectations. They go above and beyond, Nate Hughes", "Had a great stay at Charlie & Sam's place. Super easy check-in, amazing location (so close to so many good food stops ) super cute room and building, and great internet!
Highly recommend staying here!", 'It was amazing ü§©! I would definitely stay again. Sam is so sweet and friendly, all the details in the space are super cute ‚Äúlots of crystals‚Äù. The bed is incredibly comfortable ü§ç.
Thank you Sam and Charlie you are the best!', 'Fabulous place. About 8 min walk to the M into Manhattan (if it‚Äôs running) or 15 min walk to the L, and that‚Äôs right up Bedford Ave. Felt right at home!!! Very clean üôè', 'Loved the location in S Williamsburg, lots of wine bars in the area and was about a 10 min walk to the ferry. Check in was super convenient and they allowed me to leave my bags during the day after I checked out. I will probably stay here again as it was perfect for a solo traveler.', 'This is a great place to stay. Beautiful, stylish and spacious and Charlie and Sam are really nice and responsive hosts. I loved the location and felt happy and comfortable here. Also a coded lock on the front door means not having to worry about remembering keys to get in.
Sam made an effort to make sure that I could have a kettle and tea things in my room from day one on request and allowed me a late check out on the last day when I felt unwell which really made a difference to me. Great place to stay.', 'Had a great stay. The room is lovely. Comfortable! Would stay again for sure.', 'Great stay, very comfortable, everything ran very smoothly and the hosts were very responsive and helpful', 'Super clean place, convenient location. Very responsive hosts. Cozy and nice spot for a solo stay!', 'Great stay and great location! Everything was clean and homey. Would definitely book again.', 'Very nice place to stay for a short trip - not with much luggage, though :)', 'A great place to stay all around! A comfortable, spacious room and very clean bathroom. If you need to, you can get some work done in the bedrooms as there are desks and seating, as well as in the back garden to catch some sun rays. The location couldn‚Äôt have been better. The townhouse is in a prime spot for great restaurants, bars, shopping, and views of the Manhattan skyline from Domino Park. I definitely recommend Sam and Charlie‚Äôs place to stay for a great time in South Williamsburg!', 'What a great stay at the beautiful neat house and big sunny room from Charlie and Sam, a hidden gem in nice Williamsburg, and with such nice hosts, Sam helped out with all very quickly and made me feel so at home! It‚Äôs looking totally as the pictures, felt as a good retreat and will definitely book again, thanks a lot!! Carmen', 'The hosts were super helpful and responsive and welcoming! The stay was exactly as described and comfortable. Definitely recommend staying here.']

title: Single artist room 8 mins to WTC
all_reviews:
['Great location, really simple to get in and out of Manhattan on the PATH train.
Great stores, bars and restaurants nearby.', 'Everything is great, the room is lovely and comfortable, good location, and Tom is very nice host.', 'i am Latina and the place was like being at home. much better than being in a hotel alone and empty. i visit new jersey/new york 4 times a year so now I have a favorite place to stay me. i recommend it 10/10 close place to do tourism lgtbiq+ friendlly', "Tom is a great host and I couldn't have asked for a better location, right in the best part of JC.", 'Excellent host, attentive and helpful. Excellent and comfortable location', 'The place is very nice close to all the places I would return without thinking', 'Tom is a friendly host great communication and flexible check in. I would strongly recommend his place', 'perfect ..I recommend this air BNB. cleanliness location. thank you', 'The place has a spectacular location. if you consider the price and that you are eight minutes from World Trade Center you realize that despite being in Jersey As I found a spectacular place to spend your holidays and visit all the attractions of New York. Tom is a very friendly good person, and also flexible with check-in and willing to help you at all times. I felt very good from my arrival to my departure and I will not hesitate to return if I have to go to the big block as it has everything you need. I give you the highest possible score as you deserve it.', 'Tom was super flexible and a wonderful host. I highly recommend staying here!', "This was my first time staying at an Airbnb with a room with shared bathroom and kitchen facilities, so I didn't know what to expect. It was just like staying at a hostel overseas, with so many international guests. Tom was very friendly and communicative. The location is very safe and I never felt worried about walking around at night. I would definitely consider staying here again.", 'Nice quiet place. Steps away to Grove Street Path station which was very convenient for my commute. Tom was very accessible. Would stay here on my next visit.', 'I would definitely stay here again. You can pretty much roll out of bed and be at the path station. Great food options 1-3 minutes away by foot. Happy I choose this spot! Tom was great too!', 'Tom was the kindest host ever. Very open, talkative and easy to get along with.', 'Tom was a great host. The room was nice, and you have everything you need in the shared kitchen and bathroom. The apartment was close to restaurants and the train station to Manhattan. 10mn walk to the exchange place with a great view of NYC', "I highly recommend Tom's place, The location is perfect for visiting New York and the host responds quickly and is attentive", 'Tom is amazing host, And the place was really great to stay in Newjersy', "I spent a few days at Tom's in a mixed apartment with three bedrooms in total. Everything went very well, the accommodation is as advertised, the communication with Tom is perfect. The location is also great: in a few minutes you will be in Manhattan and WTC. I warmly recommend it. A place where the living is good.", 'Tom was a great host!! Communicated seamlessly throughout and helped me get settled. The room was a gem. Will definitely stay again!', 'very good, very responsive, no communication problems, place very close to PATH station, so very convenient', 'Tom is a friendly and great host. The place is clean and warm. You can have a kitchen to heat the breakfast. üëç', 'The whole room was really cool, and it‚Äôs in a really nice neighborhood!', 'Good', 'Really great place to stay, connected to the PATH trains only 3 min walk. Tom helped me carry my bag up the stairs, room had good aircon and was spacious. Would recommend to a solo traveller visiting for a few days !', "Excellent, VERY close to Grove metro station, which facilitates the arrival and departure of the apartment everywhere. My room is spacious enough.
Loved it, 110% recommended. The best place I've ever been.", "Tom was very kind to me, who didn't speak English, and thank you for all your help.And it was close to the station and it was my favorite place!
Thank you!", 'Great place to stay and Tom is a wonderful host. Close to subway and Liberty State Park. Would definitely stay here again.', 'I found Tom‚Äôs place a short time before than my NY trip, and so happy to choose here. It‚Äôs super convenient to go to NY less than 20 mins by Path, the station is like 3 mins walking distance from home. Safe area, where you can easily find restos, markets etc. Tom welcomed me in front of the home and explained things that I‚Äôll need helpfully. Even it‚Äôs in a very central area, the home was super calm and let me to sleep well before my kms of walks next day in the NY city! Room and the bathroom was clean, including all the necessities. Definitely would stay again!', 'Tom is a gracious host who has thought of everything. Very close to PATH station as well as Liberty State Park. Appreciated the common area where we can say hello to others. Will definitely stay here again.', 'Tom is a very generous and accommodating host. He was so generous that he carried my luggage up to the unit when moving in! He also allowed me to check out of the unit 2-3 hours after checkout which adds to the generosity and his accommodating nature. The unit was very clean, spacious and had very good lighting and airflow. The bathroom was very clean, and had a bathtub with shower. The kitchen had utensils, pots/pans, and ample space for cooking and sitting/eating. This unit is essentially right across from the Grove St station, and is located near many restaurants and corner and grocery stores. Overall, Tom is an amazing, accommodating host, and the unit was spacious and had great amenities and is situated in a perfect location. I recommend this host and unit to anyone who wants to do a trip to NYC and/or Jersey City.', 'Thank you. It was a very nice place.', 'Very convenient location to subway and NYC. Safe area with charming cafes and shops. Recommend this cozy and clean listing with a host that was friendly and helpful.', 'Gorgeous space, very comfortable bedrooms.', "Great place !
Location is perfect, 3 mins walk to Grove Street stop on the PATH train line that goes to Manhattan in a few minutes.
Room is exactly as on the pictures, well furnished and nicely decorated. It is part of a 3-bedroom flat on the third floor of a small apartment building, with only one flat on each floor. The two other rooms are double rooms, so you share the place with 4 other people top. As a result the only bathroom may get busy, but that's really the only negative point I can find.
Bed is comfortable, kitchen is great with anything you may need.
Tom lives in the appartment below. He is super friendly and welcoming.
Thank you Tom for offering such a great place !"]

title: Williamsburg: Entire Home near Water
all_reviews:
["In Jodi's apartment, everything was available to feel home! Jodi sent very accurate instructions in advance in advance, and also quickly informed during the week, e.g. about a possible Wi-Fi outage. Loving little touches made the spacious spaces special. The cabinets were all extremely tidy, there were small snacks and coffee supplies ready when we arrived. We were very comfortable right away! The air conditioners in both rooms do what they are supposed to do - they are louder than we know, but you get used to it quickly. Washing machines, dryers in the basement of the house were great, so we could travel with small luggage. The view from the roof - it is not a fully equipped terrace, but it was too hot anyway - was especially beautiful in the evening. For smokers certainly a highlight. The proximity to the ferry is great, you can walk a bit to the subway, the area felt very safe even late at night. Gladly again!!!", "We had a very nice week at Jodie 's The property is close to the ferry or subway . The neighborhood is very quiet and the apartment is pretty and pleasant . Jodie's information to enter the apartment is clear . It has everything you need for a good stay , Jodie has plenty to offer.", "We had a great time at Jodi's flat, the communication with Jodi was super easy, the flat was confortable, quiet, well located, we really loved staying there!", 'Amazing stay! Definitely recommend and will be booking again when I come back!', 'the apartment had space, was comfortable and had all the necessary utensils. The Host responded to all the messages and was very nice. It was always collaborative. Improving I suggest to put one curtains in the room that cover the light, in case someone sleeps in the living room and the air conditioning works well but makes a little noise. Thank you', 'Had a great stay here! Would definitely come back.', "We had a wonderful time in Jodi's cozy apartment. Tasteful decor, everything we needed was at hand. The location was also excellent. Close to the ferry, supermarkets, and the trendy neighborhood of Williamsburg/Brooklyn.
Jodi was the perfect host. Very kind, organized, and clear in communication.
We recommend this place to everyone!", 'Stayed here for a weekend trip and absolutely loved it. The apartment was so quaint and comfortable, and Jodi was so accommodating, communicative, and sweet! Would DEFINITELY recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for a place to stay in Brooklyn :)', 'We had the best time at Jodi‚Äôs place. Jodi herself was amazing; so helpful and flexible. It was in a great location, we have two young kids and felt totally safe and peaceful. Loads of great recommendations and easy to get everywhere. Felt right at home!
Thanks so much, can‚Äôt fault it! üòä', 'Really amazing apartment in a perfect neighbourhood! It was so comfy and cozy and more than enough space for three people. The roof has the best view ever and Jodi was so helpful and kind. Really a gem in Brooklyn, I hope to come again another time. Thanks for everything!', "Thanks very much Jodi for your apartment. It was all easy and spotless. :) we would gladly come back. The Austrian's üòÄ", 'Just a quick visit to Brooklyn. Location easy and fun. Comfortable and had everything we needed.', 'Good location! Just south of Williamsburg bridge and the busy Bedford Ave. Only a 10 min walk to Marcy Av subway, 15 minutes to Bedford Av subway, as a sightseer though NYC Ferry to Dumbo and Wall St only 5 minutes away down on the river. Ferry trip gives great views from the East River of Manhattan and Brooklyn bridges.
Apartment comfy and spacious for 2, has sofabed in living area for more if needed.
Nearby area has great amenities as listed by host Jodi, whose welcome communications were only to ensure all was OK', "Great apartment for a solo traveler with a great rooftop view! Jodi is an amazing host- super responsive and accommodating. You're also in walking distance of the M train which gets you into Manhattan pretty quickly!", 'I have stayed at the Williamsburg Love Home twice now and it‚Äôs still incredible! Once with my mom back in 2021, and now again with a friend in 2023!! Jodi is an incredible host who responds very quickly and she is super flexible! she‚Äôs very kind and attentive as well! A quick walk down the street to the ferry made getting into the city easy! I would recommend this home to anyone and everyone- and I‚Äôll definitely be back! Thanks Jodi!', 'We really enjoyed the stay in Jodis apartment which was so nice and cozy. Jodi was very helpful and recommended all the got spots and restaurants. We loved Brooklyn and the more guiet areas around and it was so easy to get to Manhattan.', 'AMAZING PLACE! From day one, Jodi was very communicative and responsive. The place had great space and was spotless. I love NYC so next time I go back, I will definitely stay at Jodi‚Äôs place.
The area is near by the NYC Ferry which will take you to DUMBO in 10-15 mins max. You can also do a 10-15 mins (normal in NYC, by the way) and hop on the Subway at Marcy Avenue. You can take the J, M, Z train to the city which will take you to the city very easily.
Thank you again Jodi!', "Perfect location if you choose to stay out of the chaos of Manhattan. A 5-minute walk to the ferry boat(very convenient) and the subway. For us who have a small child, it was the winning choice for its proximity to the domino park, to the various amenities and for the tranquility of the neighborhood: it was like being at home.
I'm sorry I didn't meet Jodi in person but she was always very specific, attentive and thoughtful in everything. The apartment has everything and more, we never missed anything.
We promised to come back, so next time Jodi!:)", "everything was great at Jodi's! We had a great time, highly recommend", 'Jodi was very responsive and very welcoming! The area was also very nice and had many walkable places to visit. She had many recommendations to offer and was very helpful with clear instructions. Would definitely recommend a stay here (:', 'Jodi‚Äô apartment is a perfect place to come wind down after activities in Brooklyn and the city! Very chill neighborhood and walkable to everything in Williamsburg and Domino Park! Would recommend to any of my friends! We felt like we were at home!', "We spent a wonderful week in Jody's apartment and felt like home. The apartment exudes real New York charm and you can even see part of the Manhattan skyline from the window. There was really everything you needed and Jody kept asking for us during the stay.
The area is quiet and we felt safe even in the evening. Metro is within walking distance and you are quickly in Manhattan. Basically, I could continue raving endlessly...", 'I can not say enough amazing things about staying here. Jodi was incredible from start to finish. The apartment was adorable and tastefully decorated. You really feel like you are coming home and not just to a generic hotel. I and my father absolutely loved it here and our only regret is not staying longer. Thank you for everything Jodi. You are amazing!!!', 'This was our first trip to Brooklyn and Jodi‚Äôs place made us fall in love with the Williamsburg area! Her apartment is super cute and we loved the vintage decor (especially our son who pointed everything out). The area is very quiet and there was never a sense of not feeling safe. We thoroughly enjoyed everything the area had to offer. Lots to do in walking distance and we especially enjoyed domino park with our kiddos. We used a lot of Jodi‚Äôs recommendations for food and also to grab a drink for mom and dad while grandma stayed with the kids üòÜ. The bed was super comfortable and Jodi went above and beyond and set up a pack and play for our youngest son. We arrived later than expected and were so tired so it was so nice to have that set up already so we didn‚Äôt have to set up ours. The apartment was very comfortable especially with the heat surge outside and we heard no outside noise. Jodi communicated with us the entire time. We will definitely be back! Thank you!!', 'We had a wonderful stay here! It is central to so many things in the area. It was also remarkably quiet! We would definitely stay here again!', "Jodi's place had it all! She had lots of little extras that travelers need. We loved it. Good coffee and somehow she knew I like creamy oat milk in my coffee! Jodi was also very responsive and helpful when we had any questions. This place is a gem!", 'Jodi‚Äôs place was clean and exactly as pictured. The neighborhood was nice and it was a convenient location. She communicated clearly and we had no trouble finding the apartment or getting inside. We would certainly stay again if we were in the area!', "We truly enjoyed our stay at Jodi's place. The apartment was cozy and charming, stocked with everything we needed. Jodi was friendly, responsive, and extremely accommodating. We hope to stay there again the next time we visit our son.", "The apartment was complete and met all the necessities. Jodi was an excellent host, communication was fast and she helped us with everything it took. We'll definitely be back next time.", 'We had a wonderful stay at Jodi‚Äôs place and could not recommend it enough! Jodi was very responsive and had great recommendations! We‚Äôd love to stay here again in the future!', 'Awesome Location, awesome host, awesome place!
One of the best Air B&Bs i have ever stayed in! Super clean, just like the description, so walkable. really a hidden gem.', 'Great place to stay! Will look for this place again in the future.', 'Great stay!', "We had a wonderful time at Jodi's place. Excellent base for New York. By ferry to Manhattan is a bonus.", 'Awesome spot I feel like this was a bargain for the price amazing place to stay!', 'It feels so homely that you almost have to get out and explore Brooklyn!', 'Our stay was so great!
