title: Brand new King size 1 bedroom 15 min to Manhattan
all_reviews:
['Our stay at this place was very good, easy to communicate, very close to the subway entrance, very comfortable and well designed', "Everything was considered for the guest's comfortable stay", "We were staying for the discovery of Manathan with 2 children aged 10 and 13, I recommend it because with the metro, it's easy to do everything. Plus, the place is super nice.", 'The place was spotless and very well equipped - even had an adapter for our chargers which avoided us having to buy one. The apartment is the right size even for a week‚Äôs stay and right in front is a lovely grocery shop. The metro is just a few minutes walk away. Eugene and his wife are both helpful and friendly, so would definitely recommend!', "Welcoming host - easy communication. Apartment located in a run down apartment complex, but in nice walking distance (10min) to the subway, from where you reach Manhattan Midtown in about 15 minutes. Almost 1h ift to reach Syd Manhattan (Statue of Liberty, Wall Street, 9/11 Memorial, Hudson Yards). The apartment itself is nicely renovated and fully equipped with everything we could imagine (but not washing machine and dishwasher). Nice. Extremely noisy air conditioning which meant using ear plugs to get some night sleep. Location overall ok, but you didn't just leave home during the day for a bath or change of clothes - which would otherwise have been nice in the heat.", "Eugene's place is as described. The apartment is clean and has many amenities allowing you to cook during your stay.
The Astoria neighborhood is quite popular, so don't expect to be in the middle of the Manhattan buildings. On the other hand, it's very peaceful, and we appreciated the quietness of the apartment. Plus, it's also interesting to see a more realistic neighborhood in the life of New Yorkers, far from tourist areas.
Right in front of the building, you have a supermarket that offers excellent products and whose prices are rather correct compared to other brands. There is also the Paris Baguette bakery nearby, which offers excellent baked goods, even if they are very expensive compared to France.
The metro is a 5 min walk, and in 20 min you will be in central park. If you want to go to Brooklyn, or south of Manhattan, it will take 45/50 min instead.", 'Great place to visit New York, very convenient location to the metro (ditmars blvd ) , quiet neighborhood and supermarket + pharmacy within walking distance. Very quiet and spacious apartment, highly recommended!', 'The place was conveniently located just 5 mins away from the last stop in the N and W. Lots of food and groceries around the area. The apartment was new and very clean. I loved the kitchen and the coffee (grounds and machine) provided was a great start/end to the day. I enjoyed the place.', 'An amazing stay! I definitely recommend and I can see myself coming back üíØ', 'quite nice for the price!', 'I had a wonderful five night stay in this clean, well equipped, one bedroom apartment. It was nicely furnished, large for NYC, and extremely quiet. The bed was comfortable and king size. A short walk to the train made visiting Manhattan easy and quick. There was a very good supermarket just an across the street. After a hectic day in Manhattan it was refreshing to return to the apartment. The owners quickly responded to questions and concerns.', 'This was a great find and a wonderful place to stay. I spent 4 nights here with my wife and almost 2-year old son and we really loved it. Eugene and his wife Billie were responsive, welcoming, and considerate hosts. The apartment is very clean, well-stocked, and comfortable (I already miss the bed and pillows). The building is nice and peaceful. I hope I am able to stay here again in the future when visiting my old neighborhood of Astoria.', 'The apartment is very well kept, comfortable and Eugene and his wife have done a great job at supplying it with everything anyone would need and more.
They were very friendly from the moment we made the reservation and very accommodating to our needs.
The access to train/subway is very close to the apartment and there are plenty of places to buy food and groceries around.
Thanks Eugene for having us! We truly enjoyed it!', 'Place was great surrounded by a great neighborhood. Super close to the subway and across the street from a grocery store. I feel like we had a great stay for the week we were in NY. The sofa bed was a bit thin cushion wise but we slept well otherwise with 4 people.', 'Overall, this was a great stay. We had everything we needed and host was helpful and responsive.
Located right next to many great restaurants and some shopping. You must try Paris Baguette Bakery during your stay, it‚Äôs amazing! Very short walk to the train that takes you straight into NYC. The kitchen has everything you might need to cook a meal or make a cup of coffee, which was great.
Only negative was there was no padlock on the door, so anyone who had a key could come in and it didn‚Äôt feel secure.
Small things to note if you are a light sleeper- the radiators are so loud we didn‚Äôt get much sleep. Anytime a neighbor moved above us, we could hear every step. However, this is something that is probably common in many places in NY.', 'Excellent, I recommend it both for the accommodation and for the proximity to shops and the metro.', 'Eugene and his wife were very welcoming and responsive from the time we booked our stay through our stay. The apartment was very comfortable and had plenty of space for our family of 4. The Astoria neighborhood felt safe and it was easy to walk to the subway. Thank you!', "Really pleased with our decision to stay at Eugene's place. It's conveniently located and gives you an authentic New York experience. There were some issues with the plumbing, that Eugene had absolutely no control over. Regardless, he was very responsive and accommodating. Bathroom and kitchen are packed with extras, in case you forget anything. If we head back to Astoria, we'll definitely check in with Eugene again! Thank you for everything!", "very nice and comfortable room. Easy access to Manhattan no stress! host is very nice and friendly. very fast responses. I would like to come back and stay at Eugen's apartment. Thank you so much!", 'This was one of the best stays I‚Äôve had with Airbnb. Eugene‚Äôs wife was so sweet and welcomed us personally to the space and explained everything we needed to know which made us feel right at home. The apartment was spotless, nicely spaced out, and beautiful natural sunlight. Its located in a quiet apartment building yet is close to a subway line. I highly recommend!', 'The apartment is beautiful, large, very well equipped and clean. In the kitchen as well as bathroom there is everything for your daily needs. We would love to come back!', 'A great place to stay for a great New York vacation!
Eugene and his wife offer a great apartment with good amenities and plenty of space. The apartment is located in a good quiet & safe area of Queens - the nearest subway station as well as many shops and restaurants are within easy walking distance.
We were there as a family and highly recommend the place.', 'I want to thank Eugene for his excellent hospitality! His Place was just what we were looking for to spend a few days in the city. It was a great stay!', 'The place was for my in-laws to stay for two weeks. Everything was clean and was well taken care of, there were so many things from cups to pots that made everybody comfortable and feel at home. The sheets were clean and plenty, and really there was not a thing that went against our expectations. The host couple are lovely, accommodating, and responsive. I really appreciate the fast responses and also their openness to communicate. Will definitely recommend to anyone who would like to stay at a cozy place in Astoria!', 'We had a great stay in Queens. Both Eugene and his wife were super accommodating and pleasant.
The location is great and has great transport links.
The apartment is quite small for 4 people, but since you are only on the road in New York anyway, that was no problem either.', 'Family and I stayed 4 nights to attend the US Open. Location was excellent. Extremely close to restaurants and subway. Felt safe when walking even at night. Apartment building was a little aged, but had a lot of charm. The apartment itself was extremely clean, updated and accomodating. Eugene and Billie are great host, very friendly and responsive.', 'The apartment was perfect! Very close to the subway, quiet, super clean and it had everything we needed. Bilyana (Eugene‚Äôs wife) was very friendly and helpful, she was there when we arrived and explained everything about the neighborhood. She gave us her number so we could text her if we needed something and she was always super reactive. The neighborhood is charming and you can reach Manhattan in about 20 minutes. We will definitely book again if we come back.
+ 1 bonus star for the bed sheets that were the softest I ever slept in!
Thank you Bilyana ‚ù§Ô∏è', 'We had a great stay! The apartment is very nice and you have everything you need. The neighbourhood was quiet, but still good connected with the N and W train. Eugene and his wife were so nice and communication was very good! I would definitely come back :)', "An honest review for potential future guests.
I stayed here for 7 nights with my S/O while recovering from surgery. I needed a place with a kitchen close to the OR during recovery.
Eugene was very communicative and the woman who came in to clean and give us the keys was kind.
Our first night we discovered the unit had a cockroach infestation. We found 20+ roaches (mostly alive) in the kitchen, bathroom & living room. I appreciate how quick the Host got an exterminator in, though we had a full day of our stay where we weren't allowed to use the unit because of noxious fumigation (we were refunded for that day). I couldn't leave the unit due to my condition so we had to be relegated to the bedroom while they fumigated. Saw roaches after that but I understand it takes time for fumigation to take effect.
Also, the address on the listing is incorrect. Day 1 of our stay, we were messaged by the Host with an address about 15 min away from what's listed. I thought it was worth noting.", 'Fantastic place! My daughter and I spent 5 nights at Eugene‚Äôs place and it was perfect. His wife met us so we could drop off our luggage before hitting the city which was so helpful. The bed is VERY comfortable and the layout seems big for a NYC apartment. Plenty of amenities in the kitchen (including a Nespresso). ACs cooled the place down quickly.
The location is perfect. 2 blocks to the train and a direct line into Manhattan. Lots of good restaurants around and a CVS right on the corner if you forgot something.
Highly recommend!', 'This is a repeat stay for me-lovely apartment, very convenient location, gracious and accommodating hosts. Highly recommend!', 'Great location, beautiful apartment, kind and communicative host! Would definitely stay again!', 'We had a wonder stay at this place. Eugene was very responsive to all our questions and needs. The place is very clean and has everything you need. The location is awesome as it is a quick walk to multiple restaurants, shops and the subway. Will definitely sty here again when going to NYC.', 'The apartment was extremely well equipped & in a very quiet place. very comfortable, close to subway & plenty of grocery shops.
we will definitely stay there again next time we visit NY', 'My family loved to stay with Eugene. Very comfortable and clean. Everything is at walking distance, transportation, good restaurants, shopping. For sure they will come back! Thank you Eugene!', 'Eugene was very responsive host. He understood our late check in and out. His wife was very kind and welcomed us very well. The place was clean and had all amenities. The building itself was old, but this is New York and inside the unit looked good.']

title: East Village Private Studio for One Guest
all_reviews:
['The place is super nice and clean. The location is also perfect. Thank you so much!', 'Exactly as described. Hard to find a cozier place in NYC for the price!', "The Studio was the perfect launchpad to explore Lower Manhattan. You are in the heart of East Village with incredible restaurants and bars right at your fingertips. Washington Square and Union Square are a 15 minute walk. You are less than 10 minute walk to the subway that will take you anywhere you want around the city. You are less than 25 minutes to Penn Station.
The space is compact and cozy; for a single person who is just looking for a convenient, homey place to lay their head at night, the value is incredible.
Shala and Gui make efficient use of every square inch and added lots of small, thoughtful touches that show they care about their guets. The communication and check-in was also great. The neighbors were also friendly.
On small thing for any future guests: it gets a little loud on weekend nights. So if you are a light sleeper, you might want to bring ear plugs. But this is a small trade-off for the Studio's incredible location in the heart of greatest city in the world.", "S & G were so kind and welcoming, they answered immediately to the few questions I had and were even kind enough to get me a baked good from the local bakery during my stay!! Would definitely stay here again next time I'm in NYC!", 'The studio was a perfect place to stay in NYC. Clean, confortable, small but functional. Lots of restaurants and bars in the neighborhood and easy access to subway. Had opportunity to meet Guillermo and some residents of the building, and they all were very friendly. Highly recommend S & G place if you want a real and enjoyable NYC experience.', 'Perfect stay for me. Clean, comfy and close to everything. The hosts were very lovely, helpful and quick to respond. Definitely recommend.', 'The location was perfect, close to everything, and the space was clean and cozy. The host was responsive and made sure everything went smoothly.', 'The place works well, definitely for 1 pax so don‚Äôt try and be clever! Location great, easy access to subway etc. Works well for me. A good, solid 4 flights of stairs( I am not in showroom condition) but do keep in mind!!', 'This was the perfect little spot for a few nights‚Äô stay in Manhattan.
The hosts had thought of everything - tea, coffee, snacks, towels, robe, umbrella, TV‚Ä¶
Shower is powerful and there‚Äôs a fan which quickly gets rid of the steam.
The place is compact but absolutely perfect.
There are 4 flights of stairs so it was a bit of a hike to get to the top with my suitcase but it was worth it.
If they‚Äôll have me, I‚Äôll be back!', 'Everything about this place is wonderful. Shala & Guillermo are the perfect hosts and the building the studio is in has a really nice community feel. Everything I needed had been thought about already - S&G have really carefully considered the user experience! The location is incomparable, the buzz of the East Village is so exciting and I felt safe as a solo female traveller. The studio is the perfect size for one and I loved the amount of light it got, the aircon and ceiling fan and all the helpful appliances provided. S&G also provided some snacks which were greatly appreciated! I loved everything about my stay and would book again in a heartbeat. Thank you so much for the perfect stay in NYC. I‚Äôll remember it forever!', 'A wonderful spot. I loved it! Great find. Thank you!', 'S&G‚Äôs place was perfect for my stay in New York. The studio was clean and tidy and had well thought out amenities and products available. The location was great, easy walk to the subway and lots of cool places nearby. There is a little bit of general street noise through the night on the weekends - but nothing to worry about. Would highly recommend for any lone travellers to NYC!', 'Such a wonderful place, not to mention the residents of the building are so kind and welcoming. It was the perfect little spot to stay while traveling solo.
100% will stay here again.', 'Loved staying in the studio. Very clean and tidy and well presented. The shower was superb and I slept so well in the very comfortable bed.
I know the area well and it‚Äôs always a joy to return. A short hop to sit in the community gardens or Tompkins Square Park. S&G were very helpful and friendly. Thank you to you both!', 'Fantastic time and glad I picked this listing. The studio was spotless and in a perfect location‚Äî in fact, I was surprised how quiet the building and that area of the street was during my visit! Very peaceful sleeping! üôÇ I now know why this listing is very booked up‚Äî excellence in all categories including very helpful and kind hosts! Very happy I chose to spend my time there. Highly recommended!', 'A place of beauty and filled with love : a small apartment which offers all the essentials and more in a lively and inspiring neighborhood. A wonderful place to which I will gladly return (if given the possibility).', 'S & G‚Äôs studio is perfect for anyone traveling alone. It is in a great location with lots of restaurants and shops and the apartment had everything I could need - definitely recommend!', 'This was a little oasis in the East Village. I was very comfortable and enjoyed the tree view outside my window. S & G gave clear instructions and the studio was set up perfectly for one person. It is close to the action but on a quiet stretch of street. I would love to stay there again.', 'Shala & Gui were awesome hosts, I can‚Äôt say enough good things. The studio was clean and everything was as described in the listing and shown in the photos. Very clear instructions made it easy to check in. The studio location is great, so many good restaurants in the neighborhood and it was an easy walk to everything from the studio. Shala & Gui were both friendly and welcoming. I hope I get a chance to come back again soon!', 'Very happy with my stay at the studio, I highly recommend!', 'Great place and location! well put together studio. would definitely stay again and recommend!', 'The house is in a nice location. It‚Äôs convenient to travel in Manhattan area with around 7min of walk to the metro station.
I didn‚Äôt spend a lot of time in the room in daytime but at nights this neighborhood is just as safe and quiet. The room is delicate and cozy. S&G also prepared small snacks and hot coffee when I arrive. Sharing a window view when I saw it snowing.', 'Everything went extremely smooth. Checking-in and checking-out instructions are pretty clear. Location is perfect: it‚Äôs in the middle of Manhattan, so all the attractions are within a walkable distance (of course, if one likes to walk); otherwise, there are several subway stations within 10 min walk that would bring one anywhere. I met S&G only once and by chance (seemed nice and friendly people) and didn‚Äôt communicate much with them throughout my stay cause there was no need. The room was super clean, and actually a bit bigger than I expected. Perfect for a single traveler. All amenities matched descriptions. The room is facing the street, so of course there was some noise (mostly from traffic and some temporal road construction work early in the morning) but nothing unexpected. The area itself is lively. There is plenty of Asian food restaurants further along the street and nice coffee shops.', 'My experience with S&G was excellent. The studio is impeccably clean and equipped with everything needed for a comfortable stay. The hosts were very friendly and were always ready to help with whatever was needed. This studio was great for that purpose. It has the basic commodities, the studio and the building are clean and well maintained, everything went smoothly. The area has a lot of things to do/eat, so it can be noisy, but that was not a problem for me. Different subway and buses at less than 10 min walking meant I could get to the main landmarks of Manhattan in max 30 min. Overall great experience.', 'Very clean and cozy studio', 'They have created a clean, private and calm space to come back to after a busy day out and about!', "I stayed here for a bout a week before my new apartment in NY was ready to move in. The place is spotless clean and has everything you need (and more.) It's a tiny place and could get noisy at night but can't complain considering the location.

Will recommend the place to anyone who is looking for a private place (without sharing the space) in a good location for a short term.", 'Absolutely top notch! Gorgeous setup, everything you could need, perfect location to explore the city! Great nightlife and restaurants right outside! The bed was very comfy and the studio is so well designed that there was plenty of storage. S & G left lots of treats in the studio too, which was both lovely & helpful! They were good communicators via the app and happy to offer hints & tips for my stay. It is a lively part of town on certain nights but that didn‚Äôt bother me. I‚Äôd happily stay again. Great for the solo traveller. Highly recommended!', 'S + G‚Äôs place was great, perfect location, had everything I needed for a short stay! G gave me great recommendations for breaky too!

I would definitely stay again on a return visit to New York and would recommend you stay here as well.', 'I was allowed to spend 2 weeks in this beautiful studio. I'm Studio I had everything you need. Starting with a coffee machine, to a kettle with a choice of teas, hair dryer, towels, small fridge, umbrella and bathrobe. The studio is very thoughtfully decorated, under the bed are 2 mobile storage boxes. The bedroom is facing the street, so - also due to the fact that the air conditioning is in the window and thus the window is technically "open" all the time - you can hear the sounds of the city very clearly, Ohropax are present in the studio and I also needed what is absolutely no disadvantage for me for this studio. I was allowed to get to know S&G - as well as others from the house - very dear people, they hung cookies on the door for me one day. I will definitely book this studio again. Thanks very much S&G (and Ramona) ‚ù§Ô∏è', "S & G's place was a perfect place to stay in NYC! The location in the East Village was close to so many great things. It is beautiful, nothing is missing and it is super clean. I highly recommend it and hope to stay there again.', 'Great studio, great location.', 'Amazing and cozy studio in the middle of East Village! Shala and Guillermo are the best! If you‚Äôve never been to NYC before you can count on them to give you the best recommendations!', 'place was small, cozy, and had everything you‚Äôd need immediately. hosts were kind, easy going, and attentive. area was very quiet and accessible. enjoyed my stay, and you will too.', "The place is amazing and it's really clean. You have everything you need", 'Perfect stay. The accommodation is very well located and very clean.', "My stay at the studio was genuinely enjoyable. The private studio felt much bigger because the host has thought through everything a traveler might need. I also appreciate yoghurt, milk, snacks. Small touches & attention to detail incredible.
Totally worth walking up the stairs when you are rewarded with such a cool studio on the top of the building. Even though initially I was worry about taking my two luggages up, it didn‚Äôt end up being an issue at all. (I had 2 luggages & reasonably fit)
Far exceeded my expectation, thank you S&G being a wonderful host.', "Such a great place to stay in NYC. Super clean studio with every detail spot on for a traveler's needs.

Enjoyed my stay!', "Don't hesitate - book it now! 11/10 place to stay.

Also located in a very convenient spot in the East Village, within 10 mins walk to the Q/R/N, 4/5/6, L (and probably a few others I forgot) but very walkable if you'd prefer to skip the subway and just get around on foot.", 'Loved my stay! Lovely comfy Bed

Lovely window out to the street
Close to shops, restaurants and pretty much everything else was within walking distance.
Super location

Thank you guys and hope to stay with you again some day üôèüèΩ', 'I booked this very last minute but I‚Äôm glad it worked out. This is one of best airbnbs I‚Äôve stayed at in NYC and would def stay again / highly recommend to any of my friends.', 'Lovely place, fun location and friendly neighbors!', 'S & G we‚Äôre great hosts. title: 138 Bowery-Studio Suite w. Dining Area
all_reviews: ['great host, incredible place, clean, easy to get, 100% recommended', 'Loved staying at 138 Bowery. Great location, the room layout was nice and appreciate the cleanliness. Highly recommend for someone looking to stay more than a week. I‚Äôd stay here again.', "Clean, comfortable, fairly quiet at night (quiet by Manhattan standards), plenty of restaurants around, easy to find, and easy to get in. The only thing to keep in mind is that it's basically a self check-in hotel, with many rooms/apartments, so they post generic photos, and not specific photos of the specific room in the listing. Not a problem, since you can ask the host for a detailed description of exactly what your room will or will not have. title: Comfy, sunny, private, full-floor NYC guest suite
all_reviews:
['We had a good stay. Very near the subway station and restaurants and stores. Peaceful and nice place. Very clean too. Everything was provided. Scot was there by the time we checked in and he helped us with our luggage. All in all we enjoyed our stay. Highly recommended.', 'Jennifer and Scott‚Äôs home is a gem! It was our first time staying in this part of the City and it was convenient to getting into Manhattan and other parts of Queens by train. It was a great city walk to Astoria Park and to the Museum of the Moving Image. Many good food spots nearby as well. Scott met us at check-in and kindly offered to carry our bags up the narrow flights of stairs to the flat. The bed and sofa were comfy and the apartment was a perfect resting spot after long days of adventuring. Thank you! We hope to stay again!', 'Amazing place, Me, my wife and my two little boys, we had a great time there. Location was great. Host was great- responsive. Apartment got all the amenities. We have enjoyed our stay in there. We will definitely back. Highly recommended. Thanks a lot Jennifer and Scott.', 'Scott and Jennifer were such great hosts. They left the apartment perfectly stocked and organized. They were very quick and responsive to any questions I had and it really is as advertised, very quiet in the neighborhood - a great getaway from city noise. It‚Äôs also only an 8 min walk to the subway and very easy to travel into Manhattan. I would definitely come back for a stay, even to explore the Astoria neighborhood more. Their food suggestions were so helpful!', 'This was a fabulous stay. We will be back again!', 'Had a great stay and everything was as described. Would definitely stay again.', 'We felt right at home! You can tell that they love the city down to the art on the wall, the books on the shelf and all of the suggestions in the description. The bed was so comfortable and Scott was responsive and helpful each time we reached out. Great location and quiet. Love it here ans hope to return in the future!', 'My friend and I stayed here for my birthday weekend and we absolutely plan to stay here again. The host was friendly, responsive, and was very kind by helping us bring our luggage upstairs. The space itself was spacious while keeping a cozy vibe! Clean linens, rooms, and a kitchen and dining table to have some late night eats at ‚Äî this place was perfect for us. The host also had a helpful guide for directions, places to go, and overall was incredibly hospitable. We had such a wonderful time and I would highly recommend this stay to anyone looking for a place to stay!', "This was the most perfect stay in Astoria. Jennifer and Scott were/are truly fantastic hosts, and the design of the space is so charming and well done. It is exactly as it is in the pictures, but with several little 'extras' that make it even more hospitable, i.e. awesome little travel mugs to carry on city adventures, several coffee making options, a great shower head, reliable wifi and appliances, very well stocked kitchen -- including a flower vase, which we actually needed/used!! -- and more. They were always super quick to respond, not to mention the incredible smells that floated up the stairwell on most days. Speaking of stairs, however, please know they are quite narrow and steep. We didn't mind at all, but for anyone who has issues with stairs, this may be important to note. What else can I say? Would definitely go back and will be encouraging all my friends headed to NYC (who wouldn't mind the quick hop over the bridge to/being in Queens) to stay too!! So grateful.", 'Jennifer and Scott were amazing hosts! Very accommodating. The apartment was perfect for our weekend in queens.
We will definitely use them again.', 'Great Airbnb in a great location. The apartment is comfortable, clean, and has everything you could need. The apartment was surprisingly quiet (for NYC) and the fast wifi was a bonus -- I was able to stream and get work done without any interruptions. The hosts were very responsive and helpful. Would definitely reccomend this Airbnb to anyone looking for something in the area.', 'What a great experience! The apartment is just like the pictures. We stayed with two adults and two teens and we had plenty of room.
Location was convenient. Close to the subway and the busses. We also really enjoyed taking the ferry to Roosevelt Island and Wallstreet. Great views of the city from the ferry.
Communication was always quick and they were happy to answer any questions.
Great experience and highly recommend this cute apartment.', 'Great homey place to stay for a NY trip different from a sterile monotonous hotel.
Easy quick trip from LaGuardia air port. A lot of flexibility to do things in. Will come again.', 'We had a great time at the apartment. Also suitable with those who travel with children- we received additional baby equipment from Scott, which is much appreciated :)
For joggers, Astoria park is some minutes only, sightseeing running is also a good fun.', 'We could not have asked for a better place to stay. It was right atound the corner from a grocer, laundry, subway, places to eat, pharmacy, anything younwould possibly need. It is super convenient and one subway train will get you to downtown Manhattan and even right to the Coney Island beach and Aquarium.
It was small but it was really cozy and well set up for our family of 5 (one being an infant) and Scott was unbelievably responsive. We needed a high chair, and they were able to get one set up for us extremely quickly! They even offered for any activities for the kids to do during rainy days!
Only thing to mention, this is not for someone who cannot do stairs. It is at the top of a flight of stairs but if you can do stairs, it is absolutely a perfect place to stay. You really feel welcome and like youre living a local life. Thank you so muc Scott and Jennifer!!', 'A wonderful place to stay! Hosts were there to greet us and they have a beautiful clean space. We had fun in the city - with Broadway shows and museums - all while staying in Astoria. Highly recommend and hope to return!', 'The apartment was great and as described! The info they left for us was super helpful; we especially appreciated the tip about taking the ferry over to Manhattan.', 'Location is fabulous. The kitchen had everything I needed. I felt at home. Good place to spend some time in Astoria.', "We had a great stay in this lovely apartment. It's well equipped, nice layout and style.

title: Spacious Open Concept w/ Private Bath & Entry
all_reviews:
